Gushimisha_1.songBody:
1. Ur' Uwer' Uwera ,Mwami Mana yacu,
Kare mu gitondo tukuririmbire :
Ur' umunyambarag' ur' umunyebambe;
Ntur' Ubutat’ ur’Iman’ imwe

2. Ur’ Uwer’ Uwera; dor' abera bose,
baguhimbazanya n'abamalayika,
Tukuramye, Mwami, wahozeho kera,
Kand' uriho, kand' uzahoraho.

3 . Ur' Uwer' Uwera, kand' ubwiza bwawe
Burut' uko bwarebwa n'abacumuye.
Ni wowe wenyine wer' urusha bose
Ubuntu no gutungana kose.

4 . Ur' Uwer' Uwera, Mwami Mana yacu,
Ibyaremwe byose biragusingiza :
Ur' umunyambarag' ur' umunyebambe:
lngoma yawe ntizahanguka.

Gushimisha_10.songBody:
1 . Nshim’umwami wo mw’ijuru,
Ntang’ibyo mmushimisha.
Nari mboshyw’Arambohora;
Nari ndway’Arankiza.
Tumushimire tumushime! 
Ni we Mwam’uhoraho.

2 .  Basogokuruza kera
Bari mu mubabaro
Abagirir’imbabazi:
Tumuhimbariz’ibyo
Na none tumwizigire 
Kukw ar’uko yahoze.

3 .  Ni Data wa twese mwiza.
Az’intege nke zacu;
Nukw’Aradukuyakuya,
Ngw’Aturinde satani.
Duhimbaze imbabazi ze
Zitarangir’iteka.

4 .  Yewe bamarayika beza
Nimushim’Uwiteka
Namwe bera bo mw’ijuru
Bavuye mwisi yose
Mwese mushimane natwe (X3)
Nyirigir’Uhoraho.

Gushimisha_100.songBody:
1 . Nzaririmb' igitangaza,
     Yes' Umwami yakoze;
     Ko yavuy' i We mw ijuru
     Ngw amfir’ i Gologota.

Ref:
Nzaririmb' igitangaza 
Yes' Umwami yakoze: 
Ndi kumwe n'abo mw ijuru 
Imbere ya ya ntebe.

2 . Nari nzimiye nk' intama 
     Maze Yes' arambona; 
    Nukw’ anshyira ku bitugu,
    Ansubiza mu nzira.

3 . Nar' impumyi, mfit' ubwoba 
     Nshits' intege, mbabaye, 
     Njanjaguritse, nihebye,
     Maze Yes' arankiza.

4 . Ndacyabon' ibimbabaza; 
     Haracyar' ibindushya; 
     Nyamar' ubwo turi kumwe, 
     Nzi yuko nta cyo nzaba.

5 . Azanyuza no mu rupfu,
    Nambuke na rwa Ruzi; 
    Maze, ni mfata hakurya, 
    Nzasangay' abo nkunda.

Gushimisha_101.songBody:
1 . Nabony' uburuhukiro 
     Muri Kristo Yesu. 
     Ni We musa nihishemo; 
     Nta handi nizeye.

Ref:
Nta wundi wese nizera:
Nta kindi nireguza, 
Keretse YESU wabambwe, 
Ari jyew' azize.

2 . Mpagijwe n'agakiza ke,
     Nta bwoba ngifite; 
     Yansanze, nd’ umunyabyaha; 
     Maz' aranyakira.

3 . Kand' iyo ndway' aramvura, 
     Nkaba muzima pe; 
     Njya mpeshwa n'amaraso ye
     Ubugingo bushya.

4 . Mpumurijwe n'ijambo rye,
     N’ ijambo ry'Imana;  
     Nkijijwe kubw’ izina rye,
     Singishidikanya.

Gushimisha_102.songBody:
1 . Iby' isi Yesu yabinkuyemo : 
     Kubw' amaraso, ntibinkang' ubu. 
     Nunamy' imbere y'Umusaraba; 
     Yesu yanyejeje de mu maraso ye.

Ref:
Jye nkunda... jye nkunda...
Umukiza wanjye 
Wanyiguriy' i Gologota ku Giti.

2 . Nari nazimiriye mu byaha, 
     Nd' imbata y'ishyari n'inzangano, 
     Umunsi w'amateka nywutinya, 
     Ankirish' amaraso ku Musaraba.

3 . Jye nar' imbat' amp' umudendezo; 
     Jye nar' impumyi, arampumura; 
     Jye nar’intumbi, maz' aranzura ! 
     Nimwumv' ayo mahoro Yesu yampaye!

Gushimisha_103.songBody:
1 . Kera nari mw isayo 
     Y'ibyaha ngira ngo 
     Nd' uw'Imana, ndi mwiza; 
     Nyuma, nsanga nibeshya.


Ref:
Imana yanjye 
Yarandokoye ! 
Ubu, ni Yo nsingiza 
Kuko yankijije.

2 . Nuko Yes' ansangamo,
     Mbyigaraguramo, 
     Ati : Mwan' unyemere, 
     Ngutabare, ngukize !

3 . Haz' Umwuka Wer' ubwo 
     Mu mutima wanjye, 
     Mbona ko nacumuye; 
     Ndihan' arandokora.

4 . Mana, ndagushimira 
     Yuk' Umwana wawe 
     Atandetse ngo nzapfa 
     Nkiri mu byaha byanjye.

5 . Reka njye nkuyoboka;
     Nta wundi nifuza. 
     Noneh' Unyiharire; 
     Mwami Yes' untegeke.

6 . Nahatswe na Satani;
     Nta cyiza yampaye; 
     Amp' urupfu rw'iteka ; 
     Ni kw ahemb’ ingabo ze.

7 . Ariko, Mucunguzi, 
    Wowe wangabiye 
    Ubugingo ku buntu, 
    Buva ku Musaraba.

Gushimisha_104.songBody:
1 . Imbabazi z' Umukiza
     Zamuzanye kunshungura;
     Natabitswe n'ibyaha byanjye,
     Ankuramw arankiza.

Ref:
Nari mw isayo y'ibyaha, 
Aramfat' aransayura. 
Nari mu mwijim' ukomeye: 
Non' Aramurikira,

2 . Natinze cyane kwitaba 
     Yesu wampamagaraga;
     Nyuma, niringiy' ijambo rye,
     Yes’ ankurahw ibyaha.

3 . Yaje kunkiz' agifite 
     Inkovu nyinshi z'amahwa 
     N'iz'icumu n'iz'imbereri.
     Mpimbaz' urukundo rwe.

4 . None mpora mu mahoro; 
     Umutima ni muzima; 
     Arikw’ icyatumy’ anshungura,
     Akankiza, sinkizi.

Gushimisha_105.songBody:
1 . Ubuntu bw' Imana—Butangaje 
     Ni bwo bwankuyeho—Imigozi.
     Byavuye se kuki ? 
     Byavuye ku gushaka 
     Kw' Imana yonyine—Yambohoye.

2 . Ni Yesu wenyine—Wantoreye 
     Guhirwa mw ijuru—Mu bwami bwe.                     
     Mwese ni mumenye 
     Yuk’ Umukiza wacu 
     Ajy'asanganira—Abaz' i We.

3 . S' uko nari mwiza—Haba na mba ! 
     N' ubuntu bwa Yesu ---Yangiriye.
     Yarambabarijwe 
     Kuri wa Musaraba 
     Ndetse yabambanywe —N' abambuzi.

4 . Kand' iyo nibutse—Ibya Yesu, 
     Uko yagiriwe—Bamubamba,
     Binyibuts' ibyaha :
     We nta kibi yakoze; 
     Ni jyewe yazize :—N' Umukiza !

5 . Ub' icyo nifuza —N'ukuguma 
     Mu Mukiza wanjye,—Mmwihishemo. 
     Ni We ngabo yacu 
     Ihor' idukingira 
     Imyambi wa Mubi—Aturasa.

6 . Non' icyo ngusabye,—Mwami Yesu : 
     Ingeso wa Mubi —Yanyanduje 
     Zashaka kubyuka, 
     Zirimbur' uzice pe, 
     Mpore nihariwe—N'ibya Yesu.

7 . None, maso yanjye,—Namwe matwi, 
     Nawe, munwa wanjye,—Mubiri we !
     Mwese, mushimishe 
     Uwankuye mu ngoyi, 
     Ibyaremwe byose,—Tumushime!

Gushimisha_106.songBody:
1 . Sinterw' isoni na Yesu, 
     Cyangw' iz'ishyaka rye, 
     Naho zab' iz'Ijambo rye, 
     Cyangw' Umusaraba.

Ku Musaraba rwose ni ho naturiwe
Umutwaro w'ibyaha byanjye. 
Nizeye, ndahumuka, mbon’ umucyo; 
Bituma mpora nezerewe.

2 . Izina rya Yesu wanjye 
     Ni ryo nishimira; 
     Nzi kw’ atazanyihakana 
     Kuko mmwiringiye.

3 . Ntabw' azivuguruz' ibyo 
     Yansezeranije, 
     Kukw’ icyo namubikije 
     Azagikomeza.

4 . No mw’ ijur' azanyemera, 
     Nubwo nta cyo mmaze; 
     I Yerusalemu yaho, 
     Azamp' icyicaro.

Gushimisha_107.songBody:
1 . Nkomeze njye niringira 
     Amaraso y'Umukiza.
     Nta wundi nshaka kwigana 
     Keretse Yesu wenyine.

Ref:
Nikomeze ku Rutare, 
Nahw ahandi n'umusenyi, 
Nahw ahandi n'umusenyi.

2 . Iyo ngoswe n'umwijima, 
     Niringir' ubwo buntu bwe. 
     Mu byago no mu makuba,
     Ntagir' ubw’ anzibukira.

3 . Ntunganywa n'amaraso ye 
     Na ya masezerano ye. 
     Naho napfush' ibyo mfite, 
     Ni We musa niringira.

4 . Maz’ icyo gih’azazira, 
     Azasanga mmwiteguye, 
     Nambaye gukiranuka; 
     Nta nenge nzaba ngifite.

Gushimisha_108.songBody:
1 . Jye nd' Umukristo : nzahora ndi we 
     Mu bintu byose, ngeze ku gupfa.
     Jye nd' Umukristo : Mpora mbihamya, 
     Nahw igihugu cyose cyanseka.
     Jye nd' Umukristo wo mu mutima, 
     Kuk' ubu nsigaye nkunda Kristo.
     Icyatumy' apfa yazize jyewe !
     Nabuzwa n'iki kujya mmukunda?

2 . Jye nd' Umukristo : umv'ubwo buntu
     Narakijijwe, nkurwa mu byaha.
     Jye nd' Umukristo, naho naterwa 
     N'ibyago, nkaba no ku rugamba.
     Jye nd' Umukristo: nd' umutabazi 
     Mu ntambara ndasana n'ibyaha.
     Mfit’ Umugaba, n' Umwami Yesu;
     Ni tuba hamwe, nzahora nnesha.

3 . Jye nd' Umukristo : nd' umwimukira; 
     Ndakomeje mu rugendo rwanjye.
     Iby’ino mw isi ndabihinyuye : 
     Nsigaye nifuz' ibyo mw ijuru.
     Jye nd' Umukristo : gakondo yacu 
     Iri mw ijuru ku Mana yacu.
     Nta nzar’ ibayo nta n’imiruho; 
    Abaho bose baguwe neza.

4 . Jye nd' Umukristo : icyo n'ikintu
    Gihumuriz' umutima wanjye.
    Kinyibagiza n’ibyago byose, 
    Nkumva nduhuwe n'Umwami Yesu.
    Jye nd' Umukristo, uko ndi kose.
    Maze, ni ntumirwa, ngiye gupfa,
    Nzagir' ibyishimo bitavugwa;
    Nzabon’ ihirwe, ngiye mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_109.songBody:
1 . Nyuzwe n'ubucuti bwo mw ijuru ,
     Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye. 
     Ngiz' ihirwe, mbony' umunezero : 
    Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye.

Ref:
Niseguye amaboko yawe, Yesu; 
Singitinya: nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye.

2 . Nezezwa n'uko Yes' anyobora :
     Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye. 
     Sinkiyoberw' inzira nnyuramo : 
     Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye.

3 . Umutima wanjye ntuhagaze :
     Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye. 
     Ngubwa neza ndi kumwe na Yesu : 
     Nisunz' Umukiz' ukomeye.

Gushimisha_11.songBody:
1.Mpimbariz' Iman' ibyo yankoreye:
 Yatanz' Umwana wayo w'ikinege,
 Amfir' Ab' icyiru cy'ibyaha byanjye;
 Nukw’Anshir' icyanzu ngo njye mw’ijuru.

Ref:
Nsingize, nsingize Yesu wamfiriye!
Nsingize, nsingize uwo Mwami wanjye!
Namwe ngo nimuz' abageze kwa Se;
Mumwitabe mwese, mumusingize !

2 . Yamberey' inshungu i Gologota,
 Angur’ amaraso : sinkir’ uwanjye.
 Uwab’ umugome, akamwizera,
Yakizw' ako kany' akababarirwa.


3 . Yakoz' ibikomeye ! Twishimane !
 Twishimir' ubuntu n'imbabazi ze.
 Nyamar' ubw' azaza tumwirebera,
 Nta wavug' uburyo tuzamushima.

Gushimisha_110.songBody:
1 . Igituma nkunda Yesu,
     Nkikumenyeshe none.
     N'ukw uwo Mukiza mwiza 
     Yanguz' amaraso ye.

Ref:
Igituma nkunda Yesu
Akandutira byose, 
N’uko yankuyehw ibyaha, 
Akanyoza, nkera de!

2 . Igituma nkunda Yesu, 
     N' urukundo yankunze, 
     Akankiz' ibyaha byanjye 
     Byajyaga bintegeka.

3 . Igituma nkunda Yesu 
     N'ukw ar' Umurengezi. 
     Ahor' antabar' iteka 
     Uk' Umwanz' anyoheje.

4 . Igituma nkunda Yesu 
     N' ukw atazarorera 
     Kumber’ umukunzi mwiza,
     Akamber' umwungeri.

Gushimisha_111.songBody:
1 . Izina ryiza rihebuje 
     Rinezez’ amatwi yanjye, 
     Nzajya ndihimbaza ntahwema. 
     Ndivuge : n’irya Yesu.

Ref:
Yesu, ndamukunda; 
Yesu, ndamukunda ! 
Ndamukundira yuko 
Yabanje kunkund’ atyo !

2 . Kokw iryo zina rinyibutsa 
     Uko yankunz’ akampfira, 
     Ababi nkanjy ’akabeza de 
     Mur’ ayo maraso ye !

3 . Rimbwira Data wa twes’ ibyo 
     Yanshyinguriye mw ijuru. 
     Naho nagenda mu mwijima, 
     Rimmurikira hose.

4 . Rinyeyurir’ umubabaro, 
     Rihanagur’ amarira, 
     Rinyongorera ngo mpumure, 
     Ngo ntinyuke, nkomere !

5 . Izina nkunda n’ irya Yesu, 
     Risumb’ uko turivuga; 
     Ntawo mw isi warisingiza 
     Uburyo buhagije !

Gushimisha_112.songBody:
1 . Nzi k' Umukiz' ankunda : 
     Ni ko tubibwirizwa. 
     Abato bose n'abe, 
     Kandi n' uw'imbaraga.

 Ref:
Yes' arankunda (x3)
Mpora mbihamya ntyo.

2 . Yesu n' uw'imbaraga : 
     Yapfiriye kunkiza.
     Ni mmwizer’ azanjyana 
     Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru.

3 . Arankund' ndindira 
     Mu migendere yanjye;
     Ni mfa, mmukunze, nzaba 
     Mu muryango we wera.

Gushimisha_113.songBody:
1 . Nkunda kwizigira Yesu,
    Nkajya mmwumvira rwose, 
    Ngo njye nishingikiriza 
    Ku masezerano ye.


Ref:
Yesu, Yesu, ndakwizeye : 
Ur' uwo kwiringirwa ! 
Yesu, Yesu mwiza nkunda, 
Ndusheho kukwizera.

2 . Nkunda kwizigira Yesu : 
     Nkizwa n'amaraso ye. 
     Nishyize mu ruzi rwayo, 
     Nogamo, ndatungana.

3 . Nkunda kwizigira Yesu,
     Nkaruhuk' intambara 
     Y'ibicumuro n'ibyaha, 
     Akamp' umunezero.

4 . Mpimbawe n'uko nkwizeye,
     Mutabaz' undengera; 
     Nizeye k' umpora hafi; 
     Iteka tugumane !

Gushimisha_114.songBody:
1 . Kuv’ ubu, Sintiny’ ibizab’ ejo, 
     Ibyago cyangw’ amahirwe. 
     Nzi byose kw Iman’ ibitegeka : 
     Kwiganyira n’uk’ubusa.

Ref:
Mbeshwaho no...kwizera Yesu... 
Niringiye...imbabazi ze... 
Mbumbatirwa...n’Umukiz’ unkunda... 
Nizeye Yesu... : nta Bwoba mfite...!

2 . Umwanzi Satani yangerageza. 
     Nkabon’ amakuba menshi, 
     Nzi yuk’ Umukiz’azamba hafi, 
     Njye mmwisunga, mmwihishemo.

3 . Numv’ amatsiko mu mutima wanjye 
     Yo gucya ku munsi mwiza,
     Yes’ ubw’ azagaruka kunjyana 
     Mu rugo rwe rwo mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_115.songBody:
1 . Nabony’ Umukunzi mwiza :
     Yarankunze ntamuzi. 
     Yamfatishij’ umugozi,
     Ari rwo rukundo rwe.
     Izo ngoyi ze zanteye 
     Kub’ imbata ye rwose.
     Jye nd’ uwe, na We n’ uwanjye 
     Kugez’ iteka ryose.

2 . Nabony’ Umukunzi mwiza : 
     Kera yaramfiriye 
     Yaranguz’ amp’ ubugingo; 
     Na We yaranyihaye.
     Non’ ibintu mfite byose 
     Ntabwo nkibigundira. 
     Ibyo ntunze nanjy’ ubwanjye 
     N’ iby’uwo Mucunguzi !

3 . Nabony’ Umukunzi mwiza :
     Byos’ arabishobora.
     Ajy’ andind’ akaga kose 
     Munzir’ ijya mw ijuru.
     Kumuhang’ amas’ iteka 
     Bizankiz’ intege nke.
     Nshir’ ubwoba, nshir’ubute,
     Nyuma, nzatabaruka !

4 . Nabony’ Umukunzi mwiza : 
     Ni We nyir’imbabazi.
     Ni We mujyanama Wanjye.
     Ni W’ undenger’ iteka.
     Nta kubaho, nta n’urupfu,
     Nta n’abadayimoni,
     Nta bya none, nta bizaza 
     Byazantanya na Yesu !

Gushimisha_117.songBody:
1 . Numvise Yes' ambwir' ati : 
     Ngwino nkuruhure.
     Zan’ ibyo bikuruhije,
     Mbikwikorerere !
     Mmusang' uko nari nd' uko,
     Ndushye mfit’ ishavu;
     Amber’ uburuhukiro,
     Amp’ umunezero.

2 . Numvise Yes’ ambwir’ ati :
     Nguherey' ubuntu 
     Amaz' azan' ubugingo, 
     Unyw' uram' iteka.
     Njy' ahw ari, nnywa nnezerewe 
     Kur’ ayo mazi ye,
     Umutim’ ushir’ inyota,
     Mpabw’ ubugingo bwe.

3 . Numvise Yes’ ambwir’ ati :
     Ni jye Mucyo w'isi.
     Wavukiye mu  mwijima,
     Ngwin' umurikirwe.
     Ndebye kuri Yesu, mbona 
     Kw ar’ izuba ryanjye 
     Rizamvir’ iminsi yose 
     Y'ubugingo bwanjye.

Gushimisha_118.songBody:
1 . Ibyaha byanjye byose n'ibyago 
     Nabihariy' Umwana w' Imana. 
    Namwitegerej' ari ku Giti, 
    Mmenya yukw’ ari jye yabambiwe.
    // Numva mbabariwe, ndanezererwa;
            Ndishima// x2 

2 . Mpora mbiharira Yesu; ni W' uzi 
     Kujy' ammar' agahinda mbabaye. 
     Iyo ndiz' andeban' imbabazi;
     Iyo mbay' umunyantegenke pe, 
     //Yes' arushaho kump' imbaraga. 
                  Ndishima.// x2

3 . Nzajya mbiharira Yesu, ntahwema, 
     Mfite muri We ibyiringiro; 
     Kumwizera kumpesh' amahoro, 
     Nkamwisegura nduhutse neza.
     //Turi kumwe, mba ndi mw ijuru pe: 
                 Ndishima.// x2

4 . Yewe wa mwihebe wese, emera 
     Kumuharira byose, ntutinye. 
     Nubw' ari we Rurema wa byose, 
     Arikw aragukund' ugayitse.
     //Yaguhay' ikibanza mw ijuru. 
                Tahayo.// x2

Gushimisha_119.songBody:
1 . Yesu mmurutisha byose :
     Nta kindi nshyifuza. 
     Iminsi yos' Aramfasha,
     Ngo nkomere, ne kugwa. 
     Iyo ndushye njya kuri We;
     Nta wund' unduhura nka We. 
     Yanyujuje . . . ibyishimo . . ! 
             N' uwanjye !

2 . Yesu mmurutisha byose :
     Amfasha nnaniwe. 
     Itek’ amp' imigisha ye; 
     Mbur' uko nabivuga. 
     Atang' izuba n'imvura, 
     Ngo nez' imyak' inkwiriye. 
     Angabira . . . byose nkena . . ! 
             N' uwanjye !

3 . Yesu mmurutisha byose : 
     Nzajya mmukorera, 
    Kukw’ ar' uwo kwiringirwa;
    Sinzamuhemukira. 
    Nkurikira Yesu hose;
    Turi kumwe, nta cyo nzaba. 
    Arankunda . . ! Arandinda . . ! 
             N' uwanjye !

4 . Yesu mmurutisha byose :
     N' inshuti yanjye pe ! 
     Nta wundi nabona nka We;
     Nzahora mmwizigira. 
     Yampay' impan' ihebuje, 
     Ni yo bugingo bw' iteka, 
     Aranyuze . . ! Musingize . . . 
            N' uwanjye !

Gushimisha_12.songBody:
1 . Tunezerewe k’Umukiza yaje.
Yadupfiriye twese, maz' arazuka.

Ref:
Turirimbir' Umukiza ko yadupfiriye!
Haleluya, tunezerwe kuko yazutse !

2 . Tunezerewe kw ar' Umucyo w'isi;
 Ni we weyuy’ umwijima twahozemo.

3 . Tunezerewe kw amaraso yeza;
 Yaduhay' agakiza; turacunguwe.

4 . Tunezerewe ko twarihiriwe,
 Ubw' Uwera yapfirag' abanyabyaha.

5 . Tunezerewe k' Umukiz' ariho;
 Ni we Mwana w'intama watsinz'urupfu.

6 . Tunezerewe kw ari mw ijur' ubu;
 N' Umuvugire wacu ku Mana yera.

7 . Tunezerewe k' Umukiza wacu
 Azaz’Atujyan' atugeze mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_120.songBody:
1 . Mw ijur’ imbere y’Imana 
     Mfit’ umunt’ umvugira : 
     N’ umukuru w’abatambyi, 
     Kandi yitwa Rukundo. 
     Mpamya yukw izina ryanjye 
     Riri ku mutima we. 
     Ubw’ amvugira, nta mwanzi 
     Wamunyirukanaho.

2 . Satan’ iy’ anyibukije 
     Gukiranirwa kwanjye, 
     Ashaka kunyihebesha, 
     Njya ntumbira mw ijuru; 
     Ndebay’ Umukiza wanjye 
     Wabikuyeho rwose 
     Kera yarampongereye :
     Nuko, sinzarimbuka.

3 . Uwitek’ Umucamanza 
     Ambonyehw amaraso, 
     Ntancir’ urubanza rubi : 
     Anyit’ ukiranutse.
     Yaranshunguye ngo mb’ uwe, 
     Niko kunyishingira. 
     Kukw adapfa, singipfuye :
     Jye na Yesu tur’ umwe.

Gushimisha_121.songBody:
1 . Yesu ni We mucyo wanjye;
     Ammurikir' inzira. 
     Nemer' intege nke zanjye; 
     Nizera kw’ andengera. 
     Ammurikir' inzira.       (x 2)
     Nemer' intege nke zanjye; 
     Nizera kw’ andengera.

2 . Yesu ni We nshungu yanjye : 
     Koko yaramfiriye ! 
     Ni We byiringiro byanjye; 
     Ni We wambabariye. 
     Koko yaramfiriye !      (x 2)
     Ni We byiringiro byanjye; 
     Ni We wambabariye.

3 . Yesu ni W' ump' amahoro;
     Atuma nkiranuka. 
     Ajy' amp' ubugingo na bwo 
     Bunkiz' ibyah' iteka. 
     Atuma nkiranuka         (x 2)
     Ajy' amp' ubugingo na bwo 
     Bunkiz' ibyah' iteka.

4 . Yishyuye n'imyenda yanjye,
     Angur' amaraso ye. 
     Yanteguriye gakondo 
     Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru. 
     Angur' amaraso ye;       (x 2)
     Yanteguriye gakondo 
     Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_122.songBody:
1 . Ukunda kujy' ambabarira 
     N' Umukiza. 
     Umfasha kujya nnesh' ibibi 
     N' Umukiza. 
     Umwami wanjy' aranyizeza,
     Nanjye nkunda kumukorera, 
     Kukw’ ashaka kubabarira  
                  Umwegera.

2 . Nkund' iyi nzira y'agakiza 
     Y' Umukiza, 
     Kukw ijy' intera kunezerwa 
      Mu Mukiza.
      Nababazwa n'iby'isi cyane, 
      Mfashwa no kujya mmwizigira, 
      Ngahora mpanz' amas' iteka 
                  Umukiza.

3 . Ndashima rwos' Uwankijije :
               Ni we Yesu. 
     Kand' azanjyana mu bwami bwe 
               Kukw’ ankunze. 
     Nuko nemera gushorerwa 
     N' Umwuka Wera w' Umukiza, 
     Kukw ari Wo Mufash' uhamya 
               Ibya Yesu.

Gushimisha_123.songBody:
1 . Yesu, ni Wowe musa mbonyemo 
     Amahoro nifuzaga. 
     Najyaga nyashaka, sinyabone, 
     Ngasuhuz' umutim' iteka.

Ref:
None, ni Yes' umpaza wenyine : 
Nta n'irindi zina nemera, 
Kuk' ubugingo n’umunezero 
Bibonekera muri We !

2 . Nifuzag' uko nakwinezeza, 
     Ntita ku Mukiza wanjye. 
     Nkimwirengagiza ntamwitaho, 
     Nukw amfatish' urukundo rwe !

3 . Najyaga njya kw iriba ry'iyi si, 
     Mfit' inyota nyinshi cyane, 
     Naba ngiye kunyw' agakam' ubwo, 
     Nuko nkayabura, nkiheba.

4 . Nuzuy' agahinda n'ubwihebe,
     Mbuz' ibyo niringiraga; 
     Maz' amaso yanjy' arahumuka, 
     Ndakureba, Yesu, ndanyurwa.

Gushimisha_124.songBody:
1 . Yes' amp' amahoro y' atarondoreka 
     Andinda mu byago byose. 
     Uko mba kose, nzajya nishima, nti : 
     Nguwe neza, ndatunganiwe.

Ref:
Ni neza... Ndatuje... 
Nguwe neza , ndatunganiwe !

2 . Satan' iy' antey' akandas’ imyambi ye,
     Njya mpeshw' amahoro menshi 
     No kwibuka Yes' uko yandengeye, 
     Ava mw ijuru ngw anshungure.

3 . Ibyaha byanjye yabyikoreye byose : 
     Ntiyashigaje na kimwe ! 
     Byabambwe byose ku Musaraba we : 
     Yes' ashimwe !  Yarankijije !

4 . Kuv’ ubu, kubwanjye kubaho ni Kristo; 
     Ndetse, singitinya gupfa; 
     Urupfu na rwo ruzamber' indamu. 
     Yes' ampay' amahoro menshi !

5 . Mumeny' iyo tujya : n' i bwami mw ijuru; 
     Ntabw' ar’ i kuzimu mu mva.
     Ni twumva za mpanda, tuzanezerwa. 
     Uzagaruka ryari, Yesu ?

Gushimisha_125.songBody:
1 . Ubw' Umwami Yes' ankunda, 
               Nd' amahoro ! 
     Kubw' imbabazi ze nyinshi,
               Nd' amahoro ! 
     Nuhagiwe n’amaraso; 
     Nkomezwa n'ubuntu bwinshi; 
     Kand' amfashe n'ukuboko: 
              Nd'amahoro!

2 . Naho haz' ibyago byinshi, 
              Nd' amahoro ! 
     Yesu n' Umukiza wanjye :
              Nd' amahoro !
     Niragij' Imana, Data; 
     Nguma muri Yesu Kristo; 
     Nejejwe n'Umwuka Wera : 
             Nd' amahoro !

3 . Byose bizambera byiza : 
             Nd' amahoro ! 
     No mu byago, nzaririmba :
             Nd' amahoro !
Naho ndiho, naho napfa,
Nzi ko nkundwa n'Uwiteka; 
Yes' amp' ibyo nkena byose :
             Nd' amahoro !

Gushimisha_126.songBody:
1 . Yesu, tuguhungiyeho; 
     Udutabare, tudapfa.
     Nubwo tutabikwiriye,
     Utubabarire !

Ref:
Mukiz' utwemere, 
Nubwo turi babi. 
Yesu, waradupfiriye : 
Mukiz’ utwemere !

2 . Ntabwo twaguhish' ibyaha;
     Turatsinzwe rwos’ ariko 
     Amaraso yawe, Yesu,
     Yaratuviriye.

3 . Ntabwo twashobora rwose 
     Gutungany' ingeso zacu. 
     Iyo tubigerageje, 
     Biratunanira.

4 . Dore, nkwikubis' imbere ! 
     Ungirir’ uko washaka. 
     Sinshyanga Mwam’ unkureho
     Ingeso zose mbi.

Gushimisha_127.songBody:
1 . Numvis’ ijwi ryawe, 
     Yesu, ndagusanze, 
     Ndaje, Mucunguz' unyoze 
     Mu maraso yawe.

Ref:
Mwami w'abami 
Waramfiriye.
Nje gupfa hamwe nawe, 
Ye, ku Musaraba.

2 . Numvis' ijwi ryawe, 
     Riti: Nyizigira ! 
    Unkomereze kwizera, 
    Kandi, tugumane.

3 . Numvis' ijwi ryawe 
     Ryinjiye muri jye, 
     Rimbwiriza kujya nkunda 
     Nkuko naw' unkunda.

4 . Numvis' ijwi ryawe,
    Wowe, Wamfiriye ! 
    Mwami, mbane naw' iteka; 
    Ni Wow' unyizeza.

Gushimisha_128.songBody:
1 . Ubu, nj' uko ndi, niringiye 
     Gus' amaraso wamviriye 
     Kandi yuko wampamagaye :
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

2 . Ubu, nj’ uko ndi, mbuyerezwa 
     N'intambara yo mu mutima 
     N'intimba nyinshi n'ubwihebe : 
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

3 . Ubu, nj’ uko ndi: sinabasha 
     Kwikurahw ibinter' isoni; 
     Niringiy’ amaraso yawe :
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

4 . Ubu, nj’ uko ndi, ndi n’impumyi : 
     Simfite shinge na rugero !
     Wow’ urankenur’ umpumure :
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

5 . Ubu nj’ uko ndi nd’ikigoryi :
     Mbabarira gus’ untunganye, 
     Kukw ari ko wasezeranye :
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

6 . Ubu nj’ uko ndi, ne gutinda.
     Kubw’ urukundo rwawe rwinshi,
     Ndifuza kub’ uwawe rwose :
     Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.
     
7 . Ubu, nj’ uko ndi, ndakwihaye :
      Urwo rukundo ruransinze.
      Mb’ uwawe mw isi no mw ijuru.
      Mucunguzi, nditabye, nditabye.

Gushimisha_129.songBody:
1 . Ndeger’ Umusaraba, 
     Nnaniwe, nkennye, mpumye; 
     Nta kindi kindi nshaka : 
     Ngusabye kunkiz’ ubu.

Ref:
Mwami, ndakwiringiye, 
Ai Mucunguzi wanjye; 
Dor’ uko nkunamiye 
Mwami Yes’ unkiz’ ubu.

2 . Nakwifujije kera,
    Ndi mu ngoyi z'ibyaha; 
    Maz’ umbwira nez' uti : 
    Ngukiz’ ibicumuro !

3 . Ubu ndakwihereje : 
     End’ ibyo mfite byose, 
     Ubwenge n' imbaraga; 
     Byose Yes’ ubyakire.

4 . Nizey’ ibyo wavuze 
     N'amaraso wavuye; 
     Ndicuza gutinda ntyo: 
     None, Yesu, nyakira !

5 . Yesu, non’ ungezemo : 
     Urakaza, Mukiza ! 
     Nta n' ineng'  umbaraho :
     Shimwa, shimwa, Nyakuza !

Gushimisha_13.songBody:
1 . Uwambitswe ker' ikamba
 Ritatse mu mahwa
 None yambitsw' iry'ubwami
 Kuko yanesheje.

2 .None yicaye mw ijuru,
 Ategeka byose,
 Ari we Mwami w'abami 
 N'umucy' udashira.

3 . Ni we munezero wacu 
N'uw'abo mw ijuru : 
Yatwerets’ urukundo rwe,
 Ubwo yabambwaga.

4 . Yes' umusaraba wawe,
 Nubw' ar' uw'isoni,
 Uvamw ubuntu kubwacu
 N'ibyishimo byinshi.

5 . Tubabarana na Yesu,
 Tukir' aha mw isi.
 Maze, ni tujya mw ijuru,
 Tuzimana na We.

6 . Mukiza, ku musaraba,
Waradupfiriye:
Tw’abishwe n'ibicumuro,
Tubeshwaho na wo.

Gushimisha_130.songBody:
1 . Nazimiriye kure yawe : 
     Non’ untarure ! 
     Nagundiriy' ibyaha byanjye : 
     Ndaje, noneho.

Ref:
Nditabye ! Nditabye !
Ntabwo nzongera. 
Nyemerer’ umbabarire. 
Mwami, nyakira !

2 . Napfapfany' iyo myaka yose :
     Non’ Untarure ! 
     Nkwitwayeho, Mukiza wanjye 
     Ndaje, noneho.

3 . Narembejwe n’ibyaha byanjye :
     Non’ Untarure ! 
     Niringiy’ urukundo rwawe : 
     Ndaje, noneho.

4 . Wamviriy’ amaraso yawe :
     Non' untarure ! 
     Ubwaw' uraz’ uranshungura 
     Ndaje, noneho.

5 . Umv’ uko ntats' unkize, Yesu : 
     Non’ untarure ! 
     Mukiza, nyeza nk'urubura : 
     Ndaje, noneho.

Gushimisha_131.songBody:
1 . Mwumv' imbabazi z' Imana : 
     Ntabwo zarondoreka ! 
     Mbeg’ umunyabyaha nkanjye 
     Koko yababarirwa ?

Ref:
Ndaje, Yesu..., ndakwitabye...; 
Uko ndi ko...s' unyemere...! 
Ndaje, Yesu..., ndakwitabye...;
Mukiz’ unyakire.

2 . Nari kure y' uw' unkunda,
     Mbabaz' umutima we, 
     Kuko namwimag' ahw aba 
     Mu wanjye yapfiriye !

3 . None Yesu, ndakwihaye,
     Umbohor' undokore. 
     Ibi byaha binyomaho, 
     Non’uz' ubinkureho !

4 . Haleluya : yanduhuye ! 
     Singishidikany' ubu ! 
     Ndi mu nzir’ ijya mw ijuru,
     Nuzuy’ umunezero.

Gushimisha_132.songBody:
1 . Nsiz' ububata n' umwijima, 
     Ndaje, Yesu; ndaje, Yesu. 
     Mbony’ umudendezo n' umucyo : 
     Yesu, ndakwitabye ! 
     Nsiz’ ubutindi n'uburema, 
     Mbony' ubukire n'intege nyinshi. 
     Mvuye mu byah' urankijije : 
     Yesu, ndakwitabye !

2 . Mvuye mu byago n' ibihendo, 
     Ndaje, Yesu; ndaje, Yesu, 
     Mbony' indamu mu rupfu rwawe, 
     Yesu ndakwitabye !
     Mvuyemw intimba n'amarira, 
     Ngeze mu byishimo bidashira. 
     Nshizemw induru, mpaw' impundu : 
     Yesu, ndakwitabye !
 
3 . Nsiz' amahane n'ubwigenge,
     Ndaje, Yesu; ndaje, Yesu. 
     Ngeze ku kwemer' iby’ ukunda,
     Yesu, ndakwitabye ! 
     Ntay' ibyanjye, nguhungiyeho; 
     Mvuye mu bwihebe, nd' amahoro : 
     Ntaye Satani, ngo mb' uwawe : 
     Yesu, ndakwitabye !

4 . Nsize gutiny' urupfu n'imva, 
     Ndaje, Yesu; ndaje, Yesu. 
     Mbony' umutim' ushyitse mu nda,
     Yesu, ndakwitabye ! 
     Nkuwe mu kanwa k'inyamaswa, 
     Ntashye mu rugo rw'intama zawe ! 
     Mpere none, nkugandukire : 
     Yesu, ndakwitabye !

Gushimisha_133.songBody:
1 . Ndagukurikira, Yesu;
     Nemey' umusaraba.
     Jye nta shinge, nta rugero : 
     Urampagije wenyine.

Ref:
Ndagukurikira, Yesu, 
Ubwo wanguz’ amaraso; 
Ndakwihaye, Mwami Yesu : 
Kera waranyitangiye.

2 . Icyubahiro n' iby' isi, 
     Sinkibimaranira. 
     Kubwa Yesu, ndabiretse: 
     Amp’ ibyiza byo mw ijuru.

3 . Nahw ab' isi bazanyanga, 
     Ni ko bakugiriye. 
     Ntibankund' akaramata : 
     Wowe ntabw' uzanzinukwa.

4 . Uwansek' ansuzuguye, 
     Byakunsunikiraho. 
     Uko bizamera kose, 
     Uzabinyihanganisha.

5 . Ko mpaw’ urukundo rwawe, 
     Har’ikindi nshaka se?  
     Ibinezaneza by'isi, 
     Simbishaka: mfite Yesu.

Gushimisha_134.songBody:
1 . Nshaka Yesu; nta wundi nifuza.  
     Andengera mu byago by' iyi si. 
     Nshaka Yesu; ni W' umpumuriza.
     Nah' undi yakwishoboza, jye 
              Nshaka Yesu !

Ref:
Nshaka Yesu ! Nshaka Yesu ! 
Nshaka Yesu, ntasiba : 
Mu mahoro, mu byago, 
Ni We nshaka wenyine;
None n'iteka ryose, 
Jye nshaka Yesu !

2 . Nshaka Yesu : n' inshuti yanjy’ ubu. 
     N' Umujyanam' uhor' unyobora. 
     Nshaka Yesu, ngw ansindir' Umwanzi;
     Jyenyine nzi ko nta cyo mmaze : 
              Nshaka Yesu !

3 . Nshaka Yesu : ni we Murengezi. 
     S’ inshuti yac' abanyabyaha se? 
     Nshaka Yesu : nafashwa n'undi se? 
     Nta wund’ ukund' abantu nka We : 
               Nshaka Yesu !

Gushimisha_136.songBody:
1 . Numvis’ ijwi ry' Umukiza, 
     Anyihamagarira; 
     None, mutim' ungomesha, 
     Umvir' Umucunguzi.

2 . Akir' ubugingo bwanjye: 
    Mwam' ubwitegekere; 
    Ubwimemo, budakurwa 
    Mu mategeko yawe.

3 . Ujy' ukoresh' uk' ushaka 
     Ubu bugingo bwanjye; 
     Ibyanjye ndabigutuye : 
     Databuja, nd' uwawe.

4 . No mu bihe byanjye byose, 
     Komeza kunshorera 
     N'imbaraga zawe zose;
     Ujy' untegek' iteka.

Gushimisha_137.songBody:
1 . Wowe, Mana, ndaguhimbaza 
     Kukw ari nta yindi man’ ibaho;
     Nguhaye n'umutima wanjye.
     Ump' imbaraga z'Umwuka wawe, 
     Mbashe gukor' ibikunezeza, 
     Mw izina ry'Umwami wacu Yesu.

2 . Nuzuzw’ Umwuka wawe wera, 
     Umutima wanjy' uwutegeke;
     Ujy'unyobor’ inzira yawe, 
     Ngo nyinyuremo ntajya nzimira; 
     Kandi, ni nnanirw' ujy'untabara, 
     Ugez’ ubw’ uzansohoz’i Wawe.

Gushimisha_138.songBody:
1 . Yesu, Mukiza wanjye, 
     Nguhany' ibyishimo 
     Uyu mubiri wanjye, 
     Ng’ ub’ uwawe rwose.

Ref:
Akir' ituro ryanjye, 
We Mwana w'Imana, 
Utum’ Umwuka Wera, 
Ummanukiremo,

2 . Sintinya na gatoya 
     Kukwiyegurira, 
     Kubw' imbabazi zawe, 
     Murokozi wanjye.

3 . Umuriro w'Umwuka 
     Uz' ub’ unyakemo, 
     Ummare mu mutima 
     Ibitar’ ibyawe.

4 . Za vuba, Mwami Yesu, 
     Ube Databuja; 
     Iteka nzab’ uwawe 
     Kuk' uhor' unkunda.

Gushimisha_139.songBody:
1 . Mukiza Yesu, ntabara, 
     Kukw abantu babiri 
     Bari mu mutima wanjye, 
     Umw' akund’ und’ agoma.

Ref:
Ndengera ! Ndengera ! 
Mwami wanjye, ndengera !

2 . Umwe ni we Mwuka wawe 
     Unyiringiz’ ijuru; 
     Und’ ahor’ anyoshya nabi, 
     Ashaka kunshumuza.

3 . Mwami, sinkor' ibyo nkunda, 
     Nubwo mpora mbyifuza. 
     Ibibi byo ndabikora,
     Nubw’ iteka njya mbyanga.

4 . Murokoz' umucyo wawe 
     Ummurikire neza, 
     Ngo wa muntu mubi nanga 
     Atamperana rwose.

5 . Iyo nirwanya ntyo, Mwami, 
     Nta mahoro mba mfite. 
     Ndagukunda, ndagushaka !
     Mfasha, nnesh' uwo mubi !

6 . Kiz' imbata yaw' irushywa, 
     Ihor' ikuganyira; 
     Umpe n'ububasha bwawe 
     Ngo njye nsinda Satani.

7 . Ndashak' uburuhukiro 
     Mu bwami bwawe bwiza; 
     Mfasha ngo wa wundi nanga
     Atambuza kujyayo.

Gushimisha_14.songBody:
1 . Mana, turaguhimbaza;
Twemeye yuk' ur' Umwami;
Haleluya ! Haleluya !
Data wa twes' udashira,
Isi yos' irakwambaza :
Haleluya ! (x 5)

2 . Ni Wowe wera dedede,
Mwami w'iyi si n'ijuru :
Haleluya ! Haleluya !
Dor' icyubahiro cyawe
Cyamamaye mw isi yose :
Haleluya ! (x 5)

3.  Kand' abahanuzi bawe
N'intumwa nziza za Yesu
Haleluya ! Haleluya !
Baguhimbazanya, Mana,
N'abishwe babamuhora :
Haleluya ! (x 5)

4 .  N'itorero na ryo n'uko
Ry'abera bo mw isi yose
Haleluya ! Haleluya !
Rikunda kugushimana
na za ngabo zo mw ijuru :
Haleluya ! (x 5)

5 . Data wa twese n'Umwana
N'Umwuka Wer' Iman' imwe,
Haleluya ! Haleluya!
Iman' imwe mu Butatu
Ishimirw’ icyubahiro :
Haleluya! (x 5)

Gushimisha_140.songBody:
1 . Mwami, ndakwimitse : wime 
     Mu mutima wanjye, 
     Sinibagirwe ya mahwa : 
     Njyan' i Gologota !

Ref:
Ibyabay’ i Getsemane 
N’ ibyo wababajwe byose, 
Sinzobyibagirwe, Mwami: 
Njyan’ i Gologota.

2 . Unyereke ya mva, Mwami,
     Aho bagushyize, 
     Aho marayika wera 
     Yaray' ataramye.

3 . Nje nka Mariya, Mukiza, 
     Kukurabukira; 
     Nsanz’ imva y’ irimw’ ubusa; 
     Nshimy’ Uwanzukiye!

4 . Unkorer’ umusaraba,
     Niyange, mb’uwawe; 
     Nsangire naw’ igikombe 
     Wanyoye kubwanjye.

Gushimisha_141.songBody:
1 . Mwami Yesu, ndagukunda, 
     Ndakwihaye by'ukuri. 
     Urukundo rwawe rwinshi 
     Ni rwo rubinyemeza.
     Sinkibabazwa n'amakuba 
     Yose nterwa n'iby'iyi si, 
     Kuko mbyemereye kubwawe 
     Kugira ngo ngushimishe.

Ref:
Ndagukunda, Yesu, 
Wemere kumpaka. 
Nta kindi cyampaza, Mwami, 
Keretse wowe.

2 . Mwami, ngwin’ umpishurire 
     Ibyiza wankoreye. 
     Nubwo nizeye buhoro, 
     Ngeza ku Musaraba ! 
     Nyigish’ uko wankunze, Yesu, 
     Nkiri mubi bikabije, 
     Ngo nitegerez' igiciro 
     Kimpesha kubabarirwa.

3 . Ndushijeho kugukunda, 
     Ndushaho kunezerwa; 
     Ar' aheza cyangw’ ahabi,
     Nta bwo mbur’ amahoro.
     Ariko, Yesu, ntagufite, 
     Nta mahoro nsigaranye; 
     Iby'iyi si, nubw' ari byiza, 
     Nta cyo byammarira rwose.

Gushimisha_142.songBody:
1 . Untwar' untwar’ untware, Yesu, 
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke ! 
     Untwar' ungir' imbata yawe, 
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke!

2 . Ibyaha byanjye byari byinshi : 
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke! 
     Nyamara, byos' urabijyana : 
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke !

3 . Wangabiy’ amahoro menshi :
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke! 
     Ubwo wangeze mu mutima, 
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke !

4 . Gumana nanjy’ iminsi yose :
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke ! 
     Tutari kumwe, naba mfuye :
     Mwami Yes’ untegeke !

Gushimisha_143.songBody:
1 . Yesu, ko wankunze, bigatum’ umfira.
     None nakwim' iki ? Ndakwihay’ubu, 
     Umutima wanjye n'ibyo mfite byose 
     Non’ ubyiharire : sinkir’ uwanjye.

2 . Uhagaz’ imbere y’intebe y'ubuntu, 
     Itek’ umvugira k’ Uwiteka, So. 
     Mwam' ujy’ unshoboza, ntwar’ umusaraba.
     Nkwize n' imbabazi z' uwanshunguye.

3 . Mwami, ndakwinginga : umpe gusa nawe :
     Mpa kugushimisha, kand’ unyigishe. 
     Nige kugukunda; nige kukumvira, 
     Nshak' abazimiye, mbakugezeho !

Gushimisha_144.songBody:
1 . Yesu, ndagukunda cyane ndakwihaye: 
     Nzinutsw’ ukw ibyaha byanjye binezeza. 
     Mucunguzi wanjye, Yesu, nyir’ubuntu bwose; 
     Ntabwo nigeze ngukund’ uko ngukund’ ubu.

2 . Ngukunze nkwitur’ urwo wankunze kera, 
     Unyigur’ i Gologota, ntakwiriye.
     Ngukundiy’ amahwa wanyambariye mu mutwe : 
     Ntabwo nigeze ngukund’ uko ngukund’ ubu.

3 . Nzahora ngukunda, Yes’ iteka ryose. 
     Ngihumeka, njye ndirimb’ ishimwe ryawe,
     Ningera mu rupfu, nabwo, nzagushima ntya, nti : 
     ntabwo nigeze ngukund’uko ngukund’ ubu.

4 . Ningera mu rugo rwa So, Mwami Yesu, 
     Nzajya mpaguhamiriz' iteka ryose;
     Nkwikubis’ imbere, nzagusingiza cyane, nti : 
     Ntabwo nigeze ngukund’ uko ngukund’ ubu.

Gushimisha_145.songBody:
1 . Kugukorera ni byiza, 
     Mukiza wanjye. 
     Iri turo ntuye, Mwami, 
     Rikunezeze.

Ref:
Akir' ubugingo bwanjye, 
N’ ubwawe, Yesu; 
Kandi kubw’ ubuntu bwawe, 
Undind’ ibibi.

2 . Mwam’ icyo nifuza cyane 
     N' ukwera nkawe : 
     Nta n'ikindi nshaka, Yesu; 
     Nzajya nkumvira,

3 . Mbe nk’ intumwa zawe, Yesu, 
     Njye ngukorera; 
     Ngukurikire, Muvunyi, 
     Nkubehw iteka.

4 . Singitinya n’amakuba 
     N' ibyago bindi : 
     Uwo nizeye ni Yesu 
     N'agakiza ke.

5 . Twese tujy’ imbere hamwe 
     Mu by' inzira ye, 
     Turirimban’ indirimbo, 
     Tunesh’iteka.

Gushimisha_146.songBody:
1 . Kugukunda, mwami Yesu, 
     Kuruhukir' i wawe, 
     Nkaba mu gituza cyawe,
     Birankwiriye rwose.
     Kwemer' amahoro yawe,
     Kuko waje kunkiza,
     No kumenya kwera kwawe,
     Bihora binnezeza.

2 . Amahirwe yanjye nkunda 
     Ni Wowe, Yesu wanjye ! 
     Uhor’ untabar' iteka;
     Ntugir' ubw’ uhinduka. 
     Urukundo rwawe rwinshi, 
     Waje muri twe mw isi 
     Ngw abazimiy’ ubashake, 
     Ubatarure bose.

3 . Koko, yitanze kubwanjye
     No kummeny’ arammenya. 
     Yemeye kunshyira mu nzu,
     Tukajya dusangira. 
     Mu ntege nke zanjye zose 
     Arashaka kunkiza : 
     N’ inyangamugay' akunda 
     Kumfasha no kumpira.

4 . Amaraso yawe, Yesu, 
     Ni yo mas’ ashobora 
     Kunkurahw ibyaha byanjye;
     Ampa gukiranuka. 
     Mwe kumbwir' ibindi byose :
     N’ Umurokozi wanjye, 
     Kandi yemera no kumpa 
     Amahoro y'iteka.

Gushimisha_147.songBody:
1 . Uburyo Yes’ ankunda 
     Burantangaza cyane. 
     Ubuntu yangiriye 
     Ni bwo bubimenyesha. 
     Yampay’ umunezero 
     N' amahor' aseseka. 
   /Mbwirwa n'ibyo ko nd’ uwe 
     Na We yukw ar’uwanjye./ (x 2)

2 . Ubwiza bw' isanzure 
     N'uburabyo bwo mw isi; 
     Nta wanezezwa na byo, 
     Kerets’ afite Yesu. 
     Ukw inyoni zishima
     Izina ry' Umuremyi 
   /Bimbwira ko nd’ uwawe 
     Nawe yukw’ Ur’ uwanjye./ (x 2)

3 . Ker’ ibyantinyishaga 
     None ntibinkangisha. 
     Ibyiza birangota, 
     Mukiza, nkwisegure. 
     Ne kukujijinganya, 
     Ne kugir’ amaganya: 
   /Kuko mbizi, nd’ uwawe, 
     Kandi naw’ ur’ uwanjye./ (x 2)

4 . Nd’ uwe wenyin’ iteka: 
     Nta cyadutandukanya. 
     Amahoro mez’ ampa 
     Arut’ ay’isi cyane. 
     Nubw’ iyi si n’ijuru 
     Byombi bizashiraho,
     /Azahor' ar' uwanjye,
     Nanjye ngo mb' uwe rwose./ (x 2)

Gushimisha_148.songBody:
1 . Nta rukundo rusa n’urwa Yesu 
     Rutazarangira: 
     Ni rwo ruzagez' abana be 
     Bose mu bwami bwe.

Ref:
Banguka, winjire 
Mur’ urwo rukundo 
Ruhebuje rw’Umucunguzi 
Watubabarijwe.

2 . Nta wundi mutima nk’ uwa Yesu 
     Wuzuy’ imbabazi, 
     Kand’ amarira y'abantu be
     Arayazi neza.

3 . Nta rindi jwi risa n’irya Yesu 
     Rihamagar’ abe, 
     Ngo tumwitabe, tumwumvire, 
     Tumukurikire.

4 . Nta bihembo bisa n’ibyo Yesu 
      Azah'  abantu be, 
      Azabiduh’ abamwizera, 
      Tukamukorera.

Gushimisha_149.songBody:
1 .Mbeg’ urukundo rw’ Imana yacu, 
    Nta warondor’ uko rungana !
    Rusumb’ ukwezi; rusumb’izuba;
    Kand’ i kuzimu rugerayo.
    Rwatumye Yes’aza mw isi yacu, 
    Ngw indushy’ aturuhure;
    Nacya kirara cy’inzererezi, 
    Rwatumye S’acyakira.

Ref:
Mbes’ urukundo rw’Imana yacu 
Rwagereranywa n’iki? 
Mw ijuru n’isi baruririmbe, 
Kugez’ iteka ryose !

2 . Ingoma zose zo mw isi yacu
     Zijya zihita, zishiraho;
     Abang’ Imana, Ntibayisenge, 
     Bazapfa bose be kwibukwa.
     Nyamar’ urwo rukundo rw’Imana 
     Rutagir’ akagero,
     Urw’ idukunda tw’ abari mw isi, 
     Nirwo rutazashira.

3 . Inyanja zose zaba nka wino, 
     Ijuru rikab’ impapuro,
     Ibyatsi nabyo bakabigira 
     Byos’ uducumu tw’abanditsi,
     Ab’isi bose bakandikaho
     Iby’urukundo rwayo,
     Ntibabimara ! Ntibyakwirwaho ! 
     Hakam’ inyanj’ ari yo !

4 . Kand’ ukw ikunda Umwana wayo, 
     Jye Ni kw’ inkunda, ntakwiriye.
     Nar’ umugome, nukw’ impa Yesu, 
     Ngw’ ambambirwe ku Musaraba.
     Mu bo Yacunguj’ ayo maraso 
     Nzi yuko nanjye ndimo.
     Nzajya ndirimba urwo rukundo, 
     Ndukwize mw isi yose.

Gushimisha_15.songBody:
1.Nimushim' izina ryiza ry'Uwiteka Rurema;
N'icyubahiro cye cyinshi ni mucyamamaze hose hose!
Nimuvug' urukundo rwe, bose barwumve,
Abo ku mpera y'isi bamenye kw akiza.

Ref:
Urukundo rw'Uwiteka ruratemba nk'uruzi
Kand'ubuntu bwe n'ibambe ntabwo bizashir’ iteka ryose.

2 . Nimushim' Umwami Yesu : ni We Mwana w'Intama
 Wapfiriy’ abanyabyaha, hanyum' agahambwa mu gituro !
 Maze, ku wa gatatu, yaneshej' urupfu, 
Arazuk' arazamuka, yima mw ijuru.

3 . Kand' umuns' uzaza vuba,Yes' agaruke mw isi
 Kwim' ingoma ye n'ubwami
 Mu cyubahiro n'ubwiza bwinshi,
 Isi n'ijuru byombi binezerwe hamwe
 N'inyamaswa n'inyoni n'ibyaremwe byose.

4 . Icyo gihe cy'ibirori, tuzarimba twishimye,
Twiteguye nk'umugeni, ukw arimba yitegur' umukwe;
Kukw Umwam' azamanuka ngw az' adusange,
Tub' imbata ze zera zinezerw' iteka.

Gushimisha_150.songBody:
1 . Nishimiye ko Data wa twese
     Yandikishij’ iby'urukundo rwe;
     Mu byiz’ Imana yavuze byose,
    Nta kirut' iki, ko Yes’ ankunda.

Ref:
Nishimiye ko Yes' ankunda:
Arankunda!  Arankunda!
Nishimiye ko Yes’ ankunda,
Nubwo ntakwiriye.

2 . Kand’ iyo nyobye, nkamushavuza,
     Ntareka kunkunda ntakwiriye;
     Kand’ ikinsubiz’ aho Yes' ari
     Cyane n’ ukwibuk' urukundo rwe.

3 . Ni ndeb’ ubwiza bwe bwo mw ijuru,
     Nzajya ndirimb’ ik’ iteka ryose ?
     Nzajya mmubaza ndirimba ntya, nti
     Yesu, n’iki cyakunkundishije ?

4 . Kand’ urukundo ni rwo rwazanye
     Yesu kunshunguz' urupfu rubi.
     Kokw’ arankunda, ndabizi neza :
     Nanjye ndamukunda, ndamushima.

Gushimisha_151.songBody:
1 . Yes’ arush’ abandi bose—Kudukunda; 
     Arush' ukw’ abavandimwe —Bakundana.
     Nahw’ izindi nshuti zacu 
     Zaduhararuka zose,
     YESU ntabw’ Ahemukira—Ab’ akunda.

2 . N'iki gihesh’ ubugingo—Budashira ? 
     S’ ukumenya Yesu wacu—Udukunda?
     Twarazimiye nk' intama, 
     Yes' aradushakashaka, 
     Atubony’ atwinjiz' ubwo—Mu rugo rwe

3 . Tumumenye kw ar'  inshuti—Yishimira 
     Kuduh' imigisha yose—N' imbabazi. 
     Imitima yac’ ikunda 
     Kumvir’  iyi Nshuti yacu 
     No kumwizigira cyane—Tudatinya.

4 . Kand’ ibyaha byacu byari—Bikabije: 
    Yes’ aterwa n'urukundo—Kudupfira :
    Ni byo  bituneshereza; 
    Ni byo biturind' ibibi, 
    Tukayoboka ya nzira—Iger’ i We.

Gushimisha_152.songBody:
1 . Har' umukunzi nka Yesu wacu ? 
     Oya ye, nta n' umwe! 
     Nta n' udukiz' ubumuga nka We : 
     Oya ye, nta n' umwe !

Ref:
Yes' az' ibiturushya byose; 
Atuber' umuyobora. 
Har' umukunzi nka Yesu wacu?
Oya ye, nta n' umwe !

2 . Har' und’ utungan' akera nka We ? 
     Oya ye, nta n' umwe ! 
     Nyamara nta wiyoroshya nka We :
     Oya ye, nta n' umwe.

3 . Nta munsi n' umw' adusigirira; 
     Oya ye, na hato !
     Haba n'ijoro tutaba kumwe, 
     Oya ye, na hato !

4 . Mbese, har’ uwo yigez’ ahana ?
Oya ye, nta n’ umwe !
Mu banyabyaha har’ uw’ aheza ?
Oya ye, nta n’ umwe.

5 . Har’ indi mpano twahabwa nka We ?
Oya ye, na hato !
Itamutwimye yatwim’ ijuru ?
Oya ye, na hato !

6 . Reka dushim’ Umukiza wacu !
N’ ukuri : n’ ashimwe !
Azaz’ asange dutegereje :
N’ ukuri : azaze !

Gushimisha_153.songBody:
1 . Yes' urankunda, Mukiza mwiza; 
     Yes' urankunda : sinz' icyakunkundishije !
     Waje kunkiza, nd' umunyabyaha; 
     Ubwo wanshunguye, nagupfira !

Ref:
Njye nguhimbaza, Mukiza mwiza ! 
Njye nguhimbaza, Mucunguzi wanjy' unkunda ! 
Njye nguhimbaza, Mukiza mwiza :
Nzakuririmbir' ibihe byose.

2 . Waje kunkiza, Mukiza mwiza; 
     Waje kunkiza: wabyemejwe n'iki, mbese?
     Icyo nzi n'uko wabay' inshungu,
     Ubwo wamfirag' urupfu rubi.

3 . Nshorera, Yesu, Mukiza mwiza : 
     Nshorera, Yesu; jy' ungez’ ah' ushaka hose,
     Mu nzira nziza, cyangwa no mu mbi, 
     Nger' ikirenge mu cyawe, Yesu.

4 . Yes' uzampemba, Mukiza mwiza: 
     Yes' uzampemba, ntakwiriy' ubuntu bwawe !
     Kandi nzareba n'ubwiza bwawe, 
    Nguhimbazanye n'abera bose.

Gushimisha_154.songBody:
1 . Ndabaririmbira—Iby’Uwamfiriye, 
Wankunze mfit' ibyaha, narararutse !             
Wambonyemw’ iki, Krisito, 
Ukaza mw is’ ukamfira ?

2 . Yasiz' ingoma ye,—Nukw’ aramanuka; 
Baramusuzugura, ntibamwemera.
Har’ indi nshuti nka We se 
Yakund' abayihinyuye ?

3 . Baramushingije,—Bashash' imyambaro, 
Ngo, Hozana; hahirw' Umwami Krisito!
Bukeye, barahinduka,
Bati: Nabambwe ! Nabambwe !

4 . Bafash' Umwam’ubwo,—Baramuhemura; 
Bakiz’ umwambuzi, babamba Krisito.
Iby' arabyihanganira,
Ngw’ abon' ukw aducungura.

5 . Yavuye mw ijuru,—Aza mur' iyi si, 
Abur' aho yarambik' umusaya we; 
Amfira ku Musaraba,
Ngo nanjy' angeze mw ijuru.

6 . Ntabwo nzarambirwa—Kubaririmbira 
Iby' urukundo rwe n' uko yababajwe. 
Yanyemeye nk'inshuti ye:
Nzavuga hos' izina rye !

Gushimisha_155.songBody:
1 . Yesu, nguhagaz' imbere,
     Nibaza binyobeye
     Icyakunkundishij' utyo,
     Nd' uwatsinzwe, mpindanye.

Ref:
Biranyobeye, birantangaje :
Nzajya mbitangarira!
Biranyobeye, birantangaje,
Yuko wankunz' utyo, Yesu !

2 . Wasenze kubwanjy' utya, ngo:
     Ntibib' uko jye nshaka.
     N' ibyaha byanjye byakwishe, 
     Ntabw' ari za nguma nsa !

3 . Birya byuya by' amaraso, 
     Ntangar' iyo mbyibutse : 
     Ibyo byabaye kubwanjye 
     Rya jor' i Getsemane.

4 . Wishyizehw’ ibyaha byanjye, 
     Bihinduka nk' ibyawe; 
     Wehoho nta cyo wakoze : 
     Ni jye bakujijije !

5 . Wabambwe mu cyimbo cyanjye, 
     Ng' unkize kurimbuka, 
     Ahubwo nzajye mw ijuru,
     Ngushim' ubudasiba.

Gushimisha_156.songBody:
1 . Ni jye, Yesu, witanze 
     Kera ku Musaraba, 
     Mbitewe n'urukundo 
     Ngo ngukiz'  ibyaha byawe. 
     Mugenzi, narakwitangiye : 
     Wanyituy' iki wowe ?

2 . Narets' ubwiza bwanjye 
     Nari mfite mw ijuru, 
     Nsig' umucyo kwa Data, 
     Nza mu mwijima w' iyi si,
     Naretse byose nkurengera : 
     Warets’ iki kubwanjye ?

3 . Banyish' urupfu rubi, 
     Birut' uko byavugwa; 
     Navushijw' amaraso 
     Ng' utazapfa nabi nawe 
     Nakwihanganiy' ibyo byose : 
     Wanyihanganiy' iki?

4 . Navuy' i Wanjy' i bwami, 
     Nger' ah' uri mw isi mbi, 
     Nkuzanir' agakiza  
     N' ubugingo budashira.
     Ko nakugabiy' impan' ubwo, 
     Wigeze kuntur' iki ?

Gushimisha_157.songBody:
1 . Mukiz' umpe kumenya,
     Naho kab' agace, 
     K'urukundo rw'igitangaza 
     Rwatumy' udupfira.

Ref:
Ummenyeshe, Mukiza, 
Uko wababajwe, 
Ubw' Uwera wang' ibyaha pe
Wishyiragahw’ ibyanjye.

2 . Ummenyesh' ibyo, Yesu, 
     Kuko bikomeye, 
     Bikarut' uko byashobora 
     Kumenywa n' umuntu.

3 . Mbes' imbereri, Yesu, 
     Ni zo zakubambye ? 
     Oya si zo, ni za mbabazi 
     Wangiriy' ubwanjye.

4 . Ntangajwe na rwa rupfu 
     Wamfiriye, Yesu,  
     Ko rwashoboye kunshungura 
     Ngo nkire, ntungane.

5 . Ni rwo runkiz' ibyaha 
     Bose bambonaho; 
     Si byo byonyine: runkuramo 
     N' ibinyihishemo.

6 . Mukiza, nshenjagura; 
     Men' ibinangiwe ! 
     Unyemeze yuk' unnesheje : 
    Unyimemo, Mwami.

Gushimisha_158.songBody:
1 . Umvir' ijwi rya Yesu, 
     Ni we Mukiza wawe. 
     Umv’ arakubaz’ ati : 
     Munyabyah' urankunda ?

2 . Umugore yabasha 
     Kwibagirw' umwana we?  
     Nahw ibyo byashoboka, 
     Jyeho nzajya nkwibuka.

3 . Ni jye wakubohoye, 
     Nkuvur’ ibikomere;
     Ni jye waguhabuye; 
     Ni jye mucy' ukwakira.

4 . Kand’ urukundo rwanjye  
     Ntirubasha gushira; 
     Rurut' urundi rwose, 
     Kuko rutarangira.

5 . Mu gihe gikwiriye, 
     Nzakujyana mw ijuru; 
     Uzabon' ibyishimo : 
     Mbes' urankunda cyane ?

6 . Mwami, birambabaje 
     K' urukundo ngukunda 
     Ari ruke hanyuma 
     Y'urwo rukundo rwawe.

7 . Ndagukunda buhoro, 
     Nubwo bidahebuje. 
     Nuk' umpe kurushaho 
     Kugukunda, Mukiza.

Gushimisha_159.songBody:
1 . Jye nahoze ndengerwa 
     N' inyanja y' urupfu, 
     Ntwawe n'ibicumuro, 
     Mpotorwa n'ibyaha; 
     Maze ndabukwa Yesu,
     Ndamutakambira; 
     Aransingir' aramfat’ankuramo !

Ref:
//Nakijijwe n'ubuntu bwe: 
Nta wundi wandokoye, atari We.//(x 2)

2 . Nawe, munt' urengerwa, 
     Ubur’amas' ubu ! 
     Reb' uwo Murokozi :
     Aragukuramo !
     Imiraba ntibura 
     Kumvira Nyira yo : 
     Arashaka kugukiz' umwemere !

3 . Haz’ ibyago noneho, 
     Cyangw' imibabaro, 
     Nzi ko ntazazikama : 
     Yes' azankuramo.
     Azammaramw’ ubwoba,
     Amp’ ibinkwiriye. 
     Ni kw’ azakugirira, n'umwemera.

Gushimisha_16.songBody:
1 . Aba Yesu bishimira
Izina rye ryiza;
Ribamara imibabaro,
Rikabatinyura.

2 . Umutim’ ukomeretse
Ni ryo riwukiza;
Ushonje rirawuhaza;
Riruhur’ urushye.

3 . Ni ryo ngabo yanjye nziza
Ihor’ inkingira,
N'urutare nubakaho,
N’inzu yanjy’itagwa.

4 . Ur’ Umutambyi nemera
N’Umwam’ Untegeka
N’Umwunger’ ujy’andagira
N’Inshuti nizera.

5 . Ni Wowe bugingo bwanjye,
Kandi kuri Wowe
Ni ho nsiganirwa , Yesu;
Kand’ uri n’ inzira.

6 . Nuko ndasaba wemere
Ishimwe ngushima,
Nubwo ntabasha kuvuga
Ibigukwiriye.

7 . Yes’ ubwo nzakwirebera,
Uk’ uri mw ijuru,
Ni bwo nzajya ngusingiza,
Nkuko bikwiriye.

8 . Na non’ uko mbishoboye,
Nzajya nguhimbaza;
No mw ipfa ryanjy’ iryo zina
Rizampumuriza.

Gushimisha_160.songBody:
1 . Mbeg' urukundo rwaw’ umfitiye ! 
     Sinarumenya: rurahebuje.
     Mukiza wanjy' Urumpishurire, 
     Rumpumurize no kunyobora,
                 Ni nteshuka.

2 . Urwo rukundo narugera nte? 
     Ruransumba : sinarurondora. 
     Njye ndwerekana gus’ umfashije, 
     Njye mvug' uko rukiz’abangizi 
                B' abihebe.

3 . Urwo rukundo naruvuga nte, 
     Ko ntabon’ amagamb' akwiriye ? 
     Nyamar' akanwa kanjye kifuza 
     Guhora nshimish’Umurokozi 
                Unkund’ atyo.

4 . Urwo rukundo narushimira nte ?
     Mukiza wanjye, ne guceceka ! 
     Ndirimb' imbabazi wangiriye, 
     Jy' umunyabyaha wakugomeye, 
                Ukankiza !

5 . Nta cyo nabasha kugushimisha;  
     Mukiza wanjye, nd’ umukene pe.
     Niringiy’ urukund’ umfitiye:
     Mbes' Uwankunz' akanyitangira,
                Yanyim'iki?

6 . Ndashaka, Yesu, kukugumaho, 
     Ur' isoko y'amaz' ahoraho,
     Njye mpore nkunywah' ubudasiba, 
     Ummar' inyota n'umubabaro, 
                Sinkuveho !

7 . Mukiz' ubwo nzagera mw ijuru, 
     Amaso yanjy’ akakwirebera, 
     Ni h’ urukundo rwawe nzabona 
     Uko ndumeny’ uko ndusingiza, 
                Mucunguzi!

Gushimisha_161.songBody:
1 . Mbwir’ amagambo ya Yesu; 
     Mbwir’ ibyo yankoreye.
     Ndirimbira n' indirimbo 
     Irut' izindi zose :
     Ya yindi y'abamarayika 
     Ba bungeri bumvise
     Bat' Uwiteka yubahwe, 
     Kand' amahor' abe mw isi.

     Mbwir' amagambo ya Yesu; 
     Mbwir' ibyo yankoreye. 
     Ndirimbira n'indirimbo 
     Irut' izindi zose.

3 . Mbwir’ iby' iminsi yamaze 
     Ashukwa n' umwanzi we, 
     N'uko Satani yatsinzwe
     N'Ijambo ry' Uwiteka. 
     Mbwira n'ibyiza yakoze 
     N'iby'imibabaro ye 
     N'uko yahinyuwe n'abe 
     N'uko yasuzugurwaga.

4 . Mbwir' iby'urupfu rwa Yesu 
     N'iby'Umusaraba we 
     N'uko yahambw' akazuka :
     Non' ariho, ntagipfa. 
     Mbwir' urukundo rwe rwinshi 
     Rwatumy' anshungur’atyo. 
     Ai we !  bintey' agahinda:
     Yes' ibyo yambabarijwe !

Gushimisha_162.songBody:
1 . Nganirir’ibya Yesu 
     N' iby' urukundo rwe
     N' uko yavuye mw’ ijuru,
     Ngw az’ aducungure.
     Ni yo magamb' ankwiriye, 
     Nd' indushyi, mpindanye.
     Yamviriy’ amaraso ye 
     Ngw anshungure, mb' uwe.

Ref:
Nganirir' ibya Yesu ( x 3) 
N’iby’urukundo rwe.

2 . Twagereranya n'iki 
     Ibyo yababajwe ? 
     Ntiyanze kutubambirwa 
     Ngw adukiz’ ibyaha.
     Bisubiremo witonze, 
     Ne kubyibagirwa, 
     Ngo mmeny’ icyo yankoreye 
     N' uko yanshunguye.

3 . Onger' unyibuts' ibye,
     Mbimeny’ uko biri. 
     Bivug' uburyo bworoshye 
     Nk'ubwiriz' umwana.
     N'umbonan' umubabaro, 
     Ujy'umber' inshuti, 
     Umbwir' iby' ubwo buntu bwe 
     Ngo bimpumurize.

4 . Hor' ubimbwir' iteka :
     Ntibizandambira. 
     Umva, ni jye munyabyaha 
     Yesu yaj' ashaka ! 
     Erega, n'igitangaza : 
     Mbyamamaze hose, 
     Uwer' utagir' inenge 
     Kumfira ndi mubi !

5 . Uzonger' ubimbwire 
     Iteka n' ubona 
     Yuko gukund’ iby'iyi si 
     Binyaz' umugisha.
     Unyibuts' iby'isi yindi 
     Irut' iyi cyane, 
     Ngo mbon' Umwami w'iyo si, 
     Antunganye, nnyurwe.

Gushimisha_163.songBody:
1 . Uhereye kera kose, 
     Yesu yahoze mw ijuru, 
     Ar' i buryo bw'Uwiteka, 
     Ni yo Man' Isumba byose.

2 . Maz' urukundo rwe rwinshi 
     Rwamuzanye mur'iyi si, 
     Avuka nk' abandi bantu,
     Ashir' ubwan' arakura.

3 . Atangira no kwigisha 
     Ibyiza by'Uwiteka, Se; 
     Kand' abarwayi bizeye 
    Yakundaga kubakiza.

4 . Ijambo rye ryakizaga 
     Impumyi n' abaremaye; 
    Yakoraga ku babembe 
     Bamwizeye, bagakira.

5 . Kandi n'abari bapfuye, 
     Yabashaga kubazura; 
     Nta bwo Yesu yananiwe 
     Gukiz' umunt' umwizeye.

6 . Kand' ikirut' ibyo byose, 
     Yabwirizag' abakene 
     Iby' urukundo rw'Imana
     N'iby' agakiza k' iteka.

7 . Maz' abantu babi cyane 
     Batemey' ibyo yavuze 
     Batewe n'ishyari ryinshi 
     Kumwic' urupfu rubi pe.

8 . Yabambishijw' imbereri 
     Kubwacu, ku Musaraba; 
     Batoboy' ibiganza bye 
     Byakirishag' imbabazi.

9 . Dor' uko yadupfiriye, 
     Azir' ibyaha bya twese; 
     Yapfuye mu cyimbo cyacu 
     Kubw' urukundo rwe rwinshi.
 
10 . Kand' uz' ahw’ ar' amwizeye, 
       Ntiyabura kumwakira. 
       Yarabisezerany' ati :  
       Sinzamuheza na hato.

Gushimisha_164.songBody:
1 . Yes’ avukiy’ i Betelehemu, 
     Bamuryamishije mu muvure :
     N’ umunyambabazi nyinshi cyane:
     Ng’ uko yaj’ anshaka !  (x 3)
   N’umunyambabazi nyinshi cyane
     Nguk’ uko yaj’ anshaka !

2 . Yesu yanshunguriye ku Giti, 
     Kand’ abohor’ umutima wanjye.
     Ntangazwa cyane n’imbabazi ze :
     Yaziz’ ibyaha byanjye.    (x 3)
     Ntangazwa cyane n’ imbabazi ze :
     Yaziz’ ibyaha byanjye.

3 . Yesu ntahwema gukiz’ abantu : 
     Ntitugasubire mu ngeso mbi,
     Ngo tuzabane na We mw ijuru :
     Araduhamagara,     (x 3)
     Ngo tuzabane na We mw ijuru :
     Araduhamagara.

4 . Yes’ azagaruk’ atujyan’i We, 
     Tugumane na W’ iminsi yose,
     Kuko yabisezeranye natwe : 
      Azaza, ntazatinda.    (x 3)
     Kuko yabisezeranye natwe :
     Azaza, ntazatinda.

Gushimisha_165.songBody:
1 . Hozana, singizwa, 
     Yesu, Mukiza mwiza : 
     Watumenyesheje 
     Urukundo rw'Uwiteka.
     Usingizwe, Mwami :
     Wavuye mw ijuru, 
     Uzanir' ab' isi 
     Agakiza keza. (X 2)

2 . Hozana, singizwa, 
     Muvunyi w' ubugingo; 
     Imitim' ishime
     Iryo zina ryawe ryiza.
     None turirimbe 
     Izi ndirimbo nshya,
     Ngw abana b' Imana 
     Banezerwe bose. (x 2)

3 . Hozana, singizwa, 
     Wowe, Nshuti y' abantu. 
     Uwihangannye wese 
     Ntabwo wanga kumwakira.
     Wowe, Mwami mwiza, 
     Waje kutwigisha 
     No kutumenyesha 
     Uk' ukiranuka. (x 2)

4 . Hozana, singizwa, 
     Yesu, Mukiza wacu; 
    Wemeye kwitanga 
    Kubw' ibicumuro byacu,
    Wicisha bugufi, 
    Maz' upfira bose, 
    Kugira ngw’ abawe  
    Babon' ubugingo. (x 2)

Gushimisha_166.songBody:
1 . Ngwino  soko y’umugisha;
    Mp’ umutim’ ugushima,
Ntabw’ ukam’ iteka ryose;
Njye ngusingiza cyane.
Nyigisha guhora nsenga; 
Mmenye n’ubwiza bwawe,
Nizigir’ ubwami bwawe; 
Nyuzuz’ urukund’ ubu !

2 . Nyibutsa bya byiza byawe
Byose wakankoreye.
Nizeye yukw uzanjyana, 
Ukangeza mw ijuru.
Yesu, waranshatse, mpabye;
Nari kure yaw’ ubwo,
Unyigur’ urupfu rubi,
Wemera kumbambirwa.

3 . Ndi mu mwenda wawe, Mwami,
W’ubuntu wangiriye;
Unyigize hafi yawe,
Mmeny’ imbabazi zawe.
Satan’ ajy’angerageza
Ngo nindek’ unkund’ atyo.
Akir’ umutima wanjye,
Nuk’ undinde, mb’ uwawe.

Gushimisha_167.songBody:
1 . Yesu ni We nihishemo : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhingiro.
     Nta cyankurahw amahoro : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro:

Ref:
Umwami n’ igitare gikomeye,
Gikomeye, gikomeye :
Umwami n’ igitare gikomeye : 
Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.

2 . Ku Manyw’amber’ igicucu :
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro. 
     Amber’ itara n’ijoro : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.

3 . Mu mvur’amber’ ubwugamo :
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro
     Nta n’ubw’ imiv’ intembana : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.

4 . Nta byago byanter’ ubwoba : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.
     Nta mwanzi wese wankanga : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.

5 . Ntabwo nzav’aho Yes’ari : 
     Yamberey’ ubuhungiro.
     Na We ntazampemukira : 
     Azamber’ ubuhungiro.

Gushimisha_168.songBody:
1 . Mbumbatiwe nawe, Yesu, 
     Nta kizampangara, 
     Kand' urukund' umfitiye 
     Ni rwo runduhur' ubu.
     Numvis' amajwi meza 
     Y' abatugiy' imbere; 
     Bahora baririmba, 
     Bashima Yesu, bati :

Ref:
Mbumbatiwe nawe, Yesu, 
Nta kizampangara, 
Kand' urukund' umfitiye 
Ni rwo runduhur' ubu.

2 . Mbumbatiwe nawe, Yesu; 
     Ntabwo nkiganyira. 
     Nta cyo Satan' antwar’ ubu 
     N' amahane ye yose.
     Kand' amakuba na yo 
     Ntashobora kunsinda. 
     Ibyago by'isi byose 
     Ntibyadutandukanya.

3 . Yesu, Buhungiro bwanjye, 
     YESU wamfiriye, 
     Wowe, Rutare nshinzweho,
     Nzakwiringir' iteka.
     Nuko, njye nihangana : 
     Dor' iri joro ribi 
     Vuba rigiye gucya,
     Mpereko njye mw ijuru !

Gushimisha_169.songBody:
1 . Mana, nkuko wafashaga 
     Ba sogukuruza,
     Ni ko Natw’ uzadufasha 
     Mu myak’ ir’ imbere.

2 . Umuyaga w’ishuheri 
     Urawuturinda;
     Uzatuber’ ubuturo 
     Budashir’ iteka.

3 . Ker’ abakwiringiraga 
     Bari mu mahoro :
     Tugufite, ntitwifuza 
     Undi Murengezi.

4 . Imisoz’ itararemwa,
     Is’ itarabumbwa,
     Uhereye kera kose,
     Ur’ uko Wahoze.

5 . Imyaka igihumbi, Mana,
     Ni myinshi kuri twe.
     Kuri Wow’ iguhwaniye 
     N’umuns’ umwe musa.

6 . Imyak’ ijyan’ iby’iyi si 
     Nk’amaz’ ahurura,
     Bikibagirana vuba 
     Nk’inzozi z’ umuntu.

7 . Mana, wadutabaraga 
     Mu minsi ya kera.
     Na non’ uzaturengera 
     Tugeze ku gupfa.

Gushimisha_17.songBody:
1 . Nshim' Umuremy' uhoraho
 Wahanits' ijuru, 
  Inyanj' akazidendeza;
 Yiremeye byose.
 Yashyizeho n'izuba rye
 Kumurika ku munsi,
 N'ukwezi n'inyenyeri bye
Byo kwaka n'ijoro.

2 . Mushime ko yategetse
 Imyaka ngw imere;
 Yaremeshej' ijambo rye
 Ibizima byose.
 Nitegerez' ibyiza bye
 Ku mpande zos' iteka,
 Hano hasi no hejuru;
 Ntabwo bihinyuka.

3 . Mw isi nta kintu kiriho
 Kiterekan' ibye.
 Ni We wenyin' utegeka
 Izuba n'imvura.
 lmana ni Y' ibeshaho
 Twe n'inyamaswa zose.
 Nta hantu twayihungira,
 Nta na hw itagera.

Gushimisha_170.songBody:
1 . Utinyuke kuyoborwa 
     Mu nzira nziza y'Imana.
     Kukw ishyikir' ari ryiza, 
     Ugend' ucamw uyoboka.

2 . Ntutinye gut' ibya kera, 
     Byiguhindish' imishitsi 
     Kuk' umucyo w' Uwiteka 
     Wakir' ah' ugenda hose.

3 . Urwanir' ibyiza byose 
     N’ ubihorw’ uzabipfire.
     Ujye wubahish' Imana 
     Ng' uzabe mu cyubahiro.
Gushimisha_170.songTitle: Utinyuke kuyoborwa mu nzira nziza y'Imana

Gushimisha_171.songBody:
1 . Amahoro Yesu—Ah' abantu be 
     Ntagir' akagero,—Ntarondoreka;
     Ajy'ahumuriza—Abayafite; 
     N' utayata, ntabwo—Wayakurwaho.

Ref:
Wiringir' Imana :—Uyiringira 
Ntabur' amahoro—Mez' adashira

2 . Abo Yes' arindish’—Amaboko ye 
     Nta mubish' ubasha—Kubageraho;
     Nta magany' abasha—Guhagarika 
     Imitim' irindwa—N' Umucunguzi.

3 . Ibyishimo byose—N'ibyago byacu 
    Biva mu rukundo—Rw' Umwam' Imana.
    We gushidikanya;—Jy' uyiringira; 
    Ntiyahemukira—Uyizer' atyo.

Gushimisha_172.songBody:
1 . Mwemere kw Iman' ibaha 
     Umurokozi 
     Witeguye kubakiza, 
     Ubakwiriye.
     Mw ijuru no mw isi yose, 
     Ni We nyir' ububasha;
     Kand' ubony' uwo Mukiza 
     Aranezerwa.

2 . Azatuma muba beza, 
     Mumere nka We; 
     Umukurikira wese 
     Ntabw' azaneshwa. 
     Mu rugamba, ntabahana;
     Ahor' abarwanira; 
     Kand' ubwe yemeye rwose 
     Kubarengera.

3 . Mukiz' ubwaw' ubabwira 
     Iby' amahoro, 
     Yuk' Unyuz' inshuti zawe 
     Mu nzira nziza.
     Kand' ubwaw' urabarinda 
     Kugira ngo be kugwa,
     Bave mu makuba yose 
     Bayanesheje.

4 . Mwam' ibyago ni bitera 
     Cyangw' amakuba, 
     Utwongerer' imbaraga,
     Tukwiringire.
     Maze twizigiy' ibyawe,
     Dutumbire mw ijuru; 
     Twishimire kuzabona 
     Wa munsi mwiza.

Gushimisha_173.songBody:
1 . Imana ni yo mwungeri 
     Undagiz' urukundo; 
     Niringiye yuko ntazakena, 
     Kuko nd' intama ya Yesu.

2 . Andyamisha mu cyanya cye 
     Cy'ubwatsi bwiza cyane,
     Anjyan' i ruhande rw' imigezi, 
     Itemba nez' idasuma.

3 . Ansubizamw’ intege nshya, 
     Zinkomez' umutima,
     Anyobor' inzir' igororotse 
     Kubwa rya zina rye ryera.

4 . Nubwo naca mu gikombe 
     Cy'umwijima w'urupfu, 
     Sinagir' ikibi ntinya cyose, 
     Kuko turi kumw' iteka.

5 . Kand' ujy' undindish' inkoni 
     Yawe n'inshyimbo, Mana, 
     Nukw ibyo bizampumuririza 
     No mu gicucu cy'urupfu.

6 . Untunganiriz' ameza 
     Mu maso y' abanyanga, 
     Unsize n'amavuta mu mutwe, 
     Ump' igikombe cyuzuye.

7 . N'ukur' imbabazi zawe 
     Zizanyomahw iteka;
     Nanjye nzaba mu nzu y'Uwiteka
     Ibihe byose, nishima.

Gushimisha_174.songBody:
1 . Jy'uba maso, wowe muntu wizeye :
     Mu gitondo, jya wisung’ Imana, 
     Kuk'  Umwanzi yoshy' abataba maso 
     Ngw abagushe kukw abanga.

Ref:
Jy'uba maso :  wicogora !
Jy'uba maso : senga !

2 . Jy'uba maso, no ku manywa y'ihangu, 
     Iby'isi byibagij' iby'ijuru; 
     Weho, gir' umwanya wo kwiherera, 
     Ng’ useng' Umukiza wawe.

3 . Jy'uba maso n'imunsi na n'ijoro, 
    Wibuk' ibyiza by' inshuti Yesu; 
    Ujy'umushakish' umutima wawe : 
    Mubwir' ibikubabaje.

4 . Jy'uba maso, hose mu gihe cyose : 
     Satan' akubikiriye hose, 
     Ashak' uburyo yaguseseramo, 
     Ngo yimur' Umwami Yesu.

Gushimisha_175.songBody:
1 . Mwunger’ udukunda,—Jy' uturagira, 
     N' uduhora hafi,—Twatiny' iki se? 
     Tugukurikire,---Iy' ujya hose,
     Naho haba habi—Cyangwa se heza.

2 . Mwunger' udukunda,—Tuz' ijwi ryawe. 
     Uduhamagaye,—Turanezerwa 
     Kand' iy’ uduhannye,---Turabyemera. 
     Tur' intama zawe :—Utwiharire.

3 . Wavuy' amaraso,—Mwungeri mwiza, 
     Kugira ngw intama—Uducungure. 
     Washyize kuri twe,---Ikimenyetso,
      Ni cyo Mwuka Wera,—Udutuyemo.

4 . Mwunger' Uturinde,—Uturengere 
     Amasega mabi—Ye kutwegera. 
     Nta cy' azadutwara,---Kuk' ukomeye. 
     Turikumwe, byose—Biranesheka.

Gushimisha_176.songBody:
1 . We kwumvir' Umubi ujy' agushuka. 
     Umwumviye wese ab' acumuye : 
     Wamutsinda none kubw' Umukiza, 
     Byagufash' ubundi kujy' umunesha.

Ref:
Saba Yes' agufashe, 
Agukize mu moshya; 
Azahor' akurinda, 
Akuneshereze.

2 . Wirind' ubucuti bw'abantu babi; 
     Bakunda kukoshya gukor' ibibi. 
     Ntukavug' ijambo ritey' isoni, 
     Wubahe n'izina ry'Imana yera.

3 . Ujy' ugira neza, ufash' abandi; 
     Wirinde kubeshya, ahubw' ujy' uba
     Inyangamugayo, kukw iby' ari byo 
     Bikundwa na Yesu ujy' agufasha.

4 . Unesha Satani byamwandikiwe 
     Kw azahabw' ikamba n'Umwami Yesu.
     Tugir' intege nke, nyamara Yesu 
     Ni we Mutabazi, udushoboza.

Gushimisha_177.songBody:
1 . Mwen' Imana yizerwa ,
     Waterwa n'ubwoba ? 
     Mbega, ntiwatorewe 
     Umwam' ugukunda ? 
     Ng' umeny' Uwagutoye,
     Uce mu nzira ye, 
     Unyuz' ikirenge mu cye 
     Kukw ari we Shobuja.

2 . N’ ubabara, wibwire 
     Kw akubabarira; 
     Ni hagir' ugutuka, 
     Umubabarire; 
     Wizigir' ugukunda :
     Shikama kigabo,
     Ng' uzatsind' abanzi bawe, 
     Uberek' urukundo.

3 . N' ubon' ibiruhanya,
     Ukumva k’ utsinzwe, 
     We kugir' agahinda, 
     Meny' ibigufasha;
     Ngibi : senga, wizere;
     Komeza gusenga; 
     Maz' ureb' Umusaraba 
     W'Umwana w'Uwiteka.

Gushimisha_178.songBody:
1 . Iy’ utewe n'amakub' akomeye, 
     Ukiheb' ubonye ko bicitse pe, 
     Jy’ubar' imigisha yaw' ukw’ ingana ! 
     Erega ni myinshi yo gutangaza !

Ref:
Bar' iyo migisha nonaha, 
ly' Imana yakugabiye. 
Uyibare !  Ntusige n'umwe ! 
Erega ni myinshi yo gutangaza !

2 . Nturemerewe, se, no kwiganyira ? 
     Ugira ngo ntibicyihanganirwa ? 
     Bara ya migish' Iman' ijy' iguha, 
     Umutim’ ushyike mu nda, wishime !

3 . Har' abakurushij' amajyambere, 
     Arikw aya Yesu ni y’ ahebuje ! 
     Ereg' ubutunz' ufite mw ijuru, 
     Bwo nta wabugura ! Nuko, humura !

4 . Amakuba naho yaba mensh' ate. 
    We kwiheb' Iman' irayategeka. 
    Wibuk' imigisha yakugabiye ! 
    Byos' izabitungany' ikuyobore!

Gushimisha_179.songBody:
1 . Iy' urushye, iy' uremerewe, 
    Bibwire Yesu, bibwire Yesu ! 
    Iy' ukumbuy' abakunzi bawe, 
    Byos' ubimuganyire !

 Bibwire Yesu, bibwire Yesu ! 
Ni We nshut' ihebuje, 
Nta n'indi wabon’ imeze nka We; 
Byos' ubimuganyire !

2 .Ibyo byago, ndetse n'amarira, 
    Bibwire Yesu, bibwire Yesu ! 
    Bya byaha bihishwe bikunesha,
    Byos' ubimuganyire !

3 . Ubw' utiny' indwara no gupfusha. 
     Bibwire Yesu, bibwire Yesu ! 
     Ubwo wibaz' iby'umunsi w'ejo 
     Byos' ubimuganyire !

4 . Mbes' ugir' ubwoba bwo kuzapfa ?
     Bibwire Yesu, bibwire Yesu ! 
     Ntuzi yuk' Umwami Yes' azaza ? 
     Byos' ubimuganyire!

Gushimisha_18.songBody:
1 . Mukiza, Mwungeri mwiza,
Dushorez' urukundo. 
Ikiganza cyawe cyiza
Kitugaburir' ubu.

Ref:
Uhimbazwe Mucunguzi, 
Mukiza tur’ abawe. 
Twebwe tur' abaw' iteka 
Kand' Uhimbazwe, Yesu.

2 . No kubw' imbabazi zawe 
Utwuhagir' ibyaha; 
No kubw' imbaraga zawe 
Wez' imitima yacu.

3 . Turashaka kukumvira 
Mu mategeko yawe; 
Nuko kubw' ibyo, dushaka 
Kubon' imyizerere.

4 . Mukiza, Mwungeri mwiza.
Turagukurikira. 
Utugwiriz' imbaraga 
Kand’ ujy' uturamira.

Gushimisha_180.songBody:
1 . Impara yaguy' umwuma 
     Nkukw ishak' amazi, 
     Mana ni ko njya nkwifuza 
     Ng' umpemburish' ubuntu.

2 . Ni Wowe Man' ihoraho, 
     Maz' ammar' inyota; 
     Ni ryari nzakwirebera, 
     Mu maso, Mucunguzi ?

3 . Mutima wanjy' uhagaze 
     Ubabajwe n'iki ? 
     Wiringir' Itazabura 
     Gukiz' uwihanganye.

4 . Uwifuz' Imana wese 
     Imuhaz' ibyiza, 
     Nuko nizere, nishime, 
     Nshim' imbabazi zayo.

Gushimisha_181.songBody:
1 . Mwa nshuti za Yesu mwe, 
     Nimuze, twamamaze 
     Hos' umunezero wacu, 
     Nukw indirimbo z'ishimwe 
     Zizamuke, ziger' i bwami mw ijuru.

Ref:
Turajy' i Siyoni, 
Ku murwa mwiza w'Imana, 
Tunyur' inzir' ijya mw ijuru: 
Ku murwa w'Imana yacu.

2 . Utaz' Imana yacu 
     Yaziririmb’ ate se ? 
     N'abana b' Umwami basa 
     Bashobora gusingiza 
     Uwabacunguye, nkuko bikwiriye.

3 . Umurwa w' i Siyoni 
     Wuzuy' ibyiza byinshi, 
     Kandi mu nzir' iganayo . 
     Tutaragera mw ijuru, 
     Twahaw’ ingwate yabyo ngo tunezerwe.

4 . Muhumure noneho ! 
     Nimuze, twishimane. 
     Tugende turirimbana, 
     Duca mu bwatsi bwa Yesu; 
     Tugiye mw is’ irut' iyi, ni mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_182.songBody:
1 . Mur'iyo nzir' iruhije, 
     Mbese, muragana he ? 
     Turagana mu gihugu 
      Iman' itunganije. 
     Mu bikombe n'imisozi.
     Ni ho duca tujy' i bwami, 
    / Ni ho duca tujy' i bwami : 
     Nshuti, muze, tujyane !/ (x 2)

2 . Mur' icyo gihugu gishya, 
     Ariko mwizey' iki? 
     Izaduh' imyenda yera 
     N'amakamb' adashira
     Na ya mazi y'ubugingo,
     Tubane n'Iman' iteka, 
     /Tubane n'Iman' iteka :
     Nshuti, muze, tujyane !/ (x 2)

3 . Mugend’ uko muri kose, 
     Nta n' ibyago mutinya ? 
     Uwitek' azaturinda, 
     Umwuk' udukomeze. 
     Uwitek' adutabare, 
     Yesu, na W' atujy’ imbere, 
    /Yesu na W' atujy' imbere : 
     Nshuti, muze, tujyane !/ (x 2)

4 . Natwe twaza, mwaturinda, 
     Ngo tujyan' aho mujya ? 
     Nuko, tubikunze cyane,
     Twishimye bihebuje. 
     Nimuze, tutabasiga : 
     Yes' aradutegereza; 
     /Yes' aradutegereza : 
     Nshuti, muze, tujyane !/ (x 2)

Gushimisha_183.songBody:
1 . Tugiy' i wacu mw ijuru :
     Muze, mwi...sigara !
     Gusingiz' Umucunguzi: 
     Muze, mwi...sigara !
     Abagezeyo baragwiriye;
     Baranezererw' Umwana w'Intama.
     Abandi bari mu nzira :
     Muze, mwi...sigara !

2 . Hazab' umucyo mw ijuru :
     Muze, mwisigara !
     Muve mu mwijima mubi :
     Muze, mwisigara !
     Har' ikamba Yes' azatwambika;
     Tuzanezeranwa n'abakijijwe,
     Ibyiza tubisangiye :
     Muze, mwisigara !

3 . N' ushaka ko tujyanayo, 
     Ihane ! Ihane !
     Mwiringir' agukiz' ubu :
     Ihane ! Ihane !
     Kand' uwo mutwaro wikoreye,
     Mwemerer' awugutur’ uruhuke,
     Ngo tuzabane mw ijuru :
     Ihane ! Ihane !
Gushimisha_183.songTitle: Tugiy' i wacu mw ijuru :Muze, mwisigara !

Gushimisha_184.songBody:
1 . Dor' inzir' ijya mw ijuru n' imwe : 
     N’ iya Yesu n'Umusaraba we. 
     Ni mpush' inzira y'Uwambambiwe.
     Sinzahabona n'Umucy' ubayo.

Ref:
Nta yindi nzira tuzabona : 
Nta yiriho, haba n'imwe.
N'ukur' inzir' ijya mw ijuru 
N' iy'Umusaraba.

2 . Nushaka kwinjir' Ahera cyane, 
     Ukajy' imbere y'Imana yera, 
     Uce mu nzira twaciriwe nshya;
     N’iy'amaraso y'Umwami Yesu.

3 . Nsezeye ku nzira z'isi zose : 
     Sinzazinyuramw uherey' ubu.
     Dat’ arampamagar’ ati: Ngwino ! 
     Nzakugez' aho wateguriwe.
Gushimisha_184.songTitle: Dor' inzir' ijya mw ijuru n' imwe

Gushimisha_185.songBody:
1 . Genda mu mucyo wa Yesu, 
     Aguhishurire 
     Ubury' Umwuk' afatanya 
     Abana b'umucyo.

2 . N' ugendera mu mucyo we, 
     Uraba wuzuye 
     N'Iyera yang' umwijima, 
     Ituye mu mucyo.

3 . N' ugendera mu mucyo we, 
     Ibyaha byakwishe 
     Birozwa n'amaraso ye, 
     Nuk' uhumanuke.

4 . N' ugendera mu mucyo we, 
     Azagutinyura 
     Imva n’urupfu,wibuke 
     Ko yabinesheje.

5 . Ugendere mu mucyo we, 
     Umwijim' ushire, 
     Uvirw’ iteka n'umucyo 
     W’Iman' Ihoraho.

6 . Kugendera mu mucyo we, 
     N’ inzir' iboneye 
     N' iy' amahoro n'ineza, 
     Yes' agushorera.

7 . Jy' ugendera mu mucyo we, 
     Uhung' umwijima : 
     Ni hw amaras’ akweza de, 
     Ng' uhor' utunganye.

8 . Kandi mu mucyo wa Yesu, 
     Dusangamw abandi 
     Baz' Umurokozi na bo,
     Tukamusangira.

Gushimisha_186.songBody:
1 . Mw isi yacu no mw ijuru 
     Nta zina nk’ irya Yesu : 
     Nta rindi ryampumuriza 
     Nk’ iry’ Uwatubambiwe.

Ref:
Iryo Zina... ndarikunda ...,
Ry’ Umucunguzi wanjye !
Iryo Zina... rihebuje ...
Ni ryo rinyiringiza.

2 . Nihagir’ umunt’ ushimwa 
     W’umunyacyubahiro, 
     Naho yakirush’ abandi, 
     Yes’ aramuhebuza !

3 . Iryo zina ryiza cyane 
     Ni ryo ngab’ inkingira 
     Irya myambi ya Satani; 
     Ntabwo yarishobora !

4 . Ereg’ iryo zina ryiza, 
     Sinz’ uko naryogeza. 
     Nzajya mw ijuru kubwaryo, 
     Mpore nsingiza Yesu !

5 . Ni ryo rimpesh’ ubutware 
     Bwo kunesh’ iby’iyi si, 
     Rikamvana mu buretwa, 
     Rikamp’ umudendezo !

6 . Nzajya nkwikubit’ imbere, 
     Ni nkubona mw ijuru, 
     Wow’ Umwam’ utwar’ abami;
     Nyiringir’ usingizwe !
Gushimisha_186.songTitle: Mw isi yacu no mw ijuru

Gushimisha_187.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, Mwami wacu Yesu, 
     Ngwin' ugume muri jye : 
     Mpatwe n'urukund' iteka 
     Kujya ngukurikira.

2 . Umutima wanjye wose 
     Wuzur' ijambo ryawe, 
     Mbone kunesha Satani 
     N'imigambi ye yose.

3 . Amahoro yawe, Mwami, 
     Ajy'aguma muri jye,
     Anyifurishe gufasha 
     Abanyabyago bose.

4 . Urukundo rwawe rwinshi 
     Rusandare muri jye. 
     Naho natukwa, nkagawa,
     Ruzabineshereza.

5 . No mu ntambara njya ndwana, 
     Nkubitana n'Umwanzi, 
     Nzanesha, ntumbira Yesu
     Wamunesheje kera.

6 . Ubwiza bwawe, Mukiza, 
     Bungot' impande zose, 
     Be kureba jyew' ahubwo 
     Barebe wowe musa.

Gushimisha_188.songBody:
1 . Ndashaka gusa nawe,
     Yesu, Mucunguzi : 
     Nta wigeze kukumva 
     Uvug'  urakaye. 
     Ndashaka gusa nawe :
     Wasengaga kenshi, 
     Wihereranye na So 
     Kuri wa musozi.

2 . Ndashaka gusa nawe :
     Nubwo bakwangaga, 
     Ntiwiturag' inabi 
     Wagiriwe yose.
     Ndashaka gusa nawe :
     Wafashag'  abantu; 
     Ump' urukundo rwawe, 
     Ruzabankundisha.

3 . Ndashaka gusa nawe :
     Wahamagaraga 
     Abana bato bose, 
     Maz' ukabigisha.
     Nyamara, sinsa nawe :
     Bose barabizi; 
     Mukiza mwiz' umfashe, 
     Nse nawe byukuri.

Gushimisha_189.songBody:
1 . Mugenz' uragana mw ijuru ? 
     Ujy' utumbira Yesu !
     Azakuyobor' amahoro : 
     Ujy' umuhang' amaso.

Ref:
Ujy' umuhang' amaso ! 
Ujy'umuhang' amaso ! 
Ajy'arind' umutumbiriye 
Ku manywa na n'ijoro.

2 . Iy' ushutswe ng' uyob' inzira, 
    Ujy'utumbira Yesu !
    Ukomez' inzir' ifunganye :
    Ntumukurehw’ amaso !

3 . Iy' inzir' itagaragara,
    Hakaba mu kabwibwi,
    Yes' ati : Jye ndi kumwe nawe :
    Ujy'umuhang' amaso !

4 . Urupfu ni rushak' uwarwo, 
     Ujy' utumbira Yesu !
     Ni bw' azakugeza mw ijuru,
     Usohor' amahoro.

Gushimisha_19.songBody:
1 . Ijuru ryawe, Mana, 
Riraguhimbaza :
Ushimwa n'ikirere 
N'ibirimo byose.
Bishim' ubudasiba 
Ku manywa na n'ijoro
Icyubahiro cyawe 
N'ubwenge n'ubuntu.

2 . Izuba ryawe, Mana, 
Hamwe n'inyenyeri
N'ukwezi na ko, byose 
Biraguhimbaza.
Bibwiriz' amahanga 
Atarumv' ibya Yesu
Ubwiza bw'Umuremyi 
Wabiremye byose.

3 . Ijambo ryawe ryera 
N' iry'ukuri rwose;
Ni ryiza, kandi ni ryo 
Riduhumuriza.
Kand' ubutunzi bwawe 
N'ubwenge bwo mw ijuru,
Duhora tubihabwa 
Iyo tukumviye.

4 . Nta n'umw' ubasha kubwe 
Kwirinda ngw atagwa. 
No kujy' akor' ibyiza 
No kudacumura :
Man' ujy' umfash' iteka,
Ndeke kukwibagirwa
No kugucumuraho 
Bikakubabaza.

5 . Ibyo waremye byose 
Byo mw ijuru n'isi
Bishim' izina ryawe;
Nanjye ndisingize. 
Ndashaka kugutura 
Uyu mutima wanjye
N'uyu mubiri na wo; 
Bib' imbata zawe.

Gushimisha_190.songBody:
1 . Iyo turi hamwe n'Umukiza wacu, 
    Atuyobor' inzira nziza. 
    Abamwiringira, bakamwitondaho 
    Ni bo banyamahoro basa.

Ref:
Jy' umwizera, 
Kandi jy' umwumvira ! 
Ng' ujy'unyurwa na Yesu 
Mu kubaho kwawe.

2 . Ntihakingirizwa, nta gicu gikuba : 
     Byeyurwa no kuboneka kwe. 
     Nta shavu, nta bwoba, bona n'igishyika, 
     Tumwiringiye, tumwumvira.

3 . Iy' inzar' iteye n'ubukene buje, 
    Aduhembur' ibihe byose. 
    Ntabwo n'amakuba yadukomerera, 
    Tumwiringiye, tumwumvira.

4 . Ntitwakwiyungura kugir' ibyishimo, 
     Tutazinutsw' ibyaha byose, 
     Kukw’ imbabazi ze n'imigish' afite 
     Bigir' umwizer' amwumvira.

5 . Tuzajya twishima, turi kumwe na We,
     Tuzagendana na W' iteka, 
     Tumugandukiye, ngw adutume hose, 
     Tumwiringiye, tumwumvira.

Gushimisha_191.songBody:
1 . Nunguk' ubuntu bwa Yesu, 
     Mmenye n'imbabaz' afite, 
     Nunguk' ubwenge bw' ukuri, 
     Mmeny' urukundo yankunze ! 

Ref:
Nunguk' ibya Yesu !
Nunguk’ ibya Yesu !
Nunguk' ubwenge bw' ukuri, 
Mmeny' urukundo yankunze.

2 . Nshishikarir' ibya Yesu, 
     Mmeny' iby' anshakaho byose. 
     Mwuka Wer' umfuturire :
     Mbwir' uko Yesu yankunze.

3 . Nunguk' ijambo rya Yesu, 
     Mbane n'Umwam' antoneshe; 
     Numvire byos' antegeka, 
     Mpuze na We, mmuyoboke.

4 . Meny’ iby' ubwami bwa Yesu, 
     Mmenye n'ubwiza bwe bwose, 
     Mmeny'  ukw’ azim' ingoma ye, 
     Ari We Mwami w' abami.

Gushimisha_192.songBody:
1 . Mwam' ujy' imbere mu nzira yacu. 
     Tur' abana baw' uduhe 
     Kugukurikir' iteka, 
     Utuyobore, tujye kwa Data.

2 . Mu ngeso zacu no mu mirimo, 
     Iby' ushaka ko dukora 
     Mu rugendo rw' i Siyoni,
     Utubashishe kubisohoza.

3 . Ni haz' igiter' uturengere ! 
     Ni tubon' iminsi mibi, 
     Tube twihanganye cyane, 
     Mu nzira yawe, ni ko bigenda.

4 . Ni tubabazwa n'ibidutera,
     Udukomeze, tubashe 
     Kubabarir' abatwanga;
     Tukwiringiye, bizanesheka.

5 . Naho habaho ikintu cyose 
     Kidukurahw’ amahoro 
     Ngo duterwe n'ubukonje
     Tuzacyihana, tuger' i Wawe.

6 . Duhishurire ibyo mw ijuru, 
     Amasezerano yawe 
     Ab' impamba y'ubugingo;
     Maze hanyuma, tuger' i Wawe.

7 . Uru rugendo urutunganye ! 
     Kand' uduh' Umwuka Wera 
     Ngw ab' impamba y' ubugingo, 
     Utugezeyo, twishim' iteka.

8 . Udushorere hose tugenda; 
     Ni tunanirwa mu nzira, 
     Uduhembure, Mukiza.
     Ubwo tuzapfa, tuzajy’ i Wawe.
Gushimisha_192.songTitle: Mwam' ujy' imbere mu nzira yacu.

Gushimisha_193.songBody:
1 . Kor' ugifit' uburyo ; 
     Jy'ukora n’umwete. 
    Tangira mu gitondo; 
     Wirind' ubute ! 
     Kora n' umucy' ubonetse;
     Menya ntucogore : 
     Igihe kirakuze; 
     Kora n'ubwira !

2 . Kor' izuba rirashe; 
     Ntugahweme rwose.
     Imirimo n' ishira,
     Uzaruhurwa. 
     Kand' ugifit' imbaraga, 
     Meny' ukore neza !
     Komez' uwo muhati : 
     Mar' imirimo.

3 . Kora bugiye kwira :
     Umuns' urakuze. 
     Wiyongeremw’ umwete :
     Kora n'ingoga ! 
     Ni ku kirengareng' ubu;
     Amajwi yatuje. 
     Mwen' Iman' ujy'ukora : 
     Dore, burije.

Gushimisha_194.songBody:
1 . Mana nduburir’ amaso yanjye
     Ku misozi.
     Mbe, gutabarwa kwanjye kwava he ?
     Mubimbwire.
     Ku Witeka niho guturuka,
     Ku Mana yaremy’ ijuru n’isi.

2 . Ntizemera kw ibirenge byawe 
     Biteguza;
     Ikurinda ntabw’ ihunikira,
     Ntisinzira.
     Iman’ irind’Abisirayeli
     Ihor’ iri maso, ntisinzira.

3 . Imana ni Yo Murinzi wawe 
     Wo kwizerwa :
     Ni yo gicucu cy’i buryo bwawe 
     Gihoraho.
     Ku manyw’ izuba ntirizakwica,
     N’ijor’ ukwezi ntuzagutinya.

4 . Imana ni Y’ ikurind’ ibibi 
     Byos’ iteka.
     Imana ni Y’ irind’ubugingo 
     Bwawe neza :
     Izakurind’ amajya n’amaza
     None no mu bihe bidashira.
Gushimisha_194.songTitle: Mana nduburir’ amaso yanjye ku misozi

Gushimisha_195.songBody:
1 . Yesu yatwis' amatabaza ye 
     Yo kumurikir' abo mu mwijima.
     Tubamurikishiriz' umucyo we, 
     Tubamurikishiriz' ingeso.

2 . Tur’ amatabaza ya Kristo, 
     Yifuza kureb' uko tumurika;
     Kand' iyo tuzimy' ababara cyane :
     Noneho, bagenzi, tumurike !

3 . Arashaka kw abandi bareba 
     Kumurika kwacu, bakayoboka.
     Tumurikir' ab' i wacu n' ahandi,
     Dushimishe Databuja, Yesu.

4 . Ni dushaka kumurika dutyo, 
     Twizer' Umukiza wadupfiriye,
     Tumusab’ Umwuka Wer' atunganye
      Imitima yacu : tumurike !

Gushimisha_196.songBody:
1 . Ni Yes' ufit' urufunguzo 
     Rw' ibizaba.
     Ni byo bihora binnezeza; 
     Nta wundi wo kurundindira, 
     Keretse We, keretse We.

2 . Sintiny' ibyago bizanzaho :
     Ndamwizeye, 
     Kukw’ and’ imber' abitunganya;
     Ni na W’ umeny' ibinkwiriye : 
     Kw ari byiza ! Kw ari byiza !

3 . Nd' impumyi jyewe, sinamenya 
     Ibyamfasha. 
     Ntabwo nzamwak' urufunguzo, 
     Ahubwo mfash' ukuboko kwe, 
     Mmwiringiye, mmwiringiye !

4 . Ntabwo nameny' imigambi ye; 
     Nzi kimwe cyo !
     Nzi yukw ankund' ubudasiba, 
     Nzi yukw amber' ubuhungiro, 
     Nkiri mw isi, nkiri mw isi.

5 . Yewe, ibyo birampagije : 
     Nguwe neza ! 
     Sindeba kokw ibizambaho, 
     Bizwi na Yesu wamfiriye. 
     Natiny' iki ? Natiny' iki ?

Gushimisha_197.songBody:
1 . Uwishinze ku byasezeranijwe 
     N'Umukiza wac' abon' amahoro, 
     Kand' aririmbishwa n'umunezero 
     Kuko yizey' ibihoraho.

Ref:
Twiringiye 
Ibyasezeranijwe na Yesu wacu; 
Nta bwo, nta bwo 
Yashobora guhemukir' abe.

2 . Ibyasezeranijwe n'Uwiteka 
     Ntibikuk' iyo Satan' aduteye. 
     Ntidushidikanya, ntadutinyisha, 
     Kuko twizey' ibihoraho.

3 . Ibyasezeranijwe n'Uwiteka 
    Byerekana kw amaraso ye yoza. 
    Ni y' ankiz' ibyaha, ntibinyanduze, 
    Kuko nizey' Uwanshunguye,

4 . Ibyasezeranijwe n' Uwiteka 
    Bitum' urukundo rwe runkomeza; 
    Inkota y'Umwuka ndayirwanisha;
    Ni y' itum' Umwanz' anesheka.

5 . Uwishinze ku byasezeranijwe 
     Ni w' uhora yumvir' Umwuka Wera, 
     Satani ntashobora kumutsinda, 
     Kuko yizigiy' Uhoraho.

Gushimisha_198.songBody:
1 . Umwami wacu, Yesu, 
     Ni we Tangiriro 
     Ry'Itorero yaremye 
     Mu mazi n'Ijambo. 
     Yazanywe mw isi yacu 
     No kudukiz' ibyaha,
     Ngo tub' Itorero rye 
     Yaguz' amaraso.

2 . Itorero ni rimwe 
     Mu mok' atar' amwe; 
     Umwami waryo n'umwe : 
     Riramusangira. 
     Ifunguro ni rimwe. 
     Ritung' abaryo bose;
     Rishim' izina rimwe, 
     N' iry'Umucunguzi.

3 . Yewe, kintu cyazanye 
     Ibice muri ryo, 
     Bikarisuzuguza 
     Abataririmo ! 
     Nyamar' abera baryo 
     Bahora bari maso,
     Babwir' Umwam' ibyaryo 
     Ngw az' arirengere.

4 . Mu byago biritera, 
     Rijya riruhurwa 
     No guteg' amahoro 
     Mu bihe bizaza. 
     Ryifuza kuzabona 
     Ibyiza byo mw ijuru,
     Ni riva ku rugamba, 
     Rinesheje rwose.

5 . Kandi, rikiri mw isi, 
     Rifitany' ubumwe 
     Na Dat' Imana yacu 
     N'abe bo mw Ijuru.
     Abo, bakiri mw isi, 
     Bafatanyaga na We.
     Nanjy' umpe kuba nka bo, 
     Mbasange mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_199.songBody:
1 . Ni nd' uzarwanana n' Umwami wacu ?
     Ni nd' uzamamaza ubutumwa bwe ?
     Ni nd' uzarorera kwifuz' iby'isi,
     Nubwo yarenganywa n'abanga Yesu ?

Ref:  Mbese, tur' aba nde ? Tur' aba Yesu . 
          Twar' aba Satani, Turamwimura.

2 . Dor' icyubahiro tumaranira 
     S' icy' iyi s' ahubwo n' icy' Umukiza. 
     Yaradupfiriye :   urukundo rwe 
     Ruduhata kwemer' ubuhake bwe.

3 . Yesu yaducunguj' amaraso ye 
     Y'igiciro cyinshi : tur' imbata ze. 
     Tuzagaya dute ubwo buntu bwe ? 
     Byose tubisige kubw' izina rye.

4 . Nubw' aba Satani bagir' umwete 
     Wo kurwana cyane, twe kubatinya.
     Ingabo z’ Imana nta wazitsinda, 
     Kuk' ukuri kwayo kuzineshesha.

5 . Twandikiwe kera kub' ingabo ze : 
     None, dutabare : twe gucogora ! 
     Twihangan' ahubwo, tugir' umwete, 
     Kuko turwanana n'Umucunguzi.

Gushimisha_2.songBody:
1 . Dushim’ Iman' ihoraho 
Kukw ari Yo yaturemye; 
Yatugiriy’imbabazi, 
Tuyishime, Haleluya.

2 . Iman' ijy'itugabira 
Ibyiza bidukwiriye :
Abayo bayiringiye 
Duhora tuyisingiza.

3 . Yemwe ngabo z'Uwiteka, 
Namwe bamarayika be, 
Muhora mu rurembo rwe, 
Mumuhimbazanye natwe.

4 . Dushim’ Imana y'ubuntu, 
Tuyishime twebwe twese :
Dushime Data wa twese 
N'Umwana n'Umwuka Wera.

Gushimisha_20.songBody:
1 . Mbony' Umukiza mwiza, ni Yesu Krisito.
Ni W' urut' inshuti zose zo mw isi.
Igikundiro cye cyinshi ni cyo cyanyemeje
Kumusanga  ngw anyuhagir' ankize !
Anyurura mbabaye, ankiz' amakuba; 
Amaganya yanjy' ajy'ayanyakira, 
Yaka nk'inyenyer' iteka; n' uw'igikundiro;
Ni W' urut' inshuti zose zo mw isi.

Ref:
Anyurura mbabaye, ankiz' amakuba, 
Amaganya yanjy' ajy' ayanyakira; 
Yaka nk'inyenyer' itek; n' uw'igikundiro;
Ni W' urut' inshuti zose zo mw isi.

2 . Intimba zanjye zose, yarazikoreye;
Uko ngeragejw' andinda wa Mubi.
Ibyantwazag' igitugu, yarabimbatuye :
N'igihome cyanjye, njya mmwihishamo !
Naterwa na Satani, ngahanwa n'inshuti, 
Yes' azantabar' angeze mw ijuru ! 
Yaka nk'inyenyer' iteka; n' uw'igikundiro;
Ni W’urut' inshuti zose zo mw isi.

3 . Ntazansiga nk'imfubyi, ntazampemukira.
Mpora mbeshwaho no kwizera gusa.
Ubw' angoteshej' ingabo, nta cyo ngitinya pe.
Ajy' antungisha manu yo mw ijuru.
Njya nkumbura n'umunsi nzagera mw ijuru.
Nzanezerwa ni mmureba mu maso : 
Yaka nk'inyenyer' iteka; n' uw'igikundiro. 
Ni W’ urut' inshuti zose zo mw isi.

Gushimisha_200.songBody:
1 . Umwam' agaby' ingabo ze 
     Kurwana n' ibyaha.
     Umugaba n' Umwana we : 
      Intwari ye ni nde ?

2 . Wikorer' umusaraba,
      Ugendane na We. 
      Mufatany' imibabaro, 
      Nuk' ub' intwari ye !

3 . Sitefano yakubiswe
