     Kubw' uwo Mwami we, 
     Yasabirag' abanzi be, 
     Ubwo bamwicaga.

4 . Ubwo yar' agihagaze,
     Yabay' intwari ye; 
     Bamwicishij' amabuye, 
     Areba mw ijuru.

5 . Batwikwaga mu muriro, 
     Baranabambwaga. 
     Dukurikiz' urugero 
     Rwiza baduhaye !

6 . Bajugunyirwag' intare, 
     Zikabatanyura. 
     Babicishaga n'inkota : 
     N' intwari za Yesu.

7 . Non' izo ntwari za Yesu 
     Zageze mw ijuru ! 
     Dore zigos' intebe ye; 
     Ziramusingiza !

8 . Zaciye mu mibabaro, 
     Zizamukirayo. 
     Mwam' udufashe natwe ngo 
     Duc' aho baciye.

Gushimisha_201.songBody:
1 . Bayoboke, mubyuke.
     Mwe, ntore z'Umwami,
     Dufate mu maboko
     Intwaro za Yesu.
     Mu nzira yo kunesha
     Tuyoborwa na Yesu,
     tujyane na W' iteka,
     Aturwanirire.

2 . Impanda ziravuze :
     Nimuze, mwitabe !
    Ikamba ry'ubugingo
    N’ ingabire yanyu.
    Ni mwangwa n'ababisha
    Mukomere, murwane,
    Mugir' umwete mwinshi,
    Mutsinde Satani.

3 . Mubyuke, mutabare,
     Mudashidikanya !
     Ntihagir' usigara;
     Mutumbire Yesu.
     Kandi mujye mutwara
     Intwaro zo kwizera :
     Zizatuma munesha,
     Mugir' ibyishimo.

4 . Mubyuke vuba vuba,
     Murwane mwihwema.
     Mwizer’izina ryera;
     Ni ryo muneshesha.
     Ni muva ku rugamba
     Mutahanye na Yesu,
     Muzabon’ amahoro
     Y'iteka mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_202.songBody:
1 . Tur’ abasirikare ba Kristo Yesu; 
     Ni W’ ukiz’ abamwiringira. 
     Kandi twasezeranye kurwana cyane 
     Na Satani n'isi n'umubiri.

2 . Turi bene Dat’ umwe, bagenzi banjye, 
     Kandi dusangiye kwizera; 
     Iyo badututse, baduhora Yesu, 
     Twibuke yuko yadupfiriye.

3 . Mw ibatizwa twashyizwehw ikimenyetso 
     Cy’ umusaraba yabambweho, 
     Tujye turwana munsi y'iyo bendera, 
     Twambay' intwaro duhabwa na We.

4 . Tube maso, twirinde, nta wakwikiza; 
     Twizigir' izo ntwaro nziza :
      Satani n'ashimagiza, ye kutwoshya;
      Twe kumutinya n’ az’ arakaye.

5 . Twih’ Umwuka Wera, kugira ngo yime 
     Mu mitima yac' adutware; 
     Nuk’ azatubatur' ububata bubi 
     Bwo kwifuza kose k'umubiri.

6 . Bene Data, duhumurizanye, kuko 
     Tur’ ingabo z'Uwanesheje :
     Twe gutiny’ ababisha, twe gucogora. 
     Tube maso, dusenge, turwane.

7 . Nubw’ intambar' idasiba, twagabiwe 
     Intwaro zituneshereza :
     Mw ijuru tuzaruhukan’ ibyishimo, 
     Twambay’ ikamba ritangirika.

Gushimisha_203.songBody:
1 . Mwa ngabo z'Umwami mwe, 
     Muze, dutabare ! 
     Dor' Umwami wacu 
     Yatugiy' imbere.
     Yahuye n'abanzi be, 
     Abanesha bose. 
     Dor' ibender' iragiye.
     Tuyikurikire.

Ref:
Muze ngabo zose za Yesu, 
Muze, dutabare !
Umugaba wacu 
Yatugiy’ imbere.

2 . Maz’ izina rya Yesu 
     Turivuge hose. 
     Nuko tujy' imbere, 
     Rituneshereze. 
     Indirimbo z'ishimwe  
     Zirater’ ubwoba 
     Ingabo za Satani mbi, 
     Nuko turirimbe.

3 . Nubw’ ingoma zo mw isi 
     Zigenda zitsindwa, 
     Ubwami bwa Yesu  
     Ni nde wabunesha ?
     We yasezeranije  
     Yukw Itorero rye 
     Ridatsindwa na Satani 
     N'iby’ afite byose.

Gushimisha_204.songBody:
1 . Dor' ibendera ya Yesu 
     Iramanitswe !
     Nguy’ araj' ahuruy’ atyo, 
     Ngw’ atabar’ abe.

Ref:
Ati:  Yemwe, ndaje, ndaje ! 
Nimukomere ! 
Ko ndi hamwe namwe, ni nde
Wabashobora ?

2 . Kokw ingabo za Satani 
     Zirakomeye.
     Tudafit’ Umwami Yesu, 
     Zaduhindura.

3 . Nshuti mwe, dukurikire 
     Umucunguzi, 
     Tumutumbire, twizere 
     Ubutwari bwe !

4 . Nubw’ intambar' iturushya,
     Twe gucogora ! 
     Umv’ impundu ziravuze : 
     Aranesheje !

Gushimisha_205.songBody:
1 . Urwan’ intambara nziza !
     Kristo n'imbaraga zawe :
     Fat’ ubugingw aguhaye,
     Ngo buguhesh’ ibyishimo.

2 . Usiganirw’ aho Yesu
     Yicay’ agutegereje.
     Ni We nzira kandi ni We
     Bihembo byo kurushanwa.

3 . Wabujijwe kwiganyira,
     Wizere gus’ ubuntu bwe,
     Uzabon’ urukundo rwe
     Kw ari rwo rukubeshaho.

4 . Ntutinye, we gucogora;
     Ntahinduk’ aragukunda.
     Yesu ni byos' umufite,
     Nta cyo wabasha gukena

Gushimisha_206.songBody:
1 . Har’ uwitwa Danyeli : yar’ intwari pe !
     Ntiyakangwaga n’abanz' aseng’ Imana ye.

Ref:
Tinyuka, mugenzi: ba nka Danyeli ! 
Itange ku Mwami wawe, ntumwihakane.

2 . Ub' intwari ya Yesu n’iy' ukuri kwe.
     Bakubare no mu mutwe wa Danyel’uwo !

3 . Bamwe bo mu ntore ze baraneshejwe. 
     Kuko batihaze rwose nka Danyel'uwo !

4 . Dor’ Umwanzi Satan’ agaby’ ingabo ze ! 
     Ziraneshwa zihuye na ba Danyel’ uwo !

5 . Nuko rer' ushikame kand' utambuke ! 
     Umv' impundu ziravuza ba-Danyel’uwo !

Gushimisha_207.songBody:
1 . Uwab’ atinyutse---Ibyago byose
     Naz’ akurikire—Umwami Yesu !
     Nta cyamurekesha—Iyo migambi ye
     Yo guca mu nzira —Ijya mw ijuru !

2 . Ntabw’ azacogozwa n'inshamugongo.
     Abazimubwira—Nibo bazagwa !
     Abanzi be bose—Ntibamugarura
     Mu nzir’ ahisemo— Ijya mw ijuru.

3 . Mwam’ ujy' undindisha—Umwuka wawe,
     Mbone kuzaragwa--- Kubahw iteka.
     Have wa bwoba we !—Nimunyihorere!
     Namaramaje pe— Kujya mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_208.songBody:
1 . Imana n’ ubuhungiro :
     Ni Yo ngab’ idukingira.
     Iyo turi mu makuba, 
     Ni Y’ ibasha kudukiza. 
     Uk’ Umwanzi wacu 
     Yishakiy’ uburyo 
     Bwo kudutsinda, 
     Ntatubasha na gato, 
     Kukw’ Iman’ iturengera.

2 . Ni twirwanaho twenyine,
     Tubur’ imbaraga rwose.
     Ariko dufit' Intwari
     Ijy'iturwanir’ iteka.
     Iyo ntwari ni nde ? 
     Ni wowe, Mukiza.
     Mugaba wacu,
     Tuzi yuko, mu byago,
     Ari wow’ uturengera.

3 . Iy' abagome bahuje 
     Guter' Itorero ryawe, 
     Urarirengera, Mana, 
     Ntibabashe kuritsinda. 
     Nubw’ Umugambanyi
     Ashaka kutwica, 
     Ntadushyikira, 
     Kukw aneshwa n’Ijambo 
     Ry'Imana, Nyir'imbaraga.

4 . Hishur’ ijambo rinesha, 
     Ridufasha dushobewe. 
     Imbabazi zawe nyinshi 
     Zize, zituzeho twese.
     Twakwamburw' ibyacu, 
     Ndetse, tukabohwa, 
     Ntitwabyitaho :
     Byose tuzabinesha; 
     Tuzaragwa n’ubwami bwawe !

Gushimisha_209.songBody:
1 . Yemw’ abari kuri Yesu, 
     Dukanguke, tube maso, 
     Kuko wa Mwanzi, Satani,
     Ajy’ atureba ku jisho.

2 . Satani ntiyigendera, 
     Afit’ icy’ ahagazeho; 
     Nuk  ube maso, wirinde, 
     Witwaz’ inkota y’Umwuka.

3 . K'uhishira Satani se, 
     Kandi witirirwa Yesu ? 
     None witind’ umwiyake : 
     Afit’ igihe kigufi.

4 . Yaciriw’ iteka ribi, 
     Ashak’ abo yisasira. 
     Bitum' ashishikarira 
     Koshy’ abakunzi ba Yesu.

5 . Ibya Yesu twabikijwe 
     Twihute tubimenyeshe 
     Ab'isi yose, bihane, 
     Bave mu byaha, bakizwe.

6 . Menya yukw azagaruka,
    Afit’ ubwiza bwe bwinshi
    Yahorany’ ari mw ijuru :
     Mbese, biraguhimbaye ?

7 . Nibutse ya mibabaro
     Wagize ku musaraba :
      Yewe, Mucunguzi wanjye,
      Ndihannye, ndaj’ unyakire.

Gushimisha_21.songBody:
1 . Mwami, turagushima, 
Turaguhimbaza rwose :
Mana, turagukuza 
Hamwe n'abamarayika.
/Turagupfukamiye, 
Turakuramya, Mwami/ x2

2 . Kiz’ abaw’ Uwiteka. 
Ushimish' impano zawe !
Ukuz' ubwiza bwawe, 
Bub' ubwaw’ iteka ryose !
/N'urukund' ubajyane 
Mu Bwami bwo mw ijuru !/ x2

3 . Hos’amahoro yawe 
Agwire mu bawe bose !
None n’ ibihe byose ! 
Mw isi no mu nyanja hose, 
/Izina ry'Umukiza 
Ripfukamirwe cyane !/ x2

4 .  Shimishwa, Mwuka wera ! 
Shimishwa, Data wa twese ! 
Shimishwa, Mwami Yesu,
Murokozi wacu twese !
/Nukw imbabazi zawe 
Zibahw iteka ryose./ x2

Gushimisha_210.songBody:
1 . Nimuze, ngabo za Yesu, 
     Tujye mu ntambara ! 
     Mwarobanuwe n’Umwami : 
     Mwese, mwiyereke ! 
     Umugab’ araje :
     Mumukurikire !
     Impanda bazivugije : 
     Nimuze, mwitabe !

2 . Dor’ umugab’ uzigabye 
     Ni Yesu Krisito.
     Yanesheje wa mwanzi we 
     Kubw’ Umusaraba. 
     Ndetse, n'intwaro ze 
     Yarazimwambuye. 
     Twashobora kuneshwa se, 
     Yes’ aturwanira ?

3 . Mwiyumanganye mu byago 
     Mugiye kubona.
     Murind’ imitima yanyu, 
     Itagwa mu gico. 
     Intwari y'Umwami 
     Ntiyita ku by’isi.
     Ni kw ijy'imera ngw ibone 
     Kunesha Satani.

4 . Mutwar’ intwaro z’Umwuka, 
     Ni zo mukwiriye : 
     Inkot’ ityay’ iboneye 
     N' Ijambo ry'Imana.
     Muryemere mwese : 
     Ni ryo ribakiza.
     Muryizere mu mitima, 
     Ni ho muzatsinda.

5 . Iman’ ibah’ imbaraga,
     Murwan’ intambara.
    Umwami ni W’ ubigisha
    Kunesh’ abanzi be.
    Mukomere cyane;
    Mugiye kunesha,
    Muhabw’ ingabire nziza
    Z’abatabarutse.

Gushimisha_211.songBody:
1 . Harihw indi si nziza cyane 
     Twasezeranijwe n'Imana;
     Tuyitegereje twizeye 
     Kuko Dat’ ayidufitiye.

Aheza...mw’ ijuru...
Tuzahurirayo, bagenzi : (X2)

2 . Tuzaririmbira mw ijuru 
     Indirimbo z’abakijijwe.
     Ntituzongera kubabara :
     Tuzashir’ agahinda rwose.

3 . Data tuzamusingiriza 
     Ubwo buntu yatugiriye
     N'urukundo rwe n'imbabazi 
     N'imigish’ ajy'atwungukira.

Gushimisha_212.songBody:
1 .Ni mw ijuru ku Mana —Abizeye 
    Bazateranirizwa— Mu mahirwe. 
    Kubw’ Umwuka w’Umwami 
    Bateraniyeyo.
    Bazerura ngo, Shimwa,—Shimwa, Mwami !

2 . Umwana w’Iman’ ubwe—Yavuyeyo 
     Ngw ajy'atunyuza neza— Mu nzira ye. 
     Tujye twibuk' iteka 
     Kw ari W' utwigisha;
     Tuvuge tuti : Shimwa,---Shimwa, Mwami !

3 . Twebwe twes’ ab'iyi si,—Tumushake 
     Na bene wacu bose—Tubijyane. 
     Tunezerwe, twizere, 
     Twebw' abacunguwe,
     Twerure tuti : Shimwa,—Shimwa, Mwami !

Gushimisha_213.songBody:
1 . Harihw indi s’ irut’ iyi cyane :
     Ni nziza, ni nziza ! 
     Ntiyagerwaho n’ ikibi cyose :
     Ni nziza, ni nziza !
     Ni ho tuzajya kubw’ Umukiza, 
     Baduherey’ inanga nziza nshya,
     Ducurangane n’abamarayika: 
     Iyo si ni nziza ! 

2 . Kandi nta mwijim’ uriyo rwose : 
     Iyo si ni nziza !
     Nta mubabaro, nta muborogo :
     Iyo si ni nziza !
     Banywa ku mugezi w'ubugingo, 
     Kandi bareb' Uwabapfiriye, 
     Bakishimir’ ubwiza bwe bwinshi : 
     Iyo si ni nziza !

3 . Nubw' ibyaha byacu bikabije 
     Kandi bigwiriye, 
     Umukiza yaradupfiriye 
     Ngo tubikurweho.
     Nukw abizey' Umukiza twese, 
     Tuzatunganywa n'urwo rupfu rwe, 
     Kandi nyuma tuzimana na We :
     Iyo si ni nziza !
Gushimisha_213.songTitle: Harihw indi s’ irut’ iyi cyane

Gushimisha_214.songBody:
1 . Har’ umurwa mwiza—W'abera b'Imana : 
     Nta gihumanya,—Nta gihumanya 
     Kizajya muri wo.

2 . Mwana w’Uwiteka,—Mukiz’ubu ndaje:
     Nyoz’ untunganye,—Nyoz’ untunganye ! 
     Nkiz’ibyaha byose!

3 . Mpindur’ ubu, Mwami,---Ngo mb’ umwana wawe; 
     Unkomereshe,—Unkomereshe
     Amaboko yawe !

4 . Nuk’ uzansohoze—Mu bera b'i Wawe, 
     Ntafit’ inenge,—Ntafit’ inenge, 
     Mur’iyo si nziza.

Gushimisha_215.songBody:
1 . Tujye duhimbaz’ iteka 
     Ururembo rw'i wacu, 
     Twarwubakiwe na Yesu 
     Mw ijuru ry'Uwiteka.

Ref:
Iyaba mfit’ amababa 
Nk’ abamarayika, 
Mba ngurutse, nkagerayo, 
Nkab’ i Siyon’ iteka.

2 . Kand’ amazu yaho yose 
     Ararabagirana, 
     Kand’ aruta cyane rwose 
     Ay’ abantu bubaka.

3 . Yes’ ariyo, ni We Mwami 
     Utwar’ abaho bose, 
     Kand’ abamalayika bajya
     Bamuhimbaz’ iteka.

4 . Munsi y'intebe y'ubwami 
     Ni hw isok’ ikomoka 
     Ivamo ya mazi meza 
    Ubugingo bw’iteka.

5 . Kand’ aho ni ho hamera 
     Igiti cy'ubugingo: 
     Ibibabi byacyo byiza 
     Ni byo bikiz’ abantu.

6 . Duhimbaz' urwo rurembo 
     Rwo mw ijuru ry' Imana: 
     Ni rwo Yesu Kristo wacu
     Yadutunganirije.

7 . Yes' utungany' imitima 
     Y'abakwizeye twese, 
     Tujye dukor’ iby’ ushima, 
     Tuzabane mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_216.songBody:
1 . Singishak’ ubutunzi 
     Bwo mur'iyi si mbi; 
     Ndifuz’ ubwo mw ijuru 
     No kuzagerayo. 
     Mu gitabo cy' ubwami 
     Cyanditswemw abera, 
     Mbese, Yesu Mukiza, 
     Jye wanyanditsemo ?

Ref:
Mu gitabo cyawe, 
Harimw iryanjye se ? 
Mu gitabo cy’ubwami, 
Mbese, nanditswemo ?

2 . Mfit’ ibyaha bingana 
     N'umuseny’ ubwinshi. 
     Ngwino, Yes’ ubirohe 
     Mu maraso yawe. 
     Wadusezeranije 
     Yukw ibyaha byacu, 
     Nahw ari nk'umuhemba, 
     Ng’ uzabyeza dede.

3 . Har' umurwa mw ijuru 
     Urimw inzu nyinshi; 
     Nta n'ikibi kibayo.
     N' ah’abacunguwe.
     Ubwo nogejw’ ibyaha 
     Mu maraso yawe, 
     Nzi ko wandits' iryanjye 
     Mu gitabo cyawe.

     Mu gitabo cyawe,
     Iryanjye ririmo: 
     Mu gitabo cy’ubwami, 
     Mbese, nanditswemo !

Gushimisha_217.songBody:
1 . Mw isi nd’ umushyitsi;—Si ho nzab' iteka;
     Nzayivamo, ntahe—Mw ijuru kwa Data.

2 . Kandi nzamusanga—Ku ntebe y'ubwiza. 
     Na W’azanyakira, Amp' ubuntu bwinshi

3 . Maze, mban' iteka—Na We, nta gahinda.
     Sinzaruh’ ukundi :---Hariy' amahoro.

4 . Mpore mmuhimbaza,—Nikubit’ imbere 
     Y'uwo Mutabazi—Wankuye mu rupfu.

5 . None, mfit’ ubwuzu—Bwo kuzahagera, 
     Ngo mve mur’iyi si---Njye mu mucyo wawe.

Gushimisha_218.songBody:
1 . kubana na Yesu 
     Iteka mw ijuru
     Biduter’ umunezero,
     Bikatwishimisha. 
     Mw isi, nd’ umushyitsi :
     Sinzayihoramo; 
     Ahubwo ndi mu rugendo 
     Runjyana mw ijuru.

2 . Urugo rw'Imana  
     Ajy'arunyereka,
     Ndurora runyegereye,
     Arumpishuriye;
     Bituma nifuza 
     Cyane kugerayo :
     Ni ho mwandu w'ab'Imana,
     Yerusalemu nshya.

3 . Paulo yaravuze, 
     Ati : Tuzabana 
  Iteka ryose n'Imana;
     Ni ko tubisoma. 
     Iryo sezerano,
     Urinsohoreze,  
     Tubane no mur' iyi si, 
     Uhor' undengera.

4 . N’ ugenz’ utyo, Mwami,
     Umwuka n’ uhera,
     Urupfu ruzanyinjiza
     Aho batagipfa : 
     Ni ho nzakumenya,
     Nkuk’ unzi, Mukiza, 
     Niratir’ imbere yawe 
     Ko tuzahorana.
Gushimisha_218.songTitle: Kubana na Yesu iteka mw ijuru

Gushimisha_219.songBody:
1 . Ubwo nzamar’ imirimo ngo nsezere kw isi,
     Umugezi witw' Urupfu nywambutse,
     Ni ho nzagera mw ijuru,nsang' Uwamfiriye :
     Azanyakiran’ ubuntu n’ineza.

Ref:
Nzamumenya,  nzamumenya !
Nzaba mpagaz' imbere Ye, nnyuzwe. 
Nzamumenya, nzamumenya,
Mbony’ inkovu zo mu biganza bye.

2 . Nzanezerwa ni mbon’ ubwiza bwo mu maso he, 
     Kandi sinzasiba kumushimira
     Urukundo n'imbabazi n'ubuntu byatumye
     Nanjy' amboner’ ikibanza mw ijuru.

3 . Abo nkunda bagezeyo mbafitiy’ ubwuzu:
    Wa Mugezi ni wo wadutanije.
     Ariko sinavug' ubwuzu bwinshi mfitiye
     Umukiza wanjye wanyitangiye.

4 . Azanshisha mw iremb’ansohoze mu rugw i  We. 
     Azanyambikish’ umwenda wera de.
     Nzaririmb’ iya Mose n’iy’ Umwana w’intama !
     Yewe, nzanyurwa nirebeye Yesu !
Gushimisha_219.songTitle: Ubwo nzamar’ imirimo ngo nsezere kw isi,

Gushimisha_22.songBody:
1 . Mwami mwiza w'ijuru,
Twese twaje kugushima,
Uri Nyir'imbaraga, 
Muremyi w'ibintu byose; 
Kand' uduh' amahoro, 
Udukiz' imitima.

2 . Watumy' Umwami Yesu 
Ngw atwigish’ibyiza byawe;
Twe gukomez’ ibyaha, 
Kandi turek' ingeso mbi; 
Kuk' utubabarira, 
Twese turagushima.

Gushimisha_220.songBody:
1 . Ubwo nzabon’ Umukiza 
     Ntumbira mu maso he, 
     Nzanyurwa mmwitegereje, 
     Ari We wamfiriye.

Ref:
Nzamubona, Yes' Umwami, 
Turi kumwe mw ijuru : 
Nzamwirebera mu maso,
Njye mmusingiz' iteka !

2 . Nkiri mw isi mu mubiri, 
     Mbur' uko mmwirebera. 
     Urya muns' urenda kuza, 
     Mbon' ubwiza bwe bwinshi !

3 . Amakub' azab' ashize, 
     Nta byaha, nta mwijima : 
     Ibigande biganduwe, 
     Tuzishim' imbere ye !

4 . Ni mmwirebera mu maso, 
     Nzicwa n'umunezero. 
     Nzamumeny' Uwo wankunze, 
     Akaz' akanshungura.

Gushimisha_221.songBody:
1 . Bana, mw ijur' abiringiy' Umucunguzi 
     Tuzaherway' ibintu byinshi.
     Azaduh' amakamba y'ubwiza bwinshi, 
     Kand' atwambik' imyenda yera.

Ref:
Bana, tuzahabwa, tuzahabwa byinshi, 
Tuzagabirwa byinshi mw ijuru !
Tuzahoran' ishimwe, tunezerewe, 
Ni twizer' Umukiza Yesu.

2 . Tuzagendagenda mu muhanda wakozwe 
     Mw izahabu n' ifeza nyinshi; 
     Kandi Yesu ni We zuba ryaho ryiza : 
     Nta n'ijoro riba mw’ijuru.

3 . Twe n'abera bose tuzacurang' inanga, 
     Turirimbir' Umwami Yesu; 
     Tuhanywere n'amazi y'Uruzi rwiza, 
     Dusiz' urupfu n'amakuba.

4 . Muze mwese, tujyan' iyi nzir' ifunganye, 
     Mumuhay' imitima yanyu. 
     Nimuyoboke mwes' Uwabapfiriye, 
     Abagezey' abanezeze.

Gushimisha_222.songBody:
1 . Mbese, tuzahurirayo, 
     Kuri wa mugezi mwiza 
     Uca mw ijuru hagati, 
     Uv' i bwami ku Mana yacu ?

Ref:
Koko tuzahurirayo, 
Tubonane n'abera ku mugezi, 
Ku mugez' utunganye w'Imana 
Uv' i bwami ku Mana yacu.

2 . Tuzagendana ku nkombe 
     Y'umugezi w'ubugingo. 
     Tuzasengan' Uwiteka, 
     Tuyisingiz' iteka ryose.

3 . Nuko, tutarahagera, 
     Duturw' imitwaro yose,
     Dukizwe n'ubuntu bwayo :
     Izatwambik' imyenda yera.

4 . Tuzahurira n'abera 
     Ku mugez' ubonerana; 
     Nta kizadutandukanya 
     Kuk' urupfu rutagerayo.

5 . Nuko, tuzagera vuba 
     Kur' uwo mugezi mwiza, 
     Turirimbane n'abaho 
     Indirimbo zishimishije.

Gushimisha_223.songBody:
1 . Rya joro ryatowe,
     Rubanda ruryamye,
     Mariya na Yosefu basa
     Bari maso barer’ akana
     Kaje kava mw ijuru. (x2)

2 . Rya joro ryatowe,
     Intumwa z’Imana
     Zamenyesheje ba bungeri
     Icyabonetse mw isi yacu,
     Y’uko Yesu yavutse. (x2)

3 . Rya joro ryatowe,
     Umucyo w’ukuri
     Twese waratumurikiye,
     Ng’ udukure mu byaha byacu,
     Kuko Yesu yavutse. (x2)

4 . Rya joro ryatowe
     Rituma twishima.
     Dufatanye n’abo mw ijuru
     Kuririmbir’ akana Yesu : 
     Tuti: Shimwa, Mukiza ! (x2)

Gushimisha_224.songBody:
1 . Wasiz' ubwiza war'ufite mw ijuru, 
     Ubwo wazaga mw isi, Yesu;
     No mw ivuka ryawe nta hantu hariho 
     Hagutunganiye, Mwami.

Ref:
Ngwin' uze mu mutima wanjye, 
Umbemo, ndabikwemereye. 
Ngwin' utahe mu mutima wanjye, 
Wiboneremw aho kuba.

2 . Mbes' abamalayika ntibagushingije, 
     Ubwo wimikwaga, Krisito ?
     Ariko, Mwami, wicishije bugufi, 
     Utuvukir' utyo mw isi !

3 . Dor' inyoni yos' igir' aho yarika, 
     Na y' ingunzu ntibur' intaho.
     Ariko Wowe, Mwami Yesu, wabuze 
     Ah' urambik' umusaya.

4 . Waj' uzany’ Ijambo rizima, Krisito, 
     Ryo kubatur' abantu bawe.
     Bakwitura kwang' urukundo rwaw' ubwo, 
     Bakumanika ku giti.

Ref:
Ngwin' ube mu mutima wanjye : 
Nizigiy' urwo rupfu rwawe ! 
Ngwin' utahe mu mutima wanjye : 
Nizigiy' Umusaraba!

5 . Abari mw ijuru bazagusingiza, 
     N' uza kwima ya ngoma yawe.
     Nzumv' umbwir' uti: Mfit' aho nkugeneye, 
     Ngwino, wimane nanjy' ubu !

Ref:
Bizannezeza cyane, Yesu, 
Ubwo nzumv' ijwi ryawe ryiza ! 
Bizannezeza cyane, Mukiza; 
Nzagusingiza, ntahwema !
Gushimisha_224.songTitle: Wasiz' ubwiza war' ufite mw ijuru

Gushimisha_225.songBody:
1 . Mw’ ivuka ryawe, Yesu, bakuryamishije 
     Mu kiraro kigawa, mu muvure w'inka. 
     Wasasiwe, Mukiza, ahadakwiriye. 
     Nubw' ur' Uwaturemye, ni ko wagiriwe!

2 . Nimuze, yemwe bana, tumuhimbarize 
     Ko yaryamishijw' atyo, mu muvure w'inka.
     Dushim' Umwami Yesu, tumukundir' ibyo,
     Ko yabay' umukene kubw’ abanyabyaha.

3 . Umfashe, Mwami Yesu, kuguhora hafi,
     Ngo ngukunde, tuban' iminsi yanjye yose,
     Kandi n'abandi bana, na b' ubiyereke, 
     Bagukunde, dushiman' urukundo rwawe.

Gushimisha_226.songBody:
1 . Mukiza wacu Yesu,
     Tukwakire dute ? 
     Tukwakire twishimye : 
     Ngwin' utwiberemo. 
     Wez' imitima yacu,
     Kand' utumenyeshe 
     Ingeso nziz' ukunda 
     N'ibikunezeza.

2 . Wasiz' ibyawe byose,
     Uza mur'iyi si, 
     Uraduhumuriza 
     Kuko tubabaye. 
     Nta watunyag’ ubwami 
     Bwawe bw'amahoro : 
     Uhor' udutabara, 
     Ukaturokora.

3 . Wasanze tur' imbohe,
     Uratubohora. 
     Twar’ ibisenzegeri, 
     Uraducungura.
     Ngo tub’ intore zawe,
     Duhoran' iteka, 
     Tubone n'ubugingo 
     Butazarangira.

4 . Mbe n'iki cyaguteye 
     Kuv’ ahw’ Iman’ iri ? 
     Nta kindi, n' urukundo 
     N’imbabazi zawe.
     Ntushak' abanyabyaha 
     Ko bazarimbuka; 
     Byatumy’ udutabara,
     Turababarirwa.

Gushimisha_227.songBody:
1 . Ku rurembo rwa Dawid' Umwami,
     Kera harih’ uruhongore;
     Umwan' ahabikirwa na nyina
     Mu muvure w’inka warimo.
     Uwo mwana ni we Yesu,
     Kandi nyina yitwaga Mariya.

2 . Yaje mw is’ asig' i We mw ijuru,
     Bamuraza mu ruhongore;
     Kand' uburiri bwar' umuvure,
     Nubwo yar’ Umwami wa bose :
     Umukiza wacu wera
     Yabanye n'aboroheje nka twe.

3 . Kand’ akir’ umwana, yubahaga
     Ababyey’ akabakorera;
     Yabagandukiye muri byose;
     Yabakundaga bihebuje,
     Natwe, nubwo tur’ abana,
     Tumere nka Yes’ uko yar’ari.

4 . Yatubereye nk'uworoheje,
     Kand' ari We Nyir'imbaraga !
     Yarakuraga nk'abandi bana :
     N' icyitegererezo cyacu.
     We yababaranye natwe;
     Bituma tunezeranwa na We.

5 . Uwo Mwana mwiza wo gukundwa
     None ni W' utegeka byose !
     Azagaruka, twe tumubone,
     Yes’ Umwami n' Umucunguzi.
     Kand' ashorera tw’ abana
     Ngw’ atugeze mw ijuru, tubane.

6 . Azaboneker' abamukunda,
     Atakiri mu ruhongore;
     Azab’ ari mw ijuru ku ngoma,
     I buryo bw'Iman' ihoraho :
     Tuzamwikubit’ imbere,
     Tumusingizany’ iteka ryose.

Gushimisha_228.songBody:
1 . Bahungu, bakobwa,—Nimuze mwese 
     I Betelehemu—Mu ruhongore; 
     Tureb' ibyo Data—Uri mw ijuru 
     Yaduhaye twese— Mur’iri joro !

2 . Hamwe n'abashumba,—Dushim’ Umwami 
     Uryamye mu byatsi—Nk'uworoheje.
     Dusang’ ababyeyi—Banezerewe; 
     Duhuze n'Intumwa—Kumusingiza.

3 . Nimupfukamire—Umwami mwiza 
     Uduh’ ubugingo,—Mumuhimbaze ! 
     Muvuze n'impundu—Hamwe n'Intumwa; 
     Mubwire n'abandi—Ibyo mwabonye.

4 . Twese tumushime,—Wa Mwami mwiza, 
     Tumuhimbarize—Kukw adukunda.
     Dufatanye twese,—Tuvuz’ impundu, 
     Ngw abatamumenye—Baze gukizwa.

Gushimisha_229.songBody:
1 . Abungeri barindaga 
     Intama n' ijoro, 
     Marayik' abiyereka 
     Mu cyubahiro cye.

2 . Babony' icyo cyubahiro,
     Baterwa n' ubwoba, 
     Marayik’ arababwira 
     Ati: Muhumure !

3 . Nimwumv’ ubu, mbazaniye 
     Inkuru y’ibyiza :
     Mu rurembo rwa Dawidi, 
     Havuts' Umukiza.

4 . Ndabah’ iki kimenyetso;
     Nuko, murabona  
     Baryamishij’ uruhinja 
     Mu muvure w'inka.

5 . Amaze kubivug’ atyo, 
     Habonek’ umutwe 
     W’abamarayika benshi, 
     Bahimbaza bati :

6 . Nukw icyubahiro kibe 
     Ku Mana mw ijuru,
     Kand’ ab’ ikunda bo mw isi 
     Bahabw' amahoro.

Gushimisha_23.songBody:
1 . Mana yo mw ijuru, 
Byos' uri nyira byo, 
Kand' ubiduh' ubudasiba. 
Utang’ utimana; 
Ujy' udukenura, 
Bituma tuguhimbaza.

2 . Impan' ihebuje 
Yes’ atugabira 
N' ubuntu bwe n'amahoro ye. 
Yatubabariye, 
Twaramugomeye : 
Mbes’ ibyo s’ igitangaza?

3 . Mwami, ndakwinginze, 
Nubwo ntakwiriye, 
Nyigiza hafi, tugumane ! 
Mpa kugukorera, 
Ndusheho kwemera 
Gukund’ ibiri mw ijuru !

Gushimisha_230.songBody:
1 . Umv' intumwa zo mw ijuru 
     Ziririmbira Yesu.
     Zit’ Iman’ ishimwe cyane : 
     Amahor’ abe mw isi: 
     Kuk’ Umwana way’ avutse 
     Uzakiz' abanyabyaha; 
     Yesu n' Umukiza wacu : 
     Yaje kuducungura.

Ref:
Umv’ intumwa zo mw ijuru 
Ziririmbira Yesu.

2 . Nubwo mu kiraro cy'inka,
     Arimo wavukiye, 
     Ur’ Iman’ isumba byose: 
     Twese tugusingize. 
     Tugushime cyane,Yesu : 
     Ur’ Iman’ Uri n'umuntu.
     Ur’ Imanuweli wacu : 
     Imana turi kumwe.

3 . Ur' izuba rituvira,
     Ur' amahoro yacu; 
     Wemeye kuva mw ijuru.
     Ub' umuntu wo gupfa. 
     Watuzaniy’ ubugingo,
     Ngo tukwizere, tubeho. 
     Tunezererw’ uyu munsi 
     Ko duhaw’ Umukiza.

4 . Nukw amoko yos’ ashime 
     Krist' Uwera w'Imana. 
     Hose hose humvikane
     Indirimbo z'ishimwe.
     Amahoro nabe mw isi, 
     Kuk’ Umwami Yes’ avutse. 
     Yesu  ni We Nshuti yacu, 
      N’ Umuvunyi duhawe.

Gushimisha_231.songBody:
1 . Umwana yavukiye 
     Mu murwa wa Dawidi 
     Ni we Yes' Uwiteka
     Yadusezeranije.

Ref:
Duhimbaz' uwo munsi 
Yesu yatuvukiye; 
Tubyamamaze hose 
Yuko haj’ Umukiza

2 . Habayehw abungeri, 
     Babona marayika, 
     Baratinya; na w’ ati : 
     Noneho, mutinyuke!

3 . Ati : Krist’ Umukiza 
     Yaje mu gihugu cye; 
     Umuremyi wa byose 
     Yavukiye mw icumbi !

4 . Mwana wera, w'Imana, 
     Turagupfukamiye, 
     Tugushimira cyane 
     Yuk’ utujemo, Yesu !

Gushimisha_232.songBody:
1 . Munezero, Munezero,
     Birori bishimisha ! 
     Mu ndirimbo zo mw ijuru, 
     Dushyiremo n'izacu ! 
     Yesu yaje kudukiza,
     Tumuhawe n'Uwiteka : 
     Munezero, Munezero, 
     Birori bishimisha !

2 . Munezero, Munezero,
     Imitim’ inezerwe ! 
     Tumwitabe, tumwitabe,
     Yes’ uduhamagara 
     Dukunze kw aturokora,
     Tureke kubirazika : 
      Munezero, Munezero, 
      Imitim’ inezerwe!

3 . Munezero, Munezero,
     Jyan’ ishimwe ku Mana ! 
     Amahoro n'amahoro !
     Ni kw Intumwa zivuga. 
     Yesu ni W' uhira bose :
     Twese tumuririmbire : 
     Munezero, Munezero, 
     Jyan’ ishimwe ku Mana !

Gushimisha_233.songBody:
1 . Yemwe, bungeri ba kera, 
     Mutubwir' ibya Yesu,
     Ibyo mwabonye rya joro, 
     Igihe yavukaga.

Ref:
Shimwa, Rurema ! Shimwa, Rurema !
Shimwa, Rurema, shimwa ! 
Wow’ usumba byose.
Shimwa, Rurema ! Shimwa, Rurema! 
Shimwa, Rurema, shimwa!
Amahor’ abe mw isi !

2 . Twar’ aho turaririye 
     Umukumbi n'ijoro. 
     Maze, tugubwa gitumo 
     N'urangurur' aty' ati :

3 . Marayik' aratubwira, 
     At' i Betelehemu 
     Habavukiy’ Umukiza : 
     Ni We Mwami Krisito !

4 . Uwo mwanya, haz' umutwe 
     W'ingabo zo mw ijuru, 
     Zigoswe n'umucyo mwinshi;
     Zirasingiza ziti :

5 . Natwe turahaguruka,
     Tujy’ i Betelehemu, 
     Dusangayo rwa Ruhinja, 
     Ni ko kurushima, ngo :

6 . Bungeri, turabashimye; 
     Byose turabyumyise. 
     Tujye kumusanga natwe,
     Tumusingize, tuti :

Gushimisha_234.songBody:
1 . Inkuru nziza yavuye mw ijuru 
    Yazanywe no kuduhumuriza; 
     Igaragazwa n'Umwami w'urukundo 
    Wavukiy’ abanyabyaha bose.

2 . Uwo wa muhanuzi yahanuye,
     Akamubwiririz’ amahoro, 
     N’ Umwami Yesu watuvukiye twese : 
     Tumuririmbire n'iri joro !

3 . Ajy' adutera kwiringira rwose.
     Adusezeranir' amahoro. 
     N' abafit' imitim’ ihagaz' iganya, 
     Abibuka ngw abah’ ubugingo.

4 . Dushime twes' Umucunguzi wacu 
     Kw atadutinye tw' abanyabyaha ! 
     Kand’ ubuntu bwe budukomeza mw isi. 
     Tumwitabish’ imitim' ikunze.

Gushimisha_235.songBody:
1 . Bakristo, nimuze, munezerwe mwese, 
     Nimuze, tugeran' i Betelehemu. 
     Muze kureb' Umwami wahavukiye !

Ref:
Nimuze, tumusenge ( x 3) 
Ni Kristo Yesu.

2 . Imana Rurema, nubw’ isumba byose, 
     Ntiyanze kubyarwa n'uwo woroheje.
     Iyaturemye, dor’ uko yamanutse !

3 . Muririmbe cyane, bamalayika mwese, 
     Mut’ Isumba byos’ ihabw’ icyubahiro, 
     Kand’ amahor’ abe mu bo yishimira !

4 . Tuje kukuramya, Mwami Yes’ uvutse, 
     Tuje kugusingiza, Mukiza Yesu, 
     Nubw’ ur’ Imana, none turaturanye.

Gushimisha_236.songBody:
1 . Umukiza wac' ubwo yavukaga, 
     Nta cumbi yabonye, keretse mu nka.
     Nubwo bamuhej' i Betelehemu, 
     Twe kumwim' icumbi : twe, tumwakire !

2 . Marayika yaj' asang' abungeri; 
     Izo nkuru nziz' azibabariye, 
     Bagend' uwo mwanya kumusingiza. 
     Natwe twe gutinda, tumusingize.

3 . Na ba banyabweng’ aho baboneye 
     Ya nyenyer' irang' Umwami Krisito. 
     Bamusanze vuba, ibayobora, 
     Bamutur' ibyiza bamuzaniye.

4 . Ko nd' umwana muto, namutur' iki ?
     Simfit' izahabu nk' abanyabwenge, 
     Nta n'intama mfite, nka ba bungeri. 
     Mfite kimwe gusa : mmuh' umutima !

Gushimisha_237.songBody:
1 . Tur' abami bayobotse, 
     Tuje ngo turabukire 
     Uyu Mwam' Usumba byose, 
     Dukurikiy' inyenyeri.

Ref:
Ye. . . we . . . , 
Wa nyenyeri nziza we, 
Komez' utuyobore, 
Tujy' imbere; gumy' ugende, 
Tuger' ahw Umwam' ari !

2 . Nje gutur' Umwami Yesu, 
     Nzany' izi zahabu nziza. 
     Ni We nyir'isi n'ijuru,
     N' Umwami w'abami bose.

3 . Nje gutur' Umwami Yesu, 
     Nzany' iyi mibavu myiza : 
     Byerekana yukw’ atwumva,
     Iyo tumusenze hose.

4 . Nje gutur' Umwami Yesu, 
     Nzany' ishangi rihumura : 
     Byerekana yukw azapfa 
     Mu cyimbo cy'abanyabyaha.

5 . Tuje kugushengerera :
     Ur' Umwami n'Umukiza. 
     Akir' amaturo yacu, 
    Mucunguzi, Nyirigira !

Gushimisha_238.songBody:
1 . Kera har' abungeri mu gihugu cyera, 
     Bumv' inkuru y'ibyiza ko Yes' avutse. 
     Ku musozi n'ijoro, bumv' amajwi menshi 
     Y'ingabo zo mw ijuru, zishima, ziti :

Ref:
Noel ! Noel ! Noel ! Noel ! 
Havuts' Umwami w' Isirayeli !

2 . Mu gihugu cya kure, har' abanyabwenge. 
     Bahishurirw' ikintu cyabatangaje.
     Babony' ikimenyetso cy' inyenyeri nini, 
     Kibarangir' aho Yesu yavukiye.

3 . Nukw’ Iman' iberetse k' Umukiza yaje, 
     Bajy' ahw ar' uwo mwanya ngo bamusenge. 
     Baramupfukamira, bamutur' ibyiza : 
     By'izahabu n'icyome n'ishangi na yo.

4 . Natwe tumusang' ubu; n' Umukiza wacu; 
     Yaj' aciye bugufi kubwac' ababi. 
     Nyuma, ku Musaraba, yaradupfiriye, 
     Aduhongerera ngo tutarimbuka.

5 . Nuko, umushimire ko yatuvukiye, 
     Tumutur' imitima yac' imenetse.
     Uyu munsi wa none, yonger' avukire 
     Mu mitima ya benshi, bamushimishe.
Gushimisha_238.songTitle: Kera har' abungeri mu gihugu cyera

Gushimisha_239.songBody:
1 . Nkuko ba banyabwenge 
     Barebye ya nyenyeri, 
     Bakayikurikira 
     N'umunezero mwinshi, 
     Natwe twifuze dutyo 
     Kureb' Umwami Yesu.

2 . Bo batebutse vuba 
     Gushak' urwo ruhinja; 
     Bararupfukamira,
     Ni rwo Mwami w'ijuru;
     Natwe dushake Yesu, 
     Twiboner' Umukiza.

3 . Bah' Umwan' amaturo 
     Y'igiciro kinini; 
     Baramurabukira, 
     Urut' ab'isi bose : 
     Natwe tugire dutyo, 
     Duhe Yes' imitima.

4 . Yes' Uwera w'Imana, 
      Uturindir' iteka 
      Mu nzira yaw' ifunganye; 
      Hanyum' uzatujyane  
      Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru, 
      Ah' umwijim' utaba.

5 . Abo mw ijuru bose, 
     Nta tabaza bifuza : 
     Ni Wowe mucyo waho 
     N'izuba ritarenga.
     Yes' uzatujyaneyo, 
     Tuguhimbaz' iteka.
Gushimisha_239.songTitle: Nkuko ba banyabwenge barebye ya nyenyeri

Gushimisha_24.songBody:
1 . Njya nshima nshima nshima nshim' Imana mu mutima, 
Mu mutima, mu mutima. 
Njya nshima nshima nshima nshim’ Imana mu mutima, 
Mu mutima wanjye.

2 . Nta n'urubanza, nta rubanza nshiriweho rwose, 
Mu mutima, mu mutima. 
Nta n'urubanza, nta rubanza nshiriweho rwose,
Mu mutima wanjye.

3 . Mfit’ amahor’ arut’ uko yamenywa mu mutima,
Mu mutima, mu mutima.
Mfit’ amahor’ arut’ uko yamenywa mu mutima,
Mu mutima wanjye.

Gushimisha_240.songBody:
1 . Wa mwanya mu Getsemani
     Sinawibagirwa, 
     Ubwo wabirag' ibyuya 
     Bisa n'amaraso.

Ref:
Sinibagirw' amakuba 
Wabonye kubwanjye. 
Wunamye n'umubabaro 
Ur' i Getsemani.

2 . Wari mu biti n'ijoro 
     Kubw’ ibyaha byanjye. 
     Byaragushenjaguye pe : 
     N’urubanza rwanjye.

3 . Intumwa zagusizeyo, 
     S’ arakuzinukwa.
     Natwe nta bwo twashobora 
     Kubigereranya.

4 . N’ ubona ko mbyibagiwe,
     Yes’ uzanyibutse 
     Bya byuya byawe wabize 
     Kubwanjye, kubwanjye !

Gushimisha_241.songBody:
1 . Mbes’ uriy’ ubabaye, 
     Wambay’ ibitabutse 
     Birihw amaraso ye, 
     Mutubwir’uw' ari we. 
     Dor’ ukunt' ananiwe 
     N’igiti yikoreye ! 
     Ko yaboshywe nabi se, 
     Ni nde kand’ aziz’ iki ?

2 . Uwo munt' ubay’ atyo 
     Ni We Nyir'ubugingo. 
     Ibicumuro byawe 
     Ni byo bamujijije.
     We kujarajar’ utyo :
     Sang’ Uwagupfiriye; 
     Pfukam’ i Gologota, 
     Wihan' ubabarirwe.

3 . Dor’ amahw' asongoye 
     Ni yo kamba yambitswe, 
     Kand’ intebe y'ubwami 
     Yabay’ Umusaraba.
     Mbes’ Umwam' ugizw’atyo, 
     Namumenyeshwa n’iki ? 
     Som’ icyo kirego, ngo 
     Yesu w'i Nazareti.

4 . Umva Yes’ avug' ati : 
     Nshuti yanjy’ umenye ko 
     Icyankuye mw ijuru
     Ar’ukukubeshaho.
     Ni wowe mbabarizwa, 
     Bakanshinyagurira. 
     Emera nkurokore,
     Nkuzuze n’Iman’ ubu.

5 . Ndakwihaye, Krisito, 
     Byos’ ubimbabarire, 
     Umpumur’ ummenyeshe 
     Imibabaro yawe.
     Non’ inzir’ undangira 
     Ni yo nzajya nnyuramo, 
     Nger’i Wawe mw ijuru, 
     Nzahore ngusingiza !

Gushimisha_242.songBody:
1 . Mwana w'Imana, mbega wakoz’ iki,
     Cyatumy’ ucirw’ iteka ry’ababi ? 
     Impamvu n'iki yaguteye gupfa ?
     Uyitubwire, turakwinginze.

2 . Wapfuy' urupfu rw'abagome, Mwami, 
     Uhemurwa, ushinyagurirwa. 
     Ntangajwe n'uko wemeye kubambwa, 
     Upfa nab’ utyo ku Musaraba.

3 . Ayo makuba wayatewe n'iki ? 
     N’ibyaha byanjye bakujijije ! 
     Ni jye wapfiriye, nd’ umunyabyaha : 
     Sinkwiriy’ izo mbabazi zawe !
 
4. Nta cyaha wigeze gukora, Yesu :
    Ubuntu bwawe burantangaza ! 
    Ibyaha byanjye bitagir’ ingano 
    Warabyikorey’ urandokora.

5 . Reka ngushimir' ubwo buntu bwinshi !
     Nariha nte kubabara kwawe ? 
     Akir’ ubwenge bwanjye n'ubugingo. 
    Sinkir’ uwanjye :  waranshunguye.
Gushimisha_242.songTitle: Mwana w' Imana, mbega wakoz’ iki

Gushimisha_243.songBody:
1 . Umunyamibabaro 
     N’ izina rintangaza 
     Ry’ Umwana w’Uwiteka: 
     Tumushime, n’ Umukiza !

2 . Yemeye guhemurwa 
     No gushinyagurirwa, 
     Apfir’ abanyabyaha :
     Tumushime, n’Umukiza !

3 . Twatsinzwe n'urubanza : 
     We nta kibi yakoze ! 
     Yatuberey’ inshungu :
     Tumushime, n’ Umukiza !
 
4 . Abambwe, yarangije
     Ibyo kuducungura
     Ati : Birarangiye !
Tumushime, n’ Umukiza !

5 . Avuye mu gituro,
Ajya mw ijur’ ariho,
Yicaranye n’Imana :
Tumushime, n’Umukiza !

6 . Kand’ ubw’ azagaruka,
Ngw atujyane mw ijuru,
Tuzaririmba tuti;
Tumushime, n’ Umukiza !

Gushimisha_244.songBody:
1 . Har' umusozi wa kure 
     Hafi y'ururembo, 
     Ah’ Umukiza yabambwe 
     Watubabarijwe.

2 . Ntabwo twabasha kumenya 
     Uko yababajwe ! 
     Twizeye gusa kw’ ari twe 
     Twatumy’ apfa nabi.

3 . Ni cyo cyatumy’ ibyaha byacu 
     Byos’ uko bingana 
     Bikurwaho n’Uwiteka, 
     Tukazaban’ i We,

4 . Nta wundi wabasha kuba 
     Inshungu y'ibyaha; 
     Ni We watwugururiye 
     Irembo ry'ijuru

5 . Nuk’ ubwo yadukinz’ atyo,
     Natwe tumukunde, 
     Twiringir’amaraso ye,
     Tumwumvire rwose.

Gushimisha_245.songBody:
1 . Iyo nibwiye mu mutima 
     Igit’ Umwami yatangiyeho,
     Nzinukw' ibyo niratanaga; 
     Mbireba nk'ibitariho rwose.

2 . Sinkirat’ ikindi, Mukiza, 
     Keretse ko wankunz’ ukamfira;
     Ndeke n'ibyo nishimiraga,
     Ngushimir' uko wanyitangiye.

3 . Ishavu n'ibambe bivanze 
     Byavuye mu mutima wa Yesu;
     Mbese, har’ undi Mwami nka We 
     Wateg’ ikamba nk'iryo ry'amahwa ?

4 . Mwam’ iyo mba mfit’ isi yose, 
     Nkemera kuyitanga h' ubwishyu,
     Nta bwo yarangiza na hato 
     Kwishyur' umwenda wanjy’ ukomeye !

5 . Urwo rukundo wankunz' utyo 
     Rukwiriye kuntangisha byose,
     Ibyanjye n'umutima wanjye, 
       Bikab' ibyaw’ ukabitegeka.

Gushimisha_246.songBody:
1 . I Gologota, ku Giti,
     Ni ho Yesu yabambwe;
     Yabambiwe kugira
     Ngo tubone kudapfa.

2 . Yes’ amaze kunesha,
     Avug’ ijwi rirenga,
     Abivuga yeruye,
     Ati :  Birarangiye !

3 . Amaze kuvug’ atyo,
     Aherakw arunama,
     Yunamishwa n’ibyaha
     Byanjye nanze kwihana.

4 . Non’ ansaby' imbabazi,
     Nihane, mmukureyo,
     Mmumanure ku giti,
     Aruhuk’ umutima.

5 . Abantu batihana
     Bongeye kumubamba,
     N'umuruho munini,
     Umubabaz’ iteka.

6 . Twari twararuhijwe,
     Twiganyira, twihebye;
     None turaruhutse :
     Yesu n’ubukiriro.

7 . Nukw abishwe n'ibyaha,
     Ni muhunge, mukire.
     Muze, mubikurwemo :
     Yesu n'ubukiriro.

8 . Mukiza, ndakwihaye.
     Ni Wowe wantaruye.
     Uko nzaba ndi kose,
     Yesu, nzagusingiza.

Gushimisha_247.songBody:
1 . Unyigishe, Mukiza,
     Iby’ Umusaraba 
     N'icyatumy’ uza mw isi,
    Ukatubambirwa. 
    Ummenyesh’ umumaro 
    W'umunyabyah’ umwe, 
    Umbwire n'igiciro 
    Wanshungurishije !

2 . Unyigishe n'impamvu 
     Y'isok’ itukura 
     Yo mu rubavu rwawe,
     Urwo bacumise.
     Ari jye gusa mw isi
     Wacumuy’ Imana,
     Uba warayavuye 
     Ngw amber’ impongano.

3 . Unyerek' urukundo 
     Rutarondoreka
     Rwamanuts’ i kuzimu 
     Ku bwac’ abihebe.
     Uyu mutim' ukonje 
     Wuzuy' inarijye,
     Uwatsemw urukundo 
     Ruv’ i Gologota.

4 . Unyigishe, Mukiza :
     Nd’ umunyabyaha pe. 
     Icyantabara, Mwami,
     N’ ubuntu bwonyine.
     Yesu ni jy' ugukennye :
     Mu bo wapfiriye 
     B'abanyabyaha babi,
     Ni jyew’ ukabije.

5 . Mukiza wanjye, Yesu
     Ni wowe nizeye.
     Maz’ ubw’ umpamagaye,
     Ndakwiyeguriye.
     Non’ ubw’ unyakiriye,
     Njye nshim’ imbabazi 
     Na rwa rukund’ unkunda,
     Mbivuge ndinde mfa.

Gushimisha_248.songBody:
1 . Hafi y' Umusaraba,
     Aho ntur’ iteka,
     Niho mperwa ku buntu 
     Amazi y'ubugingo.

Ref:
Nirat’ Umusaraba 
Kugez’ ubwo nzaba 
Mbony’ uburuhukiro 
Hakurya y'Uruzi

2 . Nahageze nshobewe,
     Nsinzwe n'urubanza,
     Yes’ arambabarira,
     Angotesh’ urukundo.

3 . Mwami Yes’ unyibutse 
     Uwo musaraba.
     Kugira ngo ngendere 
     Mu gicucu cyawo.

4 . Ni w’utuma nemera 
     Kwang' iby' isi rwose, 
     Kukw ari w’ unkundisha 
     Yesu wamfiriye.

5 . Hafi y'Umusaraba, 
     Ni ho ntur’ iteka, 
     Ntegerej’ igihe cyo 
     Kwambuka rwa Ruzi.

Gushimisha_249.songBody:
1 . Nitegerej’ Umusaraba 
     Wo Yesu yadupfiriyeho, 
     Nywubonye, ndamutakambira 
     Ngw ambabarire.

Ref:
Yes’ Umwam’ ahimbazwe !
Izina rye ryogezwe ! 
Yanyogeshej’ amaraso ye: 
Yes’ ahimbazwe.

2 . Iman’ ishimwe kukw inkiza 
     Imbaraga z'ibyaha zose. 
     Bituma Yes’ ambamo neza,
     Akantunganya.

3 . Ya soko nziza yoz' ibyaha, 
     Nejejwe n'uko nayinjiyemo;
     Ni yo Yes’ ahor’ ankirisha;
     Ni y’ anyejesha.

4 . Ngwino kw isoko ngari nziza ! 
     Ca bugufi, wa mutindi we ! 
     Jya ku birenge by'Umukiza,
     Ngw agutunganye.

Gushimisha_250.songBody:
1 . Shimwa, Mwami Yesu,—Ko wamviriye 
     Amaraso yawe—Ku Musaraba.

2 . Mur' ayo maraso,—Ni mo mbonera 
     Ineza n'ubuntu—No gusugira.

3 . Umugezi wayo—Ni w' uboneza 
     Abawibiramo,—Ntibarimbuke.

4 . Ibuk' ay'Aberi—Ko yatakiye
     Imana ngw ihore—Uyavushije.

5 . Nyamar' aya Yesu—Ajy' ansabira 
     Uwitek’ Imana—Kumbabarira.

6 . Iy’ aminjagiwe—K’ uwacumuye, 
     Satan’ aratinya,—Agahamuka !

7 . Non’ abari mw isi—Tuyasingize ! 
     Namwe mwikirize,—Bamarayika !

8 . Ab’ Imana twese—Turangurure, 
     Dushim’ amaraso— Yaducunguye !

Gushimisha_251.songBody:
1 . Munsi y’Umusaraba
     W’Umukiza Yesu,
     Ni ho nifuza rwose
     Guhora mpagaze.
     N’ ibuye ry’igitare
     Rimber’ igicucu,
     Rinkiz’ impagarara
     Mu rugendo rwanjye.

2 . Uwo Musaraba we
     Wabay’ ihuriro
     Ry’ukuri n’urukundo
     By’Iman’ ihoraho.
     Unyibutsa za nzozi
     Yakobo yarose :
     Umbereye nk’urwego
     Rugenza mw ijuru

3 . Hirya y’Umusaraba,
    Mbonay’ umworera :
    N’ umunwa w’i kuzimu
    Wakamw’ umuriro.
    Nyamar’ imbere yawo
    Har’ Umusaraba
    Uteze nk’amaboko,
    Ng’ unkize, ntagwayo

4 . Kur’ uwo musaraba,
     Ndasa n’ushobora
     Kureba Yes’ abambwe
     Ari jy’ apfiriye
     Ndatangaye, Mukiza :
     Ntiwar’ ukwiriye
     Kungirir’ iryo bambe,
     Jye waguhemuye !

5 . Munsi y’Umusaraba
     Nzagumay’ iteka,
     Naho nabur’ ibyanjye,
     Nywubonamw’ inyungu.
     Nta soni mfit’ uretse
     Iz’ ibyaha byanjye.
     Nzajya nirata gusa
     Uwo Musaraba !

Gushimisha_252.songBody:
1 . Yes' Umucunguzi—Yashyizwe mu mva; 
     Yategerezaga—Igihe cye.

Ref:
Ku wa gatat’ arazuka, 
Az' atsinz' urupfu n'Umubi: 
Ava mu mwijima yabinesheje. 
Yimanye mw ijuru n'abacunguwe.
Yarazutse ! Yarazutse ! 
Tumushime ! Ariho !

2 . Barindiy'  ubusa—Umwami wacu; 
     Bakingiy' ubusa—Cya gituro.

3 . Ingoyi z'urupfu—Yaraziciye; 
     Ntizamuheranye :—Yavuyemo !

Gushimisha_253.songBody:
Ref:
Haleluya ! Haleluya ! Haleluya !

1 . Hashimw' Uwatuzukiye ! 
     Kukw avuye mu gituro;
     Duhuze hamwe,—Twishime tuti : 
     Haleluya !

2 . Yesu, waradupfiriye,
     Ub' Umwam' ubahw iteka. 
     Uradukunda;—Uradushaka :
     Haleluya !

3 . Uri mu bwiza bw’ijuru, 
     Uhadutegerereje.
     Udushakisha—Ubuntu bwawe :
     Haleluya !

4 . Tuguh' imitima yacu, 
     Uyitware, Mwami Yesu,
     Ikwishimire—Iminsi yose : 
     Haleluya !

Gushimisha_254.songBody:
1 . Nimureb’igitangaza : 
     Wa Munyamubabaro 
     Yanesheje wa Mugome;
     Tumukomer’ amashyi :
     Haleluya, Haleluya !
     Tumwimike, n’ Umwami !

2 . Tumuh' ikamba ry'ubwiza,
     Ngo tumushengerere. 
     Tumuh' intebe y'ubwami.
     Twese tuvuz' impundu :
     Haleluya, Haleluya ! 
     Ni we Nyir'imbaraga !

3 . Mwambur' ikamba ry'amahwa 
     Bamwambitse baseka. 
     Mwambik' ikamba ry'Ubwami,
     Mwemere kw ar' Umwami.
     Haleluya, Haleluya ! 
     Tegeka, Nyir'ingabo !

4 . Vuz’ impundu, rangurura : 
     Yanesheje Satani. 
     Ari mu twicarabami, 
     Tumukurir' ubwatsi. 
     Haleluya, Haleluya !
     Ni We Mwami w'abami.

Gushimisha_255.songBody:
1 . Yesu Kristo yarazutse : 
     Twese tumushime : Haleluya !
     Uyu munsi, tunezerwe,
     Twese tumushime : Haleluya !
     Kera ku Musaraba, 
     Ni ho Yesu yatubabarijwe, 
     Ngw ab' impongano y'ibyaha byacu : 
     Haleluya, reka tumuhimbaze !

2 . Yes’ Umwami wo mw ijuru, 
     Twese tumushime : Haleluya !
      Tumushimish’ indirimbo
     Kukw ar’ Umukiza w’abo mw isi,
     Yarabambw’arahambwa ! 
     Ajya n’i kuzimu mu bapfuye.
     Maz’ arabinesh’ava mu rupfu !
     Haleluya, reka tumuhimbaze !

3 . Ibyo yababajwe byose, 
     Umukiza wac' abishimirwe ! 
     Ni byo byonyine byatumye
     Tugir' ubugingo budashira.
     None, yimye mw ijuru, 
     Ahw abamarayika baririmba,
     Tumusingizanye na bo, tuti : 
     Haleluya, reka tumuhimbaze.

Gushimisha_256.songBody:
1 . Yesu Krist' arazutse : 
     None ntidutiny' urupfu,
     Kuko yarunesheje, 
     Nta butware rugifite. 
     Haleluya !

2 . Non' urupfu n' irembo 
     Ry'ubugingo budashira.
     Ibyo bidutinyure, 
     Ni tujya kurinyuramo.
     Haleluya !

3 . Yesu wadupfiriye 
     Ariho : natwe tubeho !
     Tumushimish' ingeso. 
     Ni We Databuj' iteka.
     Haleluya !

4 . Ariho : nta cyabasha 
     Kudutandukanya na We.
     Aturindira hose, 
     Akagez' iteka ryose.
     Haleluya  !

5 . Turi mu maboko ye : 
     Koko, nta wamutunyaga ! 
     Naho yaba Satani, 
     Cyangw' ibyago, cyangw' urupfu.
     Haleluya !

6 . Ariho : ni We Mwami 
     W'ijuru n'isi wenyine;
     Tuzajy'  aho yagiye, 
     Duhorane na W' iteka.
     Haleluya !

Gushimisha_257.songBody:
1 . Shimwa, Mukiza—Utuzukiye !
     Tuguhimbarize—Ko wanesheje !
     Imana yashatse,—Mu gihe cyayo,
     Gutsindish' urupfu—Umucunguzi.

Ref:
Shimwa, Mukiza—Utuzukiye ! 
Tuguhimbarize—Ko wanesheje !

2 . Nimumurebe :—Ni We, ni Yesu !
     Mwe gushidikanya :—Ni We Shobuja !
     Munezerwe mwese,—Bantu b' Umwami, 
     Nimuvuge, muti :—Yatuzukiye !

3 . Nta cyo ngitinya :—Yesu ntagipfa ! 
     Ni We mpora nshima :—N' uw' amahoro.
     Aramfash' iteka;—Arankomeza. 
     Mu kubaho kwanjye,—Nta cyo ngitinya.

Gushimisha_258.songBody:
1 . Umwami yazutse !
     Inkuru yasakaye.
     Mw ijuru no mw isi, 
     Bashim' Umukiza. 
     Yaganduye byose,
     Kuko yadupfiriye. 
     Turatunganiwe : 
     Umwami yazutse !

2 . Ntugir’ icy’ utinya :
     Umucunguz’ ariho !
     Wizer’ ukomeje :
     Arakurengera.
     Utowe na Yesu :
     Witiny’ aragushaka;
     Yarakwishyuriye. 
     Umwami yazutse !

3 . Twebw’ abacunguwe 
     Tuzava mu bituro; 
     Azadukangura, 
     Aduh' ubugingo. 
     Kandi hamwe na We 
     Tuzicara kwa Data 
     Mu bwiza bw'iteka. 
     Umwami yazutse !

4. Noneho, nimuze :
   Twih’ Umukiza wacu !
   Dukundane nka We,
   Tub’ abera nka We.
   Ubwo turi mw isi,
   Tumwigane, tubeho,
   Turindir’ ijuru.
   Umwami yazutse !

Gushimisha_259.songBody:
1 . Ubu tunezerwe 
     Kuk' umubabaro n'ibyaha bishize.
     Umukiza wacu 
     N'ukuri, ni muzim' ubu ! Yarazutse !

Ref:
Kuko ntabw' imva ye 
Yaherany' umurambo we !
None twiringiye 
Ko Yes' uwo yazutse ! yazutse ! yazutse !
Yazutse ! N'ukuri, ni muzima !

2 . Umunt' iy’ apfuye, 
     Aruhuk' umubir' igihe gitoya;
     Arindir' umunsi 
     Abapfa bose bazava mu bituro.

3 . Urupfu n'ubwoba,
     Yesu yarabineshej' arabihamba. 
     Yes' aradukunda : 
     Abana natwe, turiho no mu rupfu.

Gushimisha_26.songBody:
1 . Mana Rurema, ndagushima : 
Wabonetse muri Yesu. 
Dor' urukundo rwawe rwinshi 
Wakunze twebw’ abangizi ! 
Mana, Watanz' Umwana wawe 
Ngw adukirish' amaraso ye.

2 . Njye nguhimbaza, Mwami Yesu,
Kuko wangiriy' ibambe, 
Kandi wamfiriye ku Giti,
Unkurahw ibyaha byanjye. 
Muvunyi wanjye, ndagushima; 
Ndakwihaye, mb' uwawe rwose.

3 . Wasiz’ ubwiza bwawe bwose 
War' ufit' ahw Iman' iri, 
Umber’ Intama y'igitambo, 
Utwar' ibyaha by'abantu. 
Ngukundira, Mukiza wanjye 
Ibyo wanyishyuriye byose.

4 . Urwo rukundo rwawe rwinshi 
Rujya runtangaza cyane, 
Uko nagiriw’ ubwo buntu,
Usumba byos' akamfira !
Reka ngukunde, Mwami Yesu; 
Iminsi yose ngushimishe.

Gushimisha_260.songBody:
1 . Kuri wa munsi tuzazukaho, 
     Yes' azaduh' imibiri mishya;
     Kurira no kuboroga 
     Ntabwo bizaba bikiriho.

2 . Ubu bugingo n'uyu mubiri 
     Ntabwo byabura gutandukana.
     None, mubiri, sinzira,
     Urindir' uwo munsi mwiza.

3 . Uyu mubiri waruhanyaga 
      Ni wo turambitse mu butaka;
      Nuk' ubugingo bwonyine
      Bwazamutse, bujya mw ijuru.

4 . Ubu bugingo n'uyu mubiri
     Iherezo, bizasubirana, 
     Bihabw' ishusho ya Yesu;
     Ntibizatandukan' ukundi.

5 . Mbeg' umunezero mwinshi cyane !
     Koko, mw izuka, tuzishima pe !
     Ni hw imva zose zo mw isi 
     Zizashiramw abapfu bazo.

6 . Maz' ababyeyi n'abana babo 
     N’ abavandimwe batandukanye 
     N’abishwe n’urukumbuzi 
     Bazabonanira mw ijuru !

7 . Bazabanayo mu bwami bwawe;
     Bazaba batagitandukana.
     Kubw’ umusaraba wawe,
     Uzadusohozeyo natwe.

Gushimisha_261.songBody:
1 . Bene data mwe mwese,
     Ni muze dufatanye 
     Ibi byago tubonye
     Tubisangire.

Ref:
Ku bakunzi b’Imana,
Amahoro n’ibyago 
Byose birafatanya 
Kuzan’ ibyiza.

2 . Iyi nshuti ya twese 
     None yadukuwemo. 
     Yadufashaga cyane :
     Ni y' ituriza.

3 . Twibuk' imihati ye 
     N'uko yakiranutse 
     No kwitanga kwe kose 
     No gutinyuka.

4 . Twese yatugiriye
     Umumaro w'ukuri, 
     Kandi yatuyoboye 
     Mu byo gukizwa.

5 . Twagira ngw azab' ino 
     Imyaka myinshi cyane, 
     Ariko kuva mw isi 
     Kwari kugeze.

6 . Imigambi y'Imana 
     Si nk'ibyo twibwiraga. 
     Non' ubw' ibitegetse, 
     Turabyemeye !

Gushimisha_262.songBody:
1 . Umva gusaba kwanjye, 
     Mwuka w'imbaraga ! 
     Shyir' ububasha bwawe 
     Mu mutima wanjye. 
     Mwuka Wera, hishura
     Ibyaha bindimo; 
     Mpesh' ubugingo bushya, 
     Ibyaha bimvemo.

2 . Za mu mutima wanjye ! 
     Mbese, nabaho nte, 
     Ntagufite ng' umbemo ?
     Najya nizera nte ?
     Mwuka, nyobora neza :
     Nzajya nkwemerera; 
     Ump' ubugingo bushya 
     N'umutima mwiza.

3 . Ne kongera gutinya 
     Iby'Umwanzi mubi, 
     Kuk' ukunda kumfasha,
     Ukampa kunesha.
     Mwuka, nyemez' ibyawe 
     Mu mutima wanjye;
     Uwuzuz' ubugingo 
     No kunesha byose !

Gushimisha_263.songBody:
1 . Mwuka Wera wo mw ijuru, 
     Mugabyi w'ubugingo we. 
     Manuka, turakwinginze, 
     Sang' imitim' ikwifuza.

2 . Utwere k' uko tur' uku,
     Ko twishwe n'ibicumuro; 
     Utwereke na Krisito, 
     Ukw ari n'ukw arokora.

3 . Dore, turakwiragije, 
     Kuk' uz' ibidukwiriye; 
     Tumaremw ibyaha byacu,
     Utwerek' Umucunguzi.

4 . Twikish' umuriro wawe 
     Imyand' ubonye muri twe, 
     Nk'ishyari, nko kwihimbaza,
     N'ibindi byangwa na Yesu.

5 . Uduh' ubuntu bwa Yesu, 
     N'ineza n'amahoro bye, 
     Uduhe n'urukundo rwe. 
     No kumuyobok' iteka.

Gushimisha_264.songBody:
1 . Mwuka Wer' udukunda 
     Ni Wow' ujy'utwigisha 
     Kwifuz’ impan' imwe nsa 
     Irut' izindi.

2 . Iyo mpan' ihebuje 
     N' urukundo rwa Yesu. 
     Kand' umunt' uyibuze, 
     Nta cy' ab'amaze.

3 . Urukundo ni rwiza; 
     Rujya rugira neza; 
     Nta n'ishyari rugira; 
     Ntirwirarira.

4. Rwanga n'iby'isoni nke; 
    Ntirwishakir' ibyarwo; 
    Rwemera gufashanya;
    Ntirurakara.

5 . Kand' ibyaha by'abandi, 
     Ntabwo rubyishimira, 
     Kuko runezererwa 
    Ibitunganye.

6 . Rwihanganira byose;
     Rwizigira n'abandi; 
     Nta n'ikibi rukeka 
     Ku muntu wese.

7. Kwizera, kwiringira, 
    Cyanecyan' urukundo, 
    Ni zo mpano z'iteka, 
    Ukw ar'eshatu.

8 . Ni zo mpano nifuza, 
     Mwuka Wera w'Imana; 
     Ariko kurutaho, 
     Ump' urukundo.

Gushimisha_265.songBody:
1 . Ubwo Yesu yar'agiye 
     Gusig' abantu be,
     Ngw azamuk’ ajye mw ijuru 
     Ku Mana, Se,

2 . Yasezeranye kubaha 
     Umwuka we Wera,
     Ngw ahumuriz' ayobore 
     Aba Yesu.

3 . Yiturira mu mutima 
     W’umuntu wihannye; 
      Asukamw urukundo rwe 
      N'amahoro.

4 . Ijwi rye ryongorerera 
     Imbere muri twe, 
     Rikaduhendahenda ngo 
     Dutinyuke.

5 . Ibyiza dukora byose 
     Ni W' ubidutera : 
     Ni W' udutekereresha 
     Ibya Yesu.
 
     Mwuk' ureban' imbabazi 
     Intege nke zacu, 
     Udutungany' imitima, 
     Uyibemo.

Gushimisha_266.songBody:
1 . Man' ubwami bwawe—Buze mur'iyi si ! 
     Tsind' Umurimbuzi,—Wic' ubutware bwe.

2 . Mwami, dukumbuye —Iyo ngoma yawe.
     Usimbuz' ineza—Inzangano z'isi.

3 .Turagukumbuye !—Ngwin' uc' intambara.
    Uce n'ingeso mbi,— Zos' uzimareho.

4 . Zana n’imbaraga;---Uz’uduhembure.
     Turakurindira;---Amas’ ahezeyo.

5 . Dor' ukw amasega—Amarahw intama, 
     Kandi hagwiriye—Abatakwitaho.

6 . Amahanga yose—Ari mu mwijima; 
     Yesu, wa zuba we,—Non' uz' uyavire !

Gushimisha_267.songBody:
1 . Imitim' ikomezwa 
     No kwiringira cyane
     Ko Yes' azagaruka.
     Azaza vuba, ntazatinda. 
     Tuzagir’ ibyishimo,
     Yes'ubw' uzagaruka.

2 . Kand' abo twakundaga, 
     Iyo tubapfushije, 
     Tukababara cyane,
     Iryo ni ryo ritwiringiza !
     Turorere kurira : 
     N’ aza, tuzabonana !

3 . Ni tugir' amakuba, 
     N'ibyo kutunaniza, 
     Twe gukuk' imitima !
     Mw isi s' i wacu : duhumure !
     N'ibyo kwihanganirwa 
     Kugez' ahw’ azazira.

4 . Tugeze ku meza ye,
     Dusangir' urwibutso 
     Rw'umutsima na vino; 
     Bisur' ameza yo mw ijuru : 
     Ni ko tuzasangira 
     Na W' ubw' azagaruka.

Gushimisha_268.songBody:
1 . Ubw' Umwami Yes' azaza
     Kwend' abo yatoye, 
     Ab' Akunda b'abatoni, 
     Bamuyobotse.

Ref:
Bazaka nk'inyenyeri 
Zitatse kw ikamba rye: 
Bazatangaza cyane, 
Bakize rwose.

2 . Ubw' azaz' akorany' abo 
     Yatoye ba hose, 
     Bera baboneye rwose, 
     B'abatoni be.

3 . Yemwe bantu, yemwe bantu,
     Bakund' Umukiza, 
     Ni mw' akunda, ni mw' akunda
     Nk'abatoni be.

Gushimisha_269.songBody:
1 . Yesu n' az' umwijim' uzahunga, 
     Kand’ urupfu na rwo ruzashira; 
     Nta n'uzac' ukundi mu gicucu 
     Cya cya Gikombe kibi.

Ref:
Dukumbuye Yesu cyane !
Icyaduh' akaza vuba ! 
Tuzishima twese, Yesu n’ aza
gukorany' intore ze !

2 . Yesu n' az' azac' umuborogo; 
     Azamara mw is' umubabaro; 
     Azahanagur' amarir' ubwo 
     Kuri tw' abakunzi be.

3 . Yesu n' az' impundu zizavuga, 
     Aje kudukorany' intore ze. 
     Azatwakiran' umunezero, 
     Tuban' akaramata !

Gushimisha_27.songBody:
1 . Mutabazi wacu Yesu, 
Twese tuguhimbaze;
Ni wowe wadupfiriye,
Yesu Mwana w'Intama.

Ref:
Yes' ashimwe, Yes' ashimwe: 
Icyubahiro kibe 
Icy' uwo Mwana w' Intama. 
Duhimbaz’ izina rye.

2 . Twar’imbohe za Satani, 
Twari mu mubabaro; 
Yatuboheshej’ ingoyi, 
Yes’ aratubohora.

3 . Tuguh' imibiri yacu
N'imitima n'ubwenge; 
Kand’ ibyo dufite byose 
Bib' ibyawe, Mukiza.

4 . Tukwijejwe cyanecyane 
N’ uk' ushobora rwose 
Kuturinda no kutwoza 
Ibyo twagucumuye.

Gushimisha_270.songBody:
1 . Uwadupfiriye kera 
     Azaz' ava mw ijuru; 
     Umwam' azamanukana
     N'aber' inzovu nyinshi.
     Haleluya, Haleluya !
     Umukiz' azagaruka !

2 . Azaboneker' abantu 
     Bos' afit' ubwiza bwe. 
     Kand' abamusuzuguye, 
     Bakamubamba kera, 
     Bazaboroga bamenye 
     Yukw ari Kristo w'ukuri.

3 . Kand'  inkovu z'imbereri 
     Azaza zikiriho, 
     Kand' abacunguwe bose
     Bazazinezererwa. 
     Mwam' ubwo tuzazireba, 
     Ibyishimo bizatwica.

4 . Nuko twese tugusenge, 
     Yes' ushyizwe hejuru ! 
     End' icyubahiro cyose, 
     Im' ingoma, n' iyawe !
     Haleluya, Haleluya !
     Ni Wowe Mwami wenyine !

Gushimisha_271.songBody:
1 . Ubw' impanda z'Uwiteka zizavuzwa mw ijuru, 
     Habay’ urya munsi mwiz' uhebuje, 
     Abakijijwe bo mw isi bose bazamwitaba,
     Abakoranirije mw ijuru rye.

Ref:
Ubw' Aza... z' ahamaga...ra, 
Amazi...na y'abe bo...se, 
Mu Gita...bo cy'ubugi...ngo, 
Nzi ko nzumv' izina ryanjye, nkitaba.

2 . Uwo munsi, hazazurw' abapfiriye muri We, 
     Bave mu bituro nk' Umucunguzi.
     Bazahurira mw ijuru n’abazaba bariho:
     Nzaba mpari nanjye—sinzaburayo!

3 . Yesu, Databuja, nzamukorera, ntacogora:
     Nkwiz' ubuntu n'urukund' amfitiye.
     Maz' imirimo yo mw is' ajy'ampa, ni nyirangiza,
     Azampamagar’ angeze mw ijuru.
Gushimisha_271.songTitle: Ubw' impanda z'Uwiteka zizavuzwa mw ijuru

Gushimisha_272.songBody:
1 . Umwam' ageze kw irembo, 
     Wabambwe ku Musaraba;
     Yaje kudukorany' abe,
     Tubane mw ijuru.

      Ref:
     Kw irembo Kw irembo ! 
     Ub' ari kw irembo ! 
     Nukw araje, nukw araje, 
     Kand' ageze kw irembo.

2 . Ibyerekana kuza kwe 
     Birihuta kuboneka :
     Agiye kutugabira 
     Kubaho kw'iteka.

3 . Ntihazabur' intambara; 
     Ntabw' amahor' azahora. 
     Keretse Yes' atsembyeho
Urupfu n'ibyaha.

4 . Maze, mw isi yagizwe nshya, 
     Tuzahaba, dusugire, 
     Kudapfa kwakuye gupfa,
     Tutakibabara.

Gushimisha_273.songBody:
1 . Dukanguke, dukanguke ! 
     Dukor' imirimo cyane, 
     Twitange, tub' igitambo 
     Cyo guhimbaz' Uwiteka.

2 . Kera twagirag' ubute; 
     None, reka tubwihane, 
     Dukorer' Imana yacu, 
     Dufit' umwet' ukwiriye.

3 . Ahar' uyu muns' urupfu 
     Rwaza, rukadutungura,
     Cyangwa Yesu yagaruka. 
     Bisange dukiranutse !

4 . Twang' uburiganya bwose, 
     Twibuke yuk' Uwiteka 
     Areb' ibyo mu mitima 
     Kand' atagir' icy' ahishwa.

5 . Nkukw Imana yaduhaye 
     Izuba ryo kutuvira, 
     Tumurikir' abafite 
     Umwijima mu mitima.

6 . Dukanguke, tuyishime, 
     Turirimban' indirimbo 
     N'abayishimir’ iteka 
     Mw ijuru no mw isi yose.

7 . Mukiza, turakangutse !
     Utwuzuz' Umwuka wawe, 
     Dushimish' Imana yacu
     Amagambo n'imirimo.

Gushimisha_274.songBody:
1 . Mukiza, tuguhaye 
     Uyu munsi, n' uwawe : 
     Ntituz' ibiribube:
     Ni cyo kidushakisha 
     Yuko waturengera 
     Muri byose, Krisito.

2 . Niba turibubone 
     Amahoro yonyine, 
     Utuber' ibyishimo 
     Birut' ibindi byose.
     Haz' ibyag' uduheshe 
     Kukwizera muri byo.

3 . Icyo tugushakaho 
     Kirut' ibindi byose 
     N'uko watuboneza, 
     Twirirwe dutunganye,
     Twirind' iby' udashima, 
     Yesu, tugushimishe.

4 . Tuz' intege nke zacu 
     Igice gusa, Mwami. 
     Nyamara. Mucunguzi, 
     Wowe ntutuyoberwa : 
     Uz' akaga turimo, 
     Nuk' ujy'uturengera.

5 . Turashaka kwemera 
     Rwos' ibyanditswe Byera 
     No kujya twiringira
     Ubuntu bwawe,Yesu,
     No kub' imbata zawe,
     Tugukorera gusa.

6 . Mwam' utwumvir' uduhe 
     Impano twingingira, 
     Tugir' umutim' umwe 
     Utishakir' ikindi
     Keretse gukor’ ibyo 
     Udushakaho, Yesu.

Gushimisha_275.songBody:
1 . Iri joro, Mana yanjye, 
     Ndagushimir' umugisha 
     Wampay' uyu munsi wose; 
     Non' umpishe mu mababa.

2 . Kubwa Yesu, mbabarira 
     Ibyaha nakoze none,
     Ngo mbe nuzuye na bose,
     Ntaragondwa n'ibitotsi.

3 . Unyigish' ingeso nziza, 
     Ngo mpore nzigir’ iteka. 
     Ne kuzatinya no gupfa, 
     Nkuko ntatiny' ibitotsi.

4 . Umpe gusinzira neza, 
     Niringira yuk' undinda; 
     Binsubizemw imbaraga; 
     Maz' ejo nzagukorera.

5 . Ni mbur’ ibitotsi, Mwami,
     Untekereresh' ibyiza, 
     Inzozi zo kumbabaza, 
     Satani ye kunshogoza

6 . Mana, Nyir'ibyiza byose, 
     Ushimwe n'abantu bose, 
     Ushimwe n'abo mw ijuru, 
     We Man' imwe mu Butatu.

Gushimisha_276.songBody:
1 . Data ngiye gusinzira :
     Ngwin' undind' iri joro, 
     Umbundikiz' amababa, 
     Ibibi bitanzaho. (x 2)

2 . Umbabarir' ibi byaha 
     Nagukoreye none, 
     Kand' Umwuka wawe wera 
     Untere kukumvira. (x 2)

3 . Kand' uryamish' amahoro 
     Bene wacu n'inshuti 
     Bato na bakuru bose, 
     Ubarind' ubiteho. (x 2)

4 . Ineza yaw’ iboneke 
     Mu bababaye bose, 
     Kand' Ukenur' abakene, 
     Abarway' ubakize. ( x 2)

5 . Mwami, ndangije gusenga, 
     Nsinzire nkwiseguye, 
     Marw' ubwoba no kumenya 
     K’ udindish’ urukundo. (x 2)

Gushimisha_277.songBody:
1 . Mwam' ubugingo bwacu ni nk'umunsi: 
     Ni buke rwose ntiburama cyane; 
     Kand' ibyishimo byabwo birashira :
     Mwam' udahinduka, tugumane.

2 . Gumana nanjye, kuk' umuns' ukuze, 
     Dore burije, Mwami, ndagushaka; 
     Ni mbur' abandi bose bo kumfasha,
     Tugumane, Mwami, tugumane.

3 . Iminsi yose mba ngushaka, Mwami, 
     Iyo Satan' antey' andwanya cyane, 
     Nta wundi mfit' ubasha kuntabara;
     Tugumane, Mwami, tugumane.

4 . Singir’ umwanzi n'umwe turi kumwe, 
     Kand' amakuba ntambabaza cyane; 
     Intorezo y'urupfu yaracitse;
     Byose ni byiza, ni tugumana.

5 . Amaso n' aremb' uzambonekere, 
     Nzabon' ubwiza bwawe bwo mw ijuru, 
     Nzasiga vub' umwijirna wo mw isi,
     No mw ipfa ryanjye, tuzagumane !

Gushimisha_278.songBody:
1 . Mukiza, ni Wowe zuba ryanjye :
     Nta joro ngir’ iyo turi kumwe. 
     Iby'isi bye kub’ igicu 
     Kinkingiriz' umucyo wawe !

2 . Kand' iyo mbony' ibitotsi byiza, 
     Bikanduhur' umubir' urushye,
     Nibuke yuko mw ijuru,
     Nzahora nkwiseguye, Yesu.

3 . Tujye tuguman’ umunsi wire, 
     Kuko ntabaho tutari kumwe;
     Tugumane na n'ijoro;
     Tutabanye, natinya gupfa.

4 . Niba hagiz' uwasuzuguye 
     Ijwi ry'Imana kur'uyu munsi,
     Tangira none, Mukiza,
     Kumuyobor' inzira nziza.

5 . Mwam' abarwayi, mubane maso, 
     Uh' abaken' imigisha myinshi,
     Kand' abapfushije na bo,
     Mwam’ ubasinzirize neza.

6 . Kandi, Yesu, tuzakangukane, 
     Dukor' imirimo, turi kumwe,
     Nyuma tuzajye mw ijuru
     Tugoswe n'urukundo rwawe.

Gushimisha_279.songBody:
1 . Dor' umuns' urakuze :
     Reb' aho rirengeye !
     Reb' ukwezi n'inyenyeri : 
     Dore, biragaragaye, 
          Bitwakira.

Ref:
Data wera, wera, 
Mwam’ Imana, 
Wuzuy' isi n'ijuru; 
Twese tugusingize,
    Nyir'ingabo !

2 . Rurema, Nyirigira, 
     Ngwino, turakwifuza.
     Twes' utwuzuz' urukundo, 
     Utugir' ubwoko bwawe, 
          Tukuramye.

3 . Ni hacur' umwijima. 
     Utugotesh' umucyo !
     Weyur' ibikingiriza 
     Imitima yacu twese, 
          Tukubone.

4 . Duhe kukwiringira : 
     Ni dupfa, Mucunguzi,
     Tuzabon' umucyo mwinshi, 
     Nukw ijoro rye kubaho, 
          Tugushime !

Gushimisha_28.songBody:
1 . Muganga wacu ni Yesu :
Ni we Mukiza wacu; 
Ni na W' ubyuts' abaguye : 
Umv' ijwi ry' ugukunda !

Ref:
Indirimbo z’Imana 
Ni zo zidushimisha : 
Turirimbane, tuti; 
Yesu, Yesu, Yesu !

2 . Imyend' urayirihiwe ! 
Umv' ijwi ry'Umukiza. 
Azakugeza mw ijuru, 
Ng' unezeranwe na We.

3 . Izina ryiza rya Yesu 
Ni ryo rikuru rwose. 
Dushim uwo Mucunguzi 
Imyaka yacu yose.

Gushimisha_280.songBody:
1 . Imins' irahita vuba, 
     Irahita yihuta.
     Ukw ihita, benshi bapfa 
     Batameny’ Umukiza. 
     Harihw icyo twakora :
     Tugikoran' umwete : 
     Dutabar' ubu vuba, 
     Imins' itarashira.

Ref:
Irashira, irashira ! 
Dor' imins’ irashira! 
Dutabar' ubu twese, 
Twe gukererwa dutyo !

2 . None, bib' imbuto nziza 
     Mu mitima y'abantu;
     Hanagura n'amarira 
     Y’ abanyamibabaro.
     Renger' abapfakazi,
     Kand' ubyuts' abaguye, 
     Uhumure n'impumyi,
     Ibiseb' ubivure.

3 . Iby' uzabishobor' ute ? 
     Ntibizakunanira,
     Nib' ufit' Umwuka Wera 
     N'urukundo rw'Imana :
     Ibiduh' itimanye,
     Tubishatse byukuri. 
     Tuyisengan' umwete, 
     Dukor' iby'imbabazi.

4 . Icy' Umwami Yes' ashaka 
     N' ukugendana natwe, 
     Ngo yikiriz' abarushye
     Bamutey' umugongo. 
     Kandi yaravuz' ati:
     Uzanyizera wese 
     Azabwir' imisozi 
     Ngo nitabwe mu nyanja.

5 . We gutiny' ibir' imbere : 
     Yes' azagushoboza. 
     Umuh' umutima wawe, 
     Awutegeke rwose ! 
     Isi yubahe Yesu ! 
     Yadutsindiy' urupfu 
     N'abadayimoni bose. 
     Ubu ni We dufite.

6 . Sigaho kwizera guke :
     Na wa wundi yakizwa ! 
     Wibuke ko Paulo na we 
     Yar' umwanzi w'ibyiza; 
     Yamufash' atunguwe,
     Yemera gukizw' ubwo, 
     Ab' intumwa ya Yesu, 
     Yamamaz' ubuntu bwe.

7 . Tyo n'ubu, mugende mwese, 
     Muri kumwe na Yesu; 
     Mubamwerek’ abakize, 
     Bos' abazabyemera. 
     Kandi mwe gucogora
     Cyangwa se kunanirwa,
     Mutarabasohoza 
     Ku Mukiz' ubifuza.

Gushimisha_281.songBody:
1 . Ngiy' inkuru twumvise :
     N'uko Yes' akiza ! 
     Vuga hos' iyo nkuru 
     Yuko Yes' akiza ! 
     Menyesh' abarimbuka,
     Abo mu birorero 
     N'abo mu midugudu, 
     Yuko Yes' akiza !

2 . Menyesh' abananiwe 
     Yuko Yes' akiza !
     Menyesh' abashobewe 
     Yuko Yes’ akiza!
     Yavuy' amaraso ye 
     Kera ku Musaraba,
     Ngw abakize, be gupfa : 
     Ni ko Yes’ akiza !

3 . I Rukig' ubabwire 
     Yuko Yes' akiza ! 
     Umvish' i Bugesera 
     Yuko Yes' akiza ! 
     Vug' i Bunyambiriri 
     N'i Ndorwa n'i Bumbogo,
     Bwira n'i Bufumbira 
     Yuko Yes' akiza !

4 . Banyarwanda, mumenye 
     Yuko Yes' akiza ! 
     Nimwihane, mwemere 
     Yuko Yes' akiza ! 
     Umvish' abacuruzi, 
     No mu nkik' ubivuge,
     N’i buzungu n'i bwami, 
     Yuko Yes' akiza !

Gushimisha_282.songBody:
1 . Abantu benshi cyane 
     Batay' Uwiteka, 
     Bazimiye nk'intama 
     Zahabiye kure, 
     Zihagaze ku manga, 
     Zikicwa n'imbeho,
     Impyisi zikazirya : 
     Ni kw abo bameze !

Ref:
Nimuze,tubashake 
Twe tubatarure ! 
Bizatunezeza cyane, 
Tuzany' intam' imwe.

2 . Hemeye nde kugenda 
     Gushak' inzimizi, 
     Ntiyite ku makuba 
     No kubiruhanya, 
     Ngw agir' umwete mwinshi
     Nk' ushak' itungo rye, 
     Agend’ ashak' intama
     Yesu yapfiriye ?

3 . Nubw' uri mu mahoro, 
     Mbese, wumv' ufite 
     Ishyaka rikujyana 
     Gushak' iza Yesu ? 
     Nahw ar’ aboroheje 
     Cyangw’ abagayitse 
     N' abantu b'igiciro 
     Mu maso ya Yesu.

4 . No kw irembo ry'urugo.
     Yes’ arahagaze,
     Ahamagar’ intama, 
     Azugururiye.
     Abuz' abazicyura :
     Ni wow’ abwir' ati: 
     Ushak' intama zanjye, 
     Izo napfiriye !

5 . Byab' ari byiza, Yesu, 
     Bwakwira, tukaza, 
     Tukakubwira tuti :
     N'ukuri twiriwe
     Dushak' intama zawe, 
     Izi zazimiye.
     Ngizi, turazicyuye : 
     Zishyire mu rugo !

Gushimisha_283.songBody:
1 . N' ijwi ry'umwungeri twumva; 
     Ari mw ishyamb' ashak' ize, 
     Zose zagiy’ intatane,
     Zavuye mu ruhongore.

Ref:
Tarura, tarura 
Izo ntama ze zazimiye;
Tarura, tarura 
Izo ntam’ uzimushyire.

2 . Ni nde wafash' Umwungeri
     Kujya gushak' inzimizi 
     Zicwa n'imvura n'imbeho,
     Akajya kuzitarura ?

3 . Abantu barazimiye 
     Bageze kure mu byaha. 
     Yesu ngo, Gend' ubazane, 
     Baz' ababer’ umwungeri.

Gushimisha_284.songBody:
1 . Har’ intam’ urwenda n'icyenda 
     Zari hamwe mu rwuri; 
     Arikw imwe yar' izimiye,
     Ivuye ku Mwungeri,
     Mu bihanamang' izerera,
     Itay’ umwungeri wayo mwiza. (x2)

2 . Iz’ ufit' urwenda n'icyenda, 
     Mbese, ntizihagije ? 
     Uwo mwunger' ati: Sigaho ! 
     Iyo na yo n' iyanjye !
     Naho yab' igeze kure he, 
     Ngiye gushak' iyo ntama yanjye. (x2)

3 . Mu bacunguwe nta wamenya
     Imigezi yambutse
     No kuzerera mu mwijima,
     Ashak' iyo ntama ye ! 
     Yumv’ intam' ihondobereye, 
     Asang’ ivunitse, yenda gupfa. (x2)

4 . Iyi nkora mbona n' iy'iki, 
     Kw irimw amaraso se ?
     Ati: ntuzi ko nanyuz’ aho,
     Nshak’ intam’ izimiye ? 
     Ibiganza byishwe n'iki, se ? 
     Byishwe n'amahwa mur’iri joro. (x2)

5 . Umva, ngiry' ijwi rirangira 
     Ry'uwo mwungeri mwiza,
     Ati : mbony' iyo najimije,
     Ni munezerwe mwese !
     Nukw abamarayika bose 
     Bavuz' impundu, banezerewe! (x2)

Gushimisha_285.songBody:
1 . Kiz' abarimbuka; renger' abapfa; 
     Bakiz' ibyaha n'urupfu rubi ! 
     Shak' abazimiye; byuts' abaguye; 
     Menyesha bose ko Yes' akiza.

Ref:
Kiz' abarimbuka, renger' abapfa, 
Bageze kwa Yesu, ngw abakize !

2 . Abamushungera, na bo ntabanga;
     Ategerej' abihana neza. 
     Bahate bihane, bizere Yesu, 
     Ujy'ubasabira ngo bakizwe.

3 . Toz' abazimiye, be kuzuyaza, 
     Barek' irari ridakwiriye : 
     Non' ubakangure, bisubiremo, 
     Bagarukir' Uwabacunguye.

4 . Kiz' abarimbuka : yaragutumye,
     Kand' akubashish' uwo murimo. 
     Bos' ubayobore mu nzira ntoya! 
     Menyesh' indushyi ko zaruhuwe !

Gushimisha_286.songBody:
1 . Biba mu gitondo imbuto z' ineza; 
     Jy'ubiba ku manywa n'ikigoroba 
     Rindira ko zera, baze basarure,
     Tuzatund' imiba, tunezerewe.

Ref:
//Tuzanezerwa! Tuzanezerwa 
   Ni dutund' imiba, tuzanezerwa. //(bis)

2 . Bib' izuba riva; biba mu kibunda :
     Ntugatiny' ibihu n'imbeho nyinshi. 
    Amasarura n'imirimo bishize, 
    Tuzatund' imiba, tunezerewe.

3.Tugende turira, tubibir' Umwami :
   Niba tubabazwa n'abarimbuka,
   Tuzahozwa n' aza dushir' agahinda :
   Ni dutund' imiba, tuzanezerwa.

Gushimisha_287.songBody:
1 . Yes' azaganz' ibihugu byose,
     Iyo biva bikagera. 
     Ndetse n'iyi si yos' izab' ubwami bwe, 
     Ari we Mwami w' abami.

2 . Bazamusenga badacogora;
     Bazamusingiz' iteka.
     Izina rye rizababer' impumuro,
     Ikwire mw is' isandare.

3 . Twihute, twamamaz' ibye hose,
     Mu moko yose yo mw isi, 
     Ngw indimi zose zizavug’ ishimwe rye, 
     Zemere yukw ar' Umwami.

4 . Ku ngoma ye, n' amahirwe masa : 
     Imboh' arazibobora, 
     Kand' abakene na b' akabakenura, 
     Indushy' akaziruhura.

5 . Nimuze mwese, mwa byaremwe mwe 
     Mwubah' Umwami w'abami; 
     Namwe bamarayika, turirimbane, 
     Tut' Urakaz' uhimbazwe !

Gushimisha_288.songBody:
1 . Urukundo rwa Yesu
     Nzi ko rwatugezeho. 
     Rudukuraho rwose 
     Urubanza rwo gupfa.

Ref:
Yes' arankunda, (x3) 
Kuko yamfiriye.

2 . Abatari bahabwa 
     Ubugingo bw'iteka, 
     Twihute tubabwire 
     Urukundo rwa Yesu.

3 . Nkuko yadukunz' atyo, 
     Akadupfira twese,
     Natwe dukunde dutyo 
     Abakiri mu byaha.

4 . Nuk' ubw' azagaruka, 
    Aje kwim' ingoma ye, 
    Tuzumv' ijwi ry'Umwami, 
    Ati: Mwakoze neza.

Gushimisha_289.songBody:
1 . Igitabo cy'Imana, 
     Ndagikunda, n'icyanjye : 
     Ni cyo kimbwir' ukuri, 
     Yuko nd' umunyabyaha.

2 . Kinyigish' urukundo 
     Rw'Umucunguzi wanjye : 
     Iyo nyoby' inzira ye, 
    Vuba kirantarura.

3 . Iyo ntewe n'ibyago, 
     Kimmar' umubabaro; 
     Nigishwa na cyo yuko 
     Nd' umusuhuke mw isi.

4 . Igitabo cy' Imana 
     Kimbwira yuk' umuntu 
     Azanesha n'urupfu, 
     Yizey' Umucunguzi.

5 . Kimbwira k' utihana, 
     Agapfan' ibyaha bye, 
     Azarimbuka koko, 
     Ntabane n'Uwiteka.

6 . Kandi nigishwa na cyo 
     Kw abakunzi ba Yesu
     Bazahabw' ibyishimo 
     Bitazashir’ iteka.

7 . Igitabo cy'Imana 
    Gihora kinyigisha 
    Amagamb' ahebuje : 
    Ndagikundir' ukuri.

Gushimisha_29.songBody:
1 . Uduhagarare__ Hagati, Mukiza,
Iki gihe cyacu__ Cyo guseng' ucyeze.

2 . Yesu tugisenga,__Suk' Umwuka Wera 
Mu mitima yacu,__ Atubwir' ibyawe.


3 . Kwinjira kwe kwera__ Kutumar' ubwoba 
N'agahinda kose,__ Tube mu mahoro.

4 . Tutabuzwa n'ibyo,__ Yes’ inzira yawe, 
Tuzayikomeza.__ Dufit' intege nshya. 

5 . Kandi tukigenda,__Tuzategereza 
Igihe cyo kuza---Kwawe turi maso.

Gushimisha_290.songBody:
1 . Ijambo ryaw' urimfungurire, 
     Nkuko wahagije bya bihumbi, 
     Yes' ubasaturiy' umutsima, 
     Nonub' umpaze nanjy' undengere.

2 . Ni Wowe mutsima w'ubugingo; 
     Nkizwa n'ijambo ryawe ry'ukuri. 
     Rimber' ifunguro ry'umutima, 
     Nkunde n'ukuri kwaw’ unyeretse.

3 . Yes' ump' Umwuka waw' andengere, 
     Ankore no ku maso, mpumuke. 
     Mbon' ibihishwe by'ijambo ryawe. 
     Nawe, nkubonemo, Mucunguzi !

4 . Icyo gitab' ukimpishurire, 
     Kinshinj' ibyaha byanjye, nkwizere, 
     Niho nabaturwa, nkabohorwa,
     Ni hw amahoro yawe yanzaho !

Gushimisha_291.songBody:
1 . Nubwo nd' umwana muto bwose, 
     Jye nd' agatama ka Yesu; 
     Mbasha no kwinjira mw irembo 
     Rijya mu Bwami bw'Imana.

Ref:
Njye nshyira neza, (x 2) 
      Murokozi, 
Kwizera kwanjye (x 2) 
      Muri Wowe.

2 . Nubwo nd' umwana muto bwose, 
     Yesu, war' umeze nkanjye; 
     Umwuka wawe n' ump' ubwenge, 
     Ni bwo nzasa nawe rwose.

3 . Nubwo nd' umwana muto bwose, 
     Nsa n'urum' iyo hakeye; 
     Yesu ni we munyabubasha, 
     Anshorez' ukuboko kwe.

4 . Jye ndi muto; ndacyari mw isi, 
     Mfit' ubugingo bugufi : 
     Mukiz' ubwawe n' ubw' iteka; 
     Muri bwo mbone kurama.

Gushimisha_292.songBody:
1 . Tugiye gutaha: — ntitwibagirwe 
     Amagambo yera— batwigishije.

2 . Uyu munsi mwiza—Twumvir' Umwami
      N’ umunsi w'izuka—Ry'Umucunguzi.

3 . Twubahir' Imana—Ahantu hose, 
     Twumvir' ijwi ryayo—Rituyobora.

4 . Iman' itwigishe—Kubar' iminsi,
    Twibuke kw ari Yo—Itubeshaho.

5 . Tuyiririmbire,—Tuyishimire,
     Kuko yaduhaye—Umwami mwiza.

Gushimisha_293.songBody:
1 . Uko njya mbaho mw isi,
     Njya mbwir' Umwami, nti :
     Ndakwinging' unyigishe 
     Kuguh' umutima.

2 . Iteka mu gitondo,
     Njya mbwir' Umwami, nti :
     Nyiriz' imbere yawe, 
     Mana yanjye nkunda.

3 . Kenshi cyane mu munsi, 
     Njya mbwir' Umwami, nti : 
     Ni Wowe turi kumwe : 
     Uhor' ushimishwa.

4 . Kand' iy' ijoro rije, 
     Njya mbwir' Umwami, nti : 
     Mukiz' ureba hose, 
     Mpa ku byiza byawe !

5 . Kugez' igihe nzapfa,
     Nzabwir’ Umwami, nti : 
     Ni kuri Wowe, Data, 
     Njya mperw' umugisha.

Gushimisha_294.songBody:
1 . Har'ubw' abagore 
     Bazany' abana babo , 
     Abigishwa ntibemera 
     Ko barushya Yesu. 
     Nyamara Yes' abony’ ibyo,
     Arabahamagar' ati :
     Mwemerer' abana ngo baz' aho ndi !

2 . Ati : Ndabakira, 
     Mbashyire ku bibero; 
     Ntimuzi ko nd' Umwungeri 
     W'abana bato, se? 
     Ni banyisunga bitanze,
     Nzabaha kujya mw ijuru : 
     Mwemerer' abana ngo baz' aho ndi !

3 . Icyaduh’ abana
     Bo mu mahanga yose 
     Bakumv’ inkuru za Yesu, 
     Bakaza kuri We,
     Abeyurir’ umwijima, 
     Abakiran’ imbabazi ! 
     Twemerer’abana ngo baz’ahw ari !

Gushimisha_295.songBody:
1 . Mumushime, bana bato mwese :
     N' Umukunzi wanyu. 
     Twese, twese, tujye tumushima : 
     Adukunda twese.

2 . Mumusenge, bana bato mwese :
     N’ Umukunzi wanyu. 
     Twese, twese, tujye tumushima : 
     Adukunda twese.

3 . Mumusange ...............

4 . Mumukunde...............

5 . Mumuture ................

6 . Mumukorere..............                     etc.

Gushimisha_296.songBody:
1 . Tuzany' amaturo—Yo gushimisha : 
     Yose n' aya Yesu;—tumutur' ubu !

Ref:
Tumuture, tumuture,—Tumutur' ubu ! 
Yose n' aya Yesu—Tumutur' ubu !

2 . Ava mu biganza—Byac’ aba Yesu; 
     Turayamutuye,—Tur' abana be.

3 . Ubu turi bato;—Ni yo dufite.
     Ubwo tuzakura,—Tuzasumbyaho !

4 . Ibike dufite,— Yes' ubyakire. 
     Ubwacu tukwihe :---Non' utwemere !

Gushimisha_297.songBody:
1 . Yesu ntahinduka, 
     Ntahinduka, ntahinduka;
     Yesu ntahinduka 
         Na hato !

2 . Yesu yanyogeje, 
     Yanyogeje, yanyogeje; 
     Yesu yanyogeje 
         Ibyaha.

3 . Ni We wampagije, 
     Wampagije, wampagije;
     Ni We wampagije : 
          Ndahaze !

4 . Yes' azanyakira, 
     Anyakire, anyakire;
     Yes’ azanyakira, 
          Ngez' i We.

5 .  Ni We tuzabana, 
      Tuzabana, tuzabana;
       Ni We tuzabana 
          Mw ijuru.

6 . Mpore mmusingiza, 
     Mmusingiza, musingiza;
     Mpore musingiza, 
          Nishimye !

Gushimisha_298.songBody:
1 . Mbe nk'umurase w'izuba 
     Aho ngera hose, 
     Mbonesh' umucyo wa Yesu
     Mu mwijima w'isi.

Ref:
Yesu, Mucyo w'isi, 
Mbe nk'umurase kubwawe,
Ngez’ umucyo wawe 
Mu mwijima w'iyi si !

2 . Mbe nk'umurase w'izuba 
     Weyur' umwijima 
     Wo mu mitima y'abantu 
     Bataz' Umukiza.

3 . Mbe nk'umurase w'izuba, 
     Mfash' ab'i muhira, 
     Nkwiz' amahoro ya Yesu 
     Mu bo duturanye.

4 . Mbe nk'umurase w'izuba :
     Mbisezeranye ntyo. 
     Nerekan' ingeso nziza  
     Ziva kuri Yesu.

Gushimisha_299.songBody:
1 . Amaboko yawe, Yesu Mukiza, 
     Yagirag' ineza n'iby'imbabazi.
     Kand' abana bat' akabakikira, 
     Agakiz' indembe n'abamugaye.

2 . Amaboko yanjye ndayaguhaye. 
     Ab' ayawe, Yesu, uyakoreshe ! 
     Umpe kuba nkawe, njye ngukorera, 
     Njye nkoran' umwet' umurimo wawe !

Gushimisha_3.songBody:
1 . Mwa bari mw isi yose mwe,
     Nimuhimbaz' Uwiteka.
     Muhore mumukorera, 
      Kukw ibyo bidukwiriye.

2 . Mumenye yuk' Uwiteka 
     Ari we watwiremeye;
     Turi n'intama aragira, 
     Tur' izo mu mukumbi we.

3 .Mwinjire mu marembo ye, 
    Mugere no mu rugo rwe, 
    Muhore mumusingiza, 
    Muhimbaze n'izina rye.

4 . Umwam' Imana ni mwiza; 
     Imbabazi n'ubuntu bye 
     Iteka bizahoraho; 
     Mwese mushim’ izina rye.
Gushimisha_3.songTitle: Mwa bari mw isi yose mwe

Gushimisha_30.songBody:
1 . Ai Mukunzi wanjye we, 
Umpe kukwihishamo. 
Iyo ntewe n'iby'isi 
N'ingabo za Satani, 
Mutabaz’ umpish' ubwo, 
Ba banzi be kumfata 
Umber' ubuhungiro, 
Mu rupf' uzanyakire.

2 . Nta bundi buhungiro, 
Mwam’ unyirokorere; 
We kunsiga, Krisito, 
Komez' ujy' undengera. 
Ni Wow' ump’ imbaraga,
Nta wundi mfit' umfasha; 
Mbundikiz' amababa, 
Uhor' undind' ibibi.

3 . Ur' umunyambabazi 
Zitarangira, Yesu; 
Usindagiz' urushye, 
N' urway' uramukiza,
Urera bihebuje,
Nta bwo ngutunganiye; 
Ndi mubi bikabije, 
Wow' urakiranuka.

4 . Yesu ni Wowe soko 
Y'amazi y'ubugingo, 
Reka nkunyweho cyane, 
Undudubiz' imbere. 
Nuk' umutima wanjye 
Ujye wuzur' iteka, 
Amazi y'iyo soko 
Abe mensh' adakama.

Gushimisha_300.songBody:
1 . Bana, ntimugire—Icyaha mukora, 
     Ntimutonganishwe—N'uburakari.

2 . Bana, kuko muri—Aba Yesu Kristo, 
     Nukw ingeso zanyu—Zib' ingeso ze.

3 . Yavugag’ iteka—Iby'ukuri byose, 
     Nta by'isoni Yesu —Yigez' akora.

4 . Nta n'umwe yigeze—Kugirira nabi 
     Kuko Yes' iteka—Yangag' ibyaha.

5 . Har' ufit' ubwenge—Bwo kuboshya nabi: 
     N' Umwanzi Satani—Uhora hafi.

6 . Abasezeranye—Kwimura Satani
     No kurek' ibyaha,—Mwe kumwumvira.

7 . Yes' azabafasha—Kumurwanya cyane, 
     Kuk' ubwe wenyine—Yamunesheje.

Gushimisha_301.songBody:
1 .Nd’ agatama ka Yesu, 
    Ndanezerewe cyane. 
    Mfit' Umwungeri mwiza; 
    Ajy' andagira neza.
    Arankunda, ndabizi; 
    Ijwi rye ndaryitaba.

2 .Ajy' anyahura neza; 
    Ntanyica, ntankubita. 
    Kand' angenza buhoro, 
    Ajy’ andagir’ aheza. 
    N’iyo nagiz' inyota, 
     Anshor'  amazi meza.

3 .Singitinya, noneho :
    Ndi mu ntama za Yesu : 
    Igihe ni kigera, 
    Akanshyura mu rugo,
    Nzagir' umunezero; 
    Nta bukene kwa Yesu.

Gushimisha_303.songBody:
1 .Yesu, Mwungeri wanjye,
    Nd' agatam' undagire. 
    Byose ndabitinyuka : 
    Nta wuzakunyambura !

2 .Mwami, waramfiriye 
    Kera ku Musaraba : 
    Mbonye n'ibikomere 
    Mu biganz' unteruje.

3 .None, njye ngusingiza, 
    Muri byose nkumvire ! 
    Urukund' umfitiye, 
     Ni rwo runyishimisha.

4 .Yesu, Mwungeri mwiza, 
     Non’ unyiyegereze !
     Mmenyereza noneho, 
     Nzinukwe kuzimira !

5 .Mwami Yes’ unshorere, 
    Nshe mu nzir’ ifunganye; 
    Nta cyo nanz' untegeke : 
    Wow' uz’ ibinkwiriye !

6 .Ngez' ah’ uri mw ijuru, 
    Ibijya binyobera,
    Ni ho nzabimenyera, 
    Nshim' uko wandagiye !

Gushimisha_304.songBody:
1 . Harihw Inshuti y'abana 
     Ihoraho mw ijuru,
     Ibakund' urukundo 
     Rutagir' iherezo.
     Nubw' inshuti zo mw isi 
     Zaduhararuka, 
     Inshuti yacu, Yesu, 
     Ntiyaduhemukira.

2 . Kandi mw ijuru ry'Imana, 
     Har' uburuhukiro 
     Bw'abana bamukunda, 
     Bakambaz' Imana, Se, 
     Ahw abagenzi bato 
    Bajya basohora; 
    Baruhukir' iteka 
    Mu mahor’ adashira.

3 . Nyir' urugo rwo mw ijuru 
     N' Uwatubabarijwe. 
     Ahamagar' abana 
     Ngo binjire muri rwo.
     N’ urugo rwiza cyane 
     Rw'amahoro masa; 
     Kand' ibyishimo byaho 
     Birut' iby'abo mw isi.

4 . Harihw amakamba yera 
     Y'abana bakijijwe 
     Bazaherwa mw ijuru 
     Na Yesu bakoreye. 
     Abamushimishije 
     Bakunz’ izina rye,
     Azabagororera 
     Ingororano nziza.

5 . Harihw indirimbo nziza 
     Y'abana bakijijwe 
     Bazaririmb' iteka,
     Basohoye mw ijuru:
     Ishiman’ urukundo 
     Uwabacunguye;
     Kand' abayiririmba 
     Ntabwo bazacogora.

6 . Hariho n'imyenda yera 
     Y'abana bakijijwe 
     N'impundu z'ibyishimo 
     N'inanga z'izahabu.
     Abakunz' Umukiza 
     Bazabigabirwa. 
     Tukiriho dukunde 
     Yes' urukundo rwinshi.

Gushimisha_305.songBody:
1 . Uwo ni nd' urambitswe 
     Mu muvure w'inka se ?

Ref:
N’Umukiz' Umwami wacu ! 
N’ igitangaza tubonye. 
Ngwino, tumwunamire, 
Tumuramy' atwimemo !

2 . Uriya wasonzeye 
     Mu butayu ni nde se ?

3 . Kand' uriya wigisha 
     Bos' ibyiza ni nde se ?

4 . Ni nde se bazanira 
     Abarwayi n'indushyi ?

5 . Mbese, ni nd' uririra 
     Lazar’ amaze gupfa ?

6 . Ni nde se basingiza, 
     Ahetswe n'indogobe ?

7 . Mbese, ni nd' ushavuye, 
     Aseng' i Getsemane ?

8 . Uhaw' iby' atakoze 
     Ku Musaraba ni nde?

9 . Ni nde watuzukiye 
     Ngw atubohor' ibyaha ?

10 . Ni nd' ugeze mw ijuru, 
       Afit' icyubahiro ?

Gushimisha_306.songBody:
1 . Twishimir’ umunsi w'Imana, 
     Tubonahw ibyishimo. 
     N' umunsi turuhukiraho,
     Tuvuye mu mirimo. 
     Imibabaro yac’ ivuyeho 
     No kwiganyira kose. 
     N’ umuns' abakuru n'abato 
     Basingiz' Uwiteka.

2 . Imana yarangije byose 
     Kur' uyu munsi mwiza; 
     Kandi ni ho Kristo yazutse 
     Urupf’ arunesheje,
     Ngo dukizw' ibyaha n'ingeso mbi;
     Maz' atwoherereza 
     Umwuka w'Iman' ihoraho, 
     Wamanutse mw ijuru.

3 . Iyo tugejej' uyu munsi 
     Tubon' ubukiriro, 
     Tuba dusa n'abasohoye 
     Ahitwa Paradiso. 
     Twari tuguy' umwum' ukabije;
     None tubony' amazi; 
     Kand' isi twasezeranijwe 
     Tuba tuyigezemo.

4 . Non' ingoma nyinshi zavuze
     Guhamagaz' abayo, 
     Bateranire gufungura 
     Ifunguro ry'Imana : 
     Ubutumwa buramurikira 
     Bos' abo mu mwijima, 
     Kandi busa n'amazi meza 
     Ahembur' imitima.

5 . Nuko dusab’ Iman' iduhe 
     Ub' umugisha mushya 
     Kugira ngo tuzasohore 
     Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru. 
     Ni ho tuzajya duhimbarisha 
     Ijwi ry'umunezero 
     Data wa twese n'Umwana we 
     Kandi n'Umwuka Wera.

Gushimisha_307.songBody:
1 . Haleluya ! Haj' umunsi 
     Wo kuruhukir' Imana.
     Uyu munsi ni w' urusha 
     Iyindi yos’ amahoro. 
     Iteka, twumv' ibyishimo 
     Biva ku Mana yacu.

2 . Uburuhukiro bwiza 
     Bubaho mur'uyu munsi. 
     Umucyo w'Imana yera 
     Ub’ uratumurikiye.
     Ni w' utweza mu mitima 
     Ku munsi w’ Uwiteka.

3 . Mbega, nambar' iki none,
     Mbone kwizihiz' Imana ? 
     Dor’ umwambaro yampaye 
     N’ ugukiranuka kwayo, 
     Kugira ng’ umubi nkanjye 
     Nerekan' ubwiza bwe.

4 . We yamviriy' amaraso, 
     Kuko ngir’ ibicumuro; 
     Gukiranuka kwe ni ko 
     Kwez' uyu mutima wanjye. 
     Ibyo n' umwambaro wanjye 
     Ukwiriy' icyumweru.

Gushimisha_308.songBody:
1 . Mwami Yesu, turaje 
     Kumv' amategeko yawe; 
     Ushyire mu mitima 
     Ijambo ryawe riryoha. 
     Ibyo mw isi tubireke, 
     Dutekerez' iby'ijuru.

2 . Nta cyo twebwe twamenya, 
     Iyi mitim' icyijimye,
     Itakiwe n'umucyo 
     Uva mu Mwuka w'Imana. 
     Utwigishe kuyoboka, 
     Ngo tujye dukora neza.

3 . Dore, Mwana w'Imana, 
     Twebwe twese tugusaba 
     Ng’ utweresh' imitima 
     Umwuka wawe w'ukuri; 
     Tujye twumva, turirimbe :
     Tunezez' Imana yacu.

Gushimisha_309.songBody:
1 . Inzu yawe, Mana,—Turayishimira : 
     Ni h' ujy'uhurira—N'abo wakijiije.

2 . Duteraniramo—Guseng' Uwiteka, 
     Tukamwaturira—Ibitubabaza.

3 . Dufashirizwamo—N' Ijambo ry' Imana : 
     Tukirisomerwa,—Twunguk’ ibya Yesu.

4 . Tubwiririzwamo—Ibidukomeza 
     Mu ntambara nziza,—Bikatunezeza.

5 . Tuharirimbira—Ishimwe rya Yesu, 
     Twagera mw ijuru,—Tukazarushaho.
