6 . Mw is' ujy'unkundisha— Kubana n'abawe; 
     Nzaguhimbazanye—N'abera mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_31.songBody:
1 . Mutabaz' ubuntu bwawe 
     Ni jyew' ubukwiriye. 
     Burakiz' abandi cyane; 
     None, nanjye bunzemo.

     Bunzemo, bunzemo. 
     None, nanjye bunzemo.

2 . Data mwiza, Mana yera,
     Mpora ngucumuraho. 
     Mfit' ibyaha byinshi cyane,
     Umbabarir' umpire.

     Bimveho ! Bimveho ! 
     Umbabarir' Umpire.

3 . Ntumpiteho, Yesu wanjye;
     Nkwisunge, nkwiragize ! 
     Mfit' inzara, mfit' inyota,
     Ndakwinginz’ undengere.

     Ndengera, ndengera :
     Ndakwinginz' undengere.

4 . Mwuka Wer’ ump' umutima
     Wizey' Umucunguzi; 
      Yes' unyuhagir' ibyaha 
      Mu maraso wavuye.

      Mboneza, mboneza 
      Mu maraso wavuye!

5 . Mwuka Wera, jye nd' impumyi;
     Ndakwinginz’ umpumure. 
     Ujy' uhamy’ iby'Umukiza;
     Non' umumpishurire.

     Nd' impumyi, nd' impumyi ! 
     Non' umumpishurire.

6 . Urukundo rwawe, Yesu, 
     Ruva ku musaraba, 
     Urunyerek' ub' unkize : 
     Noneh’ unyiharire.

     Nkiz' ubu, nkiz' ubu ! 
     Noneh' unyiharire !

Gushimisha_310.songBody:
1 . Iki gihe twamaranye 
    Tuyobowe n'ibendera; 
    Dutandukany' amahoro, 
    Twifitiy' umunezero.

2 . Mwa nshuti zacu nziza mwe, 
     Dusangiye gucungurwa 
     N' intambara ya Krisito, 
     Ajy' abarind' iyo mujya.

3 . Mwumv' iri jambo dusoma 
     Mu Gitabo cy' Uwiteka : 
     Mutumbir' Umurokozi,
     Mwihararuk' inzira ye.

4 . Ahar' amaso yab' aya, 
     Ntitwongere kubonana. 
     Nyamara tw’ abakijijwe 
     Tuzahurir’ i Siyoni.

5 . Yes’ azah' abakijijwe 
     Ingororano mw ijuru. 
     Mukomez' ibyo mwahawe 
     Na We, katanga ka mbere.

6 . Mwa nshuti mwe dukundanye, 
     Twabonany' Umusaraba 
     Mur' iyi minsi twabanye, 
     Mugendane n'Uwiteka.

7 . Ituza riva mw ijuru 
    Ritwuzure tw' aba Yesu, 
    Itorero rye ryo mw isi 
    Rikir' imitima myinshi.

8 . Twihane gukiranirwa 
     Kw'abatubah’ Uwiteka, 
     Tumenye yuko twe twese
     Tuzageran' imbere ye.

9 . Ngaho, murabeho mwese, 
     Bagenzi twafatanije, 
     Tuzaba hamwe mw ijuru,
     Duhoraneyo na Yesu.

Gushimisha_311.songBody:
1 . Yemwe, nshuti twabanye 
     Kandi twafatanije, 
     Tubasezeyeh’ ubu, 
     Murabeho : Ku Mana.

2 . Tugiye gutangira 
     Urugendo runini :
     Mujye mudusabira,  
     Iman' ibane natwe.

3 . Noneho, mwa nshuti mwe, 
     Turashaka kugenda.
     Ngo tujyane na Yesu, 
     Hamwe n'Uwiteka, Se.

4 . Ariko ntitwihebye 
     Kubw' inzira ducamo :
     Tuzi ko twarushyize 
     Mu maboko y'Imana.

5 . Murabeho, bagenzi, 
     Abo twafatanije.
     Mu byago no mu byiza, 
     Yes' agendane namwe.

6 . Har' uburuhukiro 
     Bw'abakijijwe bose
     Ni dupfa, tuzabayo 
     Ku Witeka mw ijuru.

7 . Ahar' amaso n' aya 
     Yo kubonana mw isi;
     Nyamar’ abakijijwe 
     Tuzabana mw ijuru.

8 . Murabeho, bagenzi 
     Dusubiy' i wac' ubu.
     Nimugende mwizeye, 
     Tubaragij' Imana.

Gushimisha_312.songBody:
1 . Abakund' Imana mwese,
     Ni hagir' abapfa muri mwebwe, 
     Cyangwa se natwe tugapfa, 
     Tuzahurir' i Siyoni twese.

Ref:
Turashima Iyatumye 
Tumaran’ iyi minsi.

2 . Nta mwenda wose dufite : 
     Twiteguye gufashwa n'Imana 
     No kwamamaz' Ubutumwa 
     Mu bihugu tugiyemo byose.

3 . Iki gihe tumaranye, 
     Twari dufatanirije hamwe;
     None natwe turagiye,
     Namwe musigarane n'Imana.

4 . Nshuti zacu, twarabanye; 
     Tubasezeranyeh’ urukundo.
     Dushim’ Imana yatumye
     Dufatany' iki gihe tumaze.
 
Ref:
None, ngaho, murabeho ! 
Iman' ibane namwe !

Gushimisha_313.songBody:
1 . Umukiz' abe hamwe namwe, 
     Ababer' Umujyanama, 
     Abaragire nk'intama, 
     Abarinde mu mahoro ye !

Ref:
Hamwe namwe, ye, Hamwe namwe !
Kugeza ku mperuka y'isi ! 
Hamwe namwe, ye, hamwe namwe, 
Umukiz' Abe hamwe namwe.

2 . Mu rugamb' abe hamwe namwe,
     Ab' ingabo yany' ikinze, 
     Abarinde mu makuba,
     Abahishe mu mababa ye !

3 . Mu miruhw abe hamwe namwe, 
     Mubuyerezwa n'ibyago, 
     Mu bukene no mu ndwara, 
     Abaramiz'  amaboko ye.

4 . Mu mahor' abe hamwe namwe,
     No mu gihe cy'urushyana, 
     No mu mvura no ku mucyo, 
     Mub’ iteka mu mahoro ye.

5 . No mu ntambara yo hanyuma,
     Har’ urupf’ imbere yanyu, 
     Mwenda kwambuka rwa ruzi, 
     Azab' ari hamwe namw' ubwo.

Gushimisha_314.songBody:
1 . Gukundana kw'aba Yesu 
     Ni ko kudukoranije, 
     Ari ko murunga w'abantu b’Imana 
     Yabanje gukund' abayo.

2 . Duhore dusabirana
     Ngw iduh' imitim' ihuje, 
     Ngw imare muri twe ibyaha n'ubwoba, 
     Iduh’ umugisha wayo.

3 . Twabon’ umukristo wese 
     Watay' iyi nzira yayo, 
     Tuzinging' Imana ngw imwibuts' ibyayo 
     Ngo yonger' arebe Yesu.

4 . Kand' iyo dutandukanye, 
     Tujyanye n'Umwami wacu, 
     Uhor' uturindish' ubuntu n'ihirwe, 
     Dukomej' ubumwe bwacu.

Gushimisha_315.songBody:
1 . Imana yakoze neza 
         Ibidutangaza, 
     Abantu bo mur' iyi si 
         Batari babona.

2 . Muhimbaz’ Iyateguye
         Inzira ducamo. 
     Ni Y' itubonanij’ ubu 
         Tutishwe n'ibyaha.

3 . Twaherukanaga kera,
         Nyamara noneho 
     Dusubiye kubonana, 
         Dufit' ibyishimo.

4 . Yemwe bagenzi dukunda,
         Nta kibi twibuka
     Mu byo twafatanyemo; 
         Turabashimiye.

5 . Ku Mana, bene Data mwe,
         Mw isi, ni ko biba. 
     Abifuza Siyoni nshya, 
         Tuzaban' iteka.

6 . Non' umugisha w'Imana 
         Uhorane namwe. 
     Ibah' ibibanezeza 
         Mu nzira mucamo.

Gushimisha_316.songBody:
1 . Man' itang' itimana, 
     Twese tuguhimbaze :

Ref:
Kokw imbabazi zawe 
Ntabwo zizarangira !

2 . Tugushimiy' izuba 
     Waturemeye, Mana :

3 . Waduhaye n'ukwezi
     Kutwakira n'ijoro :

4 . Tugushimiy' imvura 
     Imez' ibyo tubiba :

5 . Kand' imirima yacu 
     Wayihay’ umugisha :

6 . Mana, waduhesheje 
     Ibigega byuzuye :

7 . No mu mitima yacu, 
     Wez' imbuto wateye :

8 . Tugukuriy' ubwatsi  
     Ku byo twejeje byose :

Gushimisha_317.songBody:
1 . Mukiza, wadutoreye 
         Kuba nk'umubir' umwe; 
     Urashaka yuko twera, 
         Twihanganira byose.
     Ntushaka n'ibitatanya 
         Abo waje guhira; 
     Urukundo rwawe, Mwami,
         Ruduhuz' imitima.

2 . Yemw' abakundwa na Yesu,
         Na none nimwongere. 
     Muvuge mwes' imbere ye 
         Ibyo mwasezeranye. 
     Kandi ni mwongera kumva 
         K' urukundo rwatubye, 
     Mumwingingish' imitima, 
         Yemere kubuzuza.

3 . Bana b'Imana Rurema,
         Ntimutinye kwitanga ; 
     Mu kubaho kwanyu kose,
         Mukundane. mwihwema ! 
     Umukiza wacu Yesu 
         Ni kw ajy' atugirira, 
     Ngo haboneke muri twe 
         Ubuntu bw'Uwiteka

4 . Mwami Yesu, wakomeje 
         Isezerano ryacu; 
     Kand' utwigishe kubana 
         Mu rukundo nyakuri. 
     Mwam' ujy' uruduh' iteka,
         Rudacogora rwose; 
     Ni bwo bose bazamenya
         Yuko watwitoreye.

Gushimisha_318.songBody:
1 .  Hose habera heza 
   Inshuti zibana : 
     /Zirakundana neza, 
     Zibanye na Yesu./ x2

2 . Nkukw iy'imvur’ iguye, 
     Ihembur' imyaka, 
     /Ni kw’ Iman' ibigenza, 
     Yez' abakundana./ x2

3 . Kubana kwabo kwiza,
     Barahugurana, 
     /Ngo be kugwa mu cyaha, 
     Babon' amahoro./ x2

4 . Umwuk' uhamagara 
     Abo mw isi yose, 
     /Ngo bazab' ishyo rimwe, 
     Umwunger' ab' umwe./ x2

Gushimisha_319.songBody:
1 . Aho, mwumvis' ijwi ry'Umwami ? 
           Ati, Basore, mubyuke ! 
     Turi hano, tugandukire 
           Rwos’ amategeko yawe.

Ref:
Tuguhay’ ubusore bwacu 
    N’urukundo rwacu, Mwami: 
Mu ntege nke zacu twuzure, 
    Tujye duhoran' iteka.

2 . Twifuza cyan' umucyo wawe 
          N'urukundo n'amahoro; 
     Twishiman' ibendera yawe, 
          Tuyijyane mw isi yose.

3 . Dufatish' ukuboko kwawe, 
          Ujy' udushorer' iteka. 
     Nubwo duterwa n'ibitwoshya,
          Ujy' ubidukiza byose.

4 . Duh' umwete nk'Intumwa zawe, 
          Duhore dukora nka zo; 
     Duhwane na zo mu kwizera 
          No kugupfir' ubishatse.

Gushimisha_32.songBody:
1 . Mwam' utuvubir' imvura, 
Nkuko wasezeranye. 
Twumva twumye mu mitima : 
Uduhembuz' imvura.

Ref:
Utuvubir' imvura, 
Iy' umugisha wawe ! 
Hahoze hagw' urujojo : 
Duh' umuvumbi wawe !

2 . Mwam' utuvubir’ imvura :
Yaduhembura rwose. 
Twumva mu matw' irahinda : 
Uyidusohozeho !

3 . Mwam' utuvubir’ imvura,
Iducunshumukeho ! 
Tuje guhabw' umugisha 
Wadusezeranije.

4 . Mwam' utuvubir' imvura : 
Icyamp' ikagwa vuba, 
Ubu tukiri ku mavi, 
Tukigutakambira !

Gushimisha_320.songBody:
1 . Mwa bagore mwe b'i Rwanda,
        Muze, mwitabe Yesu ! 
     Dor' imirimo ni myinshi:
         Tujye kumukorera.
     Dutabare bene wacu :
         Ubu bararimbuka.
     Mwa bagore mwe b'i Rwanda, 
         Yes' arabashoboza.

2 . Mwa bagore mwe b’i Rwanda,
         None nimutebuke!
     Imibabaro n'indwara 
         Biragwiriye mw isi.
    Nimukingur' imitima, 
         Umukiz' ageremo. 
    Mwa bagore mwe b'i Rwanda, 
         Mureke gupfapfana !

3 . Mwa bagore mwe b'i Rwanda, 
         Mw isi har' umwijima. 
     Nimujyan’ amatabaza,
         Mwakire bene wanyu. 
     Abagore n'abakobwa 
         Baheze mu mwijima. 
     Mwa bagore mwe b'i Rwanda, 
         Mubamurikir' ubu !

Gushimisha_321.songBody:
1 . Mana Data wo mw ijuru , 
     Washyingiriye Adamu 
          Na Haw' i Paradiso, 
     Umaze kubateranya, 
     Ubaha n'umugish' uti: 
          Mub' amahoro masa. 
     Muzabyare,—Muzaheke, 
     Muzagwire,—Mwuzuz' isi,
     Muyitegeke n'ibyayo.

2 . Mujye mwitegeka neza, 
     Mufashanye, mukundane,
          Murengerane mwembi. 
     Mw ihirwe no mu makuba 
     Mu bworo no mu bukire,
          Muzahimbaz' Imana. 
     Mana Data,— Ubarinde, 
     Ngo bagume—Kuri Wowe, 
     Mwami, jy'ubiyegereza.

3 . Wa mukwe n'umugeni mwe, 
     Nimugir' umutim' umwe,
          Mubane mu mahoro. 
     Nuk' Umucunguzi wanyu    
     Azabakomez' iteka,
           Arind' urugo rwanyu, 
      Abageze—Mw ijur' i We, 
    Ngo mutahe—Na bwa bukwe 
    Bw'Umwana w'intama, Yesu.

Gushimisha_322.songBody:
1 . Aba bombi, Mana Data, 
     Bashyingiranyw’ amahoro, 
         Ujy'ubarinda neza. 
     Mugwaneza w'ubutunzi, 
     Ubatere kwizigira,
         Kubw' imbabazi zawe. 
     Bakwizere,—Bagusenge, 
     Wowe, Data,—Kuk' ukunda 
     No kubikiriz' iteka.

2 . Bahimbaz' izina ryawe; 
     Rinda guterana kwabo 
     Kubw' urukundo rwawe. 
     Kand' amahoro yaw' abe 
     I wabo none n'iteka
     Hamwe n'ubuntu bwawe. 
     Amen ! Amen !—Ubemeze,
     Ubafashe,—Ubarinde 
     Mu kubaho kwabo kwose.

Gushimisha_323.songBody:
1 . Mana Data wa twese,
        Muremyi wa byose, 
     Kera wateranije 
        Adamu na Hawa, 
     Non' aba bana bawe 
        Ubah' umugisha 
     Uva mu buntu bwawe, 
        Baterane neza.

2 . Yesu, Mukiza wacu,
        Wejeje bwa bukwe 
     Bw'i Kana kera, n'ubu 
        Ubah' umugisha.
     Butah' ubwawe, weze 
        Inzu y'aba bantu,
     Amahor' adashira 
       Ajy' abamw iteka.

3 . Mwuka w'Imana mwiza, 
       Non' ubahumure, 
     Bareb' ubwiza bwawe 
       N'urukundo rwawe. 
     Ubarind' amahane 
       Yic' imibanire, 
     Ahubw' ubakoreshe
        Iby' ushima gusa.

4 . Ab' ari Wowe, Data, 
       Ububakir' inzu, 
     Kugira ngw ibyishimo
       Byabo bidashira. 
     Wez' urukundo rwabo,
       Ruhorehw iteka, 
     Babane muri Wowe. 
       Bahuj' umutima.

Gushimisha_324.songBody:
1 . Mana Dat' ukiranuka, 
         Ababatizwa none, 
     Ubah' umugisha wawe, 
         Kand' ubarind' iteka; 
     Bahame mu bawe rwose,
         Bagushimishe, Mwami, 
      Kandi babe mw Itorero, 
         Bitez' ubwami bwawe.

2 . Mwam' isezerano ryabo,
         Ngo baryibuk' iteka, 
     Ubakomeze mu byawe 
         Kuko wabapfiriye; 
     Babeho mu byawe byiza,
         Bagukunde mu kuri, 
     Kuko waje kubakiza,
         Bemere gucungurwa.

3 . Mwam' ubah' Umwuka wawe,
         Bakuyoboke rwose, 
     Ntibazatanire mw isi,
         Bakundane na bose ; 
     Babone no kwamamaza 
          Ibyiza byawe byose. 
     Niho twese tuzahabwa 
          Ikamba ry'ubugingo.

Gushimisha_325.songBody:
1 . Ababatijwe none,
        Ubarinde, Mwami, 
     Ub' umubyeyi wabo,
        Kukw ar' abangizi. 
     Bajya mw ijuru bate ?
        Ntabwo bakwijyana, 
     Keretse bakwizeye, 
        Wowe, Mucunguzi.

2 . Bashakish' urukundo,
        Ujy' ubaramira. 
     Bakwiringire, Mwami,
        Bahunge Satani;
     Muvunyi Yesu, ngwino,
        Ubakiz' ibibi. 
     Twese tuguhimbaze, 
        Ng' udukiz' iteka.

3 . Mwam' ubwawe wenyine, 
        Ubabatirishe 
     Umwuka wawe wera,
        Bajye bakwizera;
     Twese tuzafatanye,
        Tuzab' umwe rwose, 
     Duhore dukundana 
        Nkuko wadukunze.

Gushimisha_326.songBody:
1 . Utuzanye hano gusangira 
     Igaburo ryera , Mwami Yesu; 
         Nuk' uyu munsi mwiza, 
         Ngwin' utwibutse yuko 
     Watubabarijwe, udupfira.

2 . Umutsima wera umanyurwa 
     N'iyi vin' isukwa bitwibutsa
         Ko mu mukumbi wawe
         Ababigira nkana 
     Uzabibahora : bazacibwa.

3 . Nukw iri Gaburo ritwibutsa 
     Yuko wapfiriye kudukiza !
         Dukiranuke twese,
         Tuguhimbaze rwose : 
     Turakwihereje : utwimemo.

Gushimisha_327.songBody:
1 . Ni byiza kureb' ab'Imana 
     Baterana bakundanye; 
     Mwuka Wera naw' ubakunda,
     Ubazenguruts' umucyo. 
   /Gusenga n’indirimbo byabo 
     Bitumbagira mw ijuru./ (bis)

2 . Iyo bagez' imbere yawe, 
     Baje gusangira nawe, 
     Urukundo ruva mw ijuru
     Rurabanezeza cyane; 
   /Imitima yabo yizeye 
     Ijy' igusingiz' iteka./ (bis)

3 . Ubwo bugingo bubeshaho 
     Abacunguwe ba hose, 
      Imitima yab' inezezwa 
      N'ukw ihor' ibon' ibyiza. 
    /Itorero ryawe ritunze 
      Ubuntu bwawe busaga./ (bis)

4 . Mana y' urukund' utwigishe 
     Gukundana neza rwose, 
     Ngo duhabw' Ibyokurya Byera,
     Tweger' Uruhimbi rwawe. 
   /Irari ry'imitima yacu  
     Rib' iryo guhazwa nawe./ (bis)

Gushimisha_328.songBody:
1 . Yes’ ur' Umukiza wanjye: 
         Kuv' ubu, jye mb' uwawe. 
     Nuhagiwe n'amaraso 
         Yawe, Mwana w'intama.

Ref:
Tugusingize, Mukiza, 
    Yesu, Mwana w'intama. 
Nuhagiwe n'amaraso : 
    Ngushime, Murokozi !

2 . Kera nararushye cyane 
         Ngo nihesh' amahoro. 
     Nonubu, namaramaje 
         Kwirangiriza Yesu.

3 . Nzajya mbwir' abantu bose 
         Agakiza ka Yesu, 
     Gashyitse, katar' igice 
         N'ubugingo bw'ubuntu.

4 . Nzajya namamaza Yesu, 
         Nshiz' amanga, nta soni : 
     Uko yambohoy' ingoyi 
         No kunkiz' akankiza.

5 . Mpimbaz' Uwanshunguy' atyo,
         Ankirish' imbabazi ! 
     Ajy' andind' amp' amahoro :
         Nukw asingizw' iteka !

Gushimisha_329.songBody:
1 . Nezerwa cyane, wa si we;
         Araje Shobuja !
     Mwa bayibamo mwese mwe,
     Musangwe mwinonosoye,
     Ni mumukingurire,
     Mumwakir' abiharire;
Kand' ibyaremwe byose bimuhimbaze !

2 . Nezerwa cyane, wa si we,
        Ko yimy' ingoma ye !
     Mwa bantu mwe, twishimane,
     Tunezerwe bihebuje.
     Namwe, bamarayika,
    Turirimban' ishimwe rye. 
Namwe misozi mwese, nimurangire !

3 . Non' ibitovu n'amahwa
         Nimubirimbure !
     Twanizwe n'ibicumuro
     N'intimba byatumezemo,
     Yes' araturengera
     Ngw abirandure muri twe,
Wa muvum' awusimbuz' umugisha we.

4 . Yazanywe no kuganz' isi,
        Ngo twes' atwereke
     Ishimwe n'icyubahiro
     Bituruka mu kwera kwe
     No mu rukund' afite,
     Urw' akund' abacumuye.
Tumuhimbaze : n' Umukiz' utangaje !

Gushimisha_33.songBody:
1 . Ndagushimiye, Mukiza,
Urukundo wankunze; 
Nuk' umpindur’ umugende 
W'amazi y'ubugingo.

Ref:
Mb' umugende gusa, Yesu,
Wuzuyemw imbaraga 
Z'agakiza kawe, Mwami,
Kabone kuntembamo !

2 . Mb' umugend' ugez' amazi 
Mu mitim’ isaraye, 
Ibone kunyw' agakiza 
K'ubutumwa bw'ineza.

3 . Mb' ikibindi cyawe, Yesu :
Nuk' unyoz' untunganye, 
Maz' unyuzuz' ayo mazi, 
Ni yo Mwuka w'Imana.

4 . Mb' umugabo wo guhamya 
Uburyo wankijije : 
Waranguze ngo mb' uwawe, 
Nuk’ unyuzure  rwose.

5 . Yesu, suk' Umwuka Wera 
Mu mutima wanjy’ ubu, 
Kugira ngo ngez' amazi 
Yawe mu basaraye !

Gushimisha_330.songBody:
1 . Wowe, Man' ikiranuka, 
     Turashim' izina ryawe 
     Kuk' uduhay' udukiza. 
     Ujy'utuyobor' i Wawe.

2 . Waduhay' Umwami Yesu, 
      Aza kutwigisha neza 
      Ibir' i Wawe mw ijuru. 
      Ngo tukuyoboke neza.

3 . Wow' udusabir' iteka, 
     Ube mu mitima yacu; 
     Natwe tujye tugukunda, 
     Kuk' ur' Umuvunyi wacu.

4 . Uhimbazwe, Mwami Yesu : 
     Twibuka k' uzagaruka 
     Kudushaka, twe n'abacu, 
     Ng' uduh' ubugingo bushya.

Gushimisha_331.songBody:
1 . Hoziyana ! Twese dushim' Uwaje
            Mw izina ry'Umwami.
            Hoziyana mw ijuru !
     Ubwo yaje mw izina ry'Umwami, (x2)
            Hoziyana ! Hoziyana ! 
            Hoziyana mw ijuru ! ( x2)

Gushimisha_332.songBody:
1 . Turirimbe na none 
        Ubuntu bw' Umwami; 
     Umunezero mwinshi 
        Ube mu mitima.
     Agakiza kacu 
        Kavuye mw ijuru : 
     Dufit' Umukiza. (x 2)

2 . Imana ntirakara :
        N' amahirwe yacu. 
     Ibabarir' umubi 
        Wayisuzuguye. 
     Umukiza wacu 
         Yikorey' ibyaha 
     Byatwicaga rwose. (x 2)

3 . Ni dushakan' umwete
         Ijambo ry'Imana, 
     Tuzagirirwa neza 
         N'Umukiza Yesu. 
     Ni We ntwari yacu : 
         Araturwanira, 
     Agahor' atsinda. (x 2)

4 . Abacunguwe bose 
         Aberek' inzira; 
     Ashyir' umucyo mwiza 
        Mu mitima yabo.
     Umwuka we wera 
        Uhor' utwigisha 
     Iby'ukuri byose. (x 2)

5 . Kand' azava mw ijuru, 
        Mu bwiza bw'Imana; 
     Azaba yanesheje; 
        Azaturokora.
     Abizeye bose 
        Bazishim' iteka, 
     Bamubony' ukw ari. (x 2)
Gushimisha_332.songTitle: Turirimbe na none Ubuntu bw' Umwami;

Gushimisha_333.songBody:
1 . Nimuze, dusange Yesu : 
     Ni W' udukesh' imitima. 
     Turirimbe, tunezerwe, 
        Kuko tur' intore ze !

2 . Data yatumy' Umwana we 
     Ngw’ atuzanir' ubugingo. 
     Ni W' ubw' uzatuzamura,
        Atujyane ku Mana.

3 . Abemey' ayo magambo 
     Bayashima mu mitima, 
     Bameny' Imana Rurema 
        Kandi bavuz' impundu.

4 . Yesu, kubw' ubuntu bwawe, 
     Uzatwijyanir' i Wawe, 
     Ahw abatowe n'Imana 
        Bicara bakishima.

Gushimisha_334.songBody:
1 . Wa mutima wanjye we, shim' Uwiteka ! 
     Mwa bindimo byose mwe, mushime !
     Njye mpimbaz' izina rye, ne kwibagirwa 
     Iby' Imana yankoreye byose. 
     Imbabarir' ibyaha nakoze byose. 
     Ni Y' inkiz' indwara zammugaje.
     Inyambik' imbabazi zayo nk' ikamba, 
     Ikampaz' ibyiza bidashira.

2 . Ijy' ikor' ibyo gukiranuka gusa. 
     N' abarenganyw' ikabarengera. 
     Ic' imanza ziboneye zitabera,
     Kand' igir' imbabazi n'ibambe. 
     Imenyesh' abayubah' inzira zayo 
     Uwitek' atinda kurakara; 
     Umujinya ntiyawuguman' iteka, 
     Akunda kugirira nez' abe.

3 . Uwiteka ntiyatwituy' ibihwanye 
     N'ibicumuro twamucumuye, 
     Kandi nkukw ijuru rye ryitaruy' isi.
     Ni kw imbabaz' agira zingana. 
     Ibuvazuba n'iburengerazuba.
     Dor' uko hitaruye kure pe. 
     Ni ko yajyanye n'ibicumuro byacu 
     Kure yacu. Turamuhimbaza !

4 . Nkuko se w' aban' abagirir' ibambe, 
     Ni kw’ Imana yac' irigirira 
     Abantu bayubaha, kukw izi neza
     Ubukene bwacu n'intege nke. 
     Iz' ubugingo bwacu ko butarama;
     Buhwanye n'ubwatsi bushiraho. 
     Ntibutinda; si nka za mbabazi zayo, 
     Zo ntizizashir' iteka ryose.

5 . Uwitonder' isezerano ry'Imana, 
     Ni ryo ryakomejwe n'amaraso 
     Ayo Yes' Umwana w'Intama yavuye,
     Kand' akumvir' ibyo yategetse, 
     Ni w' ugirirwa neza n'Iman' iteka, 
     Non' akiri mw isi no mw ijuru,
     Iman' izamwerek' imbabazi zayo 
     N'umurava no gukiranuka.

Gushimisha_335.songBody:
1 . Umuhanuzi Yesaya 
        Yeretsw' ibyiza kera.
     Yerekw' Imana mw ijuru 
         Iri mu rusengero :
      Abakerubi n'Abaserafi 
         Bayishyize hagati,
      Bajya bayishim' iteka, 
         Bayisingiza bati :

2 . Mwan' Uwer' Uwer' Uwera:
         Ibyo mw isi n'ijuru
     Byuzuyemw ishimwe ryawe, 
         Bose baguhimbaze.
     Baracyaririmba batyo,
         Kand' abantu bo mw isi
     Na bo barashim' Imana, 
         Umukiza n'Umwami.

3 . Natwe tuyihimbazanye 
         N' abamaraika bose,
     Tuti : Mwami nyir' ingabo, 
         Ni Wow' usumba byose;
     Ur' Uwer' Uwer' Uwera :
         Ibyo mw isi n'ijuru
     Byuzuyemw ishimwe ryawe. 
         Bose baguhimbaze !

Gushimisha_336.songBody:
1 . Mwuka wera w’Imana, 
          Mmanukir’ ubu ! 
          Mmena ! Mbumba !
      Nyuzura ! Nkoresha ! 
      Mwuka Wera w'Imana, 
          Mmanukir' ubu !

Gushimisha_337.songBody:
1 . Imbabazi z'Umwami wacu Yesu 
             N'urukundo rw'Imana 
             No kubana n'Umwuka Wera 
      Bibe muri twe, twebwe twese : Amen.

Gushimisha_338.songBody:
1 . Mwami, vuga, nanjye ndumva :
          Ndindiriy' icy' umbwira; 
     Kijya kinnezeza cyane, 
          Kimpan' ibicumuro.
          Mwami, ngutez' amatwi : 
     Icy' unshakaho n' iki ?

Gushimisha_339.songBody:
1 . Non' amaganya yawe yose, 
     Ngwin' uyashyir' Umucunguzi : 
     Ari ku Ntebe y'Imbabazi, 
          Ngwin' ayakuruhure!

Gushimisha_34.songBody:
1 . Ndusheho kukwegera, Mukiza, 
Ne kukuba kure: 
Nkwishingikirizeho, Mukiza, 
Ungendeshe neza.

2 . Nerekan’ icyubahiro cyawe 
Mu byo nkora byose; 
Akanwa kanjye kajye kavuga
Ibyiz' umbwiriza.

3 . Umpindure nk'isoko y'ibyiza,
Itemb' idakama; 
He kugir' undi nkorer' iteka, 
Databuja mwiza.

4 . Kand' imigambi yanjye n'inama 
Ubyigandurire; 
Nyemeza k' ur' Umwami wenyine 
Untegeka byose.

5 . Ni Wowe mutsima w'ubugingo 
N'amazi mazima; 
Iyo nishwe n'inzara n'inyota, 
Ni Wow' ujy' umpaza.

6 . Ni Wow' uhaza kwifuza kwiza,
Kose niyumvamo. 
Ni tujy' i wawe, nta cyo, Mukiza, 
Tuzifuz' ukundi.

Gushimisha_340.songBody:
1 . Umutima wanjye wizera 
          Kugusaba, Mana Data; 
     Unyumvane za mpuhwe zawe,
          Jy’ umwana wakugomeye.
     Ni Wowe wenyine nizeye 
          Kw ari Wow' ump' umugisha.

2 . Ndagusanze nguhungiyeho
          Kukw ari Wowe nizeye. 
     Umpe n'Umwuka wawe wera.
          Ump' intege. ni nnanirwa. 
     Ni mbon' ibyago, nkwizigire 
          K' unyakiran' imbabazi.

3 . Ku manywa mba mu mucyo wawe; 
          N'ijoro nkakwegamira; 
     No mu gitondo, nki gusenga,
          Ujy'untegurir' inzira:
     No mu maryama, Data mwiza, 
          Undinganiriz' iby'ejo.

Gushimisha_341.songBody:
1 . Fat' ukuboko kwanjye,—Ungendeshe; 
   Tujyan' ungez' aheza—Ku Witeka. 
   Sinagir' aho ngera,—Ntagufite.
   Mwam' ah' ushaka ko njya,— Uhanjyane.

2 . Ibyago ni bintera,—Mpumuriza; 
     Unturiz' umutima,—Ni mbabara. 
     Naje nguhungiyeho,—Ngo nduhuke :
     Sintinya turi kumwe,— Mwami wanjye.

3 . Ubu naho nahishwa—K' untabara, 
     Nizeye k' uzanjyana.—Ukankiza. 
     End' ukuboko kwanjye,—Unyobore,
     Tujyan' ungez' aheza—Ku Witeka.

Gushimisha_342.songBody:
1 . Njye nsindagizwa n'ukuboko kwawe, 
          Jy' umwana waw' ufit' intege nke. 
     Ni Wowe, Mwami, nisunze wenyine, 
          Ni mbana nawe, nta kizanyobya.

2 . Njye ntegekeshw' uko kuboko kwawe,
          Nnezerewe, ndi no mu makuba. 
     Ngukundish' umutima wanjye wose 
          Kugira ngo mb' uwawe, Mukiza.

3 . Njye nkomezwa n'uko kuboko kwawe 
         Mu mutima wanjy' ushidikanya:
     Reb' agahinda n'ishavu njya ngira 
         Umpumurize, Mwami, ntunsige.

Gushimisha_343.songBody:
1 . Munyabyaha, nturushye se ?
        Sanga Krisito ! 
     Umv' iri jambo ryiz' avug' ati : 
        Ruhuka !

2 . Yes' afit' ibimenyetso
        Bimutwereka ? 
     N'umutwe n'ibiganza bifite 
        Inkovu.

3 . Kw ar' umwami se, nta kamba 
       Yesu yambaye ? 
     Ye, namubonye yambay' ikamba 
       Ry'amahwa !

4 . Ni mpakwa kur'uwo Mwami, 
        Nzagabirw' iki ? 
     N' ugufatanya na W' imiruho
        N'intimba !

5 . Nimusaba kunyakira,
        Ntaribumpeze ? 
     Haba na gato, ntiyabikora ! 
        Witinya !

6 . Ni mmwiyeguriraho se,
        Yamp' umugisha ? 
     Umv' abo mw ijuru babihamya. 
         Bati : Ye !

Gushimisha_344.songBody:
1 . Muze mwese, muz' aho ndi, 
        Abananiwe ! 
     Yesu ni kw ahamagara 
        Abo mw isi.

2 . Si wow' umushak' ahubwo 
        Ni W' ugushaka ! 
    We kwirirwa witunganya :
        Uz' uk' uri.

3 . Dor' ahagaze ku rugi :
        Arakomanga. 
     Ahamaz' iminsi myinshi : 
       Mwinjiz' ubu !

4 . Ngwin' ureb' iby' Umukiza 
        Agukorera : 
     Aribugukiz' indwara 
        Z'umutima.

5 .Ntutsinzwe se n'urubanza 
        Rw'ibyaha byawe ? 
    Rek' akubabarir' ibyo 
        Byaha byose !

6 . Yesu kw ar' umunyebambe.
        Umwangiy' iki ? 
     Ko byatuma yigirayo, 
        Ababaye ?

7 . Amaganya yawe yose
        N'imibabaro, 
     None byos' abiguture, 
       Uruhuke !

Gushimisha_345.songBody:
1 . Umv' iryo jwi rikwinginga: 
         N' irya So wo mw ijuru ! 
     Yiriw' aguhamagara : 
         Umwitabe nonaha !

Ref:
Nonaha ... nonaha ... !
Sanga Yesu nonaha !

2 . Ko wamaz' imyaka myinshi 
         Uzerer' uzimiye, 
     Mbese, ntiwaz' uyu munsi ? 
          Ni byo bigukwiriye !

3 . Wabuz' amahoro mw isi; 
        Wuzuy' umubabaro : 
     Banguka, wisunge Yesu; 
         Ni We buruhukiro !

4 . Bwira Yes' ibyaha byawe, 
         Na W' akubabarire. 
     Herek' ugendane na We, 
         Mu nzir' ijya mw ijuru !
Gushimisha_345.songTitle: Umv' iryo jwi rikwinginga n’ irya So

Gushimisha_346.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, witabe Yesu; 
     Akuri bugufi. 
     Watur' ibyaha byawe, 
     Usang' Umukiza.

Ref:
Haguruka ! Haguruka ! 
Arakurindira. 
Watur ibyaha byawe; 
Wakire n'umugisha !
Awuguher' ubuntu; 
Nuk' umusingize !

2 . Ngwino, witabe Yesu,
     Uve mu mwijima !
     Reka gushidikanya : 
     Imins' irahita.

3 . Ngwino, witabe Yesu, 
     Gend' umuganaho ! 
     Dor' atez' amaboko, 
     Ngw akubabarire !

4 . Ngwino, witabe Yesu :
     Mbes' uratiny' iki ? 
     Yapfiriy' abagome : 
     Ngwin' umwiringire !

Gushimisha_347.songBody:
1 . Yesu nguriy' ahw ahagaze; 
     Dor' ukw aboshywe n'abanzi be !
     Umva Pilat' arabaz' ati :
     Yesu mmugirire nte ?

Ref:
Uramugenza s'ute ?
Hitamo nonaha ! 
Naw' utazibaz' ubundi, 
Uti Arangenz' ate?

2 . Ibyo na non' ubihitemo ! 
     Wabyemera, wamuhinyura, 
     Cyangwa wamwimika wishimye.
     Uramugirir' ute ?

3 . Ubwo Pilato yashakaga 
     Kwirengagiza guhitamo, 
     Byaramunaniye : naw' ibyo
     Ntibyagushobokera.

4 . Petero yaramwihakanye; 
     Ni ko guhitamo nabi pe ! 
     Wowe s' ahubwo ntiwakunda
     Gupfa bamuguhora ?

5 . Yes' umusubize nez' uti :
     Nd' uwawe, Mwami, ndakwihaye; 
     Umpe kujy' aho wanyobora, 
     Nishimiy' iby' ukunda !

Gushimisha_348.songBody:
1 . Mbese, mu mutima wawe, 
     Ntufitiye Yes' ahw aba ?
     Dor' ahagaze ku rugi :
     Munyabyaha, mwinjize !

Ref:
Uh' Umwami Yes' ahw aba : 
Umvir' ijwi rye ryinginga ! 
Kingur' umutima wawe, 
Yinjiremo, yimemo !

2 . Dor' imirimo n'iby'isi 
     Bikwihariy' umutima : 
     Ntagufitemw’ ahw atura,
     Nubwo yagupfiriye.

3 . Mbes' uracyabuz' uburyo 
     Bwo kwita kur' iryo jwi rye ? 
     We gutind' uyu n'umunsi
     Wawe wakirizwaho.

4 . Uhe Yes' ahw aba none, 
     Kukw imins' ihita vuba, 
     Udatungurwa n'urupfu, 
     Rya jwi rigaceceka !

Gushimisha_349.songBody:
1 . Reba Yesu ku Musaraba ; 
     Reb' uko twatumy' agirirwa : 
     Huguka nonah' umwitabe, 
     Umutumbire !

Ref.
     Umuhang' amas' ubu : 
     Ni h' uzab' usugiye.
     Nuk' uyahang' Umusaraba
     Bamubambyeho.

2 . Ibyaha byarakuboshye pe : 
     We kwanga yukw agukiz' ubu ! 
     Emer' aguh' ubugingo bwe : 
     Umutumbire !

3 . Uyamuhange; yarazutse ! 
     Banguk' uburyo bukiriho. 
     Agutangariz' umucyo we :
     Umutumbire !

4 . Ni w' uduhuza n'Imana, Se. 
     Azi gukiz' ukiraniwe. 
     Akujy' imber' akuyobore.
     Umutumbire !

Gushimisha_35.songBody:
1 . Umpe kukwegera,__  Mana yanjye ! 
Naho twafatanya __Umusaraba,
Nagumya kwishima,__Nkajya ngusenga nti:
Umpe kukwegera,---Mana yanjye !

2 . Umpe kukwegera,__  Mana yanjye ! 
Jy’ undenger’iteka,__  Ngumye nkwizere. 
Ntewe na Satani,__ Ujy’ undwanirira.
Umpe kukwegera, __Mana yanjye !

3 . Naho natungurwa__ N’umwijima, 
Nkisegur’ ibuye,__ Mbaye jyenyine, 
Nzabe nka Yakobo,__ Ndot’ ibyo mw ijuru, 
Nkomeze nkwegere,__ Mana yanjye !

4 . Wakinguy’ ijuru,__ Mana yanjye :
Urwego ruriho__ Rutugezayo. 
Mugenzi komera !__Jy’usab’ itek’uti : 
Tujye tugumana,__ Mana yanjye !

Gushimisha_350.songBody:
1 . Yemw’ abaguzwe n'amaraso 
     Ya Yes' Umucunguzi, 
     Nimuze, mumupfukamire :

Ref:
Musang' Umwami Yesu
Usumha byose.

2 . Dor' isoko y'amaraso ye 
     Yashyizweho kubwanyu : 
     Mumwitabe ngw aboze namwe :

3 . Dor' aya mazi y'ubugingo :
     Nimuze, muyanyweho, 
     Mumwitab' abamar' inyota :

4 . Kand' intege nke z'umubiri 
     N'imanga y'umutima 
     Bimarwa n'Umusaraba we :

5 . Mwa ndushyi mwe ziremerewe,
     Nimwemere, mwihane ! 
     Ni mworoshy' imitima yanyu !

Gushimisha_351.songBody:
1 . Yemw' abahung' Umukiza,
     Ni nd' ubirukana se ?
     Ariko ni We Mushumba 
     Udushak' intama ze.

2 . Nkuk' umwunger' ajy' ashaka
     Iyazimiye yose, 
    Uko ni ko Yesu yaje 
    Ngw adupfir' intama ze.

3 . Mudatiny' ibyaha byanyu :
     Amaraso ya Yesu, 
     Ayamenekeye twese; 
     Ni y' abyeyura byose !

4 . Naho byaba byinshi bite, 
     Bikabaremerera, 
     Umukiza wacu Yesu 
     Ntazabyibuk' ukundi.

5 . Yemw' abifuz' ubugingo 
     Butazashir' iteka, 
     Ntimugir' undi musanga :
     Yes' arabiteguye !

6 . Mwe gukund' ibyaha byanyu 
     Kubirutisha Yesu, 
     Kuko byatumy' adupfira, 
     Ngo tubane mw ijuru.

7 . Uzahabw' ibyiza byose 
     Yadusezeranije, 
     No kudapf’ iteka ryose : 
     Muze, mwe gucikanwa !

8 . Ni Satani waduhumye :
     Twabay' ibiretwa bye. 
     Noneho, turamucitse; 
     Twitaby' Umucunguzi.

9 . Yes' Umwami yatubwiye.
     At' Abaremerewe 
     N'abarushye, muz' aho ndi,
     Mbaruhure byukuri !

10 . Mwami Yesu, sinz' umunsi
       Uzanjyana mw ijuru. 
       Icyo nzi n' ukuba maso, 
       Ng' unsange niteguye !

11 . Ubwo tuzager' i Wawe,
       Tuzanezerwa cyane, 
       Twicaranye nawe, Yesu, 
       Hamwe n'abakijijwe.

12 . Mwami Yesu, singitinze ; 
       Ubu, dore, nditabye. 
       Nnejejwe n'ubwami bwawe; 
       Tuzabane mw ijuru !

Gushimisha_352.songBody:
1 . Muze kureb' i Gologota 
     Yes' ukw ashinyagurirwa, 
     Murebe Yes' ukundwa na Se 
     Amenets' umutima we.

 Ref.
     Ni tw' apfira ku Musaraba ! 
     Tumwizere twihannye. 
     Bantu b'Umwami, mushime
     Yes' Umucunguzi wanyu !

3 . Bamwambits' ikamba ry'amahwa : 
     N' ibibi byacu yazize. 
     Ubuntu n'urukundo byawe, 
     Mbe, twabirondora dute ?

4 . Ni mwumv' ijwi ry' uko yinginga :
     Ngo, Dat' ubababarire ! 
     Natwe twes' adusabir' atyo, 
     Tw' abanyabyaha yazize.

5 . Nimwumve mwes' uko gutaka, 
     Uko yatatse cyan' ati : 
     Mbe, Mana yanjye, Mana yanjye, 
     N'iki kikundekesheje ?

5 . Nimwongere mwumv' iryo jwi rye,
     Ngo, Byose birarangiye ! 
     Umwuka we wenda guhera, 
     Ati : Dat' uz' unyakire !

6 . Dor' uko tugupfukamiye,
     Turakuramya, Mukiza. 
     Kand' ibyaremwe byose na byo
     Bizagusingiza, Yesu.

7 . Dufatany' ubugingo bumwe,
     Dushim' Uwadupfiriye. 
     No mu bugingo no mu rupfu,
     Yesu Mwam' umbwire byose !

Gushimisha_353.songBody:
1 . Amaraso yose
     Y’intama n'ihene 
     Y'ibitambo by'Abayuda 
     Nta cy' atumarira.

2 . Ariko wa Mwana 
     W'Intama w'Imana 
     Ni We wenyin' ushobora 
     Kudukiz' ibyaha.

3 . Yabay'igitambo 
     Kiruta bya bindi;
     Nta yandi maras' ariho 
     Yo kutwoz' ibyaha.

4 . Ndambits' ikiganza 
     Ku mutwe wa Yesu, 
     Mmushyizehw ibyaha byanjye, 
     Mbyatuye nihannye.

5 . Umutwaro wanjye 
     Yarawikoreye,
     Ari ku Git' amanitswe, 
     Ari jyew' azize.

6 . Twizeye, dushima 
     Wa Mwana w'Intama, 
     Kuk' umuvumo twarimo 
     Wavuyeho rwose.

Gushimisha_354.songBody:
1 . Man' ishobora byose, 
     Umv' uko nkwinginga : 
     Umpishurire Yesu, 
     Meny' ibyo yankoreye.

Ref:
Yarahemuwe 
Ku Musaraba: 
Mpumur' amaso, ndebe 
Kw ari jye yazize.

2 . Mbony' inkon' akubiswe 
     N'amahwa yambaye; 
     Mbonye na za mbereri 
     N'umutim' ucumiswe.

3 . Yemeye kwiranguza
     Igikombe kibi : 
     Yakinyoye kubwanjye, 
     Maz' amp' ubugingo bwe.

4 . Reb' uyu Mucunguzi 
     Urupfu yapfuye ! 
     Nta n'ikibi yakoze : 
     Nuko sinzarimbuka !

5 . Ni jyewe yabambiwe,
     Uwamugomeye. 
     Yesu, ndagushimiye : 
     Non' uture muri jye.

6 . Yesu, we kunkundira 
     Ko ngusigirira. 
     Ku Musaraba wawe, 
     Ni ho nkuy' ubugingo.
 
7 . Mana, ndagushimira 
     K'utimanye Yesu, 
     Ngw amfire nkiraniwe. 
     Yewe, warankunze pe !

Gushimisha_355.songBody:
1 . Nejejwe n'uko nacunguwe
     N'amaraso ya Yesu;
     Yarankijije : 
     Ndamushima cyane.

Ref:
Haleluya (x 3) ku Mukiza ! 
Haleluya (x 3) Amen !

2 . Kand' iyo ntewe na Satani,
     Maze ngacik' intege, 
     Ninging' Umwami, 
     Na W' akandengera.

3 . Umutima wanjy' unejejwe 
     N'uko mbony’ Umukiza.
     Nanyuzwe na We, 
     Mu mutima wanjye.

4 . Urukundo rw'Imana yanjye 
     Runteye kuyikunda :
     Njya ndwumv' iteka 
     Mu mutima wanjye.

5 . Munezerwe, mushim' Imana, 
     Yemw' abaz' Umukiza; 
     Mushim' Imana, 
     Mwe, rubanda mwese !

Gushimisha_356.songBody:
1 . Batoboy' ibiganza bye, 
     Byabumby' imisozi, byaremye byose, 
     Byarambikwaga ku bana bato,
     Byakizag'indembe n'impumyi nyinshi.

2 . Batoboy' ibirenge bye, 
     Byatambagiye ku nyenyeri zose, 
     Byagendagenze no mw isi yacu.
     Bisur' abakene n'abanyabyaha.

3 . Bacumis' umutima we, 
     Wakundag' indushyi n'aboroheje; 
     Uvamw amaraso yoz' ibyaha, 
     Atemba nk'uruzi kubwac' ababi.

4 . Uwo mutima wa Yesu 
     N'ingingo ze nziza byaziz' iki se ? 
     Ni jye byazize n'ibyaha byanjye,
     I Gologota, ku Musaraba we.

5 . Uko ndi, Yes’ unyakire, 
     Ingingo zanjye n'umutima wanjye, 
     Ko wanshunguye, nakwiyima nte ?
     Njye nkor' iby’ukunda, mb' imbata yawe !

Gushimisha_357.songBody:
1 . Ubwo nari nshinjirijwe cyane 
     Na Satani n'ibyaha byanjye, 
     Haj' Umwami Yes' arakomanga, 
     Ati : Kanguk' unkingurire !

Ref:
Ati: Kingura ! Kingura ! 
Nkingurira, nkwinjiremo ! 
Umutima waw' uranezerwa,
Wemeye yuko nkwinjiramo.

2 . Yarandaritse mu birori bye, 
     Ngo dusangir' ibyiz' afite; 
     Maze, ndanyurwa, ndamuhimbaza :
     Sinavug' ibyo yankoreye !

3 . Ku rugamba rwanjye na Satani, 
     Yesu ni We ngab' inkingira. 
     Kuba muri We byarantinyuye,
     Ajy'ansubizamw imbaraga.

4 . Ni we Mwungeri mwiz' undagira, 
     Nta cyo nkena, ndi kumwe na We. 
     Nd' ino mw is' itek' aranyobora:
     Nyuma, nzasugira mu nzu ye.

Gushimisha_358.songBody:
1 . Twemere Yesu—Ko yaje mw isi
     Kutubwir' amahoro ye. 
     Ni We nshuti nziza.—I Gologota,
     Yahaw' abazimiye.
     Mpora nizera,—N'ubu nizeye 
     Yuko Yesu yampfiriye; 
     Ku Musaraba,—Yaranesheje;
     Ambohora mmwizeye.

2 . Inzira yanjye—Ni Yesu wanjye;
    Anjyan' aho yangeneye. 
    N' umugiraneza;—Nta muntu n'umwe 
    Yanga guh' agakiza 
    Mpora nizera,—N'ubu nizeye 
    Yuko Yesu yamfiriye; 
    Ku Musaraba,—Yaranesheje; 
    Ambohora mmwizeye.

3 . Mwami w'ubuntu,—Uhimbarizwe
     Kuk' uturarik' iteka. 
     Tukwitabe twese,— Twumv' ijwi ryawe
     Rihamagara hose.
     Twizere twese,—Twe guhinyura 
     Ko Yesu yadupfiriye; 
     Ku Musaraba,—Yaranesheje; 
     Abohor' abizeye.
Gushimisha_358.songTitle: Twemere Yesu Ko yaje mw isi

Gushimisha_359.songBody:
1 . Iyo ntinye ko kwizera 
     Kwanjy' ari guke, 
     Kand’ iyo ngiye kuneshwa, 
     Yesu ni W' umfata.

Ref:
Yes' aramfata, 
Akankomeza, 
Kukw’ ankunda bihebuje : 
Arankomeza.

2 . Urukundo rwanjye ruke 
     Ntirwamufata. 
     Sinamugundir' ubwanjye : 
     Yesu ni W' umfata.

3 . Ntiyandeka, kukw’ ankunda.
     Nubwo ndi mubi; 
     Anyishimir' ubwo nd' uwe:
     Itek' aramfata.

4 . Ntiyakundir' ubugingo 
     Bwanjye kubura; 
     Yabucunguj' igiciro : 
     Itek' aramfata.

Gushimisha_36.songBody:
1 . Ntumpiteho Mukiza we,
Wumv’ uko nganya. 
Ubw’ ugenderer’ abandi,
Nanjye ntusige !

Ref:
Yesu Mukiza, 
Wumv’ uko nganya, 
Ubw’ ugenderer’ abandi, 
Nanjye ntusige !

2 . Mpa kweger’ intebe yawe,
Mpabw’imbabazi. 
Ngupfukamiye mbabaye, 
Mpa kukwizera.

3 . Nta wundi nakwizigira; 
Ni Wowe nshaka. 
Mvur’ ibikomere byanjye, 
Umbabarire.

4 . Ur’ isoko y’amahoro, 
Nyir’ubugingo.
Singir’undi niyambaza 
Keretse Wowe.

Gushimisha_360.songBody:
1 . Rukundo rwinshi,—Buntu butarutwa, 
     Umwami Yesu—Kw agiriwe nabi, 
     Akubitirwa—Ibibi nakoze 
     Ngw anshungure rwose:—Abishimirwe

Ref:
Ubuntu bwawe—Bumfasha, Mwami: 
Busumba cyane—Impano zose. 
Njya ntekereza,—Nkir' aha mw isi, 
Ubwo buntu bwinshi—Bwanshunguye

2 . Kand’ iyo ngoswe—N'umwijima mwinshi 
     Inshuti yanjye—Imfat’ ukuboko;
     Singitiny' ubwo,—Ari y' imfashije : 
     Ntumbira mw ijuru,—Yes' antinyuye.

3 . Umusaraba—Wawe ni w' unkiza; 
     Ni W' unduhura—Rwos' imibabaro. 
     N' ubuhungiro—Bwanjye buhoraho; 
     Umbera n'icyiru—Ku Mucamanza.

Gushimisha_361.songBody:
1 . Uwo njya nikomezaho,
     Nta wundi, ni Krisito.
     Reka mubashimire, nti :
     Yesu ni W' umpagije.
     Yanyitangiyehw icyiru,
     Angur' amaraso ye;
     Nukw anyuzuza n'Imana : 
     Yesu ni W' umpagije.

2 . Nubw' ab' is’ ar' abatunzi,
     Yesu ni W’ umpagije. 
     Bafit’ iby'igihe gito : 
     Arampaza wenyine. 
     Nta mugish' uri mu by'isi :
     N’ umuram' utumuka. 
     Ibya Yesu ntibishira :
     Arampaza wenyine.

3 . Naho naba mu bukene,
     Yesu ni W' umpagije.
     Naho napfush' ibyo nkunda,
     Arampaza wenyine.
     Nahw imirima yarumba, 
     Singir' icyo nsoroma, 
     Naho napfush' amatungo, 
     Arampaza wenyine.

4 . Naho naterwa n'Umwanzi, 
     Yesu ni W' umpagije. 
     Nzajya nnesha kubwa Yesu :
     Arampaza wenyine. 
     Naho nahanwa n'inshuti, 
     Ni ko bamumereye. 
     Ni We nshut' irut' izindi : 
     Arampaza wenyine.

5 . Ubwo nzagera mu rupfu, 
     Yes' azab' ampagije.
     Azanjyan' i We, nduhuke : 
     Yes' Azab' ampagije.
     Nzaba nambutse rwa Ruzi,
     Nzamutse, njya mw ijuru. 
     Nzamwirebera mu maso : 
     Yes'  azab' ampagije.

Gushimisha_362.songBody:
1 . Iyi s’ izashira :
     Yesu n' uwanjye; 
     Nubwo byose byabura, 
     Yes' uwo n' uwanjye !
     Ubu harijimye :
     Ntiturareb' i We.
     Tuzanezerwa cyane, 
     Ni tubana na We.

2 . Sinzajya nnanirwa :
     Yesu n’ uwanjye;
     Nzatsind' amoshya yose, 
     Yes' ubw' ar' uwanjye. 
     Byose ni bishira,
     Nta cyo bizantwara : 
     Uzansang’ amahoro,
     Yes' ubw' ar’ uwanjye.

3 . Hoshi, mwe nzozi mbi !
     Yesu n’ uwanjye; 
     Naho bwatinda gucya,
     Yes' uwo n' uwanjye ! 
     Umutima wanjye 
     Yarawuhagije; 
     Ubu ndi kumwe na We : 
     Yes’ uwo n' uwanjye !

4 . Genda, wa rupfu we : 
     Yesu n' uwanjye ! 
     Nzahoranaho na We :
     Yes' uwo n' uwanjye ! 
     Kand' urukundo rwe 
     N'iby' ajy'ankorera,
     Ni byo binyereka ko 
     Yes' uw' ar’uwanjye.

Gushimisha_363.songBody:
1 . Jye mpisemo Yesu; mmurutish' iyi si yose;
     Andutir' amafaranga cyangw' izahabu.
     Jye nkund' Uwabambwe, mmurutisha n'amatungo. 
     Andutira n'amasambu n'amazu meza.

Ref:
Uwanyimika, nkab' Umwami w' ishyanga rinini rite, 
Nd’ imbata y' icyaha cyose, sinabikunda. 
Ahubwo niragije Yes' Umukunzi wanjye : 
Sinkyita ku biri mw isi: Yes' aranyuze !

2 . Jye mpisemo Yes' Umucunguzi wanjy' unkunda; 
     Andutira no gushimwa n'ab'isi bose. 
     Umv’ icyo nifuza : sinshaka kumenyekana; 
     Njye nyobok’ Umwami Yesu iminsi yose.

3 . Andyohera cyane : nta buki buryoha nka We; 
    Ni mwiza; n' uw'igikundiro cyinshi cyane;
    Ahumura neza kurush' ibirabyo byose : 
    Nabur' iki se, mmufite, kw andangirije?

Gushimisha_364.songBody:
1 . Yes' Umwami ndamubonye, 
     Kandi sinkimwimura; 
     Yemeye kunyoz' ibyaha 
     Byambuzag' ubugingo.

Ref:
Nta kirut' Umwami Yesu 
Mw isi cyangwa mw ijuru. 
Ni We wanguz' amaraso
Kera ku Musaraba.

2 . Amaras' arantangaza : 
     Yarampembuye mpfuye. 
     Ampesh' amahoro menshi 
     No kubaho kw iteka.

3 . Ubwo wampinduy' umwana, 
     Non' Umpindur' ingeso, 
     Kugira ng’ undeba wese
     Aguhimbaze, Yesu.

4 . Ndagushima ko wanshatse 
     Kandi ko wantaruye, 
     Ukanyogesh' amaraso 
     Kubw’ imbabazi zawe.

5 . Mwami Yes' ump' urukundo, 
     Rwo wakunz' abo mw isi. 
     Umpe kugukunda rwose,
     Nkunde n'abawe bose.

6 . Warampfiriye, Mukiza : 
     Noneho, mfane nawe ! 
     Kand' usohoze muri jye
     Ibyo kugushimisha.

Gushimisha_365.songBody:
1 . Mwami, nubwo nd' umunyabyaha, 
     Njya mpora nkwinginga : 
     Mana, wumve gusaba kwanjye, 
     Unze mu mutima.

2 . Narambiwe gukund' ibyaha 
     Bituma nshumura; 
     Ahubw' Umwuka wawe Wera 
     Ab'ari Wo ntunga.

3 . Kera najyaga nshidikanya :
     Nta cyo byanyunguye; 
     None nshaka ko tuvugana,
     Nkureba, nkumvira.

4 . Ndashaka kwaka cyane, Mwami,
     Mmurikirwa nawe ; 
     Umwuka waw' ufash' uwanjye,
     Nkund' uko wankunze.

5 . N'ukuri, Mwam' ubwo niyobya,
     Washaka wampana, 
     Kuk' umutima mubi nk'uyu
     Utabana nawe.

6 . Kand' amaraso yawe, Mwami,
     Nzi ko yamviriye. 
     Twuzure rwose, ndabyifuza, 
     Uk' ubinshakira.

7 . Ni byo nsigaye njya nifuza;
     Mwami, ndakwinginze,
     Mbeshweho n'ubugingo bwawe,
     Kubwawe wenyine.

Gushimisha_366.songBody:
1 . Ngutuy' ubugingo bwanjye, 
     Yesu, Mwana w' Imana; 
     Ubwakire n'urukundo, 
     Ngo bub' ubwaw' iteka.
     Nkuzaniy' ibyaha byanjye 
     N'umutim' unangiwe : 
     Mu maraso wamviriye, 
     Unyoze, Mucunguzi.

2 . Uz' uko mpora nirwanya 
     Ngo nkomez' umutima; 
     Uz' uko nari mmerewe 
     N'ishavu n'agahinda. 
     Ububasha bwawe, Mwami,
     Bundokore mu byaha 
     Kand' Umwuka w'ubugingo 
     Ujy' unkura mu bibi.

3 . Nemeye kwitanga rwose,
     Nta cyo nishigarije; 
     Mpisemo kujyana nawe 
     No kukumvira, Yesu. 
     Njye nkuyobokan' ishimwe 
     Kukw ari wow' ubimpa; 
     Ujy' unyobor'inzir' ijya 
     Mu bwami bwawe bwiza.

4 . Reb' uyu muhigo mpize 
     Ntabwo nzivuguruza. 
     Wukomeresh' amaraso 
     N'urukundo wankunze. 
     Itek' iyo nirebyeho,
     Ndiheba, nkazimira; 
     Ariko kuk' ujy'unkunda,
     Uzamfasha, Mukiza.

Gushimisha_367.songBody:
1 . Yesu ndakwitabye,—Ntakwiriye : 
     Imbabazi zawe—Zirantinyuye.
     Mfit' ibicumuro—Byuzuye muri jye;
     Niringiye gusa—Ko wampfiriye.

2 . Ibyo nacumuye—Ndabyihannye. 
     Kand' uko ndi kose—Simbiguhishe.
     Nuk' unyuhagize—Amaraso yawe,
     Nyogemo, ntungane,—Ico rimvemo.

3 . Mwami, mbabarira;—Ndakwizeye. 
     Nkwikubis' imbere;—Ndakwiringiye. 
     Amaraso yawe—Y'Umwana w'intama 
     Anyoz' antembeho,—Anyeze dede !

4 . Nuko, ndanezerwa;—Mb’ amahoro; 
     Njyana n'Uwo nkunda,—Ntaramubona;
     Itek' uko ntewe—N'iby'isi n'ibyaha. 
     Negamira Yesu,— Bikanesheka.

Gushimisha_368.songBody:
1 . Bene Data bizeye Yesu, 
     Umucunguzi wacu mwiza, 
     Mwitange mutagabanije,
     Nubwo benshi babinaniwe.

Ref:
Aheza mw ijuru ! 
Tuzahurirayo, bagenzi. x2

2 . Mwe gutinya ! Yes’ ubwe ni We 
     Waneshej' urupfu n'ibyaha. 
     Mwirinde, mwe guh' abanzi be 
     Urwitwazo rwo kumutuka.

3 . Yemw' ababyaw' ubwa kabiri, 
     Yesu ni We mukunzi wacu; 
     Ni We nzira y'abamukunda; 
     Ni We mukuru w'ubugingo.

4 . Yemw' abacunguwe na Yesu. 
     Mugacunguzw’ amaraso ye. 
     Yababohoye kwa Satani, 
     Ababohoj' amaraso ye.

5 . Tur' ishyanga rye yironkeye, 
     Yadukuye ku Musaraba.
     Az' adushoreye hw iminyago : 
     None, tujye tumunezeza !

6 . Ntimugafatanye n'iby'isi;
     Mwemere kozwa n'amaraso: 
     Mujye mwuzur' Umwuka Wera. 
     Ibyo ni byo bimunezeza.

7 . Yemw' abatura, ntimwihane, 
     Mwe gushavuz' Umucunguzi ! 
     Murabuz' abandi kwihana; 
     Mukingiran’ Umwuka Wera !

8 . Yes' umugabe w'ubugingo, 
     Ni we twese dutegereje. 
     Ntituzongera gushoberwa
     Nk'abatahaw' Umwuka Wera.

Gushimisha_369.songBody:
1 . Ngukunde Yesu. Mwami wanjye,
     Mukiza wanjye, ngukunde; 
     Ngukunde, nkor' ibyo gushimwa 
     N’ibikunezeza byose,
     Ngeze ku munsi wo gupfa, 
     Yesu, nkigukunda !

2 . Nta wundi ngir' uhwanye nawe 
     Kuk' ungwiriz' imbabazi;
     Ngukunde, Yesu, ngushimishe 
     Akanwa, no mu mutima.
     Ni Wowe Yes’ ukuraho
     Ibyaha by'abantu.

3 . Ngukunde. Yesu Databuja, 
     Mwana w'Imana Rurema; 
     Ngukundish’ imbaraga zose,
     Nahw amakub' ari menshi,
     Ngeze ku munsi wo gupfa, 
     Yesu, nkigukunda !

Gushimisha_37.songBody:
1 . Tuguman' iteka,—Mukiz' uhebuje.
 Ijwi ryawe ryiza—Rizan’ amahoro.

Ref:
Ku manywa na n'ijoro,—Ndagushak'iteka.
Ndahiriwe, Mukiza:—Twigumanire.

2 . Ndagushak' iteka :—Jy' ungum' iruhande.
Nsind' amoshya yose,—Iyo turi kumwe.

3 . Ndagushak' iteka,—Nturiz' amaganya.
 Ngwin' ubu, tubane,—Mbone gutungana.

4 . Ndagushak' iteka,—Nyigish' iby’ ushaka.
 Kand' uce muri jye—Ingeso zose mbi.

5 . Ndagushak' iteka,—Wa Mwami wera we ! 
Mb' uwaw' unyobore,—Nyir' imigisha we !

Gushimisha_370.songBody:
1 . Urampamagara, Yesu, 
     Kuk' uz' izina ryanjye; 
     Nanjy' uwagucumuyeho 
     Ubu ndihannye rwose.

2 . Nshaka kukwiyegurira :
     Mber' Umwungeri, Mwami; 
     Ujy’ undagir' uk’ ushaka,
     Kand' unyikenurire.

3 . Wemeye kwitanga rwose 
     Ng' unkize, Yesu wanjye; 
     Iyo neza yaw' ishimwe, 
     Naw' ushimishwe, Mwami.

4 . Witinya, mutima wanjye,
     Yes' arakujy' imbere : 
     Mu kubaho kwawe kose, 
     Nta kizamukunyaga.

Gushimisha_371.songBody:
1 . Yesu, nd' uwawe: nyakira 
     N'ibyanjye mfite byose. 
     Njye ngukunda, nkwizigire, 
     Nkomeze nkuyoboke.

Ref:
Nguhay' ibyanjye, 
Uko bingana. 
Mwami wanjye mwiz' unkunda, 
Unyiharire !

2 . Yesu nd' uwawe: nyakira,
     Niyoroshye, nkuramye. 
     Mpaz' ibyishimo byo mw isi. 
     Ubu, Yes' unyakire.

3 . Yesu nd' uwawe: nyakira.
     Ngir' uwawe by’ ukuri. 
     Tum' Umwuka Wer’ ambwire 
     Yuko naw' ur’ uwanjye.

4 . Byose mmaze kubiguha;
     Numv' umpay' umwet' ubu. 
     Nsingiz' ubwo buntu bwawe. 
     Nkuramye bihimbaje.

Gushimisha_372.songBody:
1 . Nyigiza hafi, Mwami Yesu; 
     Nyakira, Yesu, nguhungiyeho.
     Mbumbatiz' amaboko yawe, 
     Ni ho handutir' ahandi hose. ( x 2)

2 . Nyigiza hafi, Mwami wanjye : 
     Nta turo ryiza nkuzaniy’ ubu.
     Nzany' umutima wanjye mubi; 
     Uwuhagiz' amaraso yawe. (x 2)

3 . Nyigiza hafi y’ Uwambambiwe !
     Nihanny' ibyaha n'iby'isoni nke.
     Nzinutsw' ibyo nishimiraga. 
     Ni Wowe nshaka, Yesu wenyine ! (x 2)

4 . Iminsi yose, njye nkwegera, 
     Ngez' ubwo nzager' i Wawe, Yesu.
     Maze, mu bwami budashira, 
     Nzakubahw akaramata, Yesu. (x 2)

Gushimisha_373.songBody:
1 . Harihw’icyo nkwaka, Mwami,
Nubwo mpora ngucumuraho;
Mwami unyeze, unyejeshe
Amazi cyangw’ umuriro.

Ref:
Mpanagurwe hose, Mwami,
N’umuriro nib’ ushaka.
Nkir’ ibyaha birimburwe :
Nkir’ ibyaha, birimburwe.

2 . Nuntunganiriz’ ubwenge,
Nzanezerwa, nzaguhimbaza,
Arik’ umutima wera,
Ndawushaka kurutaho.

3 . Ninezw’umutima wanjye,
Ni bwo nzunguk’ ubwenge bwose
Bwo mw ijuru, bwo mw ijuru,
Mwami, mbubwirijwe na We.

4 . Ngeragez’ uko nshobora
Kwibuz’ inama mbi n’ibyaha;
Nyamara njya mbyibonamo :
Jy’umboneza, jy’umboneza !

Gushimisha_374.songBody:
1 . Uyu mwana w'uruhinja ni nde,
     Wabyawe n'umukene?
     Dor' aryamye mu kiraro cy'inka
     Kukw icumbi ryabuze.
     N' Umuremyi w’isi yose;
     Ni W' uhindutse muto; 
     N' Uwiteka Nyirigira 
     Utaremw’udashira.

2 . Uyu ni nde wishwe n'agahinda,
     Wuzuy' umubabaro,
     Uj' ashak' imbata za Satani,
     Byos' abyihanganira ?
     Ni We Mana yacu nziza 
     Idutunganiriza
     Ibibanza byo mw ijuru
     N'ibyishimo by'iteka.

3 . Uyu ni nd' uv’ amaraso cyane,
     Agahemurwa rwose,
     Agakubitw' ibipfunsi n'inshyi,
     Ntagir' umurengera?
     Ni We Man’ ih' imigisha
     Abo yicunguriye, 
     Kand' izacir’urubanza
     Abayisuzuguye.

4 . Uyu ni nd' ubambwe n'abagome
     Hagati y'abambuzi?
     Dor’ afit’ amahwa mu ruhanga :
     Arashinyagurirwa !
     Ni We Mana yimy’ iteka
     Mw ijuru ryera rya Se,
     Igahimbazwa n'abera
     Yacunguj' amaraso.

Gushimisha_375.songBody:
1 . Habay’ umunsi w’ishimwe mw ijuru,
     Yesu yitanga ngw agere mw isi;
     Aza kubyarwa n’umwar’ utunganye,
     Uwer’ Aturana natw’ababi.

Ref:
Dor’ urukundo rwatumy’ ampfira,
Ibyaha byanjy’Abibamba mu mva !
Maz’ arazuka ngw ampuze na Se.
N’ agaruka, nzamushimir’ ibyo.

2 . Habay’ umunsi babamb’ Umukiza
      I Gologota ku Musaraba.
     Ahemurw’ avumw’ atukwa n’abantu,
     Yikorer’ ibyaha byanjye byose !

3 . Habay’ umuns’ aruhukira mu mva,
     Harindwa n’abamarayika be.
     Niko yitanze ngw amber’ Umukiza :
     Bihebe mwese, mumwiringire !

4 . Habay’ umunsi, Satan’ aratsindwa,
     Ntiyaheza Yesu mu gituro.
     Nukw arazuka, urupf’ arutsinze,
     Non’ ari mw ijur’ i buryo bwa Se.

5 . Hazab’ umunsi tuzumvahw impanda
     Harabagiran’ ijuru ryose;
     Yes’ uw’ Azaza mu bwiza bwe bwose.
     Azim’ ingom’ uwo Mwami wanjye.
Gushimisha_375.songTitle: Habay’ umunsi w’ ishimwe mw ijuru

Gushimisha_376.songBody:
1 . Mwami Yesu, 
     Nyir'ubuntu n'ibambe,
     Menyesh' icyakwemeje 
     Wa Musaraba kera !
        Ni kubwawe, mwana, 
       Nemeye gutukwa
       No guhemurwa ntyo, 
       Nzir' ibyaha byawe.

2 . Mwami Yesu, 
     Nyir'ubuntu n'ibambe,
     Dor' ibyaha nakoze ! 
     Ndaje, nsaby' imbabazi.
        Inshyi nakubiswe,
       Mwana, n'imibyimba,
       Ndetse n'imbereri, 
       Ni byo bwishyu bwawe !

3 . Mwami Yesu, 
     Nyir'ubuntu n'ibambe,
     Nyuhagiz' amaraso, 
     Ntungane mu mutima!
       Mwana, banshumise, 
       Burya, mu rubavu !
       Shyiramw ibyo byaha  
       Ngo bisibangane !

4 . Mwami Yesu, 
     Nyir'ubuntu n'ibambe,
     Ubwo wambabariye, 
     Noneho ndakwihaye.
        Umva, mwana nkunda,
        Nagucunguriye
        Ng’ub’ uwanjye rwose 
        Utagir'inenge!

Gushimisha_377.songBody:
1 . Reka twongere twishimire 
     Rwa rukundo rudahinduka 
     N'amaraso twahongerewe 
     Ku Musarab' i Gologota.

Ref:
Twogez' ibya Yesu ! 
Tumusingiz' iteka ryose ! 
Twogez' ibya Yesu, 
Kugez' ubwo tuzaban' i We

2 . Muze mwese, mwitabe Yesu, 
     Mwisuke mu maraso none, 
     Mwakir' ubuntu n'imbabazi, 
     Mubiheshwe na za ntimba ze.

3 . Turi mw isi, tunezererwa 
     Imigisha dusogongeye, 
     Ariko ni tumwirebera, 
     Tuzicwa n'umunezero pe !

4 . Tujye twambar' iryo zina rye, 
     Tumukurikire mu nzira.
     Yes' azaza mu minsi mike;
     Tuzajya kumusanganira.

5 . Yesu, wez' imitima yacu, 
     Twuzure na bagenzi bacu, 
     Ni ho tuzaba twiteguye
     Kugusanganir' ugarutse.

Gushimisha_378.songBody:
1 . Nuzuy' umunezero 
     Kuko mmaze kozwa de
     Mu maraso ya Yesu 
     Y'igiciro kinini.

Ref:
Yes' ushimirwe 
Ko wankijije !

2 . Urukundo rwa Yesu
     Na bwa buntu bwe bwinshi 
     Bisumb' uko twibwira; 
     Bidukiz' imitima.

3 . Mana, ndagushimira 
     Urukundo wankunze : 
     Waduhay' Umukiza 
     Ngw adukiz' umuriro.

4 . None, turabinginze,
     He kub' uwo muri mwe 
     Utita ku mbabazi 
     Z'Umucunguzi wacu.

5 . Umv' icy’ agushakaho:
     Wihan’ ubabarirwe,
     Umutim’ uwinjize 
     Mu maraso ya Yesu.

Gushimisha_379.songBody:
1 . Umutim' ukomerekejwe,
     Utari womorwa, 
     Ikiganza cyatobowe 
     Ni cyo cyawomora.

2 . Iy' umutim' uremerewe,
     Hatemb' amarira, 
     Har' umutim' umwe musa
     Wawuhumuriza.

3 . Umunt’ iy' ababajwe cyane 
     N'icyaha yakoze, 
     Isok' imwe y'amaraso 
     Yamwoz' akera de !

4 . Ayo maraso n' aya Yesu; 
     Cya kiganza n' icye; 
     Wa mutima w'imbabazi 
     Na wo n' uwa Yesu.

5 . Utwerek' ibyo biganza bye 
     Byatobowe, Mana; 
     Duhungir' ibyaha byacu 
     Mur'izo nkovu ze !

Gushimisha_38.songBody:
1 . Ai Mana ndondor’ umenye
 Ibyo nkora byose,
 Werekan’ uko ndi kose,
 Ntifat’ uko ntari.

2 . Ndondorer’ uyu mutima :
 Ni Wow’ ushobora
 Kugaragaz’ ibirimo,
 Mu bwihisho bwawo.

3 . Umurik’ahatabona,
 Ah’ umwijim’uba
 Ump’umutim’ ukangutse,
 Uzinukw’ icyaha.

4 . Kand’ umeny’ ibyo nibwira
 N’imigambi yanjye;
 N’ibimbamo binyanduza,
 Bikangir’ imbohe.

5 . Mvugutira Kand’unshure,
 Inkamba zimvemo,
 Umpindur’ icyuma cyawe
 Uhor’ ukoresha.

6 . Maze nkwikubit’ imbere
 Mpishurirwe rwose
 Yukw Iman’ ar’ urukundo
 Rutagir’ ingano.

Gushimisha_380.songBody:
1 . Nubwo nsazwe n'ibyaha, 
     Yesu yarankijije; 
     Yamviriy' amaraso, 
     Angura n'urupf' atyo. 
     Tuzab' akaramata, 
     Ak'ishami n'igiti !

2 . Urukundo rwa Yesu 
     Rusaguts' ikirere ! 
     Nta cyo twarugeraho : 
     Ruzagumahw iteka.
     Ni We warumbwirije: 
     Jye ntabwo nari nduzi.

3 . Nubwo nsazwe n'ibyaha, 
     Yes' andutira byose; 
     Az' ibyo nkennye byose; 
     Az' umubabaro; 
     Namuberey' imbata: 
     Nta cyago cyampangara.

Gushimisha_381.songBody:
1 . Yes' avukiye mw isi, 
     Yakuriye muri yo, 
     Yigishwa n'Imana, Se, 
     Gusobanukirw' isi.

2 . Yesu yitegereje 
     Ubugome bwo mw isi; 
     Areby' uko bungana, 
     Arababara rwose.

3 . Nukw asang' ab'iyi si 
     Banze gukiranuka; 
     Bamuyoberwa rwose, 
     Bati : Si we mukiza.

4 . Yes' abony' ibyo byose 
     Arabababarira,
     Ngo n' abo gucungurwa 
     No kubon' igitambo.

5 . Nukw amenya kw ari We 
     Uwiteka yatanze 
     Kubaber' igitambo 
     Cyo kubahongerera.

6 . Ntiyashidikany' ubwo, 
     Yemera guhemurwa, 
     Yiteguzwa n'Imana 
     Kudupfir' abo mw isi.

7 . Maz' abantu bo mw isi 
     Bamubamba ku giti, 
     Bamubabaza cyane :
     Ni ko yadukijije.

8 . Mwami Yes' ushimirwe 
     Ubwo buntu wagize ! 
     Wemeye kumbambirwa :
     Nzahora ngusingiza !

Gushimisha_382.songBody:
1 . Yes' aduh' amahoro by’ukuri, 
     Ahor' ayaduhesh' amaraso ye.

2 . Nta mirimo se yayatwambura ? 
     Yes' ahor' aruhur' abamwumvira.

3 . Twayagira, tutaz' ibizaba ? 
     Tuzi Yesu kw ari W' utwara byose !

4 . Nta byago byadukur' imitima;
     Nta bwoba bagir' abamwihishemo.

5 . Inshuti nubwo tutari kumwe, 
     Nkukw aturind' arazirinda na zo.

6 . Mu rupfu azaduh' amahoro ye : 
     Rwaneshejwe n'Umutabazi wacu !

7 . Ibyago byo mw isi bizashira, 
     Umwam' atwinjize mu mahoro ye.

Gushimisha_383.songBody:
1 . Icyamp' ukanyikorerera
    Amaganya yanjye yose, Yesu,
    Ngaturiz' Uwiteka,
    Nkamenya yukw ibyanjye byose
    Ubitegekesh' ubugwaneza
    N'ubwenge burutaho.

2 . Kenshi ntiny' ibiribubeho,
    Ngahagarik' umutima, Mwami,
    Ngize kwizera guke.
    Icyampa nkarorera rwose
    Kwishingikiriza ku by'iyi si,
    Nkakwizera wenyine.

3 . Nabuzwa n'iki kuyisaba,
     Nkajya nyisunga, nkayikoreza
     Ayo maganya yose,
     Ngahumurizwa no kumenya
     Yuko Dat' ugaburir' inyoni
     Azanyumvira nanjye ?

4 . Ntitwizer' uko bikwiriye;
     Umutim' uhagaz' ujugunya
     Rwos' amahoro yawo.
     Arikw inyoni n'uburabyo
     Binyigisha k' umuns' ukwiriwe
     N'ibyawo byago gusa.

5 . Umpe kumeny' ibyo nigishwa
     N'uburabyo n'inyoni, Mukiza,
     Nkwishingikirizeho !
     Ngez' ah' ushaka, Mushorera,
     Nuko mmenye, nkiri mu makuba,
     Amahor' adashira.

Gushimisha_384.songBody:
1 . Ben' Imana yizerwa,
     Twiyonger' umwete;
     Maz' imbaraga zacu
     Tuzih' Umukiza 
     Kuko yatwihaye.
     Dusingize dushima
     //Ubwiza n'urukundo 
     By'Umwam' udukiza.// x 2

2 . Abashavuye mwese,
     Muze mudatinya :
     Abasenga bizeye
     Barahumurizwa.
     Umuvunyi Yesu
     Ni W' urengera bose,
     //Kukw ar' umunyaneza;
     Ntabw' azabahana.// x 2

3 . Yesu n' inshuti yacu;
     Tujye tumwinginga;
     Maze, mu byago byacu
     Ajy'aturengera.
     Ni W' uturerera
     Ubugingo twahawe,
     //Mu butunzi bwe, twese
     Akadukenura.// X 2

Gushimisha_385.songBody:
1 . Murinzi we mmenyesh’ igihe !
     I wacu se n’ i muhero?
     At’ Ijoro ryijimye cyane :
     Buracya hanyuma.
     Ntukarire, ukomeze;
     Nturorere kwiringira,
     Kugez’ igih’ uzagerayo
     Ku muns’ uhoraho.

2 . Murwanyi we, tyo mbwira nawe !
     Ansubiza yitonz’ ati :
     Dor’ urugamba ruzashira :
     Guma mu ntambara !
     Ntubabare, wihangane;
     Wirek’ imirimo yawe.
     Tuzabon’ igihembo cyiza, 
     Ni dutabaruka.

3 . Ndacyabaz’ ibyaremwe byose.
     Binsubiza bitya biti :
     Iyi si yac’ iza gushira,
     Haz’ ind’ ihoraho.
     Umeny’ ibyo bimenyetso
     Bigaragaza kuza kwe;
     Kand’ ibyaremw’ uko bingana
     Byitez’ impanda ye.

4 . Twishime mu mitima yacu
     Kukw i muhir’ ari hafi.
     Duhumure : tuzaruhuka,
     Tutakibabara.
     Ntukarire, tuzabana;
     Ibyago bizashiraho.
     Ntituzaburay’ amahoro
     Kwa Yesu mw ijuru !

Gushimisha_386.songBody:
1 . Ntukajy' urambirwa kumwizera,
Naho wababazwa n'iby'umubiri.
Dor' agufitiye ikamba ryiza pe,
Ikamba ryiza pe, ritangirika.

2 . Yemwe, mwa nshuti mwe, mwicogora:
Igihe ni gito tukaruhuka.
Tuzajya mw ijuru tube tutagipfa:
Twitange noneho, Twe gucogora!

3 . Isi y'umwijima izashira.
Ntabwo tuzongera no kubabazwa.
Tuzaka nk'izuba, turabagirana,
Turebe cya giti cy'ubugingw i we.

4 . Nuko mwa nshuti mwe, mwibabara.
Naho mwarambirwa n'iby'iyi si mbi
Tuzumv' impund' ubwo, ni dutabaruka;
Ni bwo tuzashira umubabaro.

Gushimisha_387.songBody:
1 . Yesu n' ubugingo bwacu ; 
     Aduh' amahoro ye. 
     Ni We rembo twinjiramo,
     Tukagera kwa Data.
     Iyo tubuz' amahoro, 
     Tuba tumuvuyeho.
     Tumwizere, ni we Nshuti; 
     Twe kubur' amahoro !

2 . Dor' ikizan' ubukonje 
     N' ukutihan' ibyaha, 
     Bikaguma mu mutima, 
     Bikazinur' Umwuka.
     Yemw' abifuz' ubugingo,
     Mwe kuguma mu byaha ! 
     Yesu yaradupfiriye : 
     Nta cyatuma dukonja !

3 . Ni dutungurwa n'iby'isi, 
     Tukabeshywa n'Umubi 
     Yuko twigirir' umwete,
     Tukang' Umusaraba, 
     Twang' iyo nzira — s' iyacu ! 
     Tuzagenda nka Yesu, 
     Yambitsw' ikamba ry'amahwa, 
     Yemey' Umusaraba.

4 . Mur'iyi si, si hw i wacu; 
     Tuyinyuramo gusa. 
     Tuyigendemo nka Yesu,
     Wemey' Umusaraba. 
     Tuzi ko yisiz' ubusa,
     Nta n'icyo yisigiye, 
     Kandi nta n'icyah' afite : 
     Ni twe yaj' acungura.

5 . Kuger' ikirenge mu cye,
     Emer' Umusaraba; 
     Rek' ibir' inyum' iy' uva,
     Witiny' ibir' imbere. 
     Yes' ubwe ni W' ur' imbere.
     Ari W' utubeshaho; 
     Ni We no kunesha kwacu: 
     Turabimushimiye.

6 . Kubw' abanze kwiha Yesu,
     Inzir' irakomeye.
     Arikw irimw amaraso; 
     Ni y' ajy' adutsindira.
     Non’ abatagira Yesu
    Bazajya bananirwa:
    Umubiri ntabw’ unesha;
    Ntunezez' Uwiteka.

7 . Non' abemeye kwitanga 
     Kwemer’ Umusaraba,
     Amaras' abera mashya 
     Ukunda kumwumvira.
     Mu makuba no mu byiza,
     Tuzagendana na We.
     Ntabw' azaduhemukira.
     Kuko yabinesheje.

Gushimisha_388.songBody:
1 . Tunganir’ Imana---Ubudasiba.
Jy’uhora uyisenga---Kand’ uyumvire.
Jy’ubana n’abayo;---Jy’ufash’ indushyi,
Ntusibe na rimwe---Kuyikorera.

2 . Tunganir’ Imana;---Jy’ubana na Yo.
N’ utumbira Yesu,---Uzaba nka We :
Bose bazamenya---K’ubana na We,
Barek’ ubugome---Bitabe Yesu.

3 . Tunganir’ Imana;---Ikuyobore.
N’uterwa n’ibyago,---Jy’usanga Yesu :
Ntiyirengagiza---Umwiyambaza.
Uyoboke Yesu :--- Ni we Shobuja.

4 . Tunganir’ Imana---Tuz’ umutima.
Mu by’ ukora byose,---Wihutiraho.
Jya wumvir’Umwuka;---Gwiz’ urukundo :
Nta son’ uzagira,---N’ ubona Yesu.

Gushimisha_389.songBody:
1 . Wa Mukristo muto we, 
     Ujy'utiny' iby'abandi; 
     Wibikoraho rwose, 
     Haba no kubyifuza !

2 . Byos' ibitar' ibyawe, 
     Ntubikoreho rwose, 
     Naho bizaba bike, 
     Bidafit' igiciro.

3 . Uwo Yes' akijije. 
     Bimuber' umuziro; 
     Yize no gutegeka 
     Amaboko n'amaso.

4 . Naho wab' umukene, 
     Wemer' ibyo wahawe; 
     Gendana na Shobuja, 
     Itek' unezerewe.

5 . Zinukw' ibibuzanywa, 
     Iby' Umwami w'iyi si 
     Ajy'arimbuza benshi, 
     Ababuz' ubugingo.

6 . Izer' Umucunguzi, 
     Ub' uwo kwiringirwa! 
     Birut' ubutegetsi 
     N'ubutunzi bwo mw isi.

7 . Kand' uhore wibuka 
     Ko yasezerany' ati : 
     Uzanesha kubwanjye 
     Azabona kuzuka.

Gushimisha_39.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, mutima wanjye,
 Witab' Umwami wawe !
 Winjir' umuhakweho,
 Kukw  akund' abaz' i We.

2 . Kw ar’ Umwam' ukomeye,
 Wamusaba bike, se ?
 Ubushobozi n' ubwe,
 N'ubuntu n'imbabazi.

3 . Mbanze nsab' imbabazi,
 Kuko nakugomeye.
 Umutwaro w'ibyaha,
 Dor' ubury' undembeje !

4 . Amaraso wavuye,
 Uri ku musaraba,
 Yoz 'abakiranirwa,
 Nukw anyoz' amboneze.

5 . Unduhure nonaha,
 Ndakwihay' unturemo!
 Wanshunguj' amaraso,
 Nukw unyitegekere!

6 . Mu rugendo rw'iyi si,
 Mb' intumwa ya Krisito,
 Ahw ashak' antumeyo,
 Nkuz' izina rya Yesu !

Gushimisha_390.songBody:
1 . Ngabo z'umwete, mubyuke, 
     Nimurwanir' Umwami;
     Mwatoranijwe n'Imana: 
     Kubwayo muranesha.
     Mwitegure mu mitima, 
     Mwirind' ibibashuka;
     Isi muyigandurire 
     Yes' Umwami w'abami.

2 . Mubwiriz' ab'isi bose 
     Urukundo rw'Imana;
     Abatuye mu mwijima 
     Mubabwir' iby'umucyo.
     Abayobye batizera,
     Muti : Mwemere Yesu,
     Kukw akunda guhabura 
     Imitim' izimiye.

3 . Mujye mu bihugu byose,
     Mubwiriz' iby'Umwami:
     Mujyan' Umwuka we Wera;
     Muzavug' ibye neza,
     Itorero rye rigwire 
     Mu bari mw isi yose:
     Izina ry'Umwami Yesu 
     Ripfukamirwe hose.

4 . Hahirw' abizey' Umwami,
     Bakamubabarizwa;
     Bazabon' ingororano 
     Umuns' azagaruka :
     Baziman' iteka ryose 
     Hamwe n'Umwami Yesu,
     Mu bwami bwe budashira, 
     Kuko bamukoreye.

Gushimisha_391.songBody:
1 . Kugeza gupfa, tuzakuyoboka: 
     Kugeza gupf' ur' Umwami wacu. 
     Duhagaritswe kw ibendera yawe :
     Tuzahapfira tukwiringiye.

Ref:
Kugeza gupfa, turwan' intambara; 
Ni kw ingabo z' Umwami zinesha; 
Kugeza gupf' Umusaraba wawe 
N' Ibendera yac' abacunguwe.

2 . Kubwawe, Yesu, ni byiza kubaho; 
     Inzira yaw' iratworohera. 
     Ni nde wakwanga kugukurikira,
     Wowe, Mukiza wadupfiriye ?

3 . Kugeza gupfa, dutegekwe nawe. 
     Ubw' uriho, tuzabaho natwe ! 
     Wumviy' Imana, ntiwanga no gupfa, 
     Ndets' udupfira n'urupfu rubi.

4 . Mukiz' uz' intege nke zacu rwose; 
     Tuzi ko twagwa mu nzira yacu,  
     N' utaza gusohoz' isezerano.
     Ryo kuturengera, tukiriho.

5 . Umwuka waw' udushorer' iteka,
     Kand' imitima yac' iwumvire, 
     Ngo tub' ubwoko bwaneshej' urupfu 
     Kubwawe, Yesu wadupfiriye !

Gushimisha_392.songBody:
1 . Basirikare ba Kristo, mubyuke,
     Murasane n'isi n'umubiri n'Umubi;
     Muze murwan' iyo ntambara nziza :
     Dor' ibendera mwahawe, n' Umusaraba.
     Nimumuyoboke ! Arabarengera !
     Tumufite, tuzanesh' Umwanzi Satani.

2 . Ntumwa za Yesu, ngo, Mwese mugende,
     Mujye mu bihugu byose byo mur'iyi si.
     Mwumvish' abaremwe bos' ubutumwa,
     Muti :Yesu yabacunguj' amaraso ye. 
     Muti : Mumwemere, nukw ababature!
     Ni We wadutumye kubwa rwa rukundo rwe.

3 . Yemwe Bakristo, mubyuke n'ingoga!
     Nimucan' amatabaza, mube mas' ubu.
     Wa Mukw' araje : mumusanganire !
     Azajyan' abiteguy' i bwami mw ijuru.
     Mwitange, noneho ! Ntimugapfapfane !
     Dor' araje niko yadusezeranije !

Gushimisha_393.songBody:
1 . Yesu, tugushimir' abera bawe, 
     Baguhimbarishaga kukwizera, 
     None bari mu buruhukiro : 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

2 . War' igihome cyabo n'urutare, 
     War' umugaba wabo ku rugamba, 
     N'izuba ryabo ryo mu mwijima. 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

3 . Nkuko bagirag' ubutwari bwinshi, 
     Kurwana kwacu natwe kube kwiza,
     Tuzahanwe na b' ingororano; 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

4 . Gufatanya na bo kwacu ni kwiza; 
     Bafit' ubwiza : twe tugir' inenge; 
     Dusangira na bo Databuja. 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

5 . Iyo tugiye gucogozwa rwose 
     N'intambar' idasiba, ni bwo twumva 
     Impundu zabo, tugakomera. 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

6 . Dor' ubugingo bwacu ni nk'umunsi ; 
     Bugiye kwira, maze turuhuke; 
     Tuzabon' amahoro mw ijuru. 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

7 . Bukeye hazaz' undi munsi mwiza, 
     Bazazuka bafit' ubwiza bwawe; 
     Umwami Yes' azazana na bo. 
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

8 . Kand' azakur' intore ze zo mw isi 
     Ku mpera y'isi hos' aziteranye, 
     Zijye mw ijuru zimusingiza.
     Mwami wacu Yesu, tugushime cyane !

Gushimisha_394.songBody:
1 . Duhurure ngo twitabe, 
     Tujye mu ntambara.
     Mbe, kwicara kumaz' iki,
     Satan' akiriho ?
     Dor' ar' imber'ahagaze,
    We n'abadayimoni.
    Twiringiy' Umucunguzi 
    Ko yamunesheje.

Ref:
Kwizera Krisito ! 
Kwizera Krisito ! 
Ni ko kudushoboza 
Kunesh' iby'iyi si.

2 . Twahaw' inkot' ikomeye, 
     N' Ijambo ry'Imana.
     Ni yo yanesherej' abe 
     Mu bihe bya mbere.
     Ingabo yitwa kwizera 
     Yarabakingiye.
     Natwe ni y' idukingira 
     Twiringiye Yesu.

3 . Abanzi baragwiriye, 
     Barwany' Uwiteka.
     Tuzabanesha, twambaye 
     Intwaro ze zose:
     Ingofero y'agakiza, 
     Umweko w'ukuri,
     Inkweto z'amahoro ye, 
     Biradukomeza !

4 . Unesh' ibyah' azambikwa 
     Umwambaro wera.
     Yes' azavug' izina rye 
     Ku Mana mw ijuru.
     Dukanguke, dutambuke,
     Turwan' intambara !
     Tunesh' abanzi, twizeye 
     Izina rya Yesu.

Gushimisha_395.songBody:
1 . Tumeny' ubwami buri mw ijuru, 
     Yesu yadutunganirije. 
     Mur'ubwo bwami, nta buriganya; 
     Abatuyeyo n' ab'ukuri.

2 . Uwirarira n'uw'ibinyoma 
     Ntazagerayo k' Uwiteka. 
     Arik' uwihan' akamwizera,
Umwami Yesu ntamuheza.

3 . Icyamuzanye n' ugutabara 
     Abanyabyaha bamushaka. 
     Ni tub'intore z'Umwami Yesu, 
     Tuzicar' i We mu mahoro.

Gushimisha_396.songBody:
1 . Ni heh' abizera bazajya kuba ?
Mur'iyi si nta ho tuzakirira.
Nta hantu hatagerwa n'umubisha :
Ibibi nta hantu twabihungira.        
/Nta ho, nta ho, mw isi nta ho;
  Mw ijuru ni hw i wabo w'abizera./ (bis)

2 . Tuzimuka mw isi, tuger' i wacu;
N' aheza twubakiwe n'Umukiza.
Ku Mana yacu, har' amazu menshi
Yubakany' isuku tutarabona.
/Ni ho, ni ho, ni hw i wacu;
  N' ubuturo bwiza tuzahoramo./ (bis)

3 . Yesu ni W' ugir' amahoro meza;
Urupfu n'ibyago ni W' ubitsinda.
Abashak' ubugingo budashira
Ni mumwizigire azabarengera.
/Muze mwese, dushengere;
  Mw ijuru, tuzimanan' Umukiza./ (bis)

Gushimisha_397.songBody:
1 . Mw isi tubonana n'inshuti, 
     Tugatandukana vuba : 
     Mw ijuru si ko biri.

Ref:
Tuzabon' ibyishimo, 
 Ibyishim' ibyishimo. 
Tuzabon' inshuti zacu, 
Tutakibasha gutandukana.

2 . Ni hw abakund' Umwami Yesu 
     Bose bazateranira, 
     Batagitandukana.

3 . Kandi tubony' Umucunguzi, 
     Tuzagir' umunezero 
     Urut' iyindi yose.

4 . Kandi tuzajya duhimbaza 
     Yesu, tumuririmbira 
     Mw ijur' iteka ryose.

Gushimisha_398.songBody:
1 . Kwa Data mw ijuru, nta wubabara,
     Nta wubabara, nta wubabara.
     Kwa Data mw ijuru, nta wubabara :
     Baranezerwa !

2 . Kwa Data mw ijuru, nta wiganyira,
     Nta wiganyira, nta wiganyira.
     Kwa Data mw ijuru, nta wiganyira :  
     Ho n' amahoro!

3 .... nta wucumura....Bera dedede !

4 ....nta nyot' ibayo....Hariy' isoko !

5 ....nta nzar' ibayo....Barahagijwe !

6 ....nta ndwar' ibayo....Ni bazima pe!

7 ....nta rukumbuzi....Haba n'irungu!

8 ....nta n'abagipfa....Babahw iteka !

9 ....ni hw i wanyu se ?....Uzatahayo?

10 ....nanjye ndajyayo !....Bamp'ikibanza.

11 ....nzasanga Yesu....Nuko, nzanyurwa !
Gushimisha_398.songTitle: : Kwa Data mw ijuru, nta wubabara,

Gushimisha_399.songBody:
1 . Iyi si turimo—N' iy'ibyago 
     N'iy'umubabaro—N'amakuba; 
     Isi nshya tujyamo, 
     Yo n' iy'igikundiro 
     N'iy'umunezero—N'amahoro.

2 . Kukw ari ho Yesu—Atunganya, 
     Ari hw azajyana—Abantu be,
     Abo yikuriye 
     Mu bise by'urupfu rwe, 
     Abo yikirije,—Bakab' abe.

3 . Yemw' abakijijwe—N'amaraso. 
     Mwaneshej' ibyaha—Kubwa Yesu,
     Muhore mukunda 
     Umuremyi w'ijuru, 
     Muhore mwifuza—Kuzabayo.

4 . Nimuze, twibuke—Ababayo : 
     Nta byaha bagira; n' ab'Imana.
     Natw' abakijijwe
     Dukund' Umucunguzi, 
     Tunezererwe ko—Tuzab' i We.

5 . Nimuze, tugire—Umutima 
     Uzinukw' iyi si—Y'umwijima, 
     Kukw abari mw isi 
     Bataz' Umucunguzi, 
     Batandukanijwe—N'Uwiteka.

Gushimisha_4.songBody:
1 . Dushime cyan' izina ryawe,
     Yesu mukiza wacu, 
     Tukwimik’utwitegekere

Ref:
Umwami wacu Yesu 
Usumba byose.

2 . Mwa bishwe bamubahora mwe, 
     Mwishimire mw ijuru; 
     Muhimbaz’uwadupfiriye

3 . Namwe rubyaro rw’Adamu mwe, 
     Bacunguwe na Yesu, 
     Muhimbaze mwene Dawidi.

4 . Abakuwehw ibyaha twese, 
     Twahaw’ ubwo buntu bwe, 
     Nimuze tumupfukamire: 

5 . Mwa bava mu mahanga mwese, 
     Nimwumvir' Umukiza, 
     Ni we Mucunguzi w' abantu.

6 . Twifuza cyane gusohora 
     Mw’ijur’aho Yes’ari, 
     Ngo tumushim’iteka ryose:

Gushimisha_40.songBody:
1 . Ndakwizeye, Yesu, 
 Mwana w'intama ko wamfiriye.
 None, ndakwinginze,
 Unyoz'  umutima,
 Nonubu, mb 'uwawe, unyakire !

2 . Nyuzuz' imbabazi,
 Unyobor' inzira, umpembure ! 
 Ubwo wankunz' utyo,
 Ukamfira, Yesu,
 Umvugutire, nanjye ngukunde !

3 . Ni nterw' umwijima
 N'ibyago by'iyi si, unyobore !
 Mmar' umubabaro,
 Weyur’ umwijima,
 Kandi ntundekere kure yawe !

Gushimisha_400.songBody:
1 . Twebw' abasiganirwa 
     Aho dutegekwa, 
     Twitegey' ururembo 
     Tuza gutahamo.

Ref:
Urwo rurembo rwera 
N'ibirimo byose 
Byubatwse n'izahabu 
Zirabagirana.

2 . Reka mbaganirire 
     Ibiri muri rwo, 
     Mumeny' ibyiza byarwo, 
     Murwifuze namwe.

3 . Urupfu ntirubayo,
     Nta no kunanirwa, 
     Nta mbeho, nta n'izuba, 
     Nta ndwara, nta byago.

4 . Udakijijwe wese 
     Ntabw' azatahamo, 
     Kukw azahezwa hanze 
     Hamwe na Satani.

5 . Mbe, mur'izo si zombi, 
     N' iyih’ uhisemo? 
     Mbes' iyi s' izashonga 
     Ni y' uzahamamo ?

6 . Musig' iby'ino mw isi 
     Bitazahoraho, 
     Mwiyegurire Yesu, 
     Umwami w'ijuru.

Gushimisha_401.songBody:
1 . Iri joro, yemwe bakristo mwese, 
     Turabibuts' Umwana w'Imana, 
     Uko yaje kuducungura twese,
     Ngw Iman' izadukure mu byaha.
     Abo mw isi bose banezerewe 
     Iri joro, bibuk' Umukiza. 
     Mupfukame, mushim’Umucunguzi ! 
     Tunezerwe, tunezerwe twese ! (x2)

2 . Kwizigira kwacu, bakristo mwese,
     Kudutere guhimbaz' Umwami;
     Inyenyeri y’ iracyaka kw ijuru 
     Ahw abanyabwenge bayibonye. 
     Uwo Mwami yashyizwe mu muvure: 
     Mubimenye, rubanda mwese mwe !
     Munezerwe kukw Iman' ibikiza. 
     Munezerwe, mwambaz' uwo Mwami ! (x 2)

3 . Umukiza yabakuye mu kaga 
     No mu buretwa bw'umwanzi mubi. 
     Mwes' abita ben' Imana Rurema; 
     Abigish' iby'urukundo rwayo.
     Tumwerurire yuko tumukunda:
     Yadupfiriye ku Musaraba. 
     Rubanda mwe, mwishime cyane none !
     Tunezerwe, tunezerwe twese ! (x 2)

Gushimisha_402.songBody:
1 . Ijwi ryumviswe n'abantu 
     Ribatunguye, riti: 
     Shimwa, Mana : kuzwa mw isi. 
     Amahor' abe hose! 
     Mbes' izo ndirimbo twumva 
     Zitangaza n' iza he ?
     Bungeri, n' abamalayika 
     Bababwir' Ubutumwa.

2 . Uw’ iyi si yatabaje 
     Kuko yagwij' ibyago, 
     Kuv' igihe yikoreye 
     Umutwaro w'ibyaha,
     Umukiza wahanuwe 
     Wadusezeranijwe, 
     Uwiringirwa byukuri 
     Non' aratuvukiye.

3 . Shimwa, Mana ! Kuzwa mw isi ! 
     Amahor' abe hose !
     Urukundo n'amahoro
     Biraduhishuriwe. 
     Hamwe n'Intumwa z'Imana,
     Twese turangurure, 
     Dushime no gushimisha 
     Impano y'Umukiza.

Gushimisha_403.songBody:
1 . Nyenyeri yo mu museke, 
     Ubonets' uri kw ijuru,
     Ur' umucy' utuvira. 
     Tumurikir' imitima, 
     Utweyurir' umwijima 
     Ukunda kuba mw isi.

Ref:
Mwami, Mwana—W'Uwiteka, 
Muri Wowe,—Har’ umucyo: 
Jy’ udushorera, Mukiza.

2 . Ni Wowe, Yesu, wanshatse 
     Mu mwijima wa Satani,
     Ubwo nari muri wo.
     Wowe, Mucunguzi wanjye, 
     Wankuye mu bwenge buke 
      Kubw' urukundo rwawe.

3 . Wiyambuy' icyubahiro, 
     Wigira nk'umugaragu 
     Utagir' agaciro. 
     Uhorw' ibyaha nakoze, 
     Mpeshw' amahoro n'ubuntu 
     N'urupfu rwawe, Yesu.

4 . Mucunguzi, mbane nawe, 
     Njye nkwizeran’ umurava :
     Uz' intege nke zanjye;   
     Njye nkor’ iby' ushaka byose.  
     Non' unshunshumurireho 
     Umwuka wawe Wera.

Gushimisha_404.songBody:
1 . Yesu Krist' agiye kuza:
     Tubyuke, ben' Imana.
     Igihe eye kiri hafi: 
     Umwam' azaboneka. ( x 2)

2 . Aje kwimana n'abera 
     No gukiz' Itorero,
     Ni W' uzaryambik' ikamba 
     Ry'ubwiza budashira. (x 2)

3 . Ntutinye, mukumbi muto :
     Ukundwa n'Imana, So; 
     Umusaraba wa Yesu 
     Ni wo bendera yawe. (X 2)

4 . Abo mw isi ni bakwanga, 
     Biguhesh' umugisha; 
     Urukundo no kwizera 
     Bizaguha kunesha. (x 2)

Gushimisha_405.songBody:
1 . Dor' is' ukunt' ikwifuza :
     Mukiz' iragukumbura !
     Umv' uko bagutakira,
     Ngo n'iki kigutindije ?
Uzaza ryari, Mucunguzi,
Wime bwa bwami budashira,
Ngw ibyaremwe byose byishime ?
Icyamp’ ukaz’ udatinze !

Ref:
Umwami Yes' ubw' azaza, (x 3)
Tuzamureba, tunyurwe !

2 . Azazana n' ingabo ze,
     Impanda bazivugije,
     Abapfiriye muri We,
     Bazuke, bamusang' ubwo !
Natw' abazaba bakiriho
Atujyane hamwe na bo,
Tubane na W’ iteka ryose.
Icyamp' akaz' adatinze !

3 . Satani n'abadaimoni
     Bazahunga mu maso he.
     Ab'isi b'abagurano,
     Azaza ngw ababature !
Kand' amahor' azatwar' isi;
Azac' intambara, zishire,
Ahindur’ ibi byose bishya.
Icyamp' akaz' adatinze !

4 . Bagenzi, tube mas' ubu,
     Duhore tumwiteguye.
     N' ukuri, Databuj' uwo,
     Nta wuz' igih' azazira.
Nyamar' azaza ku ngoma ye,
Aya makub' ayamareho.
Duhumure, dutegereze.
Icyamp’ akaz’ adatinze !

Gushimisha_406.songBody:
1 . Jyan' umucyo mur'Afirika!
    Gend' uyimaremw umwijima !
    Bwir' abantu bose barimo
    Yuko Yes' aKo yagukijije.
    Ni We Mwami;—Ni We Mwami :
Ni We Mana—Ijy'ikiz'
abanyabyaha.
(twebw' abanyabyaha)

2 . Mbese, mur'Afirika hose,
Ko harimw umwijima mwinshi ?
None kugira ng'ushiremo,
Yes' aragutumye—
Kuvug' Ubutumwa.
Wiceceka !—Wiceceka !
Jyan'umucyo—Umurikir' Afirika.
(abo mw Afurika)

3 . Harihw ingororano nziza
Yesu yiteguye gutanga :
Azazih' umuntu witanze
Ngwavug’ Ubutumwa,—
Ngw ajyane n'umucyo.
Reba Rwanda !—Reba Rwanda !
Icyibaza:—
N' ik' i Rwanda ikubaza ?
(Mbe, n' ik' ikubaza?)

4 . Reba Yes’ Umwana w'Imana
Yari mw ijuru hamwe na Se;
Maz' abonye tugiye gupfa,
Ava mu bwiza bwe,—
Aza mur'iyi si,
Ni ko gupfa;—
Ni ko gupfa Urw'isoni—
Rwo ku musaraba mubi.
(ari twebw' azize)


5.Mwami Yesu, nsabye k' umfasha,
Ukankiz' ibyaha bindushya,
Bigatuma ntabasha
rwose Kuvuga k' ukiza,—
Ngo nkuber' intumwa Itatumwe—
Itatumwe N'abakuru,—
Itumwe n'Uwampfiriye.
(ker’ i Gologota)

Gushimisha_407.songBody:
1 . Umurimo wacu—Ni mwiza cyane : 
     Dushakire Yesu—Abazimiye.
     Iyo babonetse,—Abo mw ijuru 
     Bajya baririmba,—Bat' Aratsinze.

Ref:
Uyu murimo ni mwiza; 
N'Umwami Yesu ntahwema. 
Dushishikare dukore: 
Ni W’uduter' imbaraga.

2 . Uwitek' ashimirw'—Umucunguzi 
     Wadutoye twese—Ngo tube benshi. 
     Tur' ab'intege nke:—Tujye twizera, 
     Twe kugir' ubute—Tumukorera.

3 . Uyu murimo we—Tuwuhoremo : 
     Twibuk' izo mbuto,—Tuzibagare !
     Nyir'ibisarurwa—Yaradutumye : 
     Tuzagororerwa—Tuzimuritse.

4 . Mu makuba yose—N'ibibabaza, 
     Naho batugaya,—Tuzakomere. 
     Twibuk' umurimo,—Tuwukomeze, 
     Tub' ab'urukundo,—Ben' Uwiteka !

Gushimisha_408.songBody:
1 . Abakijijwe mwese,
     Abo dufatanije,
     Muze none twibaze 
     Ibyo twakora.

Ref:
Abakunzi ba Yesu, 
Nkuko yadukijije, 
Ni ko bidukwiriye 
Kwamamaz' ibye.

2 . Igihe kizagera, 
     Iman' itwibarize 
    Ab'iwacu mu rugo 
    N'abaturanyi.

3 . Nuko, tubageremo, 
     Tubabwir' ibya Yesu, 
     Kand' Umwuka w'Imana 
     Adukoreshe.

4 . Dor' abadakijijwe 
     Baragwiriye hose : 
     Bazakizwa bate se, 
     Bataburiwe ?

5 . Reka tubasabire, 
     Kandi tubabwirize, 
     Bene wacu bakizwe.
     Yes' ashimishwe.

Gushimisha_409.songBody:
1 . Yes' araduhamagara ,
     Ati : Nimubyuk' ubu :
     Ibisarurwa bireze,
     Unsarurira ni nde ?
     Uhamagawe na Yesu:
     Ni wow' ubwaw' ashaka !
     Umwitabish' umutima. 
     Uti : Mwami, nyakira !

2 . Ntuzahere kure cyane 
     Kwamamaz' ibya Yesu : 
     Abaguye bari hafi,
     N'abazimiye na bo.
     Umurim' uradutota;
     Dufit' umwete muke.
     N’ ubur' integ' umusange, 
     Uti : Mwami, mfash' ubu !

3 . Nubw' utazi gushyomoka 
     Kuk' utar' umuhanga, 
     Hamya gusa ko wamenye 
     Ko Yes' ababarira. 
     Ujy'ubwir' abandi bose 
     Ibyo yagukoreye;
     Nuk' umwinging' agufashe, 
     Uti: Mwami, nyigisha !

4 . Hataboneka muri twe 
     Uvuga kw ananiwe !
     Udushoboza ni Yesu 
     Gukund’ ibyiza byose.
     Dukor’ iyo mirimo ye 
     N'urukundo n'umwete,
     Maz’ ishize, tuzavuge, 
     Tuti :Mwam' utwakire !

Gushimisha_41.songBody:
1 . Nasezeranije guhora
 Ngukurikira, Yesu;
 Iminsi yos' umpore hafi,
 Mukiza wanjye mwiza.
 Singitiny' intambara mbi zose.
Wow’ umpagarikiye,
 Sinashobora kuzimira,
 Ni mpora nkuyoboka.

2 . Ndashaka yuko twibanira,
 Ni ngeragezwa n'isi.
 Numv' amajwi yay' anyinginga
Iteka ngo nkuveho.
Ababisha baranyegereye,
Bar’ inyuma n'imbere. 
Nyamara, nkwisunge, Krisito, 
Undind' ibicumuro.

3 . Mukiz’ ijwi ryawe numvise 
Rindutir’ ayo yose : 
Unyongorere mu mutima 
Ngo ntumvir’ ayo moshya, 
Hor’ umbwiriz' ibyo kuntinyura, 
Kand' uhor' untegeka,
Uvuge ngo nanjye nkumvire, 
Murengezi nizera.

4 . Mukiza wasezeranije 
Abagukurikira 
Yuk’ uzabageza mw ijuru, 
Bahoraneyo nawe.
Kandi nanjye nasezeranije 
Guhora ngukorera; 
Umfashish’ ubuntu n'ibambe, 
We Databuja wera.

5 . Kand’ umpe kuger' ikirenge 
Mu cyawe, Muyobora. 
Imbaraga zawe zonyine,
Ni zo njya niringira. 
Ujy’ unyobor' iyo nzira yawe,
Nkiriho mur'iyi si; 
Maz' uzanyakire mw ijuru, 
Mukunzi wankijije.

Gushimisha_410.songBody:
1 . Yesu, ni Wowe dushima: 
     Watuguz' amaraso yawe 
     Cya gihe wadupfiraga. 
     Imibiri n'imitima 
     N' iyawe kubw' ubuntu bwawe 
     Buduhay' ubukiriro. 
None tur' abawe—Kuko wadutoye;
Tugushime,—Udukere, Mucyo wacu, 
Twe kuguma mu mwijima.

2 . Twebwe si twe twagushatse : 
     Ni Wow' ubwawe wadukunze 
     Kubw' ubuntu bwawe bwinshi.
     Twebwe nta ntege dufite : 
     Nta wabasha kugukorera, 
     Utamuhay' imbaraga.
Yobor' imitima !—Tujyane kwa Data 
Mu bwami bwe :—Ab'ukuri babushaka 
Ntibanga gusuzugurwa.

3 . Garagaz' ubuntu bwawe 
     Ku bataz' ubwami bw'Imana, 
     Bigumiye mu mwijima. 
     Kera kose ntibumvise 
     Ubutumwa butunezeza 
     Bukesh' imitima yacu. 
None, wategetse—Umucyo w'ukuri 
Ng'uboneke.—Mwami Yesu, tuyobore, 
Utwerek' inzira yawe.

4 . Ibisarurwa ni byinshi, 
     Abasaruzi ni bakeya: 
     Tum' abagusarurira ! 
     Duhatwe n'ubuntu bwawe 
     Guhamagar' abantu benshi, 
     Bahabw' ibyiza by'Imana. 
     Uwemerwa wese—Mu bwami bw'Imana 
     Arahirwa;—Anezezwa n'amahoro 
     Azagir' iteka ryose.

Gushimisha_411.songBody:
1 . Ai Data wo mw ijuru, 
     Tor' abasaruzi, 
     Ubakure muri twe 
     Babone kugenda, 
     Bavuge Yesu cyane 
     Ko yaducunguye,
     Kw ari We Mana yacu 
     Irokor' ab'isi.

2 . Yaguherey' ubuntu;
     Jy'utangir' ubundi ! 
     Ibyo dufite byose 
     Bikomok' ahw iri.
     Twemeze cyane rwose, 
     Mucunguzi wacu,
     Gutumwa nawe hose 
     Mu bo wapfiriye.

3 . Mukiza wacu Yesu, 
     Utwuzuz' Umwuka, 
     Mwami tukwigireho, 
     Nkuko wagendaga.
     Twe kub' abanyabute,
     Dushishikarire 
     Gukor' ibyo tubwirwa 
     N'Iman' ihoraho.

4 . Reb' igihugu cyacu, 
     Uko barimbuka ! 
     Ntubabazwa n' i wanyu, 
     Akaga barimo ?
     Satan' Umwami wabo 
     Arabazitiye, 
     Ashaka ko babana 
     Mur'urya murimo.

5 . Induru ziravuze,
     Ubatabar' ubu ! 
     N' ucogozwa n'iby'isi,
     Babwirwa na nde se? 
     Tang'umubiri wawe 
     N'ingingo n'ubwenge,
     Ubone gutabara 
     Abo yapfiriye.

6 . Urwanane na Yesu :
     Kweta bihebuje ! 
     We kwitwaz' umufuka 
     N'ibitabo gusa !
     Gend' ubyawe n'Imana 
     Ukijijwe rwose, 
     Wuzuy' Umwuka Wera 
     No kwizera na ko.

7 . Ijwi ry'Umwami Yesu 
     Rirakubwira ngo : 
     Jya mu mahanga yose,
     Uvug' ibya Yesu,
     Babyarw' ubwa kabiri.
     Yes' abarokore, 
     Babatizwe n'amazi
