     N'Umwuka Wera de.

Gushimisha_412.songBody:
1 . Isi yos' iririmbe—Ibitangaza 
     Umukiza wa twese—Yadukoreye.
           Amahang' ukw angana 
           Yos' asingize Yesu !

2 . I burasirazuba,—Bamuhimbaze ! 
     AbaShinwa bashime—Umucunguzi,
           AbaHindi bemere 
           Yesu wabapfiriye.

3 . Kandi n'Abisilamu—Bamusingize : 
     N'amahanga barimo—Ayabature.
            Yes' Umwami, bemere 
            Yuko yabacunguye.

4 . Abatuye mu mbeho,—Aho bagira 
     Ijoro rirerire—Ritinda gucya,
            Bemer' Umucyo w'isi, 
            Ngo bave mu mwijima.

5 . N'ino mu Rwanda rwacu,—Bamusingize,
     Bang' ingeso za kera,—Bamuyoboke, 
            Bati: Ngwin' utwimemo,
            Ur' Umwami w'ijuru.

6 . Amahanga yo mw isi—Yos’ ukw angana 
     Yemer' Umucunguzi,—Amuyoboke;
            Abakijijwe bose 
            Bamusingiz' iteka.

Gushimisha_413.songBody:
1 . Intumwa z'Umwami Yesu
     Zababarijwe mw isi;
     Zahaw' izina rye ryera, 
     Bazibambish' amahwa.

Ref:
Twe, twes' abakijijwe, 
Twitange, tubabwirize 
 Ijambo ry'Umwami Yesu, 
 Maze, na bo bakizwe !

2 . Twe kwita mu kaga k'isi, 
     Twihute, tubabwire 
     Ijambo ry'Umwami Yesu, 
     Tugarur' intama ze.

3 . Abataz' Imana yacu,
     Twihute, tubabwire 
     Ijambo ry'Umwami Yesu, 
     Barek' ibyaha rwose.

4 . Dor' intambara n'ibyago 
     Bir' imbere yac' ubu. 
     Abarwanir' ubutumwa, 
     Twihute, tubukwize.

5 . Peter' ubw' amwihakanye,
     Yumv' inkoko zibitse; 
     Nukw aricuz' ararira; 
     Maz' arababarirwa.

6 . Twemere kuvug' ukuri 
     Hagati y'abanzi be; 
     Tubabibemo n'imbuto 
     Yesu yatubibyemo.

7 . Uwizera yatorewe 
     Kubageza ku Mana, 
     Ngo bave mu byaha byabo: 
     Tyo nimubabwirize !

8 . Mwizerwa, genda wishima : 
     Uzagera mw ijuru ! 
     Uzambikw' ikamba ryera : 
     Nta rupfu rugerayo !

Gushimisha_414.songBody:
1 . Urutare rw'Imana 
     N' ingab' idukingira. 
     Duce ku Musaraba, 
     Tunesh' Umwanzi wacu.

Ref.
Tugende mu misozi, 
Tubabwir' ibya Yesu : 
Maze, na bo bakizwe, 
Be kujya mu muriro.

3 . Isi yacu yuzuye 
     Agahinda n'ibyaha; 
     Satani yagwijije 
     Abo yahumishije.

4 . Bene wacu bo mu ngo 
     Ntabwo bazi Krisito : 
     Baribaz' ukw ameze 
     No gukizw' icy'ari cyo.

5 . Abahisemo Yesu, 
     Nimuze, dutambuke, 
     Twerekan' ubuntu bwe 
     N'amaraso twozemo.

6 . Kand' abishushanije 
     Ntibazajya mw ijuru, 
     Kerets’ abakijijwe, 
     Buhagijw' amaraso.

7 . Abafit’ idini nsa, 
     Bakayoberwa Yesu, 
     Ni bo batubabaza : 
     Ntibazajya mw ijuru !

8 . Nshuti, warahemutse; 
     Yes’ uramubabaje. 
     Dore, wamuvuyeho, 
     Wibagirw' ubuntu bwe.

9 . Nanjy’ Iman' inkomeze,
     Ne kujya mubabaza; 
     Nukw amfash' anyobore, 
     Nite ku rukundo rwe.

Gushimisha_415.songBody:
1 . Turashim' Imana yuko twavukiye
     Ku ngoma y'Umwami Yesu, Nyir’ imbabazi.
     Iyo tuvuka ku ngoma ya Satani, 
     None tuba twihebye.

Ref:
Yesu, tugukunde cyane (X 3) 
Kuko watwitangiye !

2 . None baba badutapfunir' itabi,
     N'amajosi n'amaboko byuzuy' impigi :
     Byos' Umwami Yesu yabidukuyeho, 
     Nukw aduh' amahoro.

3 . Dukunde Yes' udukunda turi bato !
     Yaturemeshej’ Ijambo ryayo ryonyine;
     Yaduhaye n'ababyeyi badukunda,
     Batureran' ineza.
Gushimisha_415.songTitle: Turashim' Imana yuko twavukiye Ku ngoma y'Umwami YESU

Gushimisha_416.songBody:
Ref:
Gumy' ushim' ushim' ushim' 
           Ushim' Umukiza !

1 . Ibikomeye biranesheka, 
             Utaretse gushima.

2 . Na Satani ntazagushobora,
             Utaretse gushima.

3 . Amakuba ntiyakwihebesha,
             Utaretse gushima.

4 . Uraryoherwa n'ibyo mw ijuru,
             Utaretse gushima.

5 . Yes’ uramwireber' unezerwe, 
             Utaretse gushima.

Gushimisha_417.songBody:
1 . Yesu n' Umukiza 
              Ndamwiringiye. (x 2)

Ref:
Nd' igiti cyatewe ku mugezi : 
Nd' amahoro pe !

2 . Sinkinyeganyega,
              Kukw’ ankomeza. (x 2)

3 . No mu cyi, sinuma,
              Ntewe muri We. (x 2)

4 . Iyo ngiye kugwa,--- 
              Arandamira. (x 2)

5 . Iyo mbony' ibyago,
              Arandengera. (x 2)

6 . Satan' iy' anteye,—
              Ntabw' anshobora.(x2)

Gushimisha_418.songBody:
1 . Wa gatabaza kanjye we, 
            Yesu ngo, Murika ! x 2

Ref:
Murika ! Murika ! Murika !

2 . Satan' ampuh' anzimye ? 'Shwi ! 
            Yesu ngo, Murika ! x 2

3 . Ntwikirwe mu gitebo ? 'Shwi 
            Yesu ngo, Murika ! x 2

4 . Mmurikir' abo mu Rwanda !
            Yesu ngo, Murika ! x 2

5 . N' az' azansange mmurika !
            Yesu, ngo Murika ! x 2

Gushimisha_419.songBody:
1 . Har' Umwami wa kera;
     Yar’ umugwaneza.
     Hari kuri Noweli, 
     Areb' umutindi;
     Yaratoraguraga 
     Udukwi ku kwezi.
     Imbeho yari nyinshi; 
     Yendaga no kumwica.

2 . Nukw abaz' umwambari 
     W'umuhungu muto,
     At’ Uriya mutindi,
     Uz' i wabo, mbese?
     Und’ aramusubiza, 
     Ati: Ye, ndahazi :
     Aba mu kirorero 
     Cyo hirya y'umusozi.

3 . Ati : Ngwino, mwambari,
     Tumugemurire.
     Nzanir' amafunguro 
     N’ibyo kunywa n'inkwi.
     Barahagurukana,
     Badatiny' imbeho,
     Kandi bihanganira 
     Umuyaga w'icyago.

4 . Nyum' umwan' ariheba,
     Atakir' Umwami,
     At' Imbeh’ iranyishe :
     Biramera bite ?
     Nukw aramubwir' ati :
     Jy'ushing' aho mvuye :
     Ubunyinya bw'imbeho 
     Ntabwo buribukwice!

5 . Umwan' abigenz' atyo,
     Ager' ikirenge
     Mu cy'Umwami, shebuja, 
     Maz' ashir' imbeho.
     Umwami n'umwambari 
     Baca mu rubura,
     Bajy’ ah' umutind' ari,
     Baramugemurira.

6 . Natw' inshuti za Yesu.
     Twe kwimeny' ubwacu.
     Nkuko twababariwe,
     Tubabarirane.
     Abajyana na Yesu 
     Gutabar' abandi
     Na bo bazagabana 
     Umugisha w'Imana.

Gushimisha_42.songBody:
1 . Mwami wanjye, nshaka kuba 
Uwakijijwe nawe: 
Nake kubwawe wenyine 
Kuk' ur' umucyo wanjye;
Mu kwitonda kwanjye numve 
Urukundo rw'ukuri. 
No mu mwijima w'ijoro, 
Nkwibuke, Mwami Yesu.

2 . Mwami wanjye, nshaka kuba 
Urumuri kubwawe, 
Ngo njye mmurikir’ ab'isi 
Baheze mu mwijima.
Nakire mu nzira zabo, 
Bakuri kure cyane. 
Mbageze ku Mwami Yesu, 
Ngo na bo bamwizere.

3 . Mwami wanjye nshaka kuba 
Uvug' Ijambo ryawe, 
Namamaze, Databuja,
Yuko watubambiwe:
 Abari mu rupfu rubi, 
Mbabwir' ikibakiza, 
Mpumuriz’ abababaye;
Nyobore bos’i Bwami.
Gushimisha_42.songTitle: Mwami wanjye, nshaka kuba uwakijijwe nawe

Gushimisha_420.songBody:
1 . Habay’ umuntu twizeho; 
     Izina rye ni Yosefu—kera.

2 . Yar'afit’ abavandimwe, 
     Nyamara barahemutse—cyane.

3 . Bamujugunye mu bushya, 
     Basig’ umwend' amaraso—menshi.

4 . Hanyuma, bamucuruza 
     N'abantu b'Ishimayeli—bamwe.

5 . Babeshya se, bavuga ko 
     Yariwe n'inyamaswa mbi—si byo.

6 . Mw Egiputa, yarafunzwe; 
     Iherez' arafungurwa—neza.

7 . Abon’ ukw arotorera 
     Umwami waho, Farawo—koko.

8 . Bamufunguy' ahinduka 
     Igisonga cya Farawo—cyiza.

9 . Hatey' inzara, bene se 
     Bamanuka kwihahira—i we.

10 . Yanga kubirondorera,
       Ngo bemer' ibyo bakoze—bibi.

11 . Iherezo, barihana,
       Nukw arabababarira— rwose.

12 . Abakiran' imbabazi,
       No kwimuka, barimuka—bose.

13 . Baraza, bav' i Kanani, 
       Bazana na se, Yakobo—ubwe.

14 . Uko ni ko Yosef’ uwo 
       Yakijije bene wabo—bose.

15 . Bisa n'ubuntu bwa Yesu 
       Yagiriy' ababisha be—ni twe !

Gushimisha_421.songBody:
1 . Nguhaye, Data wera,
     Uyu mwaka wose,
     Ngo mbone kub' uwawe 
     Mu bibaho byose.
     Sinasaba kw ibyago 
     Mbikurwaho byose;
     Icyo ngusabye n'uko 
     Nzajya ngushimisha.

2 . Mbe, ni nde wah' umwana 
     Byos' ibyo yifuza ?
     Nyamara se ntamwima 
     Ibyiza by'ukuri.
     Nawe, Man' iby' uduha 
     Biradukwiriye :
     Birut' ibyo twibwira 
     N'ibyo twisabira.

3 . Ahar' ubuntu bwawe 
     Buzanyemerera
     Kubon' ihirwe ryinshi 
     Ntari nsanzwe mfite;
     Byamera bityo, Mwami,
     Nzajya ngushimira,
     Ngo nkuz' izina ryawe 
     Mu bataryemeye.

4 . Nib’ uzashaka yuko 
     Mbon' imibabaro
     N'ibyago n'amakuba,
     Ngo mfush' ibyo nkunda;
     Nabw' uzamfashe, Mana,
     Ngo nibuke Yesu,
     Uburyo yihanganye, 
     Ubwo yamfiraga.

5 . Nuko, mu byago byose.
     Nzajya ngusingiza,
     Menye kw iby' umpa byose,
     Biva mu rukundo.
     Nuk' uyu mwaka wose 
     Ub' uwawe, Mana;
     Mu byiza no mu byago, 
     Mbiguhimbarishe.

Gushimisha_422.songBody:
1 . Yesu yageze mu Rwanda, 
     N'i Burund' agerayo;
     Yigerey' i Tanganyika 
     N'i Bugande n'i Kongo.
     Yadukuye mu bugoryi 
     No mu mwijima mwinshi;
     Tumuberey' umuryango : 
     Tumusingize cyane !

2 . Imana yishimye cyane 
     Kubon' ibyo yaremye;
     Byari biboneye byose, 
     Nta n'inenge byarimo.
     Maz' umunt' iramurema,
     Ab' umukurambere
     W'inyamaswa n'amatungo;
     Byos' abyit' amazina.

3 . Satan' ajy'arushy' abantu,
     Abah' ibishushanyo
     No kubabuz' agaciro 
     No kubarushya cyane.
     Yabahugij’ Umuremyi,
     Ababwir' ibinyoma.
     Abahemukir' iteka : 
     Ni we mwanz' ukabije.

4 . Yemwe mwes’ abari mw isi,
     Abakuru n'abato,
     Nimumenye yukw Imana 
     Yer' ikang' ibyaha pe !
     Ni cyo cyatumy' ic' Adamu,
     We na Hawa, mw Edeni,
     Ikarimbura ya mirwa, 
     Sodomu na Gomora.

5 . Yemwe mwes' abari mw isi, 
     Namw' abari mw ijuru,
     Nimumeny' Imana yacu 
     Yukw ar' inyambabazi!
     Yatanze n'Umwana wayo,
     Aratubabarizwa;
     Yagiriwe nabi cyane,  
     Bamubamba ku Giti.

6 . Yes' ashobor' imitima 
     Y'abinangiye bose,
     Uhereye mu Bulaya,
     Ukageza mw Afrika.
     Nta mitima w' atabasha, 
     Nubwo yaba nk'ibuye;
     Nubw' irimw ibyaha byinshi 
     Yos' arayishobora.

Gushimisha_423.songBody:
1 . Reka nshim’ Umwami Yesu
     Kuko yankunze rwose :
     Yarampinduye mb' umwana, 
     Ngo tubane mw ijuru.

Ref:
Reka nshim' Umwami Yesu 
Ko yamvanye mu byaha; 
Noneho, mfit' amahoro
Arut' ay'isi cyane.

2 . Mur'iyi si dutuyemo 
     Yuzuy' uburiganya, 
     Ntabwo yabasha guhaza 
     Iby' imitim' ishaka.

3 . Kand' Umwuka wawe wera,
     Abamuhawe bose, 
     Ni W' ujy' abazinukisha 
     Kwifuz' iby'isi byose,

4 . Ujye wirukan’ ubwenge 
     Bwa Satan' anzanira 
     Bwo kuntandukanya nawe, 
     Isoko y'ubugingo.
 
5 . Yemw' ababyawe n'Imana,
     Mujye muhirimbana, 
     Mugere ku Musaraba, 
     Mubone kunesh' isi.

6 . Yes' amaz’ imyaka myinshi 
     Ajy'atwihanganira; 
     Nimuze, dusig' ab'isi, 
     Babone kutwifuza.
 
7 . Mwe kujya muvuga Yesu,
     Uwo mwumvany' abandi; 
     Mujye mumureb’ ubwanyu, 
     Ari ku Musaraba.

8 . Mwe kujya mukebaguza 
     No gusubir' inyuma 
     Mu byo mwahozemo kera,
     Mudahemura Yesu !

Gushimisha_424.songBody:
1 . Iteka nagendaga 
     Ndemerewe n’ibyaha; 
     Ntihagir’ ikibasha 
     Kummar’ Umubabaro. 

Ref:
Ndashim’ Umusaraba; 
Ndashima ya mva nziza: 
Ariko cyane cyane, 
Ndashim’ Umwami Yesu.

2 . Kugeza ubwo nageze 
     Ahantu heza cyane 
     Hangiriy’ umumaro, 
     Ntazibagirw’ ukundi.

3 . Iri n’itangiriro 
     Ry’umunezero wanjye: 
     Aha ni h’ umutwaro 
     Wamvuye mu mugongo.

4 . Ku Musaraba mwiza,
     Ni h’ umunt’ abonera 
     Abagabo batatu,
     Bakamuhumuriza.

5 . Ku Musaraba mwiza,
     Ni h’ umunt’ abonera 
     Urwandiko rw’ijuru 
     Rutar’urw’Itorero.

6 . Umugabo Ntabwenge 
     Yagiye nta rwandiko, 
     Agira ngw azinjira 
     Nkukw abandi binjira.

7 . Nukw ageze kw irembo, 
     Bamubaz’ urwandiko 
     Rwa katanga ka mbere, 
     Asang’ atarufite.

8 . Mu Rubavu rwa Yesu, 
     Havuyemw amaraso 
     Y’uruzi rw’ubugingo, 
     Yoz’ umutima wanjye.

9 . Gir’ umwete, winjire 
     Mu maraso ya Yesu; 
     Uzashirahw inenge 
     Mu mutima wanduye.

Gushimisha_425.songBody:
1 . Kera narabatijwe 
     Kandi ndakomezwa, 
     Ntari nabon' amaraso 
     Y'Umwana w'Imana.

Ref:
Ko wamfiriye, 
Ndakwitur' iki?
Ndaguh' uyu mutima 
N'ubugingo bwanjye !

2 . Mwa bafit' ibyaha mwe, 
     Nimuze, mukizwe : 
     Yesu ni We bukiriro 
     Bw'abantu banduye.

3 . Mwumv’ aho dukirizwa : 
     Ni ku Musaraba. 
     Utahagez' ashobewe 
     Ntabw' ababarirwa.

4 . Mwami Yes' unyemere, 
     Njy' ah' ur' uko nd' uku, 
     Unyuhagiz' amaraso, 
     Ayo wamviriye.

5 . Yesu, waramfiriye,
     Uwakugomeye; 
     Nkuruwe n'uko wankunze; 
     Ngusanze non' ubu.

6 . Noneho, ndakwinginze, 
     Nshyira mu maraso, 
     Ay'igiciro wavuye ; 
     Bizambuza kugwa.

7 . Kand' iyo ngiye kugwa, 
     Arankuyakuya; 
     Maz' akanyigiza hafi 
     Kukw ankunda cyane.

8 . N'ubu ndacyabanguka 
     Kuyob’ inzira ye; 
     Nakwihana, nkamwisunga, 
     Angaruramw ubwo.

9 . Uwiteka Rurema 
     Na Yesu yabyaye 
     N'Umwuka Wera bahwanye, 
     Nsingiz' ubutatu.

Gushimisha_426.songBody:
1 . Dukomeze gutambuka 
     Kuko Satan’ arindira 
     Kutubona tunanirwa 
     Ngw atwicir' umumaro pe !

Ref:
Mpisemo guhora nkizwa, 
Ngashingwa mu gakiza ke : 
Sinzava mu gakiza ke !

3 . Bahungu, namwe bakobwa, 
     Mukijijwe n'amaraso, 
     Nimufash' abananiwe 
     Bavuye ku Musaraba.

4 . Bagabo, namwe bagore, 
     Muze, dukizw' ibyo mu ngo, 
     Kukw ibigusha birimo
     Bitubuza kujy' imbere.

5 . Umv' umuhanuz' Elisa, 
     Uko yavuye Namani; 
     Maz' amuh' ingemu nyinshi, 
     Elis' arabihakana.

6 . Namani yarakijijwe, 
     Ashim' Iman' ihoraho; 
     Arerur’ avug' aty' ati: 
     Iman' iba mw Israyeli !

7 . Va mu kibi cya Gehazi 
     Wakurikiy' indamu mbi! 
     Ni we wajyany' ibibembe 
     Bya Namani yakijijwe.

8 . Abantu bose bo mw isi, 
     Abagabo n'abagore,
     Bataz' ubuntu bwa Yesu, 
     Tubah' impumuro nziza.

9 . Twitandukanye n'ab'isi, 
     Ngo bitume bakanguka, 
     Bave no mu butamenya,
     Bumvir’Imana y'ukuri.

10 . Namw' abakunda Siyoni, 
     Murek' idin' ikayutse; 
     Nta n'icyo yabamarira : 
     Ikunda gushimwa gusa.

Gushimisha_427.songBody:
1 . Urukundo rwa Yesu
     Koko rwatugezeho,
     Rudukura mu kaga
     Ko gukund’ iby'iyi si.

Ref:
Yes' arakiza : ( X 3) 
Ni we wankijije.

2 . Mwemeye kw abakiza,
     Mukabambanwa na We.
     Yes' azabajyan' i We,
     Mu bwiza budashira.

3 . Abahaw’ Umwuka we,
    Mugahinduka bashya,
    Mujye mumunambaho,
    Muzageze ku gupfa.

4 . Ariko mbaburire,
     Abajya bigumanya,
    Mbese, muzageza he
     Kutagir’ ibyishimo?

5 . Reka kwihakirizwa :
     Abo si bo bakiza !
     Kandi ntibakwandika
     Mu Gitabo cya Yesu !

6 . Kwihana s' ubuhanga
     Cyangwa guca mu bwenge,
     Keretse kwanamiza
     Yuk' ur' umunyabyaha.

7 . Abakunda kwihana,
     Mukareba Siyoni
     Yo mw ijuru ry’Imana,
     Mujye muhishimira!

Gushimisha_428.songBody:
1 . Bene Data b'abirabura 
     Murashak' iki se mw Afirika ?
     Turashak' Uwaducunguye: 
     Ni We Yes' Umwana wa Dawidi.

2 . Umukiza Yes' utubwira, 
     Twamubona tumeze dute se ? 
     N'uko mwasang' Umucunguzi,
     Mukazinukw' ingeso zose mbi.

3 . Mwami Yesu, dore, nditabye ! 
     Ngirir' uko washaka nonaha.
     Umutima wanjy' ucumura, 
     Uwumaremw umwijima wose.

4 . Si jye wanze : kera nifuje 
     Kugukiza, maz' uriyangira.
     None reka nze, nkubohore :
     Ni jy' urokor' abakiranirwa.

Gushimisha_429.songBody:
1 . Dor' inzira nziz' ijya mw ijuru 
     Ic' aho yabambwe ku Musaraba; 
     Yayibwiy' umwambuz' umwe wihannye, 
     Ashir' agahinda, arakizwa.

2 . Tuzakizwa na nde tutizeye 
     Umukiza wacu wadupfiriye ? 
     Yagiz' agahinda k'abarimbuka, 
     Atang' ubugingo, ngw abakize.

3 . Nimukizwe mwese kurimbuka, 
     Mugir' ubugingo bw'abakijijwe, 
     Mwizigir' Imana yabacunguye, 
     Muyiture byose kubwa Yesu.

4 . Dor' uko mu Rwanda barimbuka ! 
     Mubabwir' imana yac' ibakize, 
     Tuzahanwe na bo kuba mw ijuru, 
     Nta gahinda kose, nta kwicuza.

5 . Wa Musaraba we, ndakwifuza ! 
     Waneshej' urupfu rwic' ab'iyi si; 
     Watsinz' i kuzimu n'ibibabaza, 
     Uduhindura kub' umunt' umwe !
Gushimisha_429.songTitle: Dor' inzira nziz' ijya mw ijuru

Gushimisha_43.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, Mwami Yesu, ngwino, 
Kuko tugukumbuye. 
Utuvane mu ntege nke, 
Uturuhure vuba!

2 . Yesu, byishimo by'abawe,
Byiringiro by'ababi, 
Amahanga yose yose, 
Arakwifuza cyane.

3 . Yesu ni ryo zina wiswe :
Waje kuturokora. 
Wavuts’ Ur' akana gato, 
Nyamar' uri n'Umwami.

4 . Kubw’ Umwuka wawe wera, 
Mwami Yes' unyimemo ! 
Nuk' ungirir' uk' ushaka,
Uzangeze mw ijuru !

Gushimisha_430.songBody:
1 . Kera nar' umwangizi
     Mu mutima rwihishwa.
     Maze, mpura n'uw'Imana,
     Anyigish' ibya Yesu,

2 . Uk' umuntu yakizwa
    Urubanza rw'ibyaha,
    Akabyarw' ubwa kabiri
    Kubw' urupfu rwa Yesu.

3 . Ibyo mmaze kubyumva,
     Ntsindwa n'urubanz' ubwo,
     Meny’ ibyaha nagakoze
     Kuv' aho navukiye.

4 . Nsaba Yes' imbabazi,
     Natur' ibyaha byanjye,
     Nizer' urukund' ankunda;
     Hanyum'arandokora.

5 . Kuv' ubwo, njya nzinukwa
     Iby'isi nakundaga,
     Menya yuko bizashira.
     Yes' ubw' azagaruka.

6 . None, mfit' amahoro
     N'ubugingo bw'iteka.
     Yes' ampay' Umwuka Wera;
     Annesherez' iby'isi.

7 . Ikimbabaza cyane,
     Kikanter' agahinda,
     N' ukureb' abari mw isi
     Banze kwitaba Yesu.

8 . Abakijijwe twese
     Tubabarir' ab'isi,
     Tubabwire n'Ubutumwa :
     Ni wo murimo wacu.

Gushimisha_431.songBody:
1 . Abakund' iby'isi—Ntabwo babihaga; 
     Ba sogokuruza—Na bo ntibahaze.

2 . Abanga kwihana—Muratubabaza. 
     Ko tubaburira,—Mukizib' amatwi ?

3 . Ibi bibashuka,—Nta kizarokoka, 
     Kerets' abihannye,—Yes' akabakiza

4 . Iyi s' izashira—N'ibirimo byose ; 
     Inka n'imirima—N'intoke n'inzoga.

5 . Nta kizasigara :—Bizab' umuyonga 
     Ubw' is' izashira,—Muzasigara he ?

6 . Twebw' abakijijwe—Turanezerewe 
     Guca mur'iyi si,—Dufit' amahoro.

7 . Mwami wacu Yesu,—Turagushimira 
     Ko wadupfiriye,—Ntituzarimbuke.

Gushimisha_432.songBody:
1 . Abo mur'iyi si—Izashira
     Nta cyo mwibajije—Ku by'imperuka ?

2 . Ntimwitegereje—Icyiza twabonye ?
     None, mwisigara—Mu butamenya !

3 . Dor' icyo twahawe—Cy'igiciro :
     Twahaw' ubugingo—Butazashira.

4 . Yesu ni We zuba—Ritwakira;
Rituma tureba :—Tumusingize !

5 . Isi yo mw ijuru—N' ihebuza. 
     Turek' iby'iyi si,—Tuhagabane !

6 . Ushak' ubugingo—Apfirw' ibye,
     Nk'ushak' izahabu,—Ukw apfirw'ibye.

7 . Yemw' abameze nka —Muka Loti,
     Mwikund' iby'iyi si—Izarimbuka !

8 . Twebw' abakijijwe,—Dutambuke;
     Ntitugakebuke,—Ngo duhomberwe !

Gushimisha_433.songBody:
1 . Yemw' abasubir' iyo muva, 
     I kuzimu kwa Nyamutezi, 
     Mukarekur' Umusaraba, 
     Ko muneshejwe ?

Ref:
Yes' ubw' azagaruka, 
Aje kwim' ingoma ye, 
Tuzamurebesh' amas' as' ate,
Dufit' ibyaha?

2 . Ubw' utihanira gukizwa, 
     Ukaturir' abantu gusa,
     Ngo bakumenye k' ukijijwe,
     Urushywa n'iki ?

3 . Ubw' ur' umuntu w'umwigisha, 
     Wigish' abant' iby'Uwiteka, 
     Ntubageze ku Musaraba, 
     Wigish' iki se ?

4 . Ubw' ur' umunyangeso nziza, 
     Ushyitsa byose by'Itorero, 
     Ntusohore ku Musaraba, 
     Wizey' iki se ?

5 . Ubw' ur' umunyabwenge bwinshi, 
     Byos' uzi no kubigenzura,
     K' uyobew' iby' Umusaraba, 
     Bikuvuy' iki ?

6 . Ubw' ur' umunyesoni-nyinshi, 
     Utinya kwihana ng' ukizwe, 
     Wibwira kw ar' uguhemuka, 
     Uzageza he ?

7 . Ngik' icyambu cy'amaraso ye, 
     Wirohemo, wa mutindi we, 
     He kub' agace wasigaza 
     Katuhagiwe.

Gushimisha_434.songBody:
1 . Abo mur'iyi si mbi 
     Bifuza kwinezeza, 
     Kand' iteka bifuza 
     Icyubahiro.

Ref:
Twebwehw abakijijwe 
Tubaburire !

2 . Bishwe n'Umurimbuzi, 
     Abagir' imbata ze, 
     Yanga ko bameny' uko 
     Yes' abatura.

3 . Igomwa rya Satani, 
     Ajya yoshy' abantu be 
     Abahemukir' atyo, 
     Akabata pe.

4 . Naho bamutakira, 
     Ntabwo yabarengera; 
     No ku munsi w'imanza 
     Ntazabafasha !

5 . Ajy'ashuk' abant' atyo, 
     Ngw abate mu muriro, 
     Ngw atabon' iryo shyano,
     Ari wenyine.

6 . Mana, turakwinginze, 
     Ubahumur' amaso, 
     Ngo bahung' umuriro, 
     Bagutakire !

7 . Wa Mukiza wacu we, 
     Umva, turakwinginga : 
     Ngwin' utwigishe neza 
     Kubaburira.

8 . Nuko, turabinginze, 
     Uk' Umwuka w'Imana 
     Abategetse kose,
     Mwe kunangirwa !

Gushimisha_435.songBody:
1 . Muze mwes' abakijijwe, 
     Abazinutsw' iby' isi; 
     Nimwikorer' umusaraba : 
     Ni w' ubaneshereza.

Ref:
Umusaraba ni wo bendera 
Yacu tw' abakijijwe!
Twemeye n'isoni zawo : 
Ni w' utuneshereza.

2 . Umusaraba w'isoni 
     N' irembo rifunganye. 
     Uduhata kwiyambura 
     Ibituremerera.

3 . Nuko, twiyambure byose,
     Tumere nka ya mpumyi, 
     Ukw itanze gut' umwenda,
     Ngw isang' Umwami Yesu.

4 . Twajyaga dutiny' urupfu :
     Yes' arugir' irembo 
     Ritugeza vuba cyane 
     Mu bwami bwo mw ijuru.

5 . Ibikangisho by'Umwanzi 
     N' iby'intar' iziritswe : 
     Ni tudat' inzira yacu, 
     Ntabw' azadushyikira.

6 . Uzura n'Imana vuba 
     Kubw' urupfu rwa Yesu : 
     Amaraso y'Umusaraba 
     Ni y' atwuzuza na Yo.

Gushimisha_436.songBody:
1 . Ubwo nagendaga ndemerewe, 
     Sinari nz' ubw' icyo ntekereza. 
     Nonubu, maze kwihitiramo : 
     Mpisemw Umucunguzi.

Ref:
Tekereza, nimutekereze ! 
Mbes' iryo jambo muryitayeho ? 
Mwibaze, muhitemo !

3 .Mbeg' urukundo rw'Umwami Yesu ! 
    Aradukunda tudakwiriye. 
    Ubu ngub' arabahamagara : 
     None, nimuhitemo !

4 . Ntangajwe cyane n'imbabazi ze : 
     Ni zo zatumy' anyitangirira; 
     Kandi ngiheze mu mwijim' ubwo, 
     Mvanwamo n'umucyo we.

5 . Emera nawe kwihitiramo ! 
     Imur' umwanz' uguhemukira : 
     Wimik' ahubw' Umukiza wawe ! 
     Nta wakez' abo bombi.

Gushimisha_437.songBody:
1 . Mp' amavuta, Yesu, mbone kwaka ! 
     Mp' amavuta, ndakwinginze ! 
     Mp' amavuta, Yesu, mbone kwaka ! 
     Mbone kwaka, burinde bucya !

Ref:
Turirimbe, turirimbe, 
Ngo Hozana :  tugusingize ! 
Wowe, Mwam' utwar' abami :
Yesu, tugusingize !

2 . Mp' amahoro, Mukiza, nduhuke :
     Mp' amahoro. ndakwinginze ! 
     Mp' amahoro, Mukiza, nduhuke : 
     Mp' amahoro, burinde bucya !

3 . Mp' umunezero, Yesu, ngushime : 
     Mp' igikombe giseseka ! 
     Mp' umunezero, Yesu, ngushime : 
     Njye ngushima, burinde bucya !

4 . Mpa kumenek' iteka, Mukiza :
     Nkomeza ku Musaraba ! 
     Mpa kumenek' iteka, Mukiza : 
     Ujy' ummena, burinde bucya !

5 . Mpa guhora nkwihangir' amaso :
     Uk' Unyigisha nkwemere ! 
     Mpa guhora nkwihangir' amaso : 
     Nkwigireho, burinde bucya !

Gushimisha_44.songBody:
1 . Tubabarire :—Duh' umugisha.
Tumurikirwe—N'ubuntu bwawe,
Ngw inzira yaw' imenyekane mw isi, 
Abantu bameny' ubugingo bwawe.

2 . Kand' amahanga—Agusingize.
Nukw anezerwe,—Kand’ aririmbe.
Ur’ Umucamanza n'Umwami wabo;
Uzacir' ab'isi— Imanza nziza.

3 . Wategets’ isi—Ngo yer’ imyaka.
Mana, ni Wowe—Uturengera.
Imigish' uduha—Tuyamamaze,
Maz' iyi si yos' ikugandukire.

Gushimisha_45.songBody:
1 . Ndagushaka, Mwami Yesu
Ntabwo nakwishoboza. 
Ndifuza k’ umpora hafi, 
Ukajy' ump' imbaraga.

Ref:
Nta cyo nti... nya noneho... 
Nkore byo... s' untegeka... 
Njye nguku...rikira hose,
Nkumvira, nguhakwaho.


2 . Ndagushaka, Mwami Yesu 
Jye nd' umunyantege-nke. 
Uzamber' umujyanama. 
Nta wundi mbitezeho.

3 . Ndagushaka, Mwami Yesu,
Aho ndi mur'iyi si, 
Mu muvumbi no ku zuba, 
Mu bimbabaza byose.

4 . Ndagushaka, Mwami Yesu, 
Hos' uzajy’ unyobora; 
Ngeze kuri wa Mugezi, 
Uzamfashe nywambuke.

Gushimisha_46.songBody:
1 . Unjy' imbere, Man’ isumba byose, 
Jye nd' umunyantege nke.
Mur' iyi si ko nd’ umwimukira, 
Ntagufite, nagera he?
  
     Unjy' imbere, unjy’ imbere,
     Mber’ ingab' inkingira. 
     Yes’ umber’ ingab' inkingira !

2 . Mwam’ undudubirizemw isoko 
Y'amazi y'ubugingo. 
Unyoboz’ umuriro n'igicu 
Mu nzir' injyana mw ijuru.

    Mber’ impamba, mber’ impamba 
    Ijy' intunga mu nzira, 
   Ijy’intunga ngana mw’ ijuru.

3 . Ni ngera ku nkombe ya rwa Ruzi, 
Uzampe gutinyuka 
Amazi maremare y'urupfu,
Nyambuke, ngere mw ijuru.

   Nzaririmba. nzaririmba 
   Indirimbo z'ishimwe, 
   Indirimbo zigusingiza.

Gushimisha_47.songBody:
1 . Ube maso, Mukristo: 
Nturuhuke nonaha, 
Amakub'ari hafi; 
       Usabe !

2 .  Ababisha b'Imana 
Bajya bakwubikira, 
Baguciriy' ibico; 
       Usabe !

3 . Ujye wambar’ intwaro 
Yesu yakwihereye. 
Ku manywa na n’ijoro, 
      Wirinde !

4 . Umv' abatsinze kera 
Iyo ntambar' urwana; 
Baraguhugura, ngo : 
       Usabe !

5 . Umva n'Umwami wawe, 
Yesu wagupfiriye, 
Ni We watubwiy' ati ; 
       Ba maso !

6 . Iryo jamb' uryemere 
N'umutima wizeye, 
Kugira ng'urikore: 
       Usabe !

Gushimisha_48.songBody:
Ref:
Ni jye, ni jye gusa, 
Nkwiriye gusabirwa.
Ni jye, ni jye gusa, 
Nkwirive gusabirwa.

1 . Si na data, si na mama,
                   Ni jye jyenyine, 
                   Nkwiriye gusabirwa.
 Si na data, si na mama, 
                   Ni jye jyenyine, 
                   Nkwiriye gusabirwa.

2 . Kandi si na mwene data,
                   Ni jye jyenyine, 
                   Nkwiriye gusabirwa. 
Reka, si na mwene data.....

3 . S' abo mu muryango wacu, 
                   Ni jye jyenyine, 
                   Nkwiriye gusabirwa. 
S’ abo muryango wacu....

4 . Ndetse si n'inshuti zanjye,
                   Ni jye jyenyine, 
                   Nkwiriye gusabirwa. 
Reka, si n'inshuti zanjye ....
Gushimisha_48.songTitle: Ni jye, ni jye gusa, Nkwiriye gusabirwa

Gushimisha_49.songBody:
1 . Ibihe nseng' Uwiteka
Bintarura mu mpagarara,
Ngo nigir' aho Dat’ ari,
Muganyir' ibyo nkennye byose
Mu bihe by'umubabaro,
Bimpumuriz' umutima.
Nsind' ubukana bw'Umwanzi,
Mu bihe byiza byo gusenga.

2 . Ibihe nseng' Uwiteka
Binyemeza yukw' asubiza.
Ategerej' abana be,
Ngo bamusang' abakenure.
Ndamwihereje rwos’ ubu
Kuko yampamagay' ubwe.
Niringiye bwa buntu bwe :
Nogez' ibihe byo gusenga.

3 . Guhora nseng' Uwiteka
Kujye kummar' umubabaro,
Kugez' aho nzager' i We,
Mmwirebere ngeze mw ijuru,
Niyambuy' umubir’ upfa,
Nambaye kudapf' iteka;
Ubwo ni bwo nzasezera
Ku bihe byiza byo gusenga.

Gushimisha_5.songBody:
1 . Duhimbaz’Uwitek’Imana no kuyisenga. 
     Kukw ari yo yaremy’ibyo mw isi n’iby’ijuru: 
     Yesu Mwami wez’imitima yacu 
     Ngo turirimbir’ Imana.

2 . Duhimbaz’Uwitek’Imana no kuyisenga 
     Kukw ijy’ itegeka neza mu bihugu byose:
     Izaduh’ibidukwiye byose: 
     Twizer’ iri jambo ryayo.

3 . Duhimbaz’ Uwitek’ Imana no kuyisenga 
     Yaraturemye; ni Yo yaduhay’ ubugingo:
     Iturinda mu byago byacu byose; 
      Ni Y’ itugirir’ ubuntu.

4 . Duhimbaz’ Uwitek’ Imana no kuyisenga.
     Ibihumeka byose bishim’izina ryayo;
     Tuyikunde kukw ar’umucyo wacu;
     Tuyisab’ iminsi yose.

Gushimisha_51.songBody:
1 . Muze. musange Yes' ubakunda, 
Mwese nimuze, mwe kuzuyaza. 
Yes’ arashaka yuko mukira,
    Nuko, mumwitabe.

Ref:
Yes' ubw’ uzaza, tuzishima twese, 
Tujye kuban’ akaramata nawe, 
Dutandukanye n'isi n'ibyaha 
Tubanye mw ijuru.

2 . Mwese nimuze, mwitabe Yesu, 
Abaruhur’ abah' amahoro. 
Nuko, mumuh' imitima yanyu, 
      Yos’ ayiharire.

3 . Wibuke yukw igihe gikuze : 
Nta n'umw' umenya kw atinda mw isi, 
Umwami Yes' ageze bugufi : 
     Tebuk' umwakire !

Gushimisha_52.songBody:
1 . Utahe ! Utahe ! 
Ko wazerereye
Mu gihugu cya kure, 
Ibya S' ubyayirayo?

Ref:
Mwana wanjy' uzimiye, 
Tyo ngwino, garuka !
Ngwino, Ngarukira !

2 . Utahe ! Utahe ! 
Nturarambirwa se ? 
Izo ngurub' uzite ! 
Ibyo zirya si byiza.

3 . Utahe ! Utahe ! 
Ntuzi ko niriwe 
Mpagaz' aha kw irembo, 
Mfit' ubwuzu kubwawe.

Gushimisha_53.songBody:
1 . Nimusang’ Umwami Yesu :
Arabaruhura; 
Nimubyumve, mw’ abarushye,
Yasezerany' atyo. 
Ni W' ugab’ umugisha: 
Ashobora byose. 
Ni W’ ugab' ubugingo 
Butazashira.

2 . Nimusang' Umwami Yesu :
Dor' arabashaka; 
Nimubyumve, mw' abahabye,
Yasezerany' atyo. 
Kand' ushavura wese,
Agahab' inzira, 
Yumvire Yesu vuba, 
Az' amwakire.

3 . Nimusang' Umwami Yesu :
Atang' imbaraga; 
Banyantege-nke, mubyumve,
Mumwisunge mwese. 
Satan' arabarwanya, 
Akajy' abashuka. 
Yesu yaramutsinze : 
Nimutinyuke !

4 . Kand' usang’ Umwami Yesu
Ntazamukumira; 
Mwe gushidikanya rwose, 
Mwumve munezerwe. 
Akund' abanyabyaha 
Urukundo rwinshi. 
Arabahamagara 
Ngo muz' ahw ari.

Gushimisha_54.songBody:
1 . Yemwe mwes' abananiwe, 
        N'abaremerewe, 
Muyoboke Yesu Kristo; 
        Arabarahura.

Ref:
Mumwizere, mumwizere,
   Mwizere Yesu, 
Abarenger' abakize 
   Ibyaha byanyu.

2 . Yavushijw' amaraso ye 
        Ngo tuzasugire; 
Mumwemer’ abuhagire, 
        Aboze dedede.

3 . Yesu ni W' utuyobora 
       Mu nzira y'Imana; 
Mubanguke, mumwizere, 
       Mumukurikire.

4 . Nimuze muteranire 
       Mu nzira ye nziza; 
Nuko muzamushimira 
       Iteka mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_55.songBody:
1 . Yes' araduhamagara 
        Kureka ibyaha byose :
Ahor’ atubwira iteka 
        Ngo tumukurikire.

2 . Tumere nka ba barobyi, 
       Bumvis' amagambo ye; 
Bemeye gusig' ibyabo, 
       Ngo bamukurikire.

3 . Atubuza kwifuz' ibyo 
       Mw isi n'icyubahiro; 
Azaduh' ibiduhaza, 
       Ni tumukurikira.

4 . Nubwo twaba tunezerwa, 
       Cyangwa turi mu byago, 
Yes' araduhamagara, 
      Ngo tumukurikire.

5 . Yes' araduhamagara;
       Nuko, tub' intore ze, 
Tumukunde, tumusenge, 
      Tuzageze ku gupfa.

Gushimisha_56.songBody:
1 . Yes' aragutegereza;
        N' inshuti yawe.
 Araguhamagar' ati :
        Ngwino hano !

2 . Ita ku magambo meza
        Akubwir' ati :
 Nabambiwe kugira ngo
        Ngucungure.

3 . Mbes’ ubuntu bwanjye bwinshi
        Ubwangir' iki ?
 Ntiwanyemera, nkaguha
        Agakiza?

4 . Mbese ntiwamaz' imyaka
        Myishi mu byaha,
 Ur' imbata ya Satani,
        Nturambiwe?

5 . None, reka nkubohore,
        Naw' unyizere,
 Unkurikire wishimye,
        Ub' uwanjye.

6 . Yesu yahoz' akubwira
        Kensh' ibyo byiza;
 Dore, n'ub' arakwinginga ! 
        Wamwang' ute?

7 . We gutind' ahar' ijwi rye
         Ryahora vuba;
 Ubu n'igihe gikundwa,
        We gutinda.

8 . Mwami Yesu, singitinda;
          Noneho ndaje.
 Ububata bwawe bwiza
          Ni bwo nkunze.

Gushimisha_57.songBody:
1 . Yes' araguhamagara :
       Ngwino,murushywa !
    Ubu tugisab' Imana,
       Ngwino, murushywa !
    Ubu n' igihe gikwiye :
       Ngwino, murushywa !
    Itaba Yes' uyu munsi !
       Ngwino, murushywa !

2 . Ubwo wumv’ uremerewe,
       Ngwino, murushywa !
    Yes’ akuruhure none :
       Ngwino, murushywa ! 
    Nta w' ajy' ashuka, mugenzi,
       Ngwino, murushywa ! 
    Yes’ arakwakira none : 
       Ngwino, murushywa !

3 . Yes’ arakwinginze ng' uze :
       Ngwino, murushywa !
     Aguh' umugisha mwinshi;
       Ngwino, murushywa ! 
     N' umunyambabazi rwose : 
       Ngwino, murushywa !
     Tukigusabir' Imana, 
       Ngwino. murushywa !

Gushimisha_58.songBody:
1 . Shobuj' uguhamagara
       Munyabyah' umwitabe, 
    Wumvir' ijwi rye ryinginga :
       N' Umucunguzi wawe.

Ref:
Mwitabe !  Mwitabe !
Sanga Yesu nonaha !

2 . N' iki gitum' umutera 
        Kukurindira cyane ? 
     Kera kose waramwanze : 
        None ngwino : ntutinde !

3 . Banguk' aguh' uyu munsi
        Ubwera n'imbabazi 
     N'amahoro y’ adashira 
        N'ubugingo n'ubwami.

4 . Agutegey' amaboko,
        Agukund' akwifuza. 
     Banguk' uve mu bugoryi : 
        Ngwino, wikebaguza.

5 . Aracyaguhamagara :
       Wihut' atarahita. 
Wumvir' ijwi rye ryinginga,
       Udasanga yagiye !

Gushimisha_59.songBody:
1 . Nimuze, mwa ndushyi mwe mwese,
        Muremerewe, murembye.
 Yes’ aje kubasanganira 
        N'ubuntu bwe n'urukundo 
 Mwese, nimuze ! Muze, mwese !
        Mumwitab' arabifuza !

2 . Nubw’ ur' umunyabyaha byinshi, 
        Humura ye ! N' uw'ibambe !
      Iby' agushakaho ni bike : 
        N' ukwihan' ukamwizera. 
     Wa munyabyaha we wihebye, 
        Arakogesh' amaraso.

3 . Umwana wera w'Uwiteka
       Yubamiy' i Getsemane,
     Baramubamb' ari tw' azira.
       Nukw ati : Birarangiye ! 
     Utegerej' iki se, kandi ?
       Ibyo ko biguhagije !

4 . Dore, yazamutse mw ijuru,
       Atsinz' urupfu n'ibyaha !
      Aratuvugira kuri Se,
       Agaragaz' amaraso.
     Na S' akareb' izo nkovu ze, 
       Nihanny' akambabarira.

5 . Nukw abakijijwe na Yesu
     Tuzamusanganirayo ! 
   Abo mw isi n'abo mw ijuru 
Ni ko kuririmba, tuti :
   Turagushimye ! Haleluya !
 Ur' Umukiza n'Umwami !

Gushimisha_6.songBody:
1 . Nagir’ indim’ igihumbi, 
     Na bwo byananira 
     Gusingiz’ Umucunguzi, 
     Ngo mbirangize neza.

2 . Umfashe, Man’ihoraho 
     Nkwiz’icyubahiro 
     Cy’izina ryiza rya Yesu
     Namamaz’ ishimwe rye.

3 . N’izina ridutinyura 
     Mu bwoba dufite ;
     Ruhumuriz’ubabaye, 
     Rikabyuts’uwaguye.

4 . N’ukuri, Yes’ashobora, 
     Gutsembahw ibyaha,
     Akesh’amaso ye 
     Abacumuye bose.

5 . Gipfamatwi, umva Yesu !
     Kiragi, ririmba ! 
     Kimug’itere hejuru !
     Mpumyi, tumbira Yesu.

Gushimisha_60.songBody:
1 . We, mutim' urira,—Uze kwa Yesu; 
      Amakuba yawe,—Uyamubwire.
     Mubwire buhoro—Ibikuriza; 
     We kugir' ubwoba,—Kandi wirira.

2 . Bwira Yesu byose,—N' inshuti yawe, 
     Ibikubabaza—N'ibigutera.
     Arakund' afasha—Abashavuye; 
     Wizer' ijambo rye,—Kandi wirira.

3 . Abaremerewe—N'ibiruhanya, 
     Babwire kw Imana—Yabaruhura.
     Ubahumurize,—Ut' Umukiza 
     Amar' agahinda :—None, mwirira !

Gushimisha_61.songBody:
1 . Umwuk' ukubwira,—Wumv' ijwi ryawo,
     Uve mu butindi.—Reba ku Giti ! 
     Umwuk' ugushaka,—Ntuwunanire ! 
     Ur’umunyabyaha:—Sanga Krisito.

2 . K' ur’ umunyehirwe,—Uratiny' iki ?
     Akira kunesha :—Waracunguwe. 
     Ugutitiriza,—Ntuwushavuze. 
     Indirimbo zawe—Zisange Yesu.

3 . Mu mutima wawe—Here dedede. 
     Ber' Umwuka Wera—Urusengero. 
     Umwuk' ukongeza—Kwizera kwawe, 
     Ugukomereze—Gukund' Imana.

Gushimisha_62.songBody:
1 . Ntumwa za Yesu, murangurure, 
Mwamamaze mw is' ubwo butumwa bwe ! 
Nimukwiz' inkuru z'Umucunguzi :
        Ubikunz' amwitabe !

Ref:
Haz' uwemeye ! Haz' uwemeye !
Mubibwir' abato n'abakomeye. 
Yemera gutarur' abazimiye : 
      Ubikunz’ amwitabe !

2 . Ubikunze naze, ntakererwe. 
Yinjire mw irembo twugururiwe. 
Yesu ni We nzir' igeza mw ijuru :
     Ubikunz' amwitabe !

3 . Ubikunze wese namwumvire : 
Ntabw' avuguruz' isezerano rye.
 Umusang' agabany' ubugingo bwe :
     Ubikunz' amwitabe !

Gushimisha_63.songBody:
1 . Yemwe, banyabyaha mwe, 
     Mwitab' Umucunguzi. 
     Nubwo mwe mwazimiye, 
     Mwemer’ Abatarure !

Ref:
Muririmbe,...munezerewe... 
Yesu yaki...r’ abacumuye... 
Vug' iryo ja... mbo, ryamamare... 
Yukw abab' abakira.

2 . Muz' abaruhur' ubu, 
     Muze, mumwiringiye. 
     Arabakira, nubwo 
     Mwanduye bikabije.

3 . Wa mutima wanjye we, 
     Nta rubanz' ukiriho, 
     Kuko bya bicumuro 
     Byose yabyishyizeho !

4 .Yakir' abacumuye, 
    Nanjy' uko ndi nanduye ! 
    Noze mu maraso ye : 
    Azangeze mw ijuru.

5. Namwe, mwa bakonje mwe, 
    Nubwo mwamuvuyeho, 
    None nimutebuke,
    Yes' aracyabifuza.

Gushimisha_64.songBody:
1 . Muze ku Mwami w'ubugingo: 
        Bangizi, musange Yesu.
      Ni We wenyin' uzabakira; 
        Azabah' Umwuka wera.

Ref:
Umukunz' akihan' ibyaha 
Ntabwo yanga kumwakira.

2 . Abamwizera mw isi yose 
        Abatabaz’ imbaraga;
     Urukundo rwe rutangaza 
        Ruboneka hose hose.

3 . Kirisito, Mukiza rnwiza,
        Tungany’ imitima yacu; 
     Duhe gukiranuka rwose 
         N'amahoro no kwizera.

Gushimisha_65.songBody:
1 . Musange Umwam’ ugira ubuntu ,
         Abatakimwizigira.
     Ntiyanga kwakir’ abatindi;
         Ahabur' abazimiye. 
     Kandi yemeye kubapfira : 
         Yabaviriy' amaraso. 
     Nta kindi Abasha gukirisha 
         Abanze kumvir' Imana.

2 . Musang' Umwami ujy' ahembura 
        Nimuze, mwes' abaguye, 
     Batacyizigir' agakiza :
         Abategey' amaboko ! 
     Yakirishij' ubuntu bwinshi 
        Wa munyabyahakaz' arira; 
     Na wa mwambuzi babambanywe 
        Ntiyarnwisungiy' ubusa.

3 . Musang' ubasha kuruhura;
        Az' ibibarushya byose. 
     Kubw' urukundo rusaga,
       Ahez' ibibashavuza. 
     Cya gihe, muri Getsemani,
      Yariz' amarira menshi : 
     Kubw' ubuntu bwe buhoraho, 
     Azahanagur' ayanyu.

Gushimisha_66.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, ngukize, mwangizi:
     Nabony' ishavu ryawe ryose;
     Nyamar' ushatse ko ngukiza,
          Ukwiriye kunyumvira.
     Dor' uko mpagaze ku rugi;
          Ndi Shobuj' Umucunguzi. 
     Nkuzaniy' imigisha myinshi : 
         Mbese, ntiwankingurira ?

2 . Kera, narakuvukiye,
     Ngucunguz' ubugingo bwanjye. 
     Mbese, k' unangiw' umutima, 
         Ubuz' uko wanshyiramo ?
      Namaz' iminsi myinshi cyane 
         Ku rugi rwawe nkomanga.  
      Mugenzi, ko bugiye kwira,  
         Mbese, ntiwankingurira ?

3 . Rya joro ridacy' iteka 
     Ni ryir' uzantabaza s' ute ? 
     Ntutind' unyitab' uyu munsi,
        Ngukikire, nkurengere ! 
     Igihe cyawe kirakuze;
        Ntuvug' uti : Nzaz' ubundi.
     N' uza ku rugi rwanjy' utinze, 
        Uzakomangir’ ubusa,

4 . Nubwo wumv' utanyitaho, 
     Jye ndacyakwinginga ngukunze, 
     Nkurindire kugeza ryari ?
        Ngwino, ndakwifuz' i wanjye;
     Dor' uko mpagaze ku rugi :
        Ndi Shobuj' ukwitayeho. 
     Nkuzaniy’ imigisha myinshi; 
        Mbese, ntiwankingurira ?

Gushimisha_67.songBody:
1 . Uhagaze, Mukiza 
        Ku rugi rukinze, 
     Utegereza yuko 
        Bagukingurira.
     Ariko, bene Data,
        N' iby'isoni nyinshi 
    Gukingiran' Umwami 
        Yes' Umucunguzi.

2 . Akomanga ku rugi.
        Kandi dor' afite
     Inkovu z'imbereri 
        N'ikamba ry'amahwa. 
     Mbeg' urukundo rwinshi 
        Rw' utegerez' atyo !
     Nta kindi cyaha kibi 
        Nko kutamwakira !

3 . Umwam' atwingingisha 
        Ijwi ryongorera, 
     Ati : N'iki gituma 
       Mungirira mutyo? 
     Mwami, tugiz' isoni 
        Z'uko guhemuka :
     Nonehw injira, Mwami 
        Ntudusig' ukundi.

Gushimisha_68.songBody:
1 . Nta kindi gihesha gukiranuka 
       Mu b'isi no mu bo mw ijuru, 
     Keretse kwizera ko wogejwe de 
       N'amaraso ya Yesu masa.

Ref:
Wogejwe na Yesu ? 
Watunganijwe n'amaraso ? 
Har' ubwo yakuhagij' amaraso?  
Mbes' imyambaro yaw' irera?

2 . Amaraso ya Yesu yogej' atyo 
        Abanduy' imitima yabo: 
    Ntimukererw' ahubwo mutebuke, 
       Mwezw' imitima yanyu neza.

3 . Umukiz' ubw' azagaruk' afite 
       Icyubahiro cy'ubwiza bwe,
     Abatari bezwa bazinjir' i we 
      Mu birori by' ubukwe bate?

4 . Bazatinya guhinguk' imbere ye, 
       Bazahinduk' ubwoba busa. 
     Nukw iyambur' iyo myambaro mibi 
       Yes' akwambik' iye y'ubukwe.

Gushimisha_69.songBody:
1 . Nkuko Mose yamanits' inzoka ku giti,
     Abarembejwe bakayireba, 
     Bagakir' uburibwe, bakaba bazima 
     Kubw’ imbabazi z'Uwiteka, 
     Ni ko na Yesu
     Yatumanikiwe ku Musaraba kera : 
     Tumurebe, tumwiringire.

2 . Mutim' ushavuye, reb' Uwagupfiriye;
      Reba Yesu wakumanikiwe !  
      Munyabyah' umutumbir' aragukiz' ubu,
      Umureb' urakira rwose ! 
      Reba, wizere ! 
      Kubabarirwa kwawe kuv’ i Gologota :
      Reba, reba ku Musaraba.

3 . N'iki cyatumy' Umwana w' Iman'ababazwa?
    Umv' icyatumy' abambwa ku giti,
    Kand' icyatumye yambikw’ ikamba ry' amahwa : 
    Ni kubwawe n'ibyaha byawe ! 
    Reba, wizere ! 
    Dor' urupfu n' urwe, nahw imyandu n' iyawe : 
    Reba, reba ku Musaraba.

4 . Naho warir' ukicuz' ukanababara,
     Ntibyarih' ibicumuro byawe. 
     Dor' impongan' ikwiriy' ibyaha wakoze 
     N' amaraso ya Yesu masa.
     Reba, wizere ! 
     Wizer' Uwakubambiw' arakurokora : 
     Reba, reba ku Musaraba.

5 . Yagukirishije ya mibyimba yagize;
     Ni na We gukiranuka kwawe. 
    Yakubeshejeho,war' uwo kurimbuka : 
    Wakir' ubwo bugingw aguha.
     Reba, wizere ! 
     Yes’ ubw' atagipfa,tuzabanaho na We: 
     Reba, reba ku Musaraba.
Gushimisha_69.songTitle: Nkuko Mose yamanits' inzoka ku giti

Gushimisha_7.songBody:
1 . Dor’abera bo mw ijuru barishima cyane 
     Baririmbira Yes’iyi ndirimbo nshya,

Ref:
Bat’ Icyubahiro cyose kib’ icya Yesu, 
Wadukunz’ akatwuhagiz’ amaraso.

2 . Abo bose bari bandujwe n’ibyaha kera,
 None bambay’ imyenda y’abakijijwe 
 Bat’ Icyubahiro.......

3.  Uwahoz’ar’umugome
     Umutambyi w’Umwami: tumusingize!
     Tut’ Icyubahiro.......

4.  Iyo Yes’ atadukunda tutarozw’ibyaha,
     Tuba twihebye rwose: twakozwa na nde? 
     Non’icyubahiro.......

5.  Turirimbire n’aband’ uko yadukijije, 
     Bibareherez’ahw ari, baririmbe.
     Bat’ Icyubahiro.......

Gushimisha_70.songBody:
1 . Nimuze mwese
     Kumv' inkuru nziza 
     Z'agakiza kabwirizwa none.
     YESU yabasanze : 
     Arabashaka; 
     Namwe muh' Umwami: imitima.

 2 . Mwitinyishwa n'uko 
     Mufit' ibyaha,
     Ngw Azabang' abater' umugongo; 
     Ntabwo yabigira :
     Yasezeranye 
     Kwakir' uwihannye  umwizera.

 3 . Ni W' ubwe wizanye 
     Gukiz' abantu;
     Yavuye ku Witek' Aza mw isi. 
     Ngo tubon' ijuru,
     Yaradukunze; 
     Yaratubambiwe; yaravumwe!

 4 . Abwira bos' ati :
     Jye nd' Ubugingo,
     Kand' unyizera wese ntazapfa. 
     Nzamuha kubaho 
     Mu bwami bwanjye; 
     N'urupfu nzamuha kurunesha.

Gushimisha_71.songBody:
1 . Hagarara, munyabyaha,
        Kuk' uri mu mwijima; 
     Urarindagira hose, 
        Ugiye kwiyahura.

Ref:
Ngwin'Iman' ijya yakira 
   Umunyabyaha wese. 
Ibuka, nta n'umwe yanze : 
   Ngwin' irakurokora.

2 . Wajyaga wibwir' ibibi,
        Ukagir' agahinda; 
     Washatse gutsind' ibyaha, 
        Nyamar' urananirwa.

3 . Washaka kuza mu mucyo 
        Ng' ubohorwe n'Imana? 
     Wakwemera kuyikunda 
        Nkuko na Y’ igukunda?

4 . Teg’ amatwi, munyabyaha : 
        Araguhamagara. 
     None wemere gukizwa : 
       We kwihemukir' utyo !

Gushimisha_72.songBody:
1 . Twaheze mu mwijima mwinshi cyane; 
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu ! 
     Ubwiza bwe bwaratumurikiye : 
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu !

Ref:
Sang' uwo Mucy' ukwakir' ubu !
Jye nzi yuko wammurikiye, 
Nari nd' impumy’ arampumura. 
Usang' uwo Mucyo nawe !

2 . Nta mwijim' ugir' uri kumwe na we : 
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu !  
     Tugendane na W’ atumurikire :
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu !

3 . Mwa mpumyi zaheze mu mwijima mwe,
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu ! 
     Mwoge mu maraso, muhumuk' ubu : 
     Umucyo w'isi ni Yesu !

4 . Har' indi s' itagomb' izuba rwose, 
     Umucyo waho ni Yesu ! 
     Umwana w'’ntam’ ahaber' izuba : 
     Umucyo waho ni Yesu

Gushimisha_73.songBody:
1 . Ngwino, zan' ibyaha byawe 
     Kuri ya soko nziza.  
     Ubiyirohemo byose, 
     Wiboner' ihumure.

Ref: .
Gira bwangu ! Wizarira ! 
Nturushy' utindiganya na hato. 
Yiteguye kugukiza: 
Arakwinginze ng' uze.

2 . Ngwino, zan' ibyaha byawe 
     Kuri ya soko nziza, 
     Nubwo bitukura rwose, 
     Birab' umweru dede.

3 .Umv’ amagambo ya Yesu, 
    Wihan’ umwiringire !
    Mwitab’ aguh’ ubugingo;
    Nuk’ umukurikire.

4 . Subira kuri ya soko,
     Ni ho wakirira pe;
     Ni cyo kizatum’ impundu
     Zivugira mw ijuru.

Gushimisha_74.songBody:
1 . Jye mfit' Umukiz' ujy' amvugira ku Mana.
     N' inshut' idahana, Si nk' izo mw isi
     Itek' arandind' akankingira n'ibyago.
     Icyamp' Uw' akab’ Umukiza wawe !

Ref:
Njye ninging' Imana ngw’ ikwereke Yesu.
Ng’ umwakire nawe : ni ko ngusabira.

2 . Nahaw' ikibanza na Data wo mw ijuru,
     Mu rugo rwe rwera kubw' Umwana we.
     Azangezayo ngo tuban' iteka ryose.
     Icyampa ngo nawe tuzabaneyo !

3 . Nzahabwa n'umwambaro  mwiza, wera cyane,
     Tw' abacunguwe yatubikiyeyo.
     Njya ngir' amatsiko, nkawifuza,mugenzi,
     Icyampa ngo naw' uzawambar' ubwo !

4 . Kur'ubu, njya ngir’ amahoro mu mutima,
     Nyahawe na Yes' Umukiza wanjye.
     Atemba nk'uruzi : ab'isi ntibayazi.
     Icyampa ngasang' uyahawe nawe !

5 . N'umara kumwemera h' Umukiza wawe,
     Uhamye mu band' iby' agukoreye.
     Usabe n'Iman' ibahishurire Yesu,
     Bahabw' ubwo buntu wahawe nawe.
Gushimisha_74.songTitle: Jye mfit' Umukiz' ujy' amvugira ku Mana

Gushimisha_75.songBody:
1 . Yesu ni we Nshuti yacu; 
     Ni W' utwikorerera 
     Imibabaro n'ibyaha, 
     Akatwuzuza na Se. 
     Dore, tubur’ amahoro,
     Tuyabuzwa n'ubusa, 
     Kuko tudasaba neza 
     Ibyo dukena byose.

2 . Ni tugir' ibyago byinshi,
     Tugashukwa n'Umubi, 
     Tumuganyir' amaganya,
     Kukw’ ayadukuraho. 
     Harihw indi nshuti nk'iyi 
     Yababarana natwe ? 
     Yes' az' intege nke zacu, 
     Tumwisunge dusaba.

3 . Nib’ ufit' ishavu ryinshi 
     Ukababara rwose,
     Ubuhungiro ni Yesu: 
     Ngwino tumwihishemo. 
     Iy’ inshuti zidutaye, 
     Zikaduhemukira, 
     Yes' adukingir' ingabo,
     Akaduhumuriza.

Gushimisha_76.songBody:
1 . Bene wacu bo mw isi, 
     Mwese ni mutwiteho,
     Mwitegure kumvira 
     Imigambi y'Imana.

2 . Satani yayobeje 
     Sogokuruza wacu,
     Amuteg' ikigoyi,
     Maz' amuta mu rwobo.

3 . Nuko, natw' abana be 
     Tumukurikir' ubwo, 
     Twibagirw’ Uwiteka, 
     Tugwa mu minyururu.

4 . Umv' ubuntu bw'Imana, 
     Ko butangaza cyane ! 
     Nawe, wabwiyumvira, 
     Warek' iby' ugundira.

5 . Ntangazwa n'Uwiteka : 
     Yambuy' uwo Mwana we 
     Bwa bwiza bukomeye, 
     Ngw az' apfir' abagome.

6 . Yemeye guhemurwa, 
     Nta n'icyaha yakoze, 
     Yicw' urupfu rubi pe, 
     Atubohor' ibyaha.

7 . None, banyabyaha mwe, 
     Bakene na bakire, 
     Uko muri, mwitabe, 
     Mwakir' Umucunguzi !

Gushimisha_77.songBody:
1 . Umva, munyabyaha we,
     Yes' ukw’ akuburira : 
     Sigaho gukinisha 
     Ubugingo n'urupfu !

2 . Umubir' ushukana 
     Uzasaz' ushireho, 
     Ujy' iy' utagaruka : 
     Nuko, wibikinaho.

3 . Takambir' Iman' ubu, 
     Itarac' amateka :
     Yo ntikinish' ibyayo. 
     Ngwin' usab' imbabazi !

4 . Gupfa ntikuba kure : 
     We kujarajar' utyo ! 
     Ntuzi k' uzarimbuka ? 
     We kugum' uk' ur' uko.

5 . Haguruka ! Huguka ! 
     Hung' urupfu rw'iteka ! 
     Yesu n’ ubukiriro :
    Wamuhungiyeho se ?

Gushimisha_78.songBody:
1 . Kera har' umubibyi 
    Wasohoy' imbuto; 
     Zimwe zigwa ku nzira, 
     Zimarwa n'inyoni, 
     Izindi ku rutare,
     Zumishwa n'izuba,
     Kuko zari zibuze 
     Ahantu horoshye.

2 . Mu mahwa hagw' izindi,
     Zikurana na yo; 
     Nukw’ aziniga zose, 
     Ntizera na gato.
     Izindi mbuto zigwa 
     Mu butaka bwiza;
     Zimeze, zirakura, 
     Zer' imbuto nyinshi.

3 . Har' umubibyi wundi,
     Ni Yesu Krisito. 
     Ijambo ry'agakiza 
     Ni ryo mbut' abiba, 
     Kand’ imitima yacu 
     Ni na yo mbibe ye,
     Ari mib’ ari myiza, 
     Amishamw imbuto.

4 . Ku mutwe n'ibiganza  
     No ku birenge bye,
     Hatonyang' amaraso 
     Akibib' imbuto;
     Imvura ni y'imeza 
     Imbuto z'iyi si : 
     Amaras' akameza 
     Izo mu mitima.

5 . Mugenzi, har' ibiki 
     Mu mutima wawe ? 
     N’ inzira nyinshi, mbese ? 
     Cyangwa n' urutare ? 
     Cyangwa n' imbibe nziza? 
     Mbe harafumbiwe ? 
     Weramw imbuto nziza,
     Cyangw' umez' amahwa ?

6 . Umwami Yes' azaza 
     Gusarur' imbuto; 
     Azaz’ afit' intara, 
     Maz' azigosore;
     Ingano nziza zose 
     Azazihunika, 
     Maz' umuram' awute 
     Na wo mu muriro.

7 . Uzajya hehe wowe ? 
     Nturabimenya se? 
     Uzajya mu kigega, 
     Cyangwa mu muriro?
     Urorere gutinda :
     Wihane nonaha ! 
     Uyu n' umunsi mwiza 
     Wo kwemererwamo.

Gushimisha_79.songBody:
1 . Jy' uhor' undinganirije 
     Aya magambo meza. 
     Umpugur' uyamenyeshe, 
     Aya magambo ye. 
     Ayo ni yo njya nkunda, 
     Ni y' ampesh' amahoro.

Ref:
Ni yo meza, ndayakunda, 
Anter' ibyishimo byinshi : 
Ni yo meza, ndayakunda,
Anter' ibyishimo.

2 . Krist' Ahet' abantu bose 
     Aya magambo meza. 
     Mumwitabe, banyabyaha, 
     Mwumv' amagambo ye. 
     Abayoboz' ituza, 
     N' amagamb' atunganye.

3 . Kwiza hos' ubutumwa bwe 
     Bw' aya magambo meza. 
     Muz' arabababarira, 
     Mwumv’ amagambo ye. 
     Yesu ni We Mukiza, 
     Utubeshahw iteka.

Gushimisha_8.songBody:
1 . Izina rya Yesu-Turaryubaha, 
    Twemer’ Umukiza-Yukw ar’Uwiteka,
  Ngo biter’Imana-Icyubahiro
 Kuko Yes’ari We-Jambo ry’Imana.

2 . Yesu ni we Jambo-Ryaremy’iyi si
 N’umunsi n’ijoro-N’izuba n’ukwezi 
N’inyamaswa na zo -N’ibiguruka
 N’umuntu mw’ishusho - Y’Uwiteka, Se.

3. Yaciye bugufi, - Az’ino mw’isi, 
Maz’abanyabyaha - Babi baramwica, 
Nubw’afit’izina - Ry’icyubahiro, 
Hanyum’arazuka,- Ajya mw’ijuru.

4 . Mwene Dat’ ushime - Iryo zina rye,
 Wicishe bugufi - Kukw’ari we Mana.
 N’umukiza wacu: - Yitw’ Uwiteka.
 Kokw’izina yiswe - Rirahebuje.

5 . None, mu mutima - waw’ umwimike: 
Rek’anesh’ atsembe - Ibyo byaha byawe, 
Yahaw’ ubutware - Ngw’agutsindire
 Wa mubisha wawe - Iy’ahingutse.

6 . Kand’Umwami Yesu - Azagaruka, 
 Azany’ubutware - N’icyubahiro cye. 
Maz’iyi si yose - Izamwimika; 
Nanjye nzamubona – Njye mmusingize.

Gushimisha_80.songBody:
1 . Mwa bitang' igicuri mwe, 
     Muyoberw' umusaraba, 
     Turababwira turira 
     Yuko mubabaza Yesu.

Ref:
Mpisemo guhora nkizwa,
Ngashingwa mu gakiza ke;
Sinzava mu gakiza ke.

2 . Mwa barets’ ubugingo mwe, 
     Mukabuguran' iby' isi, 
     Ubw’ ibyo bizabora se
     Muzakuramo ndamu ki ?

3 . Mwa barets’ igihugu mwe, 
     Cyuzuy' ubuki n'amata, 
     Mukimiranye vuba ye,
     Musubiye mw Egiputa !

4 . Yemw’ abavug' inkuru mbi 
     Ya cya gihugu Siyoni, 
     Ibyo mwit’ amananiza 
     Bishoboker' uwizeye.

5 . Dor’ amaraso ya Yesu 
     Ni mo dukirizw’ ibyaha, 
     Ngwino, dusubiraneyo, 
     Tugere ku Musaraba !

6 . Yemwe bakunzi ba Yesu, 
     Mwihane, ye kubabara ! 
     Mumaramaze kwitanga, 
     Igihe ni kigufi pe !

7 . Mwa batuy' imitwaro mwe, 
     Ko mugifit' ingata se ? 
     Turababwira turira 
     Ko muri kure ya Yesu.

8 . Muze, musange Krisito, 
     Ku ntebe ye y'imbabazi, 
     Dor' abategerej' ubu ; 
     Muz' arabababarira !

Gushimisha_81.songBody:
1 . Teg’ amatwi, wumve 
     Ijwi rya YESU.
     Arakongorera,
     Akwinginga.

Ref:
Ati: Wemere
Ko nkurokora: 
Ni ...jye...Mucunguzi
Ntiwaza se?


 2 . Umvir' ijwi ryiza
     Rigusaba ngo, 
     Nganyir' amaganya,
     Nyikorere.

 3 . Umuhungireho,
     Umwihishemo. 
     Arakuruhura
     Unaniwe.

 4 . Ni wowe yazize
     Ku Musaraba 
     Emer' Aguture
     Ibyo byaha

 5 . Ur’ uw'intege nke :
     W' Arakomeye 
     Umwiyegurire,
     Usugire.

 6 . Ubwo yakuguze,
     Non' umwinjize 
     Mu mutima wawe,
     Akwimemo.
Gushimisha_81.songTitle: Teg’ amatwi, wumve ijwi rya YESU

Gushimisha_82.songBody:
1 . Mwami, wakomeretse: 
     Ni twe waziraga !
     Wahemuw' utyo, Mwami, 
     Ushinyagurirwa.
     Ker' utaraza mw isi, 
     War'ufit'  ubwiza !
     Dor’ uko bagushyize 
     Mur' abo bambuzi !

2 . Mpindukirir'   undebe, 
     Mukiza  w' ukuri:
     N'impano  y'imbabazi 
     Njya nkuboneramo.
     Yesu, waramfiriye :
     N' ibyanjye wazize;
     Ump' amahoro masa 
     Kuko nkwiringira.

3 . Kand' imipfire yawe 
     Ni yo yankijije.
     Intera kugushima 
     Mu kubaho kose :
     Imbabazi n' izawe, 
     Mucunguzi wanjye.
     Nah' urupfu rwantera, 
     Nta cyakunkuramo.

4 . No mw ipfa ryanjye, Yesu, 
     Uzambe bugufi :
     Urupfu ni runsinda, 
     Uzammar'   ubwoba.
     Kokw umubiri wanjye 
     Uzabor' uveho;
     Nyamara, nzakubona 
     Mu maso, Mukiza.

5 . Mukiza wanjye mfite 
     Ubwuzu n' ishimwe,
     Ngo ndeb’ inkovu zawe 
     Wagize kubwanjye !
     Umpe kunesha rero, 
     Nkuko wanesheje.
     Hahirw' uzapf’ apfira 
     Muri wowe, Yesu !

Gushimisha_83.songBody:
1 . Umutwaro wanjye, Krisito, 
     Warawikoreye. 
     Bakubambye ku Musaraba,
     Ni jyewe wazize; 
     Unkuraho wa mutwaro : 
     Sinkiwikoreye !

2 . Igikombe cyanjye cyarimo 
     Kuvumwa n'urupfu; 
     Nuk' ucyiranguza kubwanjye; 
     Ibyo bisharira, 
     Uherak’ ubisimbuza 
     Ibyiza by'ijuru !

3 . Uwiteka wang' ibyaha pe 
     Yabanguy' inkoni;
     Ariko si jye yakubise, 
     Ahubwo ni Wowe !
     Iyo mibyimba, Krisito, 
     Ni yo yankijije !

4 . Haguy’ iy' nkundura, Yesu,
     Jye nkunamamw ubgo; 
     Iguhitiraho ku Giti, 
     Jye ntiyannyagira. 
     Yarakunshocaguriye; 
     None, hareyutse.

5 . So yakuy’ inkota ye yera,
     Aragusogota; 
     Umutima waw' uhinduka 
     Urwubati rwayo.
     Non' iyo nkot' iragimbye : 
     Nta cy' ikintwar' ubu !

6 . Jye napfanye nawe, Krisito, 
     Ubwo wamfiraga; 
     Urazuka, nzukana nawe,
     Uraz' unturamo. 
     Non' untungany' unyeze de, 
     Uzangez' i Wawe.

Gushimisha_84.songBody:
1 . N' iki cyankiz' ibyaha ? 
     N' amaraso yawe, Yesu.
     N'iki cyanyeza rwose ? 
     N' amaraso yawe, Yesu.

Ref:
Ayo maraso ye 
Ni y' amboneza rwose : 
Nta cyampa gukira, 
Nk' amaraso y’Umukiza.

2 . Nta kindi cyantunganya,
     Nk'amaraso  yawe, Yesu, 
     Nta kindi cyiru mfite, 
    Nk'amaraso yawe, Yesu.

3 . Nta cyantsembahw ibyaha,
     Nk'amaraso yawe, Yesu. 
     Nta byanjye byamboneza,
     Nk'amaraso yawe, Yesu.

4 . Ni Wowe niringira  
     N'amaraso yawe, Yesu, 
     Ni Wow' ump' amahoro, 
     N'amaraso yawe, Yesu.

5 . Nguhimbariza cyane 
     Amaraso yawe, Yesu. 
     Mwami, ndagushimira 
     Amaraso wamviriye.

Gushimisha_85.songBody:
1 . Amaraso y’Umucunguzi 
     Ni yo Soko yoz’ abanduye;  
     Ni yo yez’ abanyabyaha de, 
     Bakabonera rwose.

Ref:
Ndaguhimbariza, Mucunguzi, 
Imbabazi wangiriye, 
Ukanyoz’ ibyaha nakoze 
Mu maraso wavuye.

2 . Urya mwambuzi mwabambanywe 
     Ayarabutsw’ aranezerwa; 
     Nanjy’umwihebe mubi nka we, 
     Untabar’ umboneze !

3 . Mwami Yesu, Mwana w’intama, 
     Njya ngukundira Mucunguzi, 
     Amaraso yaw’ atunganye, 
     Ayo watuviriye.

4 . Nta n’ikindi kibasha nkayo 
     Kudutsembahw ibicumuro 
     No gucungura n'abemeye 
     Kwizer' Umucunguzi.

5 . Mperey’  aho nayaboneye,  
     Ava mu bikomere byawe, 
     Nogez’ urukundo wankunze. 
     Nzagushima ndinde mfa.

6 . Nd’ ino mw isi, birannanira 
     Kugushim’ uko bikwiriye. 
     Nyum’ uzamp’ urundi rurimi, 
     Njye ngusingiz’ iteka.

Gushimisha_86.songBody:
1 . Amaraso y'Umukiza 
     Yakuyiriye.
     Yayaviriy' abagome  
     N' abanyabyaha.

Ref:
Amaraso y' Umukiza 
Yakuviriye, 
Rek' akoze, rek' akweze, 
Agukiz' ubu!

2 . Amaraso y'Umukiza 
     Ni y' atunganya. 
     Rek’ atembe nk' umugezi, 
     Akugeremo.

3 . Nubw' ufit’ ibyaha byinshi,
     Kandi wanduye, 
     Amaraso y'Umukiza 
     Arakweza de.

4 . Amaraso ni yo masa 
     Yanyishyuriye 
     Irya myenda yanjye yose,
     Ndababarirwa.

5 . Ubu nshiz' amanga cyane 
     Kwinjir' Ahera, 
     Kuko yaduhay’ inzira 
     Mu maraso ye.

6 . Amaraso yo kunesha 
     Ni yo ndwanisha, 
     Nsind' ibyaha na Satani, 
     Nshobojwe na yo.

7 . Amaraso y' Umuhuza 
    Wacu n'Imana, 
    Ni y' ambonez' umutima ; 
    Ndayasingiza.

Gushimisha_87.songBody:
1 . Mbe, ntiwaturw' ibyo byaha byawe ?
     Usange Yesu ! Usange Yesu ! 
     Ntushaka no kubinesha rwose ? 
     Wizer' amaras' akiza !
Ref:
Amara...so...kokw’ ashobora 
Imiti...m' ishobewe... 
Amara...so...y’ Umucunguzi 
Ni yo mas' atuneshereza.

2 . Mbe, ntiwaturw' ubwigenge bwawe ? 
     Usange Yesu ! Usange Yesu ! 
     Akugir’ umugwaneza nka we !
     Wizer' amaras' akiza !

3 . Mbese, ntushaka no kwezwa dede ?
     Usange Yesu ! Usange Yesu ! 
     Emer' akoz’ ibyo byaha byose, 
     Wizer’ amaras’ akiza !

4 . Mbese, ntushaka kumuyoboka ? 
     Usange Yesu ! Usange Yesu ! 
     No kumusingiz’ iteka ryose ? 
     Wizer' amaras' akiza !

Gushimisha_88.songBody:
1 . Numva Yes’ anyemeza
     Ko mbuz’ imbaraga,
     Ngo Njye mmuseng’ iteka,
     Ntacyo nzamuburana.

Ref:
Yanyishyuriye
Ya myenda yose;
Yambabariy’ ibyaha,
Atuma nera de !

2 . Ni W’ ufit’ imbaraga
     Zihagije rwose
     Zo gukiz’ ababembe,
     Zigakiz’ umutima.

3 . Singir’ icyiza nkora :
     Nibesherejweho 
     N’ubuntu bwawe gusa,
     Nezwa n’amaraso de.

4 . Nasaga n’uwapfuye
     Mu mutima wanjye,
     Maze Yes’ aranzura,
     Kandi ni W’ unkomeza.

5 . Imbere ya ya Ntebe
     Nzahagararayo;
    Nzaba njyany’ iminyago
    Nyishyikirize Yesu.

Gushimisha_89.songBody:
1 . Yesu yaje kunshaka, 
     Ndi kure, nzimiye, 
     Anshyira ku bitugu 
     Nukw arantarura ! 
     Maz’ abamarayika be. 
     Baririmba basingiza.

Ref:
Umv' uko yankunze !
Umv' uko yanshatse ! 
Ibuk’ amaraso yanguze ! 
Mbur’uko mbivuga, numiwe !

2 . Yasanze nkomeretse,
     Nukw aranyomora 
     Ampumurira neza, 
     At' Ur’ uwanjye ko! 
     Sinari numv' ijwi nk' iryo, 
     Nduhuka mu mutim’ ubwo.

3 . Anyereka n' inkovu 
     Zo mu biganza bye, 
     N'izatewe n'amahwa 
     Zo mu ruhanga rwe. 
     Nibaz’ icyo yambonyemo, 
     Cyatumye yihangan' atyo!

4 . None, tuban' iteka; 
     Mu maso he hera 
     Hamvir’ umucyo mwinshi, 
     Uhor' unyobora;
     Amp' ibikwiriye byose; 
     Mbur' uko mbimushimira.

5 . Nduhutse mu mutima,
     Amp' amahoro ye. 
     Iteka ntegereje 
     Umuns' azazaho,
     Antahukan' Angez' i We, 
     Anguze n'amaraso ye.

Gushimisha_9.songBody:
1 . Yes’ ashimwe turamushim’ Umukiza;
 Hose bahimbaz’urukundo rwe!
 Mumushime, ngabo zo mw ijuru mwese,  
Muhimbaz’ ubuntu n’ubwiza bwe.                        
 Ukw’intama zirindwa n’umushumba,
 Ni ko Yes’arind’abana be,
 Mumushime, ngabo mw ijuru mwese:
 Mutangarir’ urwo rukundo rwe.

2 . Yes’ashimwe turamushim’ Umukiza.
 Kubw’ibyaha byacu yapfiriye.
 Yaje mw isi ngw atubohor’ adukize
 Aduh’ubugingo budashira.
 Yarabambw’abyemejwe n’urukundo.
 Abagome baramuhemura.
Yambikwa n’ikamba ry’amahwa mu mutwe.
Byos’abyemezwa n’urukundo rwe.

3 . Yes’ashimwe turamushim’ Umukiza.
 Yarazutse yicara mw ijuru.
 Non’ashimwa n’abari mw ijuru bose,
Bahimbarish’ ijwi rirerire.
None twese ntitugitiny’ urupfu:
 Nyagasani wararunesheje!
 Ahubwo rwahinduw’ irembo ry’ijuru
 No kuzuka kwawe, Mucunguzi.

Gushimisha_90.songBody:
1 . Nari kure y' Imana mu ngoyi, 
     Ntazi ko naboshywe; 
     Mbohorwa n' amaraso ya Yesu, 
     Ngez’ i Gologota.

Ref:
Shimwa Gologota !  Shimwa Gologota ! 
Ni hw ibyaha byanjye byankuriweho.
Shimwa Gologota !

2 . Yesu ni we wankuye mu mbohe !
     Njye mmuririmbira 
     Indirimbo nshya nziza yampaye; 
     Ngez' i Gologota !

3 . Yahamperey' Umwuka hw ingwate,
     Mmwakira nishimye. 
     Yemeye no kumba mu mutima, 
     Ngez'i Gologota.

4 . Ngwino, sang' Umukiza, mugenzi, 
     Nukw’ akubohore.
    Yesu yahaniw' abanyabyaha
     Rimw' i Gologota.

Ref:
Gend’ umusangeyo !  Gend' umusangeyo, 
Ahw’ ibyaha byanjye Nabyogerejwe ! 
Gend’ umusangeyo !

Gushimisha_91.songBody:
1 . Ai Gitare cy’Imana, 
     Reka nguhungireho.
     Kubw’ imbabazi zawe 
     Kera warammenewe; 
     Non’ubu nkwihishemo 
     Umujinya w'Imana.

2 . Amazi n’amaraso 
     Byo mu rubavu rwawe 
     Binkiz’uburyo bwombi, 
     Urubanza rw’ibyaha 
     N’imbaraga mbi zabyo: 
     Bye kuzansind’ukundi.

3 . Ibyo twakora byose,
     N’umwete wacu wose, 
     N’agahinda gasaze 
     N’amarir’ adashira, 
     Byose ntibyashobora
     Kudukurahw ibyaha.

4 . Ntacyo nzanye mu ntoke 
     Kibasha kunshungura, 
     Simfit’ icyo naguha :
     Nizey’ Umusaraba, 
     Uwo wamfiriyeho : 
     Ni wo njya niringira.

5 . Dore nambaye ubusa, 
     Ndakwinginze Unyambike;
     Sinabasha kwikiza;
     Ndagushakah’ ubuntu;
     Unyuhagir’ibyaha, 
     Mutabazi, ne gupfa.

Gushimisha_92.songBody:
1 . Ushimwe, Mana, Ko wampaye Yesu. 
     Akankirish’ urupfu rw' akanzukira.

Ref:
Haleluya, Nyirigira ! Haleluya ! Amen ! 
Haleluya, Nyirigira! Ngwin’ umpembure !

2 . Yankirishije wa Musaraba we, 
     Singicirwahw iteka kubw' amaraso.

3 . Nar' uwo gupfa, Yes' aransimbura. 
     Ibicumuro byanjye ni byo yazize !

4 . Ngwin' umpembure ! mmaramw' ubukonje !
     Ats' umurir' ubu mu mutima wanjye !

Gushimisha_93.songBody:
1 . Umunsi mwiza nibuka
     N’ uwo nakwemereyeho,
    Wamberey’ Umucunguzi.
    Njye nkwiz’ ibyawe nishimye!

Ref:
Nsingize,nsingize 
Yesu wanyogej’ ibyaha.
Anyigish’ iby’inzira ye,  
Ngo nsenge, nshime, nnezerwe !
Nsingize, nsingize 
Yesu wanyogej’ ibyaha.

2 . Warangije kundokora :
     Nd’ uwawe naw’ ur’ uwanjye ! 
     Iryo jwi ryawe ryinginga
     Nabura nte kuryitaho?

3 . Najyaga ndorogotana 
     Mu by’isi no mu ngeso mbi. 
     Nkugarutseho noneho :
     Sinzongera kuzimira.

4 . Iteka nzagukorera; 
     Iby’isi ndabizinutswe; 
     No mw’ipfa ryanjye, Mukiza, 
     Sinzarorera kwishima.

Gushimisha_94.songBody:
1 . Ubugingo bwanjye bwahinduts' ukundi, 
     Yes' ubwo yangeragamo; 
     Umucyo winjiye mu mutima wanjye 
     Yes’ ubwo yangeragamo.

Ref:
Kuv' ubwo yanyinjiyemo (x2) 
Yarannyuze; ndishima ndamuhimbaza, 
Kuv' ubwo yanyinjiyemo.

2 . Naretse kuzerera no kuzimira, 
     Kuv' ubwo yanyinjiyemo; 
     Kand' ibyaha byanjye byakuweho  rwose,
     Kuv’ ubwo yanyinjiyemo.

3 . Noneho, mfit' ibyiringiro, nizeye 
     Yes' uwo wanyinjiyemo; 
     Nshyizw’ imbere mu nzira, sinshidikanya 
     Yes' uwo wanyinjiyemo.

4 . Sinzatinya kunyura mu rupfu hamwe 
     Na Yesu wanyinjiyemo; 
     Kuko mbon' umurwa wer' urimbishijwe 
     Wa Yesu wanyinjiyemo.

5 . Nzi ko nzajya kubana kur' uwo murwa 
     Na Yesu wanyinjiyemo; 
     Ni cyo kizatuma njya ndirimba nshima 
     Yes' uwo wanyinjiyemo.

Gushimisha_95.songBody:
1 . Ibyaha byanjye, Yesu
     Yarabyikoreye,
     W' atigeze gukora 
     Icyaha na kimwe;
     Ndamwegera, ndasenga,  
     Nd' umunyabyaha pe,  
     Nizer' ijambo ry' ati : 
     Urababariwe !

2 . Maz' ibindushya byose 
     Ndabimukorera. 
     Nta wund' utari Yesu 
     Wabyihanganira.
     Ndamwegera, njy' ahw ari, 
     Ndushye, ntentebutse, 
     Ndagenda, mpaw' intege, 
     Nsindishirijwe pe !

3 . Nukw amaganya yanjye,
     Nyakurwaho na We, 
     Nduhukira muri We, 
     Amp' amahoro ye.
     Imanuweli Kristo,  
     Zina rihebuje ! 
     Rimbera nk' imibavu, 
     Ihumura neza.

4 . Icyampa nkaba nka We,
     Akamp' ineza ye, 
     N'imbabazi n'ubuntu 
     N'ubugwaneza bye.
     Yes' uzampe gutura 
     I wawe mw ijuru, 
      Nkajya ngusingizanya 
      N'abamarayika.

Gushimisha_96.songBody:
1 . Iby' Iman' ijy' inkorera 
     Bikorwa neza byose; 
     Inam' ijy' ingira zose 
     Nzishima nnezerewe.
     Ni yo Mana; ni Y' imenya 
     Kundind' umunsi mubi : 
     Ni ko kuyihereza.

2 . Iby' Iman' ijy' inkorera 
     Bikorwa neza byose; 
     Inzira nziz' innyuzamo 
     N' iy'umurava wayo.
     Yankirije muri Yesu, 
     Ingirira n'ubuntu; 
     Nta cyo yanyima rwose.

3 . Iby' Iman' ijy' inkorera 
     Bikorwa neza byose; 
     Nagir' ishavu n'ibyago 
     Binguye mu mutima.
     Ntibinyica; nsind' ibibi, 
     Kukw’ ijy' impumuriza : 
     Nta kindi niringira.

4 . Iby' Iman' ijy' inkorera 
     Bikorwa neza byose; 
     Urupf’ ubwo ruzantera, 
     Rukazankura mw isi, 
     Sinzatinya; nzakomera, 
     Kukw Uwiteka anjyana 
     Mu bugingo budapfa.

Gushimisha_98.songBody:
1.  Ndumva k' umutim' ukeye : 
     Birannejeje rwose ! 
     Ndakijijwe, ndakijijwe : 
     N' umunezero cyane ! 
     Ibyaha byanjye byogejwe 
     N'amaraso ya Yesu; 
     Agahinda kamvuyemo : 
     Sinkir' umunyabyago.

2 . Nishimiye, nishimiye 
     Ko ntegekwa na Yesu. 
     Murokozi, Murokozi, 
     Nemeye kub' uwawe. 
     Wanyikuriye mu byaha,
     Wowe, Ntwari y'Imana; 
     Wandokorey' umutima 
      Kand' umpaye kubaho.

3 . Waj' unshakan' urukundo,
     Ubwo nari nzimiye. 
     Wankuye mu byaha byanjye,
     Unyigirir' uwawe. 
     Mpereye none n'iteka, 
     Ni Wowe nziringira; 
     Kubaho kwanjye kurindwe 
     N'amaboko ya Yesu.

4 . Ndakuririmbira, Mwami;
     Namwe ndababwiriza
     Ibyo Yesu yankoreye:
     Birantangaza rwose.
     Kuko yemeye kumfira, 
     Akamber' igitambo, 
     Umutima wanjye wose 
     N' uw'Uwawucunguye.

Gushimisha_99.songBody:
1 . Unkunda n’ Umwana w'Imana;
     Yaje mw isi kunshungura. 
     Umutima wanjy' utangazwa 
     N'urwo rukundo rwa Yesu.
     Unkunda ni Yesu; ( x 2)
     Yamfiriy’ ibyaha byanjye : 
     Unkunda ni Yesu

2 . Amaraso yawe, Mukiza,
     Ankurahw ibyaha byanjye.
     Nahinduts' uwatsinz’ urupfu
     Kubw' izo mbabazi zawe.
     Unkunda ni Yesu (x 2)
     Wanzukiye ngw ambesheho: 
     Unkunda ni Yesu.

3 . Uzi kubaho kwanjye kose;
     Unshorer' iminsi yose.
     N' umucyo waw' ummurikira,
     Ukandindish' urukundo.
     Unkunda ni Yesu; (x 2)
     Yankujije mu by' Imana: 
     Unkunda ni Yesu.

4 . Nzi ko Yes’ atajy' ahinduka,
     No gukiz' aracyakiza.
     Uk' uri kose, munyabyaha, 
     Mwizer' ukizwe nonaha !
     Ukundwa na Yesu : (x 2)
     Yapfiriy' ibyaha byawe;  
     Ukundwa na Yesu !

Wokovu_1.songBody:
1. E Yesu Mshindaji wa Golgotha, twakusifu!
Bendera ya mapenzi ni alama ya kushinda.
Ulichukuwa dhambi zetu juu ya msalaba wako.
Twakuhimidi, Bwana na Mfalme! Haleluya!

2. Twashinda na zaidi ya kushinda kati' yote.
Kwa damu yako, Yesu, na watuinua moyo.
Katika vita na 'jaribu twaipeleka kwa furaha
Bendera yako nzuri ya kushinda kati' vita.

3. Mbinguni Mkombozi ni Mkuu mwenye sifa.
Aliondoa dhambi kwa kutufilia wote.
Mwana Kondoo wake Mungu, Umestahili kupokea
Uweza, Utukufu na Heshima. Haleluya!

Lewi Pethrus, 1913

Wokovu_10.songBody:
1. Damu yako yenye baraka inayotuosha
 makosa, ilimwagwa msalabani, Bwana Yesu,
 ulipokufa. Nastahili 'pata hukumu, na 
siwezi mimi kujiosha. Unioshe katika damu,
 nipate kuwa safi kabisa!

Safi, safi kweli, safi, safi kweli! 
Unioshe katika damu, nipate kuwa 
safi kabisa! 
 
2. Yesu, ulivikwa miiba, kuangikwa juu ya
 mti. Ulivumilia mateso, maumivu na maje
raha. Ninataka kijito hicho, n'ende na nika
safishwe sana! Unioshe katika damu, nipate
 kuwa safi kabisa. 
 
3. Baba, kweli nina makosa,moyo wangu wa
udhaifu;mimi mwenye dhambi rohoni nitao
na wapi Mwokozi? Yesu, kwako msalabani
naja, ninakuamini sasa. Unioshe katika damu,
nipate kuwa safi kabisa!
 
 
 
4. Bwana, nimefika kalibu, unilinde kwako
milele! Ufunguwe kila kikamba ,unijaze moyo
mwenyewe!Na kalibu ya msalaba nitakaa
hata kufa kwangu.Unioshe katika damu,
nipate kuwa safi kabisa 
 
 
    E.R. Latta, 1780

Wokovu_100.songBody:
1. Lo! Bendera inatwekwa, yatutangulia!
 Tusione hofu, wenzi, twende kwa kushinda!

Bwana Yesu atakuja, tuilinde ngome!
 Kwa uwezo wake Yesu tutashinda 
yote.

2. Ibilisi azunguka, akitutafuta; anataka 
tuanguke, tufe, tupotee.

3. Vita kubwa, vita kali inaendelea, tuwe watu
 wa 'hodari! Twende, tutashinda!

4. Basi, kwa bendera yake tunashikamana. 
Atutie nguvu yake hata kuja kwake!

Wokovu_101.songBody:
1. E' mlinzi, twauliza: Yesu atakuja 
lini? Asubuhi ya sayuni ni karibu?
 Tuambie! Msafiri, yainue macho yako,
 angalia! Asubuhi ni karibu, usimame,
usimame!

2. Siku heri ya sabato ya milele ni karibu, na
 dalili yake Yesu hapo itaonekana. Na rohoni
 tunaona nchi nzuri ya ahadi. Asubuhi ni karibu,
 na ahadi zatimia.

3. Katika Yerusalemu, mji mpya wa mbinguni,
 Yesu atatumiliki kwa upendo na amani. 
 Baragumu italia, nasi tutaisikia. Yesu ni karibu
 sana kutukaribisha kwake.

Sidney S. Brewer

Wokovu_102.songBody:
1. Sayuni, ulaki Bwanako, umshangilie
 Mfalme! Jipambe kwa Bwana arusi, 
ujitengeneze tayari!

Furahi, furahi! Umshangilie Bwanako! 
Furahi, furahi! Umsujudie Mfalme!

2. Kutoka 'tukufu wa Baba na kiti cha enzi
 mbinguni Mwokozi alitufikia kulazwa mtoto
 horini.

3. Akawa dhabihu kamili, akasulibiwa Golgotha,
 akafa kwa 'ajili ya wote, tupewe wokovu 
wa Mungu.

4. Alitushindia mauti na kumharibu shetani;
 akaufunua uzima, tupate kuishi milele.

5. Afika kwa wenye huzuni kuwapa faraja na 
heri, na atamiliki milele, Mfalme wa pendo
 na haki.

Erik Nyström, 1893

Wokovu_103.songBody:
1. Siku kubwa ya mashangilio inatufikia 
tena. Usikie neno hili zuri: Yesu
 amefika kwetu!

Imba duniani pote pia, imba wote 
wasikie! Sifa zina Mungu wetu juu, 
na amani kwetu!

2. Utajiri, fedha na dhahabu sina ya kukuletea,
 ilakini roho yangu tupu nina'kutolea, 
yesu.

3. Sisi sote tumsifu Mungu kwa upendo wake
 kwetu! Alitutumia Mkombozi, Mwana wake 
Yesu Kristo.

Lewi Pethrus, 1916

Wokovu_104.songBody:
1. Lo! Horini Bethlehemu, ndani 'nyumba
 ya ng'ombe, Bwana Yesu alilala 
usingizi wa kitoto. Nyota zilizo mbinguni 
kimya ziliangazia Bwana Yesu, mtulivu, juu
ya ulalo wake.

2. Wachungaji wa kondoo walikuja kumwabudu,
 na majusi walifika wakamtolea tunu.
 Mungu mwenye macho yanayo tazama nchi 
yote, alivunja makusudi ya kuua ya adui.

3. Nakupenda, Bwana Yesu, kwani unaufaamu 
udhaifu wa mtoto, hali yake ya kitoto.
 Nawe sasa unaweza kunisaidia sana kila saa
 ya hatari, majaribu na mashaka.

4. Nakuomba, Bwana Yesu, unilinde njia
 yote, uwe mwenzi wangu mwema kila saa na 
dakika! Usichoke nami kamwe, nami sitaona 
hofu; Yesu unikumbatie siku zote na milele!

Wokovu_105.songBody:
1. Wakati wa Noeli nafika kwenye hori,
:/: alipolala Yesu, maskini, mtulivu. :/:

2. Mwokozi wangu mwema, kwa pendo ulifika,
:/: nitoke dhambi zangu, nipate kuwa wako:/:

3. Nakuhitaji, Yesu, rafiki wa watoto.
:/:Sitaki kuumiza kwa dhambi wewe tena. :/:

4. Nitashukuru Yesu milele na milele.
:/: maana alifika kutuokoa sisi. :/:

A. Burckhardt.

Wokovu_106.songBody:
1. Tuimbe asubuhi hii juu ya siku 
manabii walioitabiri! Ni siku kubwa, siku
 nzuri, upendo umedhihirika, upendo wake Mungu.
 Sisi sote tufurahi, tumwimbie
na kusifu Yesu, Mwokozi wetu!

2. Yu sura yake Mungu Baba, lakini mtu, ili
 sisi tupate kumjua. Yuaja na amani kwetu,
 Kuwatafuta wapotevu na kuwaponya wote.
 Sisi sote tuungane naye Yesu na tupate pendo 
na uzima wake!

3. Ataliona sikitiko, na kufahamu shida yetu
 asaidie sisi! Atafundisha haki kweli, kweli,
 Nakutufahamisha pendo katika kufa kwake, sisi sote 
tuokoke, na tufufuliwe naye, mbingu zitufunguliwe!

J.O. William, 1819

Wokovu_107.songBody:
1. Alipoteswa yesu peke' katika 
Gethsemane,akakinywea kwa upendo kikombe
 cha uchungu.

Mwokozi wangu alichukua yote,
 uzima wake ali'toa; kutuokoa 
alitufilia.

2. Akasimama peke yake kuchekwa na
 kupigwa, uchwani akatiwa taji iliyo ya
 miiba.

3. Akachukua msalaba njiani kwa Golgotha,
 na akajeruhiwa sana kwa'jili yetu sisi.

4. Na sasa, wewe mwenye dhambi, tazama
 pendo lake! Neema kubwa yakungoja; uache
 dhambi zako!

Wokovu_108.songBody:
1. Mwana kondo' wa Mungu, ali'filia sisi juu ya
msalaba kati' macheko mengi. Umeondoa dhambi
na umeshinda kufa. Utupa raha, Yesu!

N. Decius, avant 1529

Wokovu_109.songBody:
1. Yesu, unionye tena msalaba wako! 
Huo ni kisima safi chenye kusafisha.

Msalaba wako, Yesu, nausifu sana.
 Yesu, unilinde huko hata nikuone!

2. Huko niliona kwanza ne'ma yako kubwa,
 Nuru ikafika kwangu 'toka msalaba.

3. Yesu, unilinde huko, unifaamishe jinsi 
ulivyochukua dhambi zangu zote!

4. Unilinde siku zote penye msalaba,
 nikuone, nikupende, sasa na milele!

Fanny Crosby, 1968

Wokovu_11.songBody:
1. Ikiwa wananiuliza msingi wa uzima, Je,
 twahitaji kuongeza kwa kazi yake
 Yesu? Kwa uhodari nitajibu: Msingi wangu
 ni wa nguvu, ni damu yake Yesu Kristo, inani
 tosha sana. 
 
2. U mwamba wa zamani sana, daima utadu
mu. Na hata siku nitakufa, nitautegemea.
 Nitakapoondoka huku, nitamsifu mwana
 kondoo, na damu ya Mwokozi wangu,
 funguo la mbinguni.  
 
      Fredrik Engelke

Wokovu_110.songBody:
1. Mwamba uliopasuka, ndani yako 
nijifiche! Maji yale, damu ile itokayo
 mbavu zako, iwe dawa ya kuponya roho 
yangu na ubaya!

2. Kazi za mikono yangu, haziwezi kukomboa. 
Hata ningelia sana na kutenda kazi nyingi,
 singeweza kuokoka, peke yako u Mwokozi.

3. Ndani yangu sina kitu, naushika msalaba.
 Uchi mimi, univike! Sina nguvu, 'nichukue! 
Ni mchafu, unioshe! Wewe u Mwokozi wangu.

4. Kwa maisha yangu yote hata nitatoa roho,
 hata saa ya kuitwa mbele ya Mfalme wangu,
 mwambauliopasuka, nijifiche ndani yako!

A.M. Toplady, 1776

Wokovu_111.songBody:
1. E' Yesu, sitausahau uchungu wako
 kubwa, ulipoteswa Gethsemane 
usiku peke yako.

Mateso uliyoyaona, uchungu na
 machozi, Usiku ule Gethsemane,
 Siyasahau kamwe.

2. Naona wewe Gethsemane, ulivyoteswa
 huko kwa 'jili ya makosa yangu, na kuitoa
 damu.

3. Huzuni nyingi uliona katika teso lako
 ulipoachwa peke yako na wanafunzi wako.

4. Na ukiona roho yangu haina pendo
 kwako, uniongoze Gethsemane, nione teso 
lako!

Edward P. Hammond

Wokovu_112.songBody:
1. Ulinde roho na nafsi yangu chini ya 
damu, chini ya damu! Makosa, hofu na
 shaka ziwe chini ya damu yako!

Chini ya damu yako, Yesu, ndani ya 
mto huo safi, unilinde kwa siku zote,
 chini ya damu yako!

2. Makimbilio ya mwenye dhambi, chini ya 
damu, chini ya damu, ni ukombozi kwa watu
 wote, chini ya damu yako!

3. Nijaze nguvu na pendo lako chini ya damu,
 chini ya damu, nipate tena kutii wewe chini ya
 damu yako!

4. Amani kubwa moyoni mwangu chini ya
 damu, chini ya damu, karama zako zanipa 
raha, chini ya damu yako.

5. Nijazwe Roho Mtakatifu chini ya damu,
 chini ya damu, daima niwe na moyo safi, chini
 ya damuyako.

Inconnu

Wokovu_113.songBody:
1. Msalabani Mwokozi wangu alijitoa 
kuniokoa, na damu yake ilimwagika 
kwa'jili yangu, kunikomboa.

E' Golgotha, e' Golgotha, alipoteswa
 Bwana Yesu! E' Golgotha, e' Golgotha,
 nilipopata raha kweli!

2. Na nchi ile ilitetema, mbinguni jua
 likafunikwa wakati Yesu alipokufa, akichukua
 hatia yangu.

3. Likapasuka pazia lote, kwa hiyo neno 
limetimizwa. Naona njia ya mbingu wazi:
 Nikutakaswa kwa damu yake.

4. Mwokozi wangu, upendo gani: Uliutoa 
uzima wako! Kunikomboa ulisikia mateso yote 
ya msalaba.

William Darwood, 1886

Wokovu_114.songBody:
1. Imba habari njema: Mungu apenda
 wote! Uihubiri damu ituponyayo roho!
 Taja karama kubwa: Mwana alitujia,
 pasha habari hiyo kwa kila mtu!

Yesu msalabani alifilia wote, 
alitupatanisha na Mungu, Baba
 yetu. Pazia la hekalu likapasuka
 huko, njia imefunguka kwa wewe,
nami!

2. Uwaimbie wenye shida na sikitiko na wapigao
 vita katika majaribu! Imba katika miji,
 pasha habari njema: Yesu awatafuta kwa 
pendo kubwa!

3. Imba katika giza, lisipofika jua, uwaimbie
 wote, watu wa kila bali! Imba mapema sana,
 na adhuhuri pia, sifu Mwokozi hata usiku
 waja!

Elsa Eklund, 1918?

Wokovu_115.songBody:
1. Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa, pasha
 habari hiyo! Pendo la Mungu ni 
kubwa, mwanzo wa nyimbo zote. Malaika 
waliimba, wachunga wakasikia. Tunafurahi
 kujua: Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa.

Pendo kuu, pendo kuu, pendo kuu,
 pendo la Mungu ni kubwa!

2. Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa kwako uliye
 mbali. Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa, anakuhurumia. 
Ukiendee kisima kinachotoka Golgotha, utaupata
 uzima katika pendo la Mungu.

3. Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa, latufikisha 
mbingu. Pendo la Mungu ni kubwa, tutafurahi
 sana! Huko hakuna jaribu, wala ugonjwa na
 kufa. Tumeokoka sababu pendo la Mungu ni
 kubwa.

J.M. Driver, 1882 ?

Wokovu_116.songBody:
1. Tuimbie, tumsifu Yesu ju'ya msalaba!
 Aliteswa na akafa, yote kwa ajili 
yetu. Akashinda, 'kafufuka, ni Mwokozi
 'kamilifu.

2. Yesu alitukomboa, na akawa haki yetu.
Dhambi aliziondoa, akatupa tumaini:
Tutarithi utukufu, nuru, raha na uheri.

3. Yesu alipofufuka akatushindia kufa, 
akapewa nguvu zote duniani na mbinguni. Sisi 
sote tumepona kwa kupigwa kwake Yesu.

4. Tushukuru Mungu Baba kwa ajili ya upendo!
Tumsifu Yesu Kristo kwa neema yake kubwa!
Tumfungulie moyo kwake Roho 'takatifu!

Venatius Fortanus, env. 600

Wokovu_117.songBody:
1. Nilipofika Golgotha nikaiona huko 
neema kubwa kama mto, neema ya ajabu.

Neema ya Golgotha ni kama bahari 
kubwa, ne'ma tele na ya milele, 
ne'ma ya kutosha!

2. Nilipofika moyo wangu ulilemewa sana,
 sikufaamu bado vema neema yake kubwa.

3. Nilipoona kwamba Yesu alichukua dhambi,
 neema ikadhihirika, na moyo ukapona.

4. Mbinguni nitakapofika, furaha itakuwa
 kuimba juu ya neema milele na milele.

E.O. Excell, 1905

Wokovu_118.songBody:
1. Ni Mwokozi mzuri ninaye, alikufa
 kunikomboa. Alitoa uzima wake kwa 
ajili ya watu wote.

Alikufa msalabani, alikufa msalabani.
 Kwa ajili ya dhambi zangu zote alikufa 
msalabani.

2. Aliacha makao juu, akafika ulimwenguni;
 aliteswa kwa'jili yangu na kunifungulia
 mbingu.

3. Dhambi zangu ali'chukua, kujitwika hukumu
 yangu, na alijeruhiwa ili aniponye na
 'nipa raha.

4. Bwana Yesu alifufuka, akarudi mbinguni
 kwake; na yuaja upesi tena achukue walio 
wake.

F.A. Graves

Wokovu_119.songBody:
1. Tuimbie msalaba wa Mwokozi, damu 
yake inatusafisha sana! Tunaweza kuwa
 huru, kwani Yesu alikufa ili ku'ondoa
 dhambi.

Haleluya, anipenda! Haleluya nafurahi!
Haleluya, siku moja nitamwona Yesu!

2. Twafurahi kwa neema yake kubwa, alikuja 
ili tuwe na uzima. Kama njia ni nyembamba
 duniani, Yesu atatupa nguvu na 'hodari.

3. Tuuimbe moto ule 'takatifu uli'tupwa na
 Mwokozi duniani! Tuvipige vita vilivyo vizuri,
 nasi tutapewa taji ya uzima!

Wokovu_12.songBody:
1. Kwa badala yangu kweli Yesu alitoa
 damu. Mimi huru na ni heri, Bwana
 Yesu asifiwe. 
 
Yesu alinikomboa, lakini si kwa dha
habu na mali ya dunia; bali damu ya
 Mwana ni malipo kwa ajili yangu,
 haleluya! 
 
2. Tu'inue msalaba, hata wote wataona
 Mwana wake Mungu, hapo alitoa damu yake! 
 
3. Dia kubwa, Yesu Kristo! Wingi sana wa
 upendo: Yesu aliacha mbingu, alitufilia sote. 
 
4. Sitaweza kufahamu bei ya wokovu wangu,
 bali ninajua sana: Yesu alinikomboa. 
 
      C.Austin Milles

Wokovu_120.songBody:
1. Msalabani nilimwona Yesu, Mwokozi 
wangu aliyeniponya; rohoni mwangu giza ikatoka,
ninafuata Yesu sasa.

Nimeokoka kutoka dhambi, na siku zote
ninaimba kwa furaha. Ni vita 
kali kushinda yote, lakini Yesu yu
 karibu.

2. Mwokozi wangu ananipa nguvu, nikiuona 
udhaifu huku. Na vita yote itakapokwisha,
 nitaipata raha kwake.

3. Mwokozi wangu, ninakufuata, furaha yako
inanituliza. Na siku moja utakuja tena 
kunichukua huko kwako.

Wokovu_121.songBody:
1. Yesu ni furaha yangu, amejaa pendo
 kweli. Anaweza kusimika kila mwenye 
udhaifu. Ananipa ujasiri, nguvu, raha na 
faraja. Hata nikionja kufa, Yesu ni mchunga
 wangu.

2. Nimefungwa na Mwokozi kwa kifungu cha 
upendo, hata kufa hakuwezi kunitenga naye
 Yesu. Mimi wake siku zote, ninataka kumtii.
 Kwa neema nimepona, nisitumikie dhambi.

3. Kwa mikono ya upendo ninakumbatiwa 
naye, sitaweza kutafsiri pendo lake kubwa
 kwangu. Napokea nguvu yake, yanijaza moyo
 wangu. Yesu ananiongoza katika safari
 yangu.

Torvald Löwe

Wokovu_122.songBody:
1. Mwokozi kamili ni Yesu pekee, 
Mwokozi mzuri halisi. Katika wokovu
 wa Mungu mkuu ninalindwa naye kabisa.

Katika wokovu nalindwa salama,
 naishi kwa maji ya 'hai. Upendo wa
 Mungu unanizunguuka :/: na kanihifadhi
 daima. :/:

2. Baraka ya mbingu inanijaliza kwa Roho ya
 utakatifu. Nasifu Mwokozi katika furaha, 
wokovu umenifikia.

3. Mwokozi mzuri ni Yesu pekee, aniondoaye
 mizigo. Njiani ananiongoza vizuri, anipa na
 nguvu ya mwendo.

4. Nitakapomwona Mwokozi mbinguni baada
 ya shida za huku, Nitamhimidi na kumshukuru
 Bwana ninayempenda.

Fanny J. Crosby, 1903

Wokovu_123.songBody:
1. Mwokozi mzuri ninaye, zamani
 sikumfahamu, na sasa ninamhubiri, 
wengine wapate kuona.

Wote watamwona, wote watamwona
Mwokozi mzuri ninaye; Lo! Wote
watamwona.

2. Shetani akinizuia nisimfuate Mwokozi,
 najua Bwanangu hodari hutaka kunisaidia.

3. Apita wo wote kwa wema, mfano 'tukufu
 wa Baba, lakini anitaja ndugu, niliye maskini 
kabisa.

4. Natoa maisha na pendo kwa Yesu aliyenipenda.
Katika ishara za Mungu upendo wapita yo yote.

Carrie E. Breek, 1902

Wokovu_124.songBody:
1. Naona pendo kubwa mno, latoka
 kwa Mwokozi wangu, ni tele kama
 maji mengi yatembeayo baharini. Lanitolea 
tumaini yakwamba nitatiwa nguvu; na 
niwe mhodari tena kwa pendo kubwa la
 Mwokozi!

Haleluya! Ni pendo kubwa linalotoka
 moyo wako! E' Mungu wangu nakuomba:
 Nijaze pendo lako tele!

2. Na pendo hilo kubwa mno huyaondoa majivuno, 
na kunifunza haki kweli, uongo wote niuvue!
 Hunituliza moyo wangu, huruma nayo hunitia.
 Na sote tuwe na umoja katika pendo la Mwokozi.

3. Nijazwe pendo hilo kubwa, linibidishe siku
 zote! Rononi niwe na juhudi nitumikie Bwana 
Yesu! ... Hazina yako 'nipeleke kwa watu 
waliopotea, wafahamishwe pendo kubwa ulilo nalo,
 Mungu wangu

A. Playle, 1899

Wokovu_125.songBody:
1. Haleluya! Nafurahi, ninaimba kila 
siku sifa zake Mungu wangu, aliyeniweka 
huru. Haleluya! Bwana Yesu aliniokoa 
kweli! Haleluya! Mimi wake, yeye ni Mwokozi
 wangu!

2. Heri! Nilieokoka kwa neema yake
 kubwa ninataka kumsifu Mungu na wokovu
 wake. Wakinung'unika wote, sitawafuata
 wao; nitasifu Mungu wangu siku zote na
 milele.

3. Kama ndege waimbavyo asubuhi bustanini, 
Na sauti ya mawingu ivumavyo baharini, 
hivyo nitamshukuru Bwana wangu kwa furaha. 
Roho yangu itaimba: Haleluya! Sifu Mungu!

4. Haleluya! Furahini mbele yake Mungu 
wetu! Na watakatifu wote, mwimbieni jina
 lake! Malaika wote pia, msifuni Bwana
 Mungu! Mbingu zote zitajibu: Haleluya,
 Haleluya!

Einar Karlsson, 1917

Wokovu_126.songBody:
1. E' Mtakatifu, Mungu wa majeshi, leo
 asubuhi tunaimba mbele yako! E' Mtakatifu,
 Mungu wa rehema, Bwana Mwenyezi, tunakuabudu!
