5.Furaha gani kukuona kati yetu Bwana, 
ni kama nyumba ilio na mwamba, furaha 
gani kukuona ndani yetu Bwana, ni 
furaha na raha zaidi.

umuco_163.songBody:
1.Ewe mugenzi wanje ni witonde, kuko 
hari inzira imwe gusa, inzira ishikana mu 
Bwami bw’Imana, ni yo nzira y’agakiza 
kacu.

Benshi barazimagirika, kuko 
badahagaze neza, wirinde kandi 
wiyubare, wisuzume mu ngendo zawe 
ubone kuzoshika amahoro.

2.Ewe mugenzi wanje niwitonde, kuko 
iyo nzira ipfunganye, ibonwa n’amaso 
y’inkukuma, abayiciyemwo n’ababona.

3.Iyo nzira irimwo amahwa, abatinya ayo 
mahwa bose, ntibashobora gukomeza iyo 
nzira, bifatira inzira zoroshe.

4.Kenshi hariho benshi bavuga yuko, 
bahagaze mu nzira y’agakiza, ariko 
bahagaze nabi, bahagaze iruhande rw’iyo 
nzira.

5.Hariho vyinshi mw’isi bikurura, hariho 
vyinshi mw’isi bihamagara, ntukagire 
imitima ibiri, agakiza ni kamwe gusa.

umuco_164.songBody:
1.Mwene Data mukundwa, we 
wahamagawe n’Uhoraho, Imana 
y’Aburahamu, ni yo yagusezeraniye, 
isezerano ry’intahava Izobana nawe 
hose.

Ntiwibagir’ iyagusezeraniye, ntiwibagire 
n’isezerano ryawe ; Uhoraho ari kumwe 
nawe hose, inzira z’Uhoraho n’igihome 
gikingira umugororotsi.

2.Mwene Data mukundwa, 
wasezeranijwe n’Uhoraho, Imana 
y’Aburahamu, yuk’ uzoyikorera hose, 
n’isezerano ry’intahava, iri kumwe nawe 
hose.

3.Mwene Data mukundwa, ko 
wahamagawe n’Uhoraho, Imana 
y’Aburahamu, none bite ga mwene 
Data ? Izere iyasezeranye Iri kumwe 
nawe hose.

4.Ibuk’ isezerano ryawe, ibuka 
iyasezeranye nawe, ibuk’ uko 
wanezerejwe, n’isezerano ry’Uhoraho, 
none bite ga mwene Data, izere 
iyaseranye.

5.Ntubabazwe mwene Data, n’ivyo 
ucamwo mu rugendo, ivyo vyose
n’ibidusunikira kw’isezerano ry’Uhoraho, 
izer’ ufatanye n’ukwihangana, izobana 
nawe hose.

umuco_165.songBody:
1.Mur’iyi si har’ico mpahamiye, 
kindutira ibindi vyose ; mur’iyi si 
har’ico nifuza rwose : N’ukugira 
umugabane wanje ./.N'ugukorera Imana 
yanje(Umwami wanje)./.

N’ikihe kiruta vyose k’umukristo 
nyakuri ? N'ukubaho nkuko Kristo 
yabayeho, n’ukuvuga nkuko Kristo 
yavuze, n’ugukora nkuko Kristo yakoze.

2.Hari imigabane ibiri imbere yanje 
ntabony’ uwa mbere sinshobora, gushikira 
n’uwugira kabiri, n’ugukorera Imana 
nkiriho ./.N’ugukor’ ic’Imana imbwiye 
gukora./.

3.Uwa mbere n’ugukor’ ico ntegerezwa, 
uwa kabiri n’igitsibo mbikiwe ; 
none nobishikira nte Mana yanje ? 
Ntashobojwe nawe bwirukiro ./.Abazima 
ni bo bagukorera./.

4.Ntegerezwa kugukorera mur’iyi si, 
ntegerezwa kuba icabona cawe, 
ntegerezwa kugushingir’ intahe,
 mu mvura mu makuba no mu 
bimoko ./.Abazima ni bo bagukorera./.

5.Ndagukunda n’umutima wanje 
wose, ndakunda n’igikorwa cawe, 
nta wundi mfise noganyira atari wewe, 
shir’ umuryango wuguruye imbere 
yanje ./.Maz’ unshoboze mbone 
kugukorera./.

umuco_166.songBody:
1.Ujana wangu, ujana wangu ninaumpa 
Bwana Yesu, ninamjipa katika vyote, 
katika siku za maisha yangu ./.Yesu 
zihirisha nguvu zako, ndani yangu ewe 
Bwana wangu./.

Siku zangu za kale, nilimtumikia shetani, 
katika ujana wangu, lakini ulikufa bure, 
lakini siku zangu za sasa, nitamtumikia 
Bwana wangu, siku za maisha yangu 
yote ./.Nitamtumikia Bwana wangu./.

2.Ujana wangu ujana wangu, ninaumpa 
Bwana Yesu ili awutawale ujana wangu, 
katika siku za maisha yangu ./.Yesu 
zihirisha nguvu zako, ndani yangu ewe 
Bwana wangu./.

3.Ujana wangu ujana wangu,  wakale 
ulikufa bure sana lakini ujana wangu 
wa sasa, ni wa katika Bwana Yesu 
Kristo ./.Ninawaza kazi yake Bwana kuliko 
raha ya duniani./.

4.Ujana wangu ujana wangu, si wa
 yule muovu tena, bali ni wa Kristo 
Yesu aliniwokowa akanifilia ./.Habari za 
mbinguni zimo rohoni mimi ni wa Yesu 
siku zote./.

umuco_167.songBody:
1.Uhoraho yarampamagaye, amboha 
n’imigozi y’urukundo ; Uhoraho 
yarampamagaye, mvuka mu Bwami 
bwiwe bw’urukundo.

Mpagaze, ku ruhande rw’Uhoraho, 
nah’isi yose yonyanka, navutse mu 
bundi Bwami busha, nd’igikoresho 
c’Uhoraho, sinshobora guceceka ./.Kuko 
nd’umwana w’Uhoraho./.

2.Mbeg’ imigozi numva imboshe 
ingobera kumushingira intahe, ingobera 
kumukorera mu rukundo, ariko inkomezi n'iz’Uhoraho.

3.Yaramapamagaye kand’aramboha, 
nanje ndemera guca ah' ancisha 
 niteze gukora ico we ambwiye, niteze kuja 
aho azonjana.

4.Yankuye mu ba kure bo mw’isi, anzana 
nk’intama yazimiye ; ambohera mu rugo 
rwiwe rwera, ankoresha ico we ashaka.

5.Yemwe bana b’Imana Ihoraho,
 twaboshwe n’umugozi w’urukundo ; 
igikorwa nic’Uhoraho Imana, twizere 
amasezerano yiwe.

umuco_168.songBody:
1.Siku izi turizo nazo, ni siku zicafu 
sana, maasi ni mengi sana, jaribu ni 
nyingi sana ./.Jameni tutafanyaje tusipo 
mkaribia Bwana./.

Bwana Yesu alisema eti : siku izo za 
mwisho, patakua tetemeko na vita, 
vita za kiroho na za kimwili, na upendo 
wa wengi utapowa, heri watavumiliyao 
mpaka mwisho.

2.Siku izi tulizo nazo, ni siku zicafu sana, 
jaribu ni nyingi sana, shetani anatumika 
sana ./.Katika hali ya kujificha katika hali 
ya kisiri./.

3.Kuna wafalme wawili : Yesu na Shetani.
Yesu anatumika tena, katika hali ya 
kisiri ./.shetani naye anatumika katika hali 
(hiyo) ya kisiri./.

4.Vitu hivi vigumu sana, utajuaje shetani 
na Yesu, utajuaje Shetani, usipomjua Yesu 
Kristo ? ./.Utajuaje Yesu Kristo usipomjua shetani ?./.

5.Tumuombe Bwana Mungu, atushindie 
uovu huyo, tumuombe Bwana Yesu, 
atujaze
Ufunuo wake ./.Ili atushindie shetani 
tupate kuishi milele./.

umuco_169.songBody:
1.Duniani tunapoishi, kuna vipindi mbali 
mbali, kuna nyakati mbali, mbali lakini 
huko juu mbinguni hakutakua vipindi 
hakutakua na nyakati.

Kuna wakati wa kimvuli, kuna wakati 
wa kulia, kuna wakati wa kukauka, 
kuna wakati wa huzuni, na kuna 
wakati wa ufunuo, na kuna wakati wa 
furaha ./.Na siku yote na mateso yake 
ivyo ni vipindi vya safari./.

2.Duniani tunapoishi, kuna shida mbali 
mbali, kuna za kiroho na za kimwili, lakini 
huko juu mbinguni, hakutakua shida, 
hakutakua na magumu.

3.Duniani tunapoishi, ninakutana na 
shida nyingi, katika kimvuli zaidi lakini 
huko juu mbinguni, ayo yote 
nitakua katika raha ya milele.

4.Ningali duniani humu chini, ninakutana 
na shida nyingi, na vipindi mbali, mbali 
lakini huko juu mbinguni, nitasahau hayo 
yote, nitakua katika raha ya milele.

umuco_17.songBody:
1. Wa kristo tulijenge kanisa la Bwana, 
tuepuke vishawishi vya muovu shetani,

Ee Mungu, bariki kanisa tukufu, watu 
waupate, wokovu wako.

2.Duniya na anasa vyote vitakwisha, 
Neno la Bwana Yesu, litaishi milele.

3.Wa kristo tulishike, Neno lake Bwana; 
tumuombe ufunuo, wa siku za mwisho,

4.Wa kristo tusilale, Bwana yu’karibu; 
tumuvae Yesu, Kristo, ili tuwe macho.

5.Ee ndugu jiazali, siku zinakwisha; 
safisha moyo wako, usiangamie

umuco_170.songBody:
1.Igihe kiriko kirihuta cane, Mwami 
tegura ishengero ryawe; Ubwami bwawe 
buregereje, none ambika ishengero 
ryawe.

Eh’uraje urihuta cane, guh’impera 
abakozi bawe, gwisha imvura mu mbuto 
zawe, ababagara babagare, abimbuzi 
bimbure, kukw’igihe gishize.

2.Igihe kiriko kirihuta cane, 
Mwami tunganya ishengero ryawe; 
komez’ urufatiro washizeho, raba 
dukeneye kwambikwa.

3.Ubwiza bwawe ni bwuzure, korera mu 
mpano zawe Mwami; izo washize mu 
bagukunda, raba dukeneye kwambikwa.

4.Watwigishije vyinshi Mwami 
Yesu, uducisha henshi Bwirukiro; 
komez’ urufatiro rwawe Mwami
 raba utwambik’ubwiza bwawe.

5.Humura amaso abata-bona, ukangure 
n'aba-sinziriye komeza urufatiro rwawe
Mwami, utwambike ubwiza bwawe 
Mana

umuco_171.songBody:
1.Yemwe Shengero ry’abazima, 
abashitse ku musaraba wera, dukovye 
mu gusenga cane, duhumuke amaso 
tubone, ./.Ibikorerwa mu rugo 
rw’Imana./.

Ntaho ntaho vyoshoboka, k’umukozi 
akora ata mpembo, kukw’Imana 
Itagabitanya, ngo yibagir’ imiruho 
n’ubutame, twatamye kubw’Izina 
ryayo ./.Non’impera yacu iri mw’ijuru./.

2.Yemwe Shengero ry’Abera, imbuto 
zose zitar’ iz'Umwami, n’ibikorwa 
bidakorerwa muri We vyose bizoshirana 
n’iyi si, ./.Harahiriw’ abatamira mu Mwami./.

3.Wibuke ko inkomezi n’ubuzima vyose 
wabironse kubw’Ubuntu, ivy’ufise 
wabironse kubw’Ubuntu, wicishe bugufi 
imbere y’Imana uyishikanir’ uhinda agashitsi./.

4.Gir’umutima uhumuye cane, witonde 
mu gukorer’ Imana, uyikorere n’umutima 
wawe wose wizigire k’uzohembwa
 mw’ijuru ./.Ubuntu n’ukuri ntibikuve 
hejuru./.

5.Ibihe biriko birihuta cane, ibimenyetso 
birashika vyihuta, witwararik’ ivy’Ubwami 
bw’Imana , ukorere Imana 
hakibona ./.Wirundaniriz’ itunga mw’ijuru./.

umuco_172.songBody:
1.Inzira y’abana b’Imana, nimwe 
gusa ntihindagurika; n’inzir’ imwe igoye 
gutahura, kukw’imbere 
y’isezerano ./.Hama hari imibabaro yo 
kuramukwa./.

Imibabaro niy’igihe gito, ingorane 
niz’iy’igihe gito, har’itunga mw’isezerano 
ry’Uhoraho ribikiw’ abihangana 
n’abitanga ./.Mwami n'umpe kwitanga
 no kwihangana./.

2.Yesu Kristo mu kuducungura nawe 
yaciye mur’iyo nzira; aho yasenga 
abir’ icuya c’amaraso, kubw’imibabaro 
yar’imbere yiwe ./.Yar’imibabaro 
y’imbere y’agakiza./.

3.Turanihira mu mitima yacu,
 dushaka kuva mur’iyi mibabaro; 
ubutame n’ugucumukura, n’imibabaro 
yo kuramukwa ./.Kukw’imbere 
tuzohanagurw’ amarira./.

4.Twihangane mu mitima yacu, 
intumbero y’Imana ni nziza; kandi ni 
kubw’urukund’ adukunda, Uhoraho 
aducisha mu ngorane ./.Kugira ngo tube 
abakristo bashitse./.

5.Umunezero wacu ni wuzure,
har'imibabaro yo kuramukwa, Umwana
w'isezerano ari hafi kuvuka, kuko 
Imana itihana ku mpano ./.ntiyihana 
no ku muhamagaro wayo./.

umuco_173.songBody:
1.Ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa mbere, ryaravuze, 
risohora abana b’Imana, muri Egiputa; 
bambutse baja I kanani, mw’isezerano 
ryabo, n’ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa mbere, baja 
I kanani.

Ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa mbere, ryar'irya 
Mose muri Egiputa; ijwi ry’ukuvayo 
kwa kabiri, ryar'irya Yesu Kristo ku 
musaraba; ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa gatatu, 
niry’umumarayika ku kagoroba ./.Ari we 
yegeranya intama, intama, intama 
z’Imana./.

2.Ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa kabiri,naryo 
ryaravuze, risohor’ abana b’Imana 
mu mategeko; tuva I bupfu twinjira, I 
buzima, kubw’umuntu umwe gusa, niwe 
Yesu Kristo.

3.Ijwi ry’ukuvayo kwa gatatu, ryaravuze, 
risohora abana b’Imana, I Babuloni; tuva 
mu bupfu bw’iki gihe, bw’abana b’bantu 
turonk’ Ijambo rizima, ry’igihe cacu.

4.Iryo n’ijwi ry’agakiza kacu, mur’iki 
gihe kibi, risemerera rit’eh’ umukwe 
nguyo  araje; abizeye mwes nimwiyeze, 
mwambar’ impuzu zera, mwitegurire 
ubukwe, bw’Umwami Yesu.

5.Iryo n’ijwi ryo kudukangura, ngo 
tube maso, kuko tutazi igihe, umukwe 
azozira none uwumva niyumve, ijwi 
ry’umumarayika, kuko igihe c’amateka, 
kigiye kuza.

umuco_174.songBody:
1.Uwirata yirate Kristo, uwirata 
yirate ubuntu; ni co cirato nyakuri, 
kukw’inyama n’amaraso, bitazoragwa 
Ubwami bw’Imana.

Uko nik’Uhoraho agize 
ng’umunyabwenge yoye, kwirata 
ubwenge bwiwe; umunyenkomezi
 yoye, kwirat’ inkomezi ziwe; 
cank’umutunzi yoye, kwirat’ ubutunzi 
bwiwe; ./.Arik’ uwirata yirate ko 
yamenye, Uhoraho n’ubushobozi bwiwe./.

2.Uhoraho niwe umutima wawe 
ukwiriye kwirata; abaciye bugufi 
bazovyumva, banezerezwe n’ico, ico nico 
Uhoraho ashaka.

3.Niwe yakweretse iciza ic’ari co, 
akwerek’ ivy’umuhezagiro; akwereka 
ivy’umuvumo, niwe vyirato vyawe hose 
ugendane nawe wicishije bugufi.

4.Niw’ aduha kuba muri Kristo, 
yaduhindukiy’ubwenge nyakuri; 
yaduhindukiy’ ukugororoka kugira 
ngo tubone gucungurwa ng’uwirata yirate 
Kristo.

5.Uwirata yirate Uhoraho, kukw’umuntu 
yishimagiza, atari we yemerwa namba, 
ariko hamerwa uw’Umwami, ni we 
vyirato vyawe hose.

umuco_175.songBody:
1.Mashujaa wa imani, wa kati wa mbere, 
walisimamia kweli kazi ya Mungu Baba, 
walisinziya wote, wanangoja taji zao, kwa 
ajiri yao wote, tumepata wokovu kweli ni 
sifa kwa Mungu Baba ./.Oo, haleluya!./.

Hao wote watafufukia uzima wa milele, 
na waliyo na hekima watangaa kama 
mwanga wa anga, na waongozao 
wengi katika njia ya haki, watangaa 
kama nyota ./.Milele, kwa furaha ya 
milele, na milele./.

2.Mashujaa wa imani wamepigania 
kweli, kazi ya Mungu Baba injili yake 
Bwana, walijitowa zaidi katika hali yoyote 
kwa ajili yao wote, tumepata wokovu 
kweli, ni sifa kwa Mungu Baba ./.Oo, 
haleluya!./.

3.Mashujaa wa imani mitume na 
manabii, wainjilisti wachungaji, waalimu 
na wazee, watoa huduma wote, na 
waonyaji pia, wasimamizi na waaskofu, 
na wengine wote ni sifa kwa Mungu 
Baba ./.Oo, haleluya!./.

4.Na sisi siku izi, tujitoe kwa zaidi, 
tuseme habari njema, katika wapotevu, 
wahubiri muhubiri, wahuduma 
muhudumie, kwa hali yoyote 
tumutumikie Bwana. tutavikwa taji huko
./.Oo, haleluya!./.

umuco_176.songBody:
1.Yewe Yerusalemu, wo mw’ijuru 
wuzuye ubwiza bw’Uhoraho; wubatswe 
n’umwubatsi nyakuri, ndatazir’ Imana 
kubwawe.

Iyo nzamuriy’ amaso kuri wewe, nuzura 
umunezero mwinshi, iyo numvise 
inkuru z’iyo, nca numva nohagurukira, 
nkaj’ i Yerusalemu iwacu, ahar’ amahoro
 menshi, har’umunezero mwinshi, 
ahari itunga ryinshi ahar’ amazu 
menshi ./.Haleluya, Haleluya, haleluya./.
         Ahar' amazu menshi.

2.Ewe Yerusalemu, wo mw’ijuru, 
uburuhukiro bw’abahizi; nta munyakibi 
avurwa muri wewe, ur’umurwa w’abera 
b’Iyera.

3.Ewe Yerusalemu, wo mw’ijuru 
uwakubonye wese araririmba, kuko ari 
igitangaza kukubona, ur’umurwa w’Abera 
b’Iyera.

4.Ewe Yerusalemu wo mw’ijuru, 
Umwami wawe n’uw'agahebuza, 
yanesheje abami bose, arabatsinda 
yatubereye umuhizi mu rugendo.

Iyo ninjiye muri Mpwemu, mu Bwami 
bw’Imana nzima, nsangayo ivyiza vyinshi 
cane nkifuza icohangumiza rwose, 
Mwami mfasha ndahegukire,

umuco_177.songBody:
1.Sinari nzi, Sinari nzi k’umuntu buntu, 
ashobora kwizer’Imana; kuk’ubwenge, 
kuk'ubwenge bw’umwana w’umuntu, 
butandukanye n’ubw’Imana ./.Ivyifuzo 
vy’umwana w’umuntu bitandukanye 
n’ivy’Imana./.

None vyavuye kuki? 
ni kubwa Mpwemu w’Uhoraho, ni kubw’ubushobozi 
bw’Uhoraho, ubushobozi bwo mw’Ijuru, 
butanga guhishurirwa, bukinjira mu 
mwana w’umuntu, bukamuhindura 
icaremwe gisha, ahagadutse 
hagatotahara, ahar’ ikibi hakaba iciza, 
Ubwami bw’Imana bukamwuzura, 
urukundo, umunezero, amahoro, 
ukwihangana ./.Umuntu akabeshwaho 
na Mpwemu, akabaho kubwa Kristo./.

2.Sinari nzi! sinari nzi k’umuntu buntu, 
ashobora kumenya ivya Mpwemu, 
kukw’ivyo Mpwemu, kukw’ivyo 
Mpwemu ashaka vyose, bitandukanye 
n’ivy'akameremere ././Iy’umuntu yumvise ivyo 
asanga bidahujije n’ivyiyumviro vyiwe./.

3.Sinari nzi, sinari nzi k’umuntu buntu, 
ashobora kwumva ururimi rw’Imana; 
kukw’ivy’Ubwami, kukw’ivy’Ubwami 
bw’Imana nzima bitandukanye 
nivy’Ubwami bw’iyi si n’Ubwami 
bw'Imana nzima n'ubwami bw’Abera 
B’Imana Yera./.

4.Uwo Mpwemu, uwo Mpwemu 
niw’ ah’umuntu, kuvuga ururimi rutari 
urw'iy’isi, niw’ atunihira, niw’ atunihira 
iminiho, itovugwa adutakira ku Mana 
Yera
./.Niw’ aduha gusasirira ivyiza bitur’ imbere vyose./.

umuco_178.songBody:
1.Nzokwama nishimira cane rwose, 
kurongorwa na Mpwemu w’Imana, 
nzokwama nishimira kugumbirana 
nawe ./.Nkagendera munsi y’ubushobozi 
bwiwe./.

Uwo Mpwemu atanga umunezero,
 uwo Mpwemu atanga amahoro, 
niw’ aduha gukorer’ Imana, niw’ aduha 
kwitandukanya n’ivyanduye, 
kuk’ubushobozi bwiwe bunesh’umubiri.

2.Nishimira kuba muri we iteka,
  kuko kuba munsi y’ubushobozi bwiwe, 
vyic’ubushobozi bwa 
kameremere ./.Nkijira muvy’Ubwami 
bw’Imana./.

3.Nzishimira guca bugufi rwose, kugira 
ngo ubwo bushobozi bumbe hejuru, kuko 
bunyinjiza mu gihuguc’ ubwiza ./.Nkinjira 
muvy’ubwami bw’Imana./.

4.Ubwo bushobozi n’umuriro waka, na 
Mpwemu n’umuriro waka, kuko aho 
yaritse ntihayoberana ./.Yisangije imvu 
n’imigendere./.

5.Kubw’uwo Mpwemu indirimbo 
ziraza, kubw’uwo Mpwemu ubutumwa 
buravugwa, kubw’uwo Mpwemu 
humvikana indimi nsha ./.Nico gituma 
nzishimira kubana naw’iteka./.

umuco_179.songBody:
1.Ninachunga usiku na mchana, kusikia 
sauti ya Bwana Mungu, kama jinsi 
Mungu alikua, akitembea Adamu jioni.

Bwana akiniita nami nitaitika Baba, 
Bwana akinituma, nitaenda pote 
ambapo ananituma, ninakaa kama 
mlinzi nikuchunga kusikia sauti ya 
Bwana Mungu ikifariji roho yangu.

2.Ninachunga usiku na mchana, kama 
zamu angojavyo asubuhi kusikia sauti 
ya Baba Mungu ili aniambie habari za 
Ufalme.

3.Ninachunga usiku na mchana, kusikia 
sauti ya Baba Mungu, aniambie habari za 
kuja kwake, nijue habari za Ufalme.

4.Ninasimama juu ya mnara, nikichunga 
kusikia sauti ya Baba, aniambie ambacho 
nitafanya katika giza hii ya dunia.

umuco_18.songBody:
1.Kaze Mukiza ndahevye vyose, 
n’ushike mu mutima wanje (Yesu) 
ah’uzob’ uhezagir’ abandi nanje nyene 
ntuze kunsiga.

Ndagu…shima… Yesu ko we…meye 
kotu…bana.

2.Ndushirizeho kwizera Yesu, simbe kure 
y’inyonga zawe (Mwami), ibinyanduza 
ubinyogeshe, ya maraso yo mu rubavu.

3.Mfukamy’imbere y’inyonga zawe, 
ngomba kwizera no gukora(Yesu), iri 
sengesho urihindure, ribir’imota imbere 
yawe.

4.Nkukw’impongo zi-zihuzagizwa, 
zifuz’imigezi y’amazi(Mwami), ni ko 
umutima wanje wifuza, kubona mu 
nyoga h’Umwami.

5.Mutima wanje ugir’ inyota yo 
kukubona Mana yanje(Yesu), agakiza nta 
handi nkaronka, Atari mu nkomezi zawe.

umuco_180.songBody:
1.Duga nawe mwene Data usigaye, 
ku musozi w’abera Siyoni, urabe kandi 
witegereze ./.ubone kandi utahure 
neza./. Ivyo wizeye ivy’ari vyo, Umwami 
wawe uw’ari we, amasezerano ay’ari yo.

Eh’Abera bashagaje, ku musozi 
w’Abera Siyoni, amaso yabo 
ntagoheka , amatwi yabo yama yiteze 
kwumva; ijwi ry’inzamba y’iherezo, 
ryerekana ko vyose bishize, umunsi
 w’agakiza kacu, tuzoba turangije 
intambara ./.Nguy’uraje nguy’uraje, 
nguy’uraje Haleluya!./.

2.Duga nawe mwene Data, usigaya, 
ku musozi w’Abera Siyoni, inzamba 
y’iherezo itaravuga ./.kukw’izokwumva 
abari k’umusozi./. Ntuz’umaramarire 
hagati, ntuz’usange wambaye ubusa, 
iruka nyaruka we mwene Data.

3.Ibimenyetso vyose vyarashitse, 
vyerekana k’inzamba y’iherezo, igiye 
kuvuga y’iherezo rya vyose ./.Abari hejuru 
ku musozi bazoyumva./. abishushanya 
ntibazoyumva, ibinebwe ntibizoyumva, 
abank’ ukuri ntibazoyumva,

4.Duga nawe mwene Data usigaye, 
ubuntu bw’Imana buri hejuru 
yawe, ibuka umuhamagaro wawe 
ncuti, ./.Usanga ko Imana Igukunda./. Na 
niyo yagusezeraniye, yakujabukije ikiyaga 
gitukura, yakuneshereje intambara.

umuco_181.songBody:
1.Numv’ ijwi ry’Umwami rimpamagara, 
rikampamagara mu gacerere; rimbwira 
ngo negere, negere dusangire ku meza 
y’Ubwami bwiwe, ni bwo butumire 
Umwami adutumira.

Eh’Umwami ari ku meza yiwe ariko 
agaburira abana biwe arobanura 
ingano mu muguruka; uwumva 
ni yumve kand’amenye uwiteguye wese 
aronk’ umugabane wiwe, ni vyo vyamwa 
vyo mu bwami bw’Imana.

2.Numv’ ijwi rya Yesu rihamagara, 
uteg’ ugutwi wumve mwene Data; abari 
maso ijoro umutaga bose, ngo begere, 
begere ameza yiwe, ni bwo butumire 
Imana idutumira.

3.Yesu ari ku muryango arahamagara, 
ati; abinjira ni mwinjire vuba; kuk’umuco 
ugiye gutana n’umwiza, uwinjira ni yinjire 
mw’irembo rifunganye, ni bwo butumire 
Yesu adutumira.

4.Igihe c’ubutumire kiriko kirahita 
twinjire mu muryango ucuguruye; umuco 
ugiye gutana n’umwiza, injira, injira 
wew’ usigaye, nibwo butumire Umwami 
adutumira.

umuco_182.songBody:
1.Yesu n’Umwami w’urukundo 
rwinshi, kuko yikoreye imibabaro yacu; 
yajanjaguriwe ivyacu bigabitanyo, 
igihano cacu cabaye kuri we.

N’ukuri, n’izacu ntimba yishizeko, 
n’iyacu mibabaro yikoreye, tweho 
twamwiyumviriye nk’uwakubiswe, 
nk’uwacumiswe n’Imana, akicurikirizwa 
n’akabonge, kubw’ivyaha vyacu; 
ajanjagurirw’ivyacu bigabitanyo, 
n’urukundo rw’imbura rugero 
./.Kand’imishishagu yiwe ni yo idukiza./.

2.Abisirayeli baramutwenze cane, 
bamugayira mu mitima yabo; 
bamucirakw’iteka n’ivyanditswe, nubwo 
yari uwera w’Isumba vyose.

3.Yesu niwe mwungere mwiza, 
yahamagaye abana b’Isirayeli bose; 
abaha indya nziza z’ubwoko bwose, nabo 
bazifata bazimuta mu maso.

4.Amosozi yaciye akoroka ubwo 
nyene aca asemerera ati Yerusalemu; 
nagerageje kukwinjiza mu mugabane 
wawe, none ico wanse ni co gakiza kawe.

5.Yar’amashami yo ku gishitsi ca Dawidi, 
ariko yarahanyuwe atererwa hasi; kugira 
ngo jewe umunyamahanga, ntererwa ku 
gishitsi kubw’ubuntu.

umuco_183.songBody:
1.Kera jewe naganzwa n’umubiri, 
nari nafashwe mpiri n’icaha, njanwa 
hirya n’ino n’umuntu w’inyuma, kuko 
sogokuru Adamu yabinsigiye.

Ubu nashitse mu Bwami bw’Imana, 
n’Ubwami bw’ubushobozi bwinshi, 
ukwiganyira n’amarira ntibishikayo, 
n’Ubwami bw’amahoro gusa.

2.Yemwe ukuntu jewe nari ngowe, 
nashaka gukor’iciza bikananira, ikibi 
ntashaka akaba ari co nkora, jewe nari 
imbohe ya satani koko.

3.Ariko Imana ishimwe cane rwose, 
kuko yanyogej’ivyaha vyanje vyose, 
ikankura mu buja bwa satani, none ndi 
mu Bwami bwayo bwera.

4.Icemezo c’uko Yesu yazutse, nukw’ari m
uzima muri jewe, yankuye mu 
bupfu bw’iyi si, no mu bikorwa vyayo 
vy’umwiza.

5.Yesu yarabishingiye intahe, ati: ni jewe 
Bugingo n’ukuzuka, uwunyizera ntazigera 
apfa namba, none notiny’iki kandi jewe.

umuco_184.songBody:
1.Jewe nagiriw’ ubuntu bwinshi cane, 
Imana yampumuy’ amaso ngo mbone, 
inzamura ku musozi wayo wera, 
inyerek’ ivy’abantu batigeze bamenya. 
Impishurira amabanga yari yanyegejwe, 
ivy’Imana yabikiye ab’ikunda, ngo 
bibabere umuco mu minsi mibi, kugira 
ngo bashobore kunesha wa mubi.

2.Ndavye mbona wa Mwagazi w’intama 
yajanjaguwe avirirana amaraso hose, 
afise amahembe indwi n’amaso indwi, 
ni zo Mpwemu z’Imana nzima, zatumwe 
ko zija mw’isi yose, ayo mahemebe ni 
zo nkomezi z’Umwami, ni yo ntsinzi 
n’ivyirato vy’abera, ni bo Bamalayika ndwi 
b’Amashengero.

3.Ndavye mbona wa Mwagazi w’intama 
amena ivyari bimatanije igitabo, nca 
mbona Antikristo kw’ifarasi yiwe, 
avuga amajambo y’amarogotano, 
asesa amaraso menshi y’Abera, mbona 
amahanga yose amwunamiye, aca 
abarongoza ubugunge n’uburyarya, 
abagumishako na vya binyoma vyiwe.

4.Ndavye mbona ijuru riruguruye, 
mbon’uwicaye kw’ifarasi yera, yitwa 
Mwizigirwa irindi Munyakuri, inyonga 
ziwe ni nk’imbeya z’umuriro, mu mutwe 
yar'afise imigara myinshi, yambaye 
impuzu zera zajobetswe mu maraso, 
kand’ubwiwe yitwa Jambo w’Imana, 
Umwami w’amahoro, Haleluya!

5.Nca numva ijwi rivuga mw’ijuru 
riti: Tunezerwe duhe Imana icubahiro, 
kuk'Ubukwe bwa wa Mwagazi bushitse, 
umugeni wiwe yahejeje kwitegura, 
yambaye impuzu nziza zera cane, 
zikayangana kandi zera hose, abo nibo 
banesheje ca gikoko, abo nibo bagendeye 
mu muco w’igihe cabo.

6.Nca numva wa Mwagazi asemerera 
cane, abarira wa Mugeni ati duga 
hano, nca mbona wa Mugeni azamuwe 
vuba, ndavye mbona Yerusalemu nsha, 
iteguwe nk’inzu yateguriwe umugeni, 
yubatswe ku rufatiro rugumye cane, 
kandi yambay’ ubwiza bw’Umwami aho 
niho tuzibanira n’Umwami!

umuco_185.songBody:
1.Mara nyingi ninateswa, na ubaya wa 
dunia maovu yanisumbua, ninyakuwe 
nije kwako, nikae Yerusalemu.

E’mbingu jiandae, E’Yerusalemu 
jiandae, jiandaeni kupokea walioshinda 
dunia, wanaokua na kovu, za msalaba 
wa Kristo

2.Ahadi zote zimefika, dalili zote 
zimefika, umemtuma Elia kuandaa kanisa 
lako, tunyakue tuje kwako.

3.Tarumbeti ya malaika wa siku za 
mwisho limelia, tunangojea nini Baba? 
Tufariji na roho wako tukungojee kwa 
bidii.

4.Umenyakua Enoki umenyakua Elia, 
walikua wamechukizwa na maasi ya 
dunia, tunyakue nasi Bwana

5.Ashindae atavikwa taji ya uzima 
wa milele, ataishi Yerusalemu
 pamoja na  Mkombozi milele na milele.

umuco_186.songBody:
1.Mwami Yesu nkunda cane, 
ijwi ryawe riranezera, iyo ngenda 
mur’iyi si, mpumurizwa nuk’unkunda 
Yesu ./.Ndakwihaye jewe nd’uwawe, 
unyigishe ngendane nawe./.

2.Mwami Yesu wanyiguze, mpura 
n’ibingora mu nzira, iyo ngenda 
mur’iyi si, mpumurizwa n’ijwi ryawe 
Yesu ./.Rinyemeza yuko nd’uwawe, 
bikamaramaza satani./.

3.Mwami Yesu uko ndi kose, jewe 
nd’uwawe bwirukiro, mu mibabaro 
nd’uwawe, mu munezero nd’uwawe 
Yesu ./.Mu magorwa jewe nd’uwawe, 
mu ntambara jewe nd’uwawe./.

4.Mwami Yesu jewe nyakira, 
kuko wankunze ubwa mbere, aho 
wampamagara Mwami, ukanyigisha 
kukwubaha Yesu ./.Mu ntege nke 
none nd’uwawe, mu nkomezi jewe 
nd’uwawe./.

5.Ubu singikekeranya, wanyigishij’ ijambo 
ryawe, kuko ndiho kubwawe Mwami, no 
ku rupfu nzob’uwawe Yesu ./.Uruhure 
umutima wanje, nce mur’iyi si 
ngororoka./.

umuco_187.songBody:
1.Ibanga ry’Umukwe n’Umugeni, 
n’ibanga rikomeye cane, 
ririmw’ amasezerano menshi, y’Umukwe 
n’Umugeni.

Nub’ Umwami afitaniye ibanga 
n’ishengero ryiwe n’ibanga ry’Umukwe 
n’Umugeni.

2.Yesu yakunze umugeni, ava mw’ijuru 
aza mw’isi, amugura amaraso yiwe, 
n’ibanga rikomeye cane.

3.Umukwe amaze gukw’Umugeni,
 agaragaj’ urukundo rwiwe, baca 
bahan’ amasezerano, y’Umukwe 
n’Umugeni.

4.Yesu amaze gukw’ Umugeni 
yamusigiy’ amasezerano, yukw’azogaruka 
kumujana, kandi ngo yirinde abansi.

5.E’Mugeni niwitegure iryavuzwe 
riratashe ibimenyetso vyarashitse ehe 
Umukwe nguyo araje.

umuco_188.songBody:
1. Ni nde yohagarara adahagaritswe 
n’Imana? Ni nde yogenda atarongowe 
n’Imana ./.Uhoraho ni we Murongozi 
nyakuri inkingi yo kwegamira./.

Ni nde yiteguye, kurwan’ urugamba, 
rw’igihe ca nyuma; akameny’ Imana, 
ku munsi mubi, mu bugingo bwiwe?
./.Uwo niw’ ashinz’ imizi, kuri rwa rutare, 
na ya nkingi y’ukuri./.

2.Uhoraho abwira Yeremiya at’ubona iki? 
Naw’ ati mbon’ igiti igiti c’umurinzi
./.Uhoraho niwe Murinzi nyakuri, 
arind’ ijambo ryiwe./.

Niw’ azokwigisha, akugir’ inama mu 
bugingo bwawe. Uzomeny’Imana 
mu bihe bigoye vy’igihe ca nyuma
./.Uzubaka vy'ukuri kuri rwa rutare soko 
y’ubugingo./.

3.Umuntu yubak’ inzu, Uhoraho 
atubatse, uworind’igisagara Uhoraho 
atarinze ./.Mbega vyomar’ iki? Uhoraho 
niwe Murinzi nyakuri./.

Azokurongora, akwuhagir’imvyiro, 
mu bugingo bwawe; uzomwizigira, 
uzonesh’ umubi, akugerageza ./.Ubwo 
uzoshing’ imizi, kuri rwa rutare, soko 
y’ubugingo./.

4.Jewe nogenda nte, ntarongowe 
n’Imana, jewe nokor’ iki, ntarongowe 
n’Imana./.Mana yanje mfasha je 
ndongorwe nawe mu nzira y’ukuri./.

Ni we nzizigira, ni we nzokorera mu 
bugingo bwanje ni we Mwami wanje, 
ni we mwungere wanje Murongozi 
nyakuri ./.Undongore Mukiza, je 
ngendane nawe mu nzira y’ukuri./.

umuco_189.songBody:
1.Umwami Yesu yaravuze, at’unyizera 
ntazigera, abon’ urupfu rwa kabiri, kuko 
jewe natsinze urupfu,

Mwami, Mwami turakwambaza; twe 
Shengero ryawe Mwami, nuz’ ushitse 
isezerano, ry’ishengero ryawe Mwami.

2.Arongera, aravuga, ati ni jewe 
soko y’ubugingo, unyizera ntazigera, 
agir’ inyota n’umunsi n’umwe.

3.Arongera, aravuga, ati ni jewe 
muzabibu, ishami ryose ritam’ imbuto, 
Data azoritemera hasi.

4.Arongera, aravuga ati ni mwaguma 
muri jewe, muzer’imbuto zitar’iz'iyi si, 
kubw’ivyo Data azoshemagizwa.

5.Uzur’ ijambo we Shengero, uzura 
Mpwemu we Shengero, uzur’ ubumwe 
n’urukundo, kubw'ivy’ Umwami 
azoshemagizwa.

umuco_19.songBody:
1.Ewe ncuti uri ngaha, nuze twubake, ku 
masezerano y’Imana, yadusezeraniye.

Kaze Yesu, kaze Yesu, nuze twibanire; 
mbone kwubaka ku masezerano 
y’Imana.

2.Umwami Yesu yarasize isezerano ati: 
sinzobasiga nk’impfuvyi, nzoza kuri mwe 
vuba.

3. Umwami yasize avuze ati: hasigaye 
igihe gito, ab’isi ntibabe bakimbona, 
ariko mwe muzombona.

4.Isezerano ntiryatevye, ry’Umwami 
Yesu, ryashitse kubari bizeye, 
ivyasezeranijwe.

5.Nan’ubu Yesu arakora, n’usab’
uhishurirwe ivyo, akorera mu ba mwizeye, 
babatijwe na Mpwemu.

umuco_190.songBody:
1.E’Bwana Mungu unafahamu, siku 
izi tulizo nazo kuna maasi mengi sana, 
ninakuomba Bwana unirehemu.

E’Bwana Mungu mwenye neema, 
ninakuomba Bwana unirehemu, 
mbinguni hakufika kitu cha uchafu 
na wala kwa hio wewe u‘Mungu 
ninakuomba Bwana unirehemu.

2.Tazama siku izi za Laodikiya, watu 
ni wengi sana, maasi ni mengi sana, 
kwa hio sisi watu wako, tunakuomba 
uturehemu.

3.Yesu peke yako ulisema ya kwamba, 
kama ilivyo kuwa wakati wa Nowa, 
na ndivyo hivyo itakua na wakati huu 
utuhepushe uovu huyo.

4.Na kwa hio ndugu, tulivae neno la 
wakati wetu, latwambia tujiepushe, na 
siku hizi za hatari, tulivae neno lake Yesu, 
ili tushinde siku izi za kuhasi.

umuco_191.songBody:
1.Safari hiyi, ya kwenda mbinguni 
ni ngumu sana, Bwana uniwezeshe 
kama sikuone wewe Bwana wangu, 
natetemeshwa na mambo ya huku.

Ninasafiri kwa waliokombolewa, 
Ninasafiri huko juu mbinguni ./.Oo 
Bwana wangu, Bwana wangu niokowe, 
na giza hii ya mambo ya huku./.

2.Safari hii ya kwenda mbinguni ni 
ngumu sana, Bwana unisaidie, ona, 
milima ni mirefu sana, siwezi kitu Bwana 
uniwezeshe.

3.Kwa nguvu zangu, mimi siwezi kitu 
nakuitaji, Bwana unitangulie, unishike 
mkono niko juu ya bahari, nishike mkono 
nisije kuzama.

4.Wandugu zangu, wamenitangulia kwa 
nguvu zako, wameshinda wote na mimi 
Bwana ni umoja wao nisaidie nifike mbinguni

umuco_192.songBody:
1.Mwami wanje je ndagushima, 
urukundo Mwam’ unkunda, n’imbabazi 
zaw’ ungirira, mur’urugendo rwanje.

Reka Mwami ndakuririmbe, reka 
Mwami ndagushime; urakwiriye 
Mwami ishimwe, n’ushimwe, 
ivyaremwe vyose bikuririmbe, 
bigushime; haleluya, haleluya! Agakiza 
n'ak’Imana ya Aburahamu, Haleluya, 
haleluya, haleluya. Haleluya

2.Ubuntu bwawe ungirira ndi mur’ubu 
bugaragwa, niy’ ubonye ndendebukiwe, 
wam’ umfasha Mwami wanje.

3.Nirat’ ubuntu bwawe Mwami 
sikubw’ inkomezi zanje si ku
bw’ ubushobozi bwanje n’ubuntu bwawe 
gusa.

4.Nshimishwa cane na wa munsi, 
ngushimira imbonankubone, turi kumwe 
na bene Data, Haleluya Mukiza!

umuco_193.songBody:
1.Hari ibuye abubatsi bagaye, hari ibuye 
abubatsi bataye; ryahinduts' irigumya
 imfuruka,ryashizweho n’Imana nzima.

Iryo shengero rya Kristo Yesu, 
ryubatswe n'amabuye mazima; 
har’ urufatiro rw’amabuye, ari bo 
ntumwa n’abavugishwa; ./.Yesu ni we 
buye rigumy’ imfuruka./. ./.Nanje nta 
handi nzishimira kuba atari mu ngoro 
y’Uhoraho./.

2.Iryo shengero ry’Imana nzima, 
n’ishengero ry’abazima, ryubatswe mu 
rufatiro, ryubatswe n’amabuye mazima.

3.Ayo mabuye n’abana b’Imana, bubatse 
inzu y’Imana nzima; bahora batanga 
ibimazi, n’amashikanwa bishimwa n’Imana

4.Twishikanire Umwami Yesu ni we 
buye rifis’ ubugingo; twubake kur’urwo 
rufatiro, twubake inzu y’Imana nzima.

umuco_194.songBody:
1.Yesu ni we rutare, rutare rw’ubugingo; 
uwutanyoye kuri rwo ntabon’ubugingo 
busha, kukw’ari we yamyeho, kandi 
azokwamaho, no mu bugingo busha, 
azohorah’ iteka.

Yesu ni we yampfiriye ku musaraba, 
intuntu iramwuzura igetsemane; 
ng’umwizer’ abon’ ubugingo budashira, 
ndizeye ndizeye nyakira mbon’ ubugingo 
budashira.

2.Yesu ni wewe nzira, ukuri n’ubugingo, 
uwutamuciyeko wese,  ntabon' ubugingo 
busha, kukw’ari wewe nkingi, ni wewe 
rufatiro, aho utaba Mukiza, nta mahoro 
aboneka.

3.Yesu we ndakwihaye, mb’ishamvu 
ryawe Mwami, sintezw’ ubwoba n’iyi si, 
ngo bimbuz’ ubugingo; kuko jewe 
wampfiriye, kugira ngo sinze mpfe, 
ngo nze ndagwe mw’ijuru, umugabane 
mwiza.

4.Ninagera mu Bwami, mu Bwami 
bw’Uhoraho, ubw’Imana yateguye, ngo 
bubemwo abera; niho nzoruhukira, 
nduhuke ibinduhisha, vyo mur’ubu 
bugingo, n’imiruho yo mw’isi.

umuco_195.songBody:
1.Igihe kigeze kure, ububi bugeze kure 
./. Ibimenyetso vy’ijoro vyamaze gushika 
vyose./.

Yesu we Rumuri rumurikira, umurikire 
mur’iyi si, ndazi kw’igihe kigiye  gushira, 
uz’unkize sinze mpfe, Yesu we rumuri 
rumurikira, ndaj’ umpishe muri wewe, 
kuko igihe kigiye gushira, uz’unkize 
sinze mpfe.

2.Yesu yabwiy’ ishengero, at’ivyo bimaze 
kuba ./.Murangamize hejuru, agakiza kari 
hafi./.

3.Shengero ni twikangure, 
duseng' amanywa n’ijoro ./.Igihe kigeze 
kure, dutegerez’ Umukiza./.

4.Yesu yabwiye Yohana, ngw’ehe ehe 
ndaje vuba kugerera umwe wese ibihuje 
n’ivy’akora./.

5.Kor’ ivy’umukristo ashitse, 
kor’ ivy’ukugororoka ./.Iteho kwuzura 
Mpwemu, ehe ng’uyo ng’uyo araje./.

umuco_196.songBody:
1.Sogokuru Aburahamu, yubah’ Imana 
muri vyose, Imana yaramukunda, nkuko 
nawe yayikunda.

Haleluya!(x2), Haleluya, Imana ni 
nkuru!

2.Imana yaramukunda, 
ikanamusezeranira, yaramusezeraniye, 
yukw’izomuha umwana Isaka.

3.Yaramuhaye umwana, itako 
iranamumusaba, Iti n’unshikanire, 
umwana wawe kw’ikimazi.

4.Aburahamu aca arumvira, ajana 
umwana wiwe Isaka, ngo amushikanire 
Imana, kubwo kwumvira Umwami wiwe.

5.Natwe nitwumvir’ Imana, tuyikorere 
tuyisenge, twizere ibitaboneka, nkuko 
Aburahamu nawe yizeye.

umuco_197.songBody:
1.Imana yatoranije Isirayeli, iyikura 
mu gihugu c’amahanga, iyishira mu 
gihugu cayo bwite, n’ihanga ry’Uhoraho 
Umwam' Imana.

Wirinde ndi kumwe nawe; mu magorwa 
ndi kumwe nawe; mu muriro ndi 
kumwe nawe, no mu rupfu nzobana 
nawe ./.Ni wewe uwo mfash’ ukuboko; 
ni wewe uwo nakunze kera; ni wewe 
nameny’ ubwa mbere na mbere, 
ah’uzoja hose ndi kumwe nawe./.

2.Bose bar’ abana ba Aburahamu, 
nkukw’Imana yari yasezeranye nawe; 
yukw’izomuhindur’ ihanga rikomeye, 
n’ihanga ry’Uhoraho Umwami Imana.

3.Abazokuvuma bose nzobavuma, 
abazoguhezagira mbahezagire; kandi 
muri wewe nih’imiryango yose yo mw’isi 
izohererwa umugisha.

4.Abazokurwanya bose nzobarwanya, 
abazogufasha bose nzobafasha, 
imisozi izokwikubita hasi it’icubahiro ni
c’Umwami Imana.

5.Nezerwa himbarwa bana b’Imana, 
agakiza n'ak’Imana ya Aburahamu; 
Iyaremye vyose iri kumwe natwe, 
iyanesheje vyose iri kumwe natwe.

umuco_198.songBody:
1.Hari imburi, imburi y’Uhoraho, kandi 
yama iza ngo twiyubare, kukw’inyuma 
inyuma y’ imburi ./.Hama gucirwakw’ 
iteka ku bantu batumviy’ imburi./.

Ntac’ Imana ikora, itaburiy' abana bayo. 
Ntac’ Imana ikora, itabwiy’ abasavyi 
bayo. Arikw’Imana ishimwe cane, 
kuk’urufatiro rw’Imana nzima; 
rwanditseko ikimenyetso, ng’Uhoraho 
araz’ abiwe ./.Kandi ng’uwuvug’ izina 
ryiwe, yitandukanye n’ivyanduye./.

2.Yaburiye Abisirayeli, ati: 
musig’ amaraso y’intama; musige ku 
miryango yanyu mwese ./.Kuko ngiye 
guhonya no gutikiza, abana b’imfura 
b’Egiputa./.

3.No mu gihe, igihe ca Nowa, 
yaburiy’ umusavyi wiwe Nowa, 
yukw’agiye, kurimbur' ababi ./.ababi 
banduj' iyi si bose, kukw’ivyaha 
vyarenz’ urugero./.

4.Nub’ ivyaha, vyaha vyabaye vyinshi, 
ibintu vyose vyarononekaye, abantu bose 
buzuy’ ubugunge ./.Bakorey’ ibitey’ isoni 
ahabona, Mwami dufashe tukuyoboke./.

5.Mana nzima, wuzuy’ ubuntu, 
wandik’ imburi yawe mu mitima; 
uyandikish’  ubushobozi bwawe./.kugira ngo 
dushobore kuyoboka, kuk’ugiye 
kurimbur’ iyi si./.

umuco_199.songBody:
1.Turi mu ntambara y’iherezo, 
turi ku rugamba rukomeye, mbega 
ni nde azoneshereza, n’Umwami 
Yesu yanesheje, ./.Yatsinz’ urupfu 
ku musaraba./.

Ehe ng’uyo azananye n’ibicu, abizera 
bose bazomubona; harahiriwe 
uwunesha, azorya ku giti c’ubugingo, 
ntazobona urupfu rwa kabiri, azicarana 
n’Umwami Yesu ./.Mur’ubwo Bwami 
bw’Uhoraho./.

2.Turi ku rugamba rukomeye, turwana 
n’inkomezi z’umwiza; s’intambara 
y’inyama n’amaraso, n’abakuru 
baganz’ ikirere ./.Harahiriwe 
uwunesha./.

3.Satani n’abamukorera bose, 
bashiz’ intambamyi mu nzira, urugamba 
rurakomeye cane, harahiriwe uwunesha 
./.Ngw’azinjire mu buruhukiro./.

4.Mu nzira yose har’intambamyi, 
satani yanteze imitego ; ivyo vyose 
birwany’ ubugingo, ngo simbon’ ubwiza 
bw’Uhoraho ./.Uneshereze Mukiza 
wanje./.

5.Umpe kurwan’ intamabara nziza, 
nimpfa mpfire muri wewe Yesu; 
umbumbatish' amaboko yawe, 
wam’unyigisha ukugororoka ./.Ngo nze 
ndaganwe n’Abera bose./.

umuco_2.songBody:
1.Ririmba mwana w’Imana, Uyiririmbire 
Yihinduye umuntu, Ngw’idukize ivyaha.

      Eh’Imana iradukunda(2), Yazanye 
uyu Muco, Ng’utumurikire.

2.Nezerwa mwana w’Imana, wakiwe 
n’uyu Muco. Umuco  wo kukagoroba, 
 Ririmba Haleluya!

3. Ririmbira muri Mpwemu, sengera 
muri Mpwemu, Tang’umutima wawe, 
Ub’ishikanwa ryiza.

4.Ijambo ryarashitse, Ukuri kwarashitse, 
N’Ijambo ry’Ubu bugingo, Niryo Yesu 
Mukiza.

umuco_20.songBody:
1.Mfise Umukiz’ankunda ni Yesu ni Yesu, 
yampaye kumwizera ni Yesu Mwami

Haleluya, nzama ndirimbira 
Yesu mushima, mushima nzama 
nirat’urukundo rwa Yesu Mwami.

2.Mfise Umukiza ankunda ankunda 
ankunda yankunze akampfira mu 
gishingo canje.

3.Ahejeje kumpfira ya-ciye amber’inzira, 
inshikana mw’ijuru ni Yesu Mwami

4.Uwampay’amahoro ni Yesu ni Yesu, 
yampay’isezerano yuko tuzobana.

5.Iyo nzira uwuyicamwo yama ar’umwe 
na Yesu, yitondera ukuri kw’ijambo 
ryiwe.

umuco_200.songBody:
1.Umunsi wo kuza kw’Umukiza uregereje, 
n’umunsi mwiza utey’igomwe ku bizeye, 
ku bafise ikimenyetso ca Mpwemu yera, 
bazokwumva inzamb’ ivuze iyo mu bicu

Ijwi ry’inzamba y’umumalayika mukuru, 
rizosemerera cane mu mahanga yose, 
abari mu birere bine vy’isi bazoyumva, 
bati nimuze mu munezero wa Data

2.Benshi mur’ico gihe ntibazomeny’
ivyabaye, kuko uzoba ar’umusi 
umeze nk’iyindi yose, abizeye gusa 
ni bo bazomeny’ iryo banga, abuzuye 
ubushobozi bw’Uhoraho.

3.Abitwa ko basenga bose uko bari, 
ntibazomenya ivyabaye uwo munsi, kuko 
bizomenya gusa abizeye, abazoba buzuye 
Mpwemu bazovyumva.

4.Ico gihe abizeye bose imitima yabo, 
izohuzagizwa kubw’ikigira kibe, niho 
bazoca bumv’ inzamba ivuze hose, abafise 
ikimenyetso bazovyumva.

5.Uwo munsi n’umusi mwiza 
utey’igomwe, tuzoba dusezey’imibabaro 
yose, tuzogira umunezero utigeze 
kubaho, wewe, jewe, twese turi mu 
ruhande ruhe?

umuco_201.songBody:
1.Umunsi wo kuza kw’Umwami, 
uregereje cane, nanje nama niteguriye 
uwo munsi, ah’abapfiriye mu Mwami 
bazozuka ./.Bene Data bose tuzobonana, 
Paulo na Daniyeli tuzobonana./.

Nezerwa himbarwa, mutima wanje 
kukw’ivyo wizeye ari ivy’ukuri; 
kukw’abatasi bose, abagiye bose, ata 
n'umwe yagaye ico gihugu; n’igihugu 
gitemba amata n’ubuki, inzara n’urupfu 
ntibiriyo. N’igihugu c’Abera b’Iyera, 
nanje nziboner’Umwami imbona
nkubone ./.Nzoririmba urukundo rwiwe, 
turi kumwe n’Abera bose; turirimbe iyo 
mw’ijuru duti: Haleluya!./.

2.N’umunsi w’akanyamuneza 
kenshi, kur’iryo koraniro 
rihambaye cane, tuzoba turangije 
urugamba kubw’amaraso ya wa 
Mwagazi ./.Nk’ukw’ijambo ry’ubuhanuzi 
rivuga, yukw’ico gihe tuzoba tunesheje./.

3.Indimi zose n’amoko yose, bazoba 
bari mur’iryo koraniro, abazoba 
biteguriye ubukwe, bwa wa Mwagazi 
w’intama ./.Bazokwinjira mu mazimano, 
yateguriwe Umugeni./.

4.Bene Data mwese mwitegurire, 
kwinjira mur’ubwo bukwe, eh’igihe 
cabwo kiregereje, umukwe agiye 
kuza ./.Agakiza kacu karegereje, tugiye 
kuva mur’iyi si./.

umuco_202.songBody:
Intumbero yawe n’iyihe? Icifuzo 
cawe n’ikihe? Ic’ugomba wewe n’igiki? 
Mbeg’inzira urimwo ijahe?

Umwami Yesu yarabajije ati: Mbeg’ igihe 
nzozira, nzosanga ukwizera mw’isi, 
mbeg’intumbero yawe n'iyihe?

2.Intumbero yawe n’iyihe? 
Niy’amaronko y’iyi si; ntumere nk’umwe 
Balamu yakurikiy’ amaronko y’isi.

3.Mbeg’ ishengero ryawe n’irihe? 
Mbeg’ uri mu mubiri wa Kristo? Cank’uri 
mu nzira y’umwe Balamu, yans’ukuri 
kubw’amaronko y’isi.

4.Intumbero y’ukuri n’imwe, 
n’iy’abatumberey’ umusaraba, abavyawe 
n’amaraso y’Umwami, iyo niyo ntumbero y’ukuri.

5.Wirinde ivyifuzo vy’isi, wirinde 
icubahiro c’iyi si, wirinde n’umwe Delila, 
yabeshe umukozi w’Imana

umuco_203.songBody:
1.Safari yangu sasa, iko wazi kweli; 
kwakuwa nimejua mimi ni nani, na 
nimejua kuwa msafiri ni nini, na shaba ya 
msafiri ni nini.

Njia nimeijua, na mwisho wake 
nimeujua, na wasafiri ninawajua, 
waliyo wa kwetu nawajua, Haleluya 
nasifu Bwana, Haleluya, haleluya!

2.Nimeona mengi, humu safarini, 
nimejua wengi humu safarini, na 
hali za wasafiri nimezijua, kitu gani 
kitanishimamisha tena.

3.Tabia za kwetu ninazijua, zisizo za 
kwetu ninazijua; wamaneno mengi 
nimewajua,  Haleluya, haleluya, 
nimewajua!

4.Mitego yote nimeijua, habari za uongo 
zote nimezijua habari za Ufalme piya 
nimezijua, ni nani atakae nidanganya 
tena?

5.Ninafurahi sana humu safarini, 
kwa kuwa sitapotea njia tena kwa nguvu 
ya Mungu yote nimeyijua, ninakwenda 
mbinguni, Haleluya.

umuco_204.songBody:
1.Benshi birukira, mu 
masengero yubatswe, n’amaboko 
y’abana b’abantu, bakishimira 
ibiboneka ./.Bikabanezereza, 
bakavyishimira./.

Injira vuba injira(vuba), mu rusengero 
rw’Imana(Yera), ruri ahera ,ahera cane, 
ahatabonwa n’ab'inyama (n’amaraso), 
ni kubw’ubuntu oh! Ni kubw’ubuntu, 
injira injira, ni kubw’ubuntu.

2.Benshi birukira gusengera, mu 
mashengero yubatswe, n’amaboko 
y’abana b’abantu, ariko ntibamenye 
yuko ./.Abaseng’ Imana bose bayisengera 
muri Mpwemu./.

3.Umwami wacu Yesu yavuz’ati: 
Ishengero ryanje ryubatse, ku 
guhishurirwa na Mpwemu,none natwe 
twese twubake ./.Kur’urwo rutare, ku 
guhishurirwa./.

umuco_205.songBody:
1.Umwami yasigiye ishengero ryiwe 
umuragi w’amahoro, mukundane mwese 
nk’uko nabakunze ni yo ndagi ndabaraze.

Urukundo n’ukwizera, amahoro 
n’ivyizigiro; ubugwaneza n’ukwirinda, 
kugira  neza kwicisha bugufi ./.Ako niko 
karanga(x3) k’Ishengero./.

2.Umwami yabwiye Ishengero ryiwe, 
ni mube umwe mwese; nk'uko nanje nd'umwe, 
na Dat' Imana. ni yo ndagi ndabaraze

3.Ikirang’ Umwami, mw’Ishengero ryiwe 
n’urukundo n’amahoro nitwer’imbuto 
za Mpwemu Yera, Umwami 
azoshemegizwa.

4.Uwuri mu mubiri wa Yesu 
Kristo, arangwa n'izo mbuto; natwe 
twer' imbuto z'uburyo bwa Mpwemu
Umwam' azoshemagizwa.

umuco_206.songBody:
1.Ijambo ry'Imana n'ijambo 
ry’ukuri, kudahinduka; iy’Imana 
isezerany’ isezerano ntirihinduka; 
n’Ijambo ry’Uhorah’ Imana.

./.Naho isi n’ijuru, vyorangira 
vyose./. Ijambo ry’Imana, ry’Imana; 
rizokwamah’ ibihe vyose(Ijambo) 
n’ijambo ry’Uhorah’ Imana(Ijambo); 
ni ryo ryaremy’ isi n’ijuru(Ijambo); ni 
ryo ryihinduye umuntu(Ijambo); ni ryo 
Yesu Mukiza wacu, ./.None natwe, 
twambar’ Ijambo, ni ryo rizoduha 
kudapfa./.

2.Ivy’Imana yavugish’ umuhanuzi wayo, 
umuhanuzi Malaki yavugishijwe ivy'ukuza 
kw’integuza y’Umwami, igihe c’iherezo 
mu bushobozi bwa Eliya.

3.Ivy’Imana yavugishij’ umuhanuzi wayo 
vyarashitse vyose; non’Umwami wacu 
ehe ng'uyo agira aze, gutwar’ ishengero 
nk’uko vyari vyasezeranywe.

umuco_207.songBody:
1.Imvura yaraguye igwira, igiti c’Imana 
nzima; ari ryo Shengero rya mbere, 
yaguye ku munsi wa Pentekote, umunsi 
w’ivyasezeranywe.

Igiti n’ishengero, ryatewe n’Umwami 
Yesu, imvura niy’Imana nzima; igiti 
cer’ imbuto, zitey’ igomwe cane, vyari 
vyasezeranywe.

2.Satani yabony’ ico giti, igiti 
gitey’ igomwe; aca yohereza inzige, zo 
kuyigiza ico giti, ariko igiti nic’Imana.

3.Inzige ziyigiz’ ico giti, igiti c’Imana 
nzima; gisigara ku gishitsi, nta mashami 
nta n’amababi, gisigara ku gishitsi.

4.Kubw’inkomezi z’Imana, igiti casubiye 
gutoha, kubw’imvura y’Imana nzima, 
kirashamika kirashurika, kuko car’igiti 
c’Imana.

5.Kubw’inkomezi z’Imana, Satani 
afis’ ubwoba; kubw’inkomezi z’abahanuzi, 
Satani ahind’ agashitsi, kubw’inkomezi za 
Mpwemu Yera.

umuco_208.songBody:
1.We hanga ry’Imana nzima, Imana yawe 
irakomeye, yagukuye muri Egiputa, 
mu buja bw’umwe Farawo.

N'ishimwe rinini cane, ku buntu 
wagiriwe; abana bawe baririmbe, 
bati: Uhoraho ashimwe ./.Shimwa 
Mwami shimwa, shimwa, shimwa! 
Ku vyiza wakoze, shimwa, shimwa! 
Mw’Ishengero ryawe, shimwa, 
shimwa./. 

2.We hanga ry’Imana nzima, Imana 
yawe n’inyenkomezi, yagutsindiy’ ivyago 
vyinshi, n’abami b’inkomezi nyinshi.

3.Mvuge nte ga Mana yanje n’ukuri 
ur’umunyenkomezi, ihanga ryawe 
rigushime ku buntu warigiriye.

4.Mu rugendo nzokwama Mwami, 
ngushima nkuririmbira, ku buntu bwawe 
wangiriye, nkaba nd’umwe mw'ihanga 
ryawe.

umuco_209.songBody:
1.N'ukuri n'ukuri ndababwire, 
uwutavuts’ ubwakabiri ntashobora 
kubon’ Imana na rimwe kirets’ avuts’ ubwa 
kabiri, emera upfe kuri wewe, wumve ko wewe 
utakiriho: hasigaye Umwami Yesu, 
emera upfe kuri wewe, wewe, wewe, 
wewe…

Inzira y’umusaraba, ./.eh’iruguruye./.
Umwami Yesu nawe, aracataritse 
ibiganza vyiwe ati nimuze, nimuze 
mwese, nari narapfuye none ndi 
muzima, kandi ni kubwanyu, ni ku
bwanyu, none injira, mu ruhongore, mu 
ruhongore, rw’intama z’Imana, injira, 
injira, injira…

2.N’ukuri, n’ukuri, ndababwire, 
uwutejejwe n’amaraso, ntashobora 
kubon’ Imana na rimwe, kiretse avutse 
muri Mpwemu ikiri muri mu mubiri n’umubiri 
ikiri muri Mpwemu ni Mpwemu, 
kukw’ivya Mpwemu ari Mpwemu, 
ivy’umubiri ar’umubiri...biri...biri...biri...

3.Yesu yabwiye Nikodemu, at’utavutse 
ubwa kabiri, ntushobora kubon’Imana 
na rimwe, kirets’uvuts’ubwa kabiri,
 kukw’ivyo Mpwemu yifuza vyose, 
bitandukanye n’ivy’umubiri, n’ivyo 
kamere kifuza vyose, bitandukanye n’ivya 
Mpwemu, Mpwemu, Mpwemu...

4.None k’Umwami yaduciriy’ inzira, 
n’iki cotubuza kuyicamwo, natwe 
twemere gupfa kuri twebwe, 
twambar’ ubuzima bw’Umwami Yesu, 
dupfane nawe, tuzuranwe nawe, 
twambar’ ubuzima bw’Uhoraho, 
ingo twinjire, ingo twinjire, mu nzira 
y’umusaraba, saraba...saraba...saraba...

umuco_21.songBody:
1.Tuwashe taa ziwake daima tukisubiri 
ndugu yangu. Bwana atafika, wenye 
vyombo muweke mafuta, akifika sisi 
twende pamoja naye.

Oo ndugu yangu,tumungojee bila 
kuchoka, kwa kuwa hatujui saha, 
atakapokuja Bwana asubuhi, ao Ni 
usiku tumungojee, akifika twende 
kwake na furaha ya arusi ya Mwana 
kondoo.

2.Na imani yetu ndiye mafuta, tulishike 
neno kila siku tuwashe taa kama 
Bibi arusi angoja Bwana pia, sisi 
sote tumungojee Bwana Arusi.

3.Je nawe ndugu unaengoja Bwana uko 
hali gani katika maisha unajenga wapi, 
nyumba yako, umupe Bwana Yesu, Moyo 
wako ili akufikishe mbinguni

4.Acha vyote ujenge juu ya Yesu na 
uache neno liwe ndani yako Yesu akirudi 
kuchukua wake ujikute tayali, ndugu 
yangu wende pamoja na Bwana Yesu.

umuco_210.songBody:
1.Har’inzira nziza, ij’ah’uri Mwami; 
n’inzira nziza cane, yuzuy’ubwiza 
bw’Umwami ./../.Nzoyicamwo jewe./../.

Ikozwe n’amabuye y’igiciro kinini, 
umugezi wayo n’umwubatsi wayo 
ni Yesu Mwami, ni Yesu Mwami, 
yayisize zahabu na Maragarita nyinshi 
itemb’ amaraso n’amarira y’Abera 
./../.Nzoca mur’iyo nzira, nshikah’uri 
Mwami./../.

2.Ntinyerera na gato, kubw’amaraso 
y’Umwami; ntinyerera na gato 
kubw’amaraso y’Abera ./../.N’inzira nziza 
cane./../.

3.Har’ibimenyetso, cane mur’iyo 
nzira; n’ivyerekana yuko 
har’ abayiciyemwo././.Nd’umwe muri bo 
Mwami./../.

4.Nshoboza Mwami Yesu, kuko 
nd’uwawe rwose, mfat’ukuboko 
jewe, unyuzuz’ inkomezi./../.Umurikire 
Mwami./../.

umuco_211.songBody:
1.Sirayeli, Sirayeli nyamusubiranyuma, 
igihe kigeze he bivuge namba ubibona; 
na wewe Laodikiya wigiz’ uwahumutse, 
igihe kigeze he bivuge namba ubibona?

Eh’abana b’Ubwami, bariko barinjira, 
bamaze gushikira bos’ibibanza 
vyabo naw’uja irya n’ino ufatafata 
vyanka, uzohava ukebuka wamaze 
kwugaranwa ./.Injira ncuti, injira./.

2.Waragiye ku musozi 
wigir’umushibamyi,wibwira 
mu mutima uti ndakomeye 
sinzogwa; wigir’ uwahumutse kandi 
naw’ ukir’ impumyi, igihe kigeze he bivuge 
namba ubibona?

3.Na wewe mwene Dat’uri muri 
Laodikiya, ukab’ ata kind’ ukora atari 
ukwishimagiza, wigir’ uwahumutse kandi 
naw’ ukir’ impumyi, igihe kigeze he bivuge 
namb’ utar’ impumyi?

4.Wicar’uvug’ insak’ ukibwira kuri mu kuri, 
wirirw’ urac’ imanza 
kand’atawabigushinze, aho 
kurab’ igih’ ugezemwo wishing’utaka, 
igihe kigeze he, mbarira namba ubibona.

umuco_212.songBody:
1.Mburanya, kandi untsinde; 
kuk’urubanza rwatanguriye, mu 
b’inzu yawe Mana, nkubita kandi 
unsubire ./.Kukw’inkoni yawe Mana, 
ariy’ inyobora Mwami (vy’ukuri)./.

Muri wewe, niho har’inyishu, muri 
wewe, niho hari vyose; muri wewe 
nta oya canke ego, muri wewe hari 
“Amen” ./.Unkubite kand’unsubireee, 
kukw’indagizo, yawe Mwami, 
ariy’inyobora./.

2.Ndemeye gutsindwa n’Ijambo, 
kuk’urubanza rwawe rukomeye, mu 
b’inzu yawe Mana, nkubita kandi 
unsubire ./.Kukw’inkoni yawe Mana, 
ariy’inyora Mwami (vy’ukuri)./.

3.Mpa kwubah’Ijambo ryawe, mpa 
kwubaha mwene Data, mpa kuba 
mu kibanza canje, unyobore wame 
unyobora./.Kukw’Ijambo ryawe Mana, 
ari ryo rimurikira./.

4.Umwe wese, azobazw’ ivyiwe, umwe 
wese azoburanywa, twemere gutsindwa 
n’Ijambo, umwe wese yubahe mwene 
Se ./.Kukw’Ijambo ry’Imana Yera, ari ryo 
rimurikira./.

umuco_213.songBody:
1.Nshoboza Mwami Yesu, guhora 
nguhimbara; mu kubaho kwanje kuko 
kuba mw’isi ar’ivy’igihe gito; ariko kuba 
mw’ijuru n’ivy’ibihe bidashira.

Turiko dusozera intambwe yanyuma 
./.Dushoboze kugira ngo tuzoshobore 
gushikira, kuzoba hafi yawe Mwami./.

2.Washoboje Daniyeli, 
kugum’aguhimbara; mu buzima 
bwiwe bwose mu rugendo, yamye 
akwemangira; none nanje Mwami 
umfashe nguhimbare

3.Washoboj’abana bawe, bose 
kuguhimbara none nanje Mwami 
mfasha mur’iyi si, nshobore 
kuguhimbara; kuko kubaho mw’isi, 
ar’ivy’igihe gito.

4.Fash’ Ishengero ryawe, rishobore 
kuguhimbara; suka Mpwemu wawe 
mw’Ishengero ryawe, ryuzur’ ubwiza 
bwawe; kugir’abana bawe bashobore 
kuguhimbara.

umuco_214.songBody:
1.Mbe Mwami je nzonesha 
ryar’ intambara zose, ngo nger’iwawe 
Mwami nanje nduhuke? Nzogeza 
ryari Mwami kubabarizwa mw’isi, ngo 
nger’ iwawe Mwami nanje nduhuke?

Iyo nzira ncamwo iduga cane, nca 
mu mivyimba no mu magufa, kubwo 
kubona inzir' ah’ica, sinumviriz’ abo ku 
ruhande, kubwo kumenya nez’iyo ngiye, 
sinterw’ ubwoba n’iyo mivyimba, izuba 
ni ryinshi Mwami nje ngo nduhuke, 
imvura ni nyinshi Mwami nje ngo 
nduhuke, nduhuke.

2.Nzogera ryar’ iwawe ngo 
nduhuk’ imiruho, ubwo ntazongera 
kuririra mw’isi ukundi, umutima wanje 
udendebuwe no kurira, nzoger’ iwawe 
ryari mbon’uwo nkunda.

3.Iyo mvuz’ ivy'ukuri benshi barabimpora, 
nzoger’iwawe ryari ngo nduhuke kurira, 
mur’iyi si  nta mahoro ndayiboneramwo, 
nzoger' iwawe ryari mve mur’iyi si mbi.

umuco_215.songBody:
1.Umv’ ijwi ry’usemerera riti, ni 
mutegur’ inzira y’Umwami; cur’ intama 
ziwe zazimiye, dukoran’ umwete 
hakibona.

Umwam' atugir’ inama yuko, 
izishonje tuzozahirira, kand’izigwaye 
tuzozandaza; inyantege nke nazo 
tuziterure ./.Dukore twese tuzoruhuka 
Umwami ni yaza./.

2.Ijwi ryiwe ryumvikana hose, 
rit’egeranya intama burije, zishorere 
zishike mu rugo, kora nk’umwizigirwa 
w’Umwami.

3.Mwami urugendo ruraruhije, 
duh’ umwete twandaz’ abarushe; 
kand’ibikorwa biraruhije, duh’umwete 
n’ishaka dukore

4. Eh’abakomeretswa n’amahwa, 
hari n’abahumishwa n’umwansi; 
Mwami humur’ amaso abahumye, 
babon’ ivy'ukorera mw’ishengero.

umuco_216.songBody:
1.Urugendo rw’abana b’Imana, biragoye 
kurumenya vy’ukuri, iyo ndarwibajije 
ruransiga, ico nzi gusa kandi nizeye n’uko 
ab’Imana bari muri rwo

Ntuz’ ugire abo wishimira mw’ijambo, 
ntuze wiyitirire umuntu n’umwe 
mw’Ishengero, uz’ urondere kubona 
Imana yonyene mw’ijambo ryayo ./.Ivyo 
navyo bizoguha guhagarara, 
kand’uzoshikama mu gakiza./.

2.Iyo nzira bagenda bacamwo, nayo
 nyene iragoye gutahura, kuko n’ubwenge 
ntibuyitahura, ariko uwuyihishuriwe 
wese, arayizera kandi akayibandanya.

3.Ncuti zanje mumbwire namwe, 
umunyabwenge arazimira, n’ikijuju naco 
kikayihusha, ivy’iyo nzira Data, biz’ Imana 
nyen’igikorwa.

4.N’uko bene Data nkunda cane, iyo 
nzira uz' uyibaze Imana gusa, nturabe 
ivyifuzo vyawe ncuti ariko wiragize Imana 
yonyene, kuko iri mu guhishurirwa 
kuzima.

umuco_217.songBody:
1.Nari nicecekeye bene Data, ata 
na kimwe ninona jewe, ngize ntya 
nsang’ Iman yahagurukije ba Daniyeli 
basigaye bafis’ imigabo y’igikorwa c’Imana.

None ni mwumve namwe 
ihang’ Umwami yiguz’ amaraso 
nimuze dusubir’ I Yerusalemu tuje 
kwubak’ ingoro y’Uhoraho.

2.Birakomeye cane bene Data, 
kuk’Umwami yarwany’ iryo hanga, 
niwe asigaye arishigikiye, kandi nawe 
n’uwukomeye, asigaye yumvira 
ukugomba kw’Imana.

3.Ndasubiye kubikubwira ncuti, ivyoba 
vyiza n’uko wokwizera, uvyank’ ubikunda 
ico gikorwa kizokorwa n’abahizi b’Imana, 
niwizigire rero mufatanye hamwe 
m’urugendo.

4.Wiyuhagire rero mugenzi wanje, 
wiyambure wewe ivy’umenyereye, 
witandukanye n’ivyo wikundira, 
kuko igikorwa c’Imana nzima, kenshi 
sic’ abantu bikundira canke biyumvira.

umuco_218.songBody:
1.Shengero ry’Imana Ihoraho, ntimuri 
ishengero nk’ayandi, ivyo ni mubimenye 
bagenzi, kuko muri ihanga riri ukwaryo; 
ihanga ry’Imana isumba vyose

Umve rero ncuti zanje, 
dusangiy’ ukwizera kuzima, ni mwihutire 
kugendera mwese, mw’ijambo ry’Imana 
ryose, kuko niho hari ubugingo 
budashira.

2.Ijambo ngiryo riravuga, n’uwufise 
amatwi ni yumve, uwufise amaso 
n’abone, kuko Uhoraho ubwiwe ni we 
yakenyereye ishengero ryiwe.

3.N’ubuntu butangaje bene Data, kubona 
Imana ariy’ ikora, mbega n’impamvu 
yihe haba ivyo, nuko ihanga ar’ iry’Imana 
nzima, yarikunze ritarribwabeho na gato.

4.Itandukanye rero n’akamenyero, 
mwihutire kwinjira n’ingoga, mw’ihanga 
ry’ukuri ry’Imana, ritari iribonwa 
n’amaso y’umubiri, ariko rigendera mu 
guhishurirwa.

umuco_219.songBody:
1.Mwami wanje umpumure amaso, 
mbon’ inzira ica ku musaraba, 
niy’ ishikana mw’ijuru ku Mana, niho 
tuzorangiriz’ urugendo, turirimbe 
tugushime.

Har’ inzira nyinshi cane, zica ku 
musoz’ unyerera, zimanuka zij’ ikuzimu, 
benshi nizo bacamwo.

2.Mbeg’ iyo nzira imeze gute, 
yuzuy’ umuco mwinshi cane, 
n’abayicamwo bameze gute,n'abahawe 
gucika abana b'Imana, bavutse ubwa 
kabiri.

3.Benshi baseng’ Imana ariko inzira, 
ntibayibona, benshi bakunda Imana 
arikw’ inzira ntibayibona ar’inzira y’ukuri 
kand’ishikana mu bugingo budashira.

4.Wibuk’ Isirayeli igeze mu bugaragwa, 
yari kumwe n’inkingi y’umuriro, 
yari kumwe na Mose umuhanuzi? 
Arikw’ inzira ntibayibona.

5.Batuka Mose inkingi ihari, 
bagator’ amabuye inkingi ihari, bama 
bidodomba ibihe vyose, amaso yabo 
ntiyabon’ Imana, kand’ariyo yari 
yarabahamagaye.

6.Mwami fash’ ishengero ryawe 
twugurur’ amaso tubone, tubon’ inkingi 
y’umuriro, n’ukunt’ irongor’ ishengero 
mu kuri kwose, dufashe Mwami 
tukuyoboke.

umuco_22.songBody:
1.Mfise umuntu ankunda n’Umwami 
Yesu, urukundo rwiwe n’agahebuza, mu 
bugingo bwanje.

Mbega ncuti wubatse he? Kuri kristo 
wumva ufise Urukundo rwa Yesu kristo?

2.Yesu ni we Jambo Jambo ni Yesu, 
uryizeye vy’ukuri, afite ubugingo hamwe 
n’urukundo

3.Vyose bizoshira kiretse kimwe, 
urukundo gusa ruzokwamaho ibihe 
bidashira.

4.Ahari urukundo rwa Yesu, ntihaba 
ubwoba ntagushidikanya, nta 
n’amaganya nta n'umwijima.

5.Yesu n’urukundo n’umwakire ubu, 
wizere ijambo rye, ubone ubugingo 
uronke urukundo.

umuco_220.songBody:
1.Ijambo ry’Imana twoshobora kuryizera 
gute, tudashobora guhishurirw’ ab’Imana 
yarirungikanye?
./.Kuko kuva na kera hose Imana 
yakoresha abana bayo bambay’ umubiri

./.Mana tugirir’ imbabazi./. kugira ngo 
ntidushobore ./.Guhush’inzira./.

2.Mu gihe ca Nowa wahagurukije 
umusavyi wawe Nowa kuburira ab’igihe ciwe 
ivyagira bishike ./.Yamara kubwo 
kubon’ umuntu ntibashoboye gukira 
ivyago vyagira bishike dushoboze twoye 
kubon’ umuntu./.

3.Ni nako vyagenze mu bihe vyose 
vyagiye bibaho ku bahamagawe 
bose bagiye barongorwa nivy’Imana 
ishima ./.N’isi ubwayo idashobora 
kubatahura, uduhe Mana kwama turi 
maso./.

4.No mur’iki gihe cacu har’ijambo 
ritegura Umugeni yamara 
hakubona ijambo ridushoboza 
gushikira ugutunganywa 
kwose ./.Tukabon’ ibidakwiye kubonwa 
tugirire ubuntu Mana./.

5.Shengero dusangiye ukwizera ijambo 
ry’Imana ntirikina rifise ububasha 
bwo gukiza ku baryizera ./.Kandi rifise 
ubushobozi bwo kwica ku bataryizera 
dushoboze Mana kwizera kugira ngo 
tubeho./.

umuco_221.songBody:
1.Inzir’ ija mu Bwami, mugenzi n'iy’ abana 
b’Imana Ihoraho, abo na bo bama 
bitez’ imisi yose kurongorwa nivy’Imana 
ishima, bakagenda bicishije bugufi.

Ndashim’ Imana mu bugingo bwanje, 
kubw’igikorwa cayo co gucungura, 
ico yatanguye kuva kera cane, 
ikoreshej' abana bayo b’abahizi ./.Bama 
basemerera ibihe vyose bati: Uku 
ni k’Uhoraho agize ab’Imana bakumvira n’imitima yabo bose./.

2.Imana ihamagara Aburahamu, 
av’ iwabo atangur’ urugendo, nah’ atar’ azi 
iy’aja vy’ukuri mu kwizera yashitse mu 
gihugu c’amasezerano y’Uhoraho.

3.Eliya nawe mu bugingo bwiwe, 
yabay’umuhizi mu kwizera, 
kubw’ukwumvir’ Imana mwenedata 
yaremanze ku ruhande rw’Uhoraho, 
yiyerekanye abiwe barizera.

4.Umwami yaranesheje urugamba vyose 
vyarangiriye ku musaraba, ab’Imana 
mushikame mu kuri, maze benedata 
mushobore kwegukir’ amarembo y’abansi 
banyu.

umuco_222.songBody:
1.Ndaririmba intsinzi intsinzi y'Uhoraho, 
intsinzi ndirimba s’iyo nabwiwe n’abantu 
n’iyo, n’iyo niboneye.

Nari narumvishije ivyaw’ ugutwi 
ariko noneh’ ijisho(ryanje) 
rirakwiboneye ./.(N'iyo, n'iyo niboneye)./.

2.Ndaririmb’ intsinzi intsinzi y’Umwami
 yabonekey’ i Gologota Umwami ati : 
vyose birarangiye n'iyo, n'iyo niboneye.

3.Ndaririmb’ intsinzi, intsinzi y’Imana 
n’intsinzi y’ukuri Satani yatsinzwe 
n’ijambo n'iyo, n'iyo niboneye.

4.Ndaririmb’ intsinzi intsinzi y’ijambo 
Abera baranesheje n’intsinzi, n’intsinzi 
ikomeye n'iyo, n'iyo niboneye.

5.Ndaririmb’ intsinzi intsinzi y’Abera 
baneshej’ ibinyoma n’intsinzi, n’intsinzi 
itazoshira n'iyo n'iyo niboneye.

umuco_223.songBody:
1.Ni kuki ishengero rica mw’isi mu 
mahanga menshi kandi rikahateba? ./.Ni 
kuki intambwe ziba nyinshi benshi 
bakananirwa./.

N’uko ntawuzoshika, 
atarwany’ urugamba n’uko 
ntawuzoshika atanesheje urugamba.

2.Ni kuk’Isirayeli yidodomba ivyokurya 
n’amazi bibuze ./.Ntibizeye Imana namba 
bagenza Mose gusa./.

3.Vyose vyari mu Mana nzima 
babirondera nabi kuko batizera 
./.Imana ikabibaha kand’ikabahana kuko 
batabona./.

4.Natwe ntitwidoge turizwa 
n’ivyokurya canke n’ivyo tutumva kuko 
bikomeye ./.Turindire ni twameneka 
tuzovyumva dushikiriy’ ukwezwa./.

5.Iyo niyo nzira ishengero ricamwo 
n’inzira itumbikana mu bwenge ./.Igoye 
gutahura mugabo ishikana mw’ijuru ku 
Mana./.

6.Ni twuzure Mpwemu Yera 
tuzogendana n’Imana yacu ./.Tuzovyumva 
vyos’uko biri ntituzotsitara namba./.

umuco_224.songBody:
1.Mbeg’inzira y’amarushwa, Daniyeli 
yaciyemwo n’Aburahamu na Isaka, 
na Yakobo n’Umwami Yesu ./. Niyo yaciyemwo./.

Emera uduge umusozi niho inzir’ ica, 
amarira uharirira uzoyahanagurwa, 
biguh’ inkomezi ./.Iyo nzira Abera bose 
niyo bacamwo./.

2.Sab’ Imana inkomezi umusozi 
ntukunanire nturabe abaca musi 
yawo ko bagaenda borohewe 
biyambik’ ukugororoka kuva mu nkomezi 
zabo ./.Iyo n’iyindi nzira./.

3.Inzira ducamwo irakomeye, Abera ni 
bo bayimenya, abanduy’ imitima yabo, 
ntibashobora kuyicamwo ./.Bagejej bayigwamwo./.

4.Udafise Mpwemu Yera ntuzokwumva 
namba, intambwe zose zizogusiga 
ivy’Imana ikoze uzogum’ ubaza, kuri 
wewe ni mw’ijoro ./.Sab’ Imana buce./.

umuco_225.songBody:
1.Nous vivons une bonne période, où le 
chemin qui va vers le ciel est ouvert, à 
tous les élus de Dieu qui marchent non 
selon leurs désirs mais selon la volonté
 du Seigneur.

Ne perdez plus courage oh ! élu de 
Dieu, reste fermes dans la parole de 
Dieu voici le matin éternel vient où 
tous les vainqueurs, dans la foi, seront 
présents ././Nous chanterons tous les 
jours en disant : oh ! que la gloire et 
la puissance, soient à l’eternel pour 
toujours./.

2.Les enfants de Dieu n’ont eu pour 
toujours qu’une seule envie dans leur 
vie si ce n’est que de mener une vie 
chrétienne digne de tous ceux qui sont 
appelés dans la vérité.

3.Malgré leurs faiblesses humaines tant 
spirituelles que charnelles malgré les
 difficultés rencontrées et que le combat 
soit acharné ils ont persévéré dans la 
vérité.

4.Nous aussi frères et soeurs en Christ 
persévérons sachant que toutes choses 
concourent au bien de ceux qui aiment 
Dieu tenons fermes ce que nous avons 
reçu bientôt le combat va se terminer et 
nous serons tous couronnés.

umuco_226.songBody:
1.Uhoraho n’umuco wanje, amurikira 
ibirenge vyanje, n’ahimbarizw’ izina 
ryiwe, ni ryo ryampaye kubana nawe.

./.Ubu ntegereje kandi nihanganye 
kuzambikw’ umubiri udapfa./.

2.Ntegereje izuka ry’Abera, no kubona 
Umukiza wanje, twibonanire hirya 
mw’ijuru, ibi nivyo vyizigiro mfise.

3.Uhoraho n’umwungere wanje, ntaco 
nzokena mur’iyi nzira, naho umwijima 
wonsugereza, inkigi y’umuriro n’itara 
ryanje

4.Nyenyeri yo ku kagoroba, suk’ umuco 
mu bana bawe, bahumuke babon’ inzira, 
ubahe n’amavuta asagutse.

5.Yesu abwira abamwizeye ati : ni je 
Muco w’ukuri, n’umwungere wigura
 intama, utandiye wese ntaronk’ ubugingo.

6.Nyenyeri yo mu gaturuturu, ah’ ushitse 
nta mwiza uhaba, tugushimiy’ ijambo 
uduha, ni ryo gari rizodushitsa mw’ijuru.

umuco_227.songBody:
1.Pour  cet immense bonheur, 
Alléluia! que tu as mis dans mon cœur, 
Alléluia ! Je veux te chanter, Seigneur, 
Alléluia ! oui Jésus est mon Sauveur, Alléluia !

2.Je le redirai encore, Alléluia Que 
pour moi Jesus est mort Alleluia ! Voilà 
pourquoi je l’adore, Alléluia ! Lui seul est 
tout mon trésor, Alléluia !

3.Que chaque jour à chaque heur, 
Alléluia ! En moi tu aies ta demeure, 
Alléluia que ma vie soit une fleur 
Alléluia ! un parfum pour toi, Seigneur, 
Alléluia !

4.Que chaque seconde de ma vie, 
Alléluia ! ma vie soit conduite à toi,
 Alléluia ! un outil pour toi Sauveur, Alléluia !

umuco_228.songBody:
1.Quand l’Esprit de Dieu habita en moi, 
je chante comme David (bis) ./.Je chante 
(x3) comme David./.

2.Quand l’Esprit de Dieu habite en moi, 
je loue comme David (bis) ./. Je loue (x3) 
comme David./.

3.Quand l’Esprit de Dieu habite en moi, 
je prie comme David (bis) ./.Je prie (x3) 
comme David./.

4.Quand l’Esprit de Dieu habite en moi, 
je danse comme David (bis) ./.Je danse 
(x3) comme David./.
umuco_228.songTitle: (a) QUAND L’ESPRIT DE DIEU HABITE EN MOI

umuco_229.songBody:
1.L’amour de Dieu de loin surpasse ce 
qu’on peut dire un coeur humain ; il est 
plus grand que les espaces mȇme en 
l’abîme, il nous atteint, pour le péché de 
notre monde Dieu nous donna Jésus, 
il nous pardonne, oh ! paix profonde, il 
sauve les perdus.

L’amour de Dieu, si fort si tendre, est un 
amour sans fin tel est le chant, que font 
entendre les Anges et les Saints.

2.Versez de l’encre, dans les ondes, 
changez le ciel, en parchemin tenez la
 plume, à tout le monde et que chacun, 
soit écrivain vous direz tout, l’Amour du 
Père ferait tarir les eaux, et remplirait la 
place entière, sur ces divins rouleaux.

3.Et que le monde, un jou chancelle
 avec ses trônes, et ses rois quand 
trembleront, tous les rebelles soudain 
saisis, d’un grand effroi, de Dieu l’Amour 
que rien ne lasse pour nous encore 
vivra, c’est le miracle de la grâce, Amen ! 
Alléluia !
umuco_229.songTitle: L'AMOUR DE DIEU DE LOIN, SURPASSE

umuco_23.songBody:
1.Yesu yaraciye umugani mwiza, 
w’urwamfu n’ururo, urwamfu n’abana ba 
wa mubi, uburo n’abana b’Imana.

Abana ba wa mubi bama bahama 
abana b’Imana ibihe vyose, uhereye mu 
gihe c’umwe Abeli, gushika n’uno munsi

2.Imana yabivye imbuto nziza, mu 
ndimiro nziza cane, haca iruhande 
umwansi wayo, ateramw’ imbuto mbi.

3.Imvura iragwa ku mbuto nziza, kandi 
igwa no ku mbuto mbi, vyose biramera 
bib’ uruvange, urwamfu hamwe n’uburo.

4.Abana b’Imana ibihe 
vyose, bafis’ uguhishurirwa, 
bagahishurirw’ amasezerano, 
Imana yabasezeraniye.

5.Abana ba wa mubi ntabwo bafise 
guhishurirwa muri bo, akarorero Kayini 
ntabwo yamenye, ivyo gushikanir’Imana.

None nawe mwene data wahishuriwe 
ukuri kuzima n’ushim’ Imana, 
dushikame ku masezerano yayo 
duhang’ amas’ iwacu.

umuco_230.songBody:
1.Nkunda kwibaza cane iminsi yose 
ku kintu nama mbona kandi kitoroshe 
simfise n’ukuntu nogisigura neza 
n’urukundo Umwami Imana yakunze 
abiwe ./.Aho niho har’agakiza k’Imana./.

None ngire nte jewe, ko nd’umuntu, 
Arikw’ Imana yo ni nyen’ inkomezi, Yesu 
Kristo, Mwami wanje Mana yanje, 
unyuzuz’ urukundo rwawe ./.Nshobore 
kugendera mu kugomba kwawe./.

2.Ico gikorwa nticoroshe bagenzi, kuko 
catanguye kuva kera cane, Imana ikirema 
isi n’ijuru n’ibindi vyose, arik’ umuntu 
ikamurema mw’ishusho yayo ./.Iyo 
yar’ imigabo yayo yo kutwihishurira./.

3.Imigambi y’Imana yarakomej’ iseruka, 
igihe Adamu yacumuye k'Uhoraho 
ubuntu n’agakiza k’Imana itanga 
biraseruka mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo 
duhabwa gucungurwa ./.Izo n’imbabazi 
zayo zo kuturokora./.

4.Ubu naho sinzi ukuntu nobivuga, 
kuk’Umwami wanje mbona ari 
Muzima, mw’Ihanga ryayo jewe ngenda 
mbona uko bukeye ubwiza bw’Imana 
bwiyongera ./.Iyo n’intsinzi y’umusaraba 
wa Yesu Kristo./.

umuco_231.songBody:
1.Uhereye kera hose Imana ifise 
imigabo, Imana isezeranira Aburahamu 
sogokuru, imubwira ko uruvyaro rwiwe 
ruzogwira ./.Kubw’ukwizera yarashoboye 
kuvyara naho yar' akaheze./.

Bene Data igihe kirakuze cane, kuko 
ivy’Imana yasezeranye vyarashitse, 
ibindi navyo birihuta, guseruka 
tugumye muri twebwe urukundo 
rw’Imana ./.Tugendere mu kwizera, 
kuvuye mu guhishurirwa eh’Umwami 
araje./.

2.Mu gihe c'umusavyi w’Imana, 
nawe yitwa Dawidi Uhoraho yongera 
gutanga isezerano yuko ku gishitsi 
ciwe hazoturuka Umukiza ./.Umukiza 
w’Abisirayeli n’abanyamahanga niwe 
Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu./.

3.Abanyamahanga twese twari injabuka 
ku masezerano nta Mana nzima twari 
dufise vy’ukuri, kiretse Imana zitavuga 
kandi ntizishure ./.Kubwa Yesu Kristo 
tumadikwa ku gishitsi n’ubuntu 
bw’Imana./.

4.Ariko ubu none turi abaraganwa na 
Yesu Kristo turi abo mu nzu y'Imana 
Ihoraho nuko rero twiyubare uko 
tugenda ./.Nitwihangana tukagumya 
ukwizera (kuzima) tuzomubona mw’ijuru 
amaso mu yandi./.

umuco_233.songBody:
1.Turi mu gihe canyuma c’ubuntu, 
kuko ubutumwa bwiza twumva vy’ukuri 
 s’ubwo kutugira irindi shengero canke 
ngo butuzanire izindi nyigisho ./.Ariko 
n’ubutugarura kw’ijambo ry’Uhoraho 
(Imana)./.

Nico gituma yasezeranye ati ehe ngiye 
gukora igikorwa kitar’ ic’umubiri naho 
bazokibasigurira, ntibazogitahura 
kiretse abafise amaso n’amatwi 
bashobora kubona, no gutahura 
ivy’Imana ./.Yari yaravugiye mu kanwa 
k’abahanuzi (bayo)./.

2.Isezerano Umwami yasezeranye nta 
gihe gisigaye ngo riseruke kuko wa 
mugore mbona akuriwe wa mwana 
w’umuhungu ari hafi kuvuka ./.Kandi 
niyavuka azoca azamurwa mw’ijuru./.

3.Ntitukiri muri vya bihe vya kera 
ariko turi mu gihe c’Iman' Ihoraho ijwi 
riranguruye riri mu gusemerera akamo 
n’inzamba y’Imana igiye kuvuga ./.Kuko 
Umwami wacu (Yesu) agiye kugaruka./.

4.Mbega ncuti nawe uzoba urimwo 
kuko abadafise Mpwemu w’Imana 
batazoshobora na gato kuzamurwa iki 
n’igihe ciza co kwitunganya ./.kugira ngo 
uzoshobore gusanganira Umukiza./.

umuco_234.songBody:
1.Ewe bihe vyiz’ Imana yateguriy’ abayo 
kugira ngo bagende bamurikirwa 
n’umuco ari ryo Jambo ryahishuwe ryo 
mur’iki gihe ubura bw’Imana bugenda 
buronka ./.Kukw’ ar’ukuri kuzotuma 
basanganir’ Umukiza./.

Umunsi mukuru uhambaye uraje inkumi 
z’ibijuju zo zizorira cane nay’inkumi 
z’ubwenge zizoririmba kuko zigiye 
gusanganir’ Umwami mu bicu uko 
nikwo kuzuka kwa mbere Mwene Data 
ambara nawe ukuri kuzima uzoshobore 
kuzoba mur’uko kuzuka.

2.Iki gihe turimwo benshi baracifuje 
abahanuzi barahanura bashim ’Imana 
abahizi bigatuma bashikama 
mu kwizera Abera na bo barakibona 
bakagihahamira ./.Kuko ar’igihe c’ubuntu 
n’agakiza./.

3.Ewe hanga ry’Imana Imana isumba vyose, 
k’Umwami yakuvukiye mbega wewe 
war'ubizi, akabambwa ku Musaraba 
mbega har’igikorwa arikw’arakora ./.Ni waba 
ukibona, ncuti n’ushime Imana./.

4.Mbona rero iminsi igenda yihuta 
cane Abera bagenda bambikwa impuzu 
z’ubukwe kandi bagenda badomwako
 ikimenyetso ari co ca Mpwemu Yera 
Mpwemu Yera w’Imana ./.Kukw’ata gihe 
gisigaye, Umwami Yesu akaza./.

umuco_235.songBody:
1.Jina la Bwana Mungu , ni jina la ajabu 
kweli, ni jina lililoniumba mimi, mbingu 
dunia, hata na vitu vyote.

Ilo jina ni wokovu wetu, Yesu Kristo 
alisulubiwa kwa ajili ya wewe na mimi, 
akasema yote yamekwisha ./.Haleluya, 
haleluya ! Mwokozi alitukomboa./.

2.Jina la Mungu Baba, ni jina la uwezo 
wote kwa sababu linaponya magonjwa 
na kuwapa watu kushinda vita.

3.Jina la Bwana Mungu, linaleta amani 
moyoni, katika jina hilo, tunapata kutii 
Mungu katika imani.

4.Jina la Bwana Mungu, ni la Uzima 
wa milele linatupa kuwa taifa lake na 
kuongozwa na neno lake.

5.Jina hilo si lingine bali ni la Yesu
Kristo, kwa sababu katika huyo, 
tumepata uzima wa milele.

umuco_236.songBody:
1.Uhoraho Umwami ndagusavye, 
umfate ukuboko mu rugendo, kuko 
ico wampamagariye, atar’ ukuzoguma 
mur’iyi si.

Ungirire ubuntu Mwami Yesu ./.Kugira 
ngo nonosore ico ntegerezwa gukora./.

2.Ijambo ryawe riravuga, yuko 
harih’ibikorwa vyiza ; Abera bawe 
bazokora, bamaze guhamagarwa.

3.Raba ivyo wasezeranye, vyinshi 
n'ivyamaze gushika ; ibindi navyo mur’iki 
gihe, bishika imbere y’amaso yanje.

4.Mu bihe vyose vyabayeho, iki n’igihe 
gitangaje, ivy’abahanuzi batabonye, 
vyose bishika mur’iki gihe.

5.Nitegereje ibishika vyose, mbona 
ko uri hafi kugaruka, nico gituma 
ndagusaba, ngo unshoboze kuguhimbara.

6.Niwabona ntagishoboye, kwera 
imbuto ziguhimbara, uze ukubite 
umutima wanje, unsubize uguhishurirwa.

7.Niwabona yuko Ijambo ryawe, 
ryahindutse ubumenyi muri je, uze 
ukubite umutima wanje, unsubize 
uguhishurirwa.

8.Hezagira Ishengero ryawe iryo waguze 
amaraso uduhe kwubaka ku rutare nkuko 
wagiriye Petero.

umuco_237.songBody:
1.Igihe ni cashika, turangij’ urugendo, 
tuzoca tuzamurwa, dusanganir’ Umwami 
mu bicu.

Bene Data basinziriye bazoca bazuka ; 
natw’ abazoba bakiriho, tuzohindurwa 
mu kanya gato ./.Twambikw’ umubiri 
musha dusanganir’ Umwami mu bicu./.

2.Ico gihe ndakiraba nkabona cegereje ; 
kuko ibimenyetso, vyinshi vyamaze 
guseruka.

3.Ico gihe ni cashika, intambara 
n’amarira ; indwara hamwe n’urupfu, 
vyose bizoba birangiye.

4.Ni twashika mw’ijuru, tuzobonana 
na Yesu ; amaso mu yandi, tuzosa nawe 
dutash’ Ubukwe.

Tuzosangira na Yesu, ku meza yiwe 
mw’ijuru, amosozi yo mur’iyi si, 
azoyaduhanagura ./.Umwami wacu 
Yesu, azotubera nk’izuba ryaka./.

5.Abazotah’ ubwo Bukwe, mbega bobo ni 
bande ? N’ab’Imana yamenye, 
isi n'ijuru bitarabaho.

Eh’Umwami Yesu araje, aje 
gutwar’ ishengero, hahiriwe abri 
maso, bamesuye imvune zabo ./.Abo 
ni bo mugeni, w’umwagazi w’intama 
w’Imana./.

umuco_238.songBody:
1.Abera baciye mu nzira ifunganye, 
Abera baciye mu vyo badatahura Abera
 baciye mu bisig’ ubwenge kuk’Uhoraho 
niko yabishimye.

Nshimir’ Uhoraho, kwar’ivyo 
yashimye, nshimir’ Uhoraho kwar’ivyo 
bimuhimbara, nshimir’ Uhoraho
 kwar’ivyo yanyuzemwo, n
shimir’ Uhoraho kw’aduha 
kubinyuramwo.

2.Nowa yaburiwe kubak’ ubwato 
mu bisig’ ubwenge, yubak’ ubwato 
kukw’ijambo ry’igihe ciwe niko 
ryamusaba abikora naho atabitahura.

Umpe kuba Mwami mu batahura 
ivyawe, sinze maramare ku munsi 
uzogaruka, nkuko abo mu gihe ca Nowa
 vyagenze, barimbuwe n’umwuzure 
bitwengera.

3.Mu gihe cawe Mwami niko vyagenze, 
wariko uravuga ijambo bakwitegereza, 
abafarisayo n’abasadukayo ntibashobora 
kwizer’ ijambo ry’igihe cabo.

Umpe Mwami ntegurwe n’ijambo 
ryawe nshobore gutambuka uyo 
murongo, kuko ataco nobarusha kiretse 
ngiriwe ubuntu nawe Mwami.

4.Abera bene Data batubere akarorero, 
ntitwishinge kwama tuguma mu vyo 
twamenye ahubwo twame duhinda 
agashitsi nk’abazi ko tuzobibazwa 
n’Imana.

Twizigir’ Imana mu bugingo bwacu, 
ntiducobogore mu vyo twizera, gutyo 
dushobore kwiteg’ Umwami n’agaruka 
kutuzamur’ i we mw’ijuru.

umuco_239.songBody:
1.Har’igihugu ciza twasezeraniwe, iyo 
ndakibonye kiranezera ; mbega weho 
ncuti uragisasirira ? Abera bapfuye
 bakiciteze.

Benshi bazoririmba ishimwe ryiza, 
bicaranye n’Umwami w’Abami, 
bazov’ i burasirazuba abandi bave 
i burengerazuba, hazob’umunezero 
mwinshi cane, ku bogejwe n’amaraso.

2.Ndatangajwe n’ubuntu nagiriwe, 
kuzotah’ubukwe bw’Umwagazi ; 
Abera bazambar’ ibitako, nta ndobeke 
izobicaramwo.

Bazogendagenda imisozi myiza, 
bagendanirwa n’abamarayika, 
tuzumv’ inkuru nziza z’abahizi, bamwe 
baduciriye inzira ubwiza bw’umukiza 
wacu Yesu, buzotwibagiza imibabaro.

3.Tuzumv’ inkuru nziza za Daniyeli, 
Shaduraki hamwe na Meshaki, ingene 
bashinze intahe mu muriro, mbega
 mwene Data uzoba uhari.

Mbega umunezero mwinshi cane ? 
gusangira hamwe vino nziza, 
tuzumv’ intahe za paulo, ingene 
yarwaniy’ ukwizera (kwiwe) hazoba 
har’impundu n’amahoro, iyo tuzoba 
iminsi yose.

umuco_24.songBody:
1.Ewe mwenzangu usikie, siku za Bwana 
zakaribia; dunia hii itakwisha, maandiko 
yanatwambia

Jameni tumuombeni Mungu apate 
kuturehemu ili tuepuke hukumu tusije 
tukapotea./.Ee Mungu, tuokowe dunia 
yaangamia./.

2. Roho wa Mungu yu’mwetu, roho 
aliye Muombezi wetu, anatusii tuyaache 
maovu yanatupoteza.

3.Jambo muhimu kwetu sote, tuwe 
hodari kwa neno lake, neno la Mungu la 
uzima liwezalo kutuokoa.

umuco_240.songBody:
1.Ku munsi  w’Umwami wacu, nari ndi 
mu mwuka, numva ijwi inyuma yanje 
rimeze nk’iry’impanda, riti we Yohana 
we zamuka uze hano nkwerek’ibikwiriye 
kuzoba nyuma y’ibyo.

Oh Yohana we Ngwino nkwereke 
uwicaye kuri ya ntebe (x) Yasaga na 
Yasipi, ngwino... Yasaga na Sarudiyo, 
ngwino... Uwambere nka Rubeni, 
ngwino... Uwanyuma nka Benyamini, 
ngwino... Tanguriro n’iherezo, ngwino...
 Alfa na Omega, ngwino... Muhanuzi 
mukuru, ngwino... N’Umwami wacu Yesu, 
ngwino... Oh, Yohana we, ngwino...

2.Hanyuma y’ibyo mbona, mw’ijuru 
ry’Imana, urugi rukinguye mbon’ intebe
 y’Ubwami, kand’uwari yicaye ku ntebe 
y’Ubwami yasaga na Yasipi hamwe na 
Sarudiyo.

3.Intebe yarigoswe, n’umukorombya 
wasaga n'ibuye ryitwa Samaragido
umukororombya ufit’ amabara arindwi, 
agererany’ ibihe birindwi by’itorero.

4.Hagati y’iyo ntebe, no kuyizenguruka 
har’ibizima bine kandi byuzuy’ amaso, 
ikizima cya mbere cyasaga n’intare 
ikizima cya kabiri gisa n’ikimasa, icya
 gatatu mu maso hasa nah’umuntu,
 nah’icya kane gisa n’inkukuma iguruka.

umuco_241.songBody:
1.Vuba kandi vuba cane ivyo twizeye 
bitaboneka bigiye kuboneka vuba kandi 
vuba cane ijuru rizoshingir’ intahe abana 
b’Imana.

Vuba kandi vuba cane nyen’ umurima 
agiye kwimbura vuba kandi vuba cane 
urwamfu n’uburo bizotandukana ./.Vuba 
kandi vuba cane ishengero rigiye gutaha 
vuba kandi vuba cane uwizey’ ukuri 
n’uwizey’ ikinyoma bagiye kugaragara./.

2.Imana isezeranir’ Aburahamu 
yuk’uruvyaro rwiwe ruzogwira 
ntivyumvikana ariko igihe carashitse 
Imana irasohoz’ ivyo yasezeranye

Abahanuzi bahanura bati: 
inkumi izosama inda isi ntiyavyizera ariko vyose 
vyarashitse ./.Nawe shengero ufise 
isezerano ritaboneka humura ureme 
cane kuko vuba kandi vuba cane rigiye 
kugaragara./.

3.Abahanuzi bahanura bati: 
Umuco w’akagoroba uzokwaka 
ntivyumvikan’ ariko noneho raba umuco 
waratse uratumurikira.

Yesu abwir’ abigishwa biwe ati: 
mukabon’ umusokoni n’ibindi biti 
bitoshe menye ko ugucungurwa 
kwegereje ./.None rab’ Isirayeli 
yaradugij’ ibendera ryayo ivyo vyose 
n’ibitwereka ko vuba kandi vubz cane 
tugiye kubon’ Umwami./.
umuco_241.songTitle: VUBA KANDI VUBA CANE, IVYO TWIZEYE

umuco_242.songBody:
1.Haguruka turwane urugamba 
rwaratanguye, kand’abo 
turwana s’ab’inyama n’amaraso,
 dufis’ umugabisha, ahagaze ku 
ruhande rwacu, nawe n’Umwami Yesu 
azodutsindira.

Kandi Umwami Yesu arazi 
kurwan’ intambara; n’ingabo za Farao, 
yarazisutse mu kiyaga, n’ingabo za 
satani turazi yukw’azozihonya ./.Ni zaza 
kuturwanya azodutsindira./.

2.Nuk’ubu turi hafi, yo kujabuka 
ca kiyaga, kimwe gisuka benshi 
mu bibanezereza; igihe gisa n’iki 
c’ukw’ab’Imana batoranywa, kandi n’aba 
satani nabo nuko nyene.

3.Yesu ni we yavuze, at’isi yaranyanse, 
namwe ni yabakunda, izob’ 
ikunze icayo ; kand’agahamo kenshi, karabaye 
ku ntumwa, muze dusabe Yesu, 
azodutsindira.

umuco_243.songBody:
1.Iminsi yerekana, ukugaruka kwawe 
Mwami, yarashitse Yose Mwami, mpa 
kugira ngo singoheke.

Ijambo niryo rivuga yuko ivyo twiteze 
vyose vyaramaze guseruka twihangane 
bizodushikako vyose.

2.Tuzobonana n’Abera bose bizeye 
nk’uko twizeye tuzoganira ivy’intambara 
twahuye nazo mur’iy’isi.

3.Nowa azotubarira ingen’ Imana 
yamubwiye kubak’ ubwato ngo arokoke 
nawe ntivyamworoheye.

4.Tuzobonana na Eliya na we 
bizomushimisha kubonana nabo mu gihe 
ciwe ngo babane iteka ryose.

5.Azotwerek’ Umwami Yesu ati: rab’ abo 
mu gihe canje azoshimir’ Umwami Yesu 
ko yashoboye kutuzigama.

6.Tuzobonana n’Abera bose 
tutagitandukana iteka mbes’ubuntu 
butangaje kubana n’Umwami iteka ryose.

7.Twitange mu mitima yacu kukw’ivyiza 
tubikiwe birengeye uko tubibwirwa 
tuzobibona ni twashika mw’ijuru

umuco_244.songBody:
1.Je suis en route, je continue mon 
voyage, le voyage du pèlerin, il est long, il 
me plaît, il me conduit vers le Seigneur.

Jésus est son Nom, j’entends les anges 
du ciel chanter, oui, j’entends le ciel et 
la mer chanter, et je chante aussi un 
cantique nouveau, louant le Nom du 
Christ.

2.Je suis en route, je monte vers 
Jérusalem, la belle cité des pèlerins, 
chantant avec tous les élus, des 
cantiques et des chants nouveaux.

3.Chantez avec moi, vous tous les 
rachetés de Christ, car notre route 
continue, la nourriture est donnée, gloire 
à Dieu, Alléluia !

4.Je marche sans tourner, mon âme 
dirigée vers la promesse, la promesse 
faite aux héros, aux témoins fidèles de 
l’oeuvre.

umuco_245.songBody:
1.Ijambo ry’Imana ntiryihenda, ijambo 
ry’Imana ntiribesha, ivyo rivuze birashika, 
niyo bitevye birashika.

./.Turi mu bihe vy’ubuhanuzi, aho 
ubuhanuzi bwahanuwe bugaragarira 
imbere yacu./.

2.Vyinshi mu vyahanuwe vyarashitse, 
ibindi biriko birashika, n’ibitashika 
bigiye gushika, rindira gato uzobibona.

3.Benshi mu bahizi b’Imana, beretswe 
ivy’iki gihe turimwo, bituma bacifuza 
cane, kuko ari igihe c’ubuhanuzi.

4.Ijambo ry’ubuhanuzi, rivuga yuko 
umumarayika w’indwi niyavuza inzamba, 
niho ibanga ry’Imana rizoba riherahejwe.

5.Ijwi ry’Umumarayika w’indwi, 
ryaramaze gusemerera, ivyanyegejwe 
abanyabwenge vyose, vyahishuriwe 
inzoya.

6.Ijambo ry’Ubuhanuzi rishitse, 
vyerekana ko igihe gishitse, none ncuti 
twitegure, kuragwa ivyasezeranywe.

umuco_246.songBody:
1.Tu’ jeshi lake Bwana, tuwe imara kweli, 
kama askari vitani na tukeshe kwa kweli.

Neno la Mungu : Chakula chetu, chakula 
chetu vitani. Maombi pia : Silaha zetu, 
silaha zetu vitani.

2.Shika silaha zako, usiku na mchana, 
omba Mwokozi wako, na ukeshe kwa 
kweli.

3.Tuna Mfalme wetu, aliyeshinda yote, 
na sisi tutashinda, kwa kuwa ameshida.

4.Na wewe ndugu yangu, uwe 
muvumilivu, katika shida zote, shika neno 
la Mungu.

5.Utii Mungu wako, uvae neno lake, 
shindana na shetani, naye atakukimbia.

umuco_247.songBody:
1.Yesu Mukiza wanje warambabarijwe (x3)

Nshoboza Mwami Yesu, name 
ngukorera, rab’ iminsi irashize 
naw’ uragarutse, nzogusanganira 
uhagaze mu bicu, niho nzoba 
nduhuts’imiruho y’iyi si.

2.Kandi Mwami Yesu warampamagaye(x3)

3.Unyemerere Mwami name nkuyoboka(x3)

4.Nta kindi nifuza mur’iyi si ndimwo(x3)

5.Uhoraho Mukiza ndagutakambiye(x3)

6.Sinifuza Mwami kwama nkubabaza(x3)

7.Nyugururira Mwami inzugi zugaye(x3)

8.Ibihe birakuze umpe kuba maso(x3)

9.Umpe kubona Mwami igikorwa cawe(x3)

10.Umpe kwinjira Mwami mu 
      masezerano(x3)

11. Sinze maramare umuns’ uzogaruka(x3)

12.Umpe Mukiza wanje kwama menetse(x3)

umuco_248.songBody:
1.Ni nde ari mu mubiri wa Kristo? (x3) 
afis’ ivyizigoro nyakuri

N’uwejejwe n’amaraso, 
n’uwambay’ ijambo ry’Imana, 
n’uwanesheje Antikristo, uwo niw’ari 
mu Mugeni.

2.Nind’ agendana n’Uhoraho?
  Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

3.Nind’ arwana kand’ akanesha?
   Yuzuy' ivyizigiro nyakuri

4.Nind’ asiganwa nk’umuhizi? 
  Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

5.Nind’ afis’ intsinzi muri we?
  Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

6.Nind’ ameny’ ibihe vy’Imana?
   Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

7.Nind’ adatwarwa n’imiyaga?
   Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

8.Ninde yatsinzwe n’Uhoraho?
   Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri

9.Nind’ azi inzira z’Uhoraho?
   Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.

11.Nind’ azozamurwa mu bicu? 
     Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri

12.Nind’ azokwambikwa igitsibo? 
     Yuzuy’ ivyizigiro nyakuri.
umuco_248.songTitle: NINDE ARI MU MUBIRI WA KRISTO

umuco_249.songBody:
1.Ndirimbira mu nzira, iyobor’ imitima, 
i kalvali hatemba, isok’ inesha, 
nah’imyampi yondasa, Umwam’ arabizi, 
ni naw’ unyobora akamurikira.

Nifuza kumureba amaso mu yandi, ngo 
ndirimb’ iteka ubuntu bwe bwinshi, mu 
mihanda y’izahabu ndangurur’ ijwi, nta 
maganya arashize ndi mu bwugamo.

2.Iy’amazi asuma aj’ i muhengeri, 
Umukiza afata ingabo yo mw’ijuru, We 
nyine azanyobora no mur’iyi si, bidatinze 
ariko nzagera mw’ijuru.

3.Umuriro w’Imana nah’ijoro ryagwa, 
umwijima ukambuza kumeny’ inzira, 
ni we niyegereza akamurikira. 
Anyonger’ imbaraga akanyobora.

4.No mu miband’ ikomeye ndeb’ imisozi, 
binyibutsa na none Umwami 
w’ ishema, yitwaj’ inkota ityaye ngo 
ayobore urugamba, n’ingab’ inkingira 
abisingirizwe.

umuco_25.songBody:
1.Nijaposema kwa lugha kushinda 
malaika; kama sina roho upendo Mimi ni 
kitu bure.

Upendo hauna wivu upendo hauchoki; 
upendo huvumilia, upendo haujivuni.

2.Nijapokua nabii kujua siri zote; kama 
sina roho upendo mimi ni kitu bure. 

3.Nijapojitowa mali ku-walisha masikini; 
kama sina roho upendo mimi ni kitu bure.

4.Nijapojitoa mwili ku-unguzwa motoni; 
kama sina roho upendo mimi ni kitu 
bure.

5.Wakristo tuwe umoja katika mwili 
wake; tuwe na pendo la Bwana katika 
mioyo yetu.

umuco_250.songBody:
1.Kisha nikaona Sayuni, sayuni mle 
mbinguni, ameketi Mwana wa 
Mungu Sayuni mji mwema.

Ndugu simama, simama, simama, 
simama usije anguka, ndugu simama, 
simama, simama uingie mle mbinguni.

2.Nikaona malaika, waimba waamini 
njooni mle mwangu, mulio andaliwa.

3.Njia yote ni nyembamba si wengi 
waingiyao ndugu kesha ukiomba 
usimame imara.

umuco_251.songBody:
Ico twikorakoreye n’iminwe yacu, 
ico twiboneye n’amaso yacu, ico 
twiyumviye n’amatwi yacu ./.Ni we 
Jambo w’ubugingo w’Imana

1.Hahirwa uwusoma ijambo rizima, 
hahirwa n’abumvir’ ubuhanuzi bwaryo, 
maze bakarishira mu bikorwa ./.Ni bo 
barya Manu imwe yahishijwe./.

2.Sab’ Imana iguhe umwete uvuye 
mw’iuru, maze urye ku giti co mw’itongo 
ryayo, bizogutsindira intege nke mu 
rugendo ./.Biguhe kuba umukristo 
ashikamye./.
