3.Mbere hari n’ibuye ryahishijwe, 
ryabikiwe abatamira mu 
Mwami, ryanditsweko n’izina 
ry’akabanga ./.Ritahura gusa abarihawe
 bonyene./.

4.Saba Data wo mw’ijuru agufashe, 
kugerera mu birimba vy’ijur, wame 
wirira ivyamwa vyo mw’itongo ./.Maze 
wiyuzurire umunezero mwinshi./.

5.Ni wumv’ umutima wawe ugadutse 
cank’umutima wawe unaniwe, 
saba Yesu agushore ku mugezi 
wiwe ./.Uzovah’ ufis’ inkomezi./.

6.Uwunesha satani n’ibikorwa 
vyiwe, niw’ azicarana n’Umwami 
Yesu, azoba n’inkingi y’urusengero 
rwiwe ./.Azinywera ku mazi y’ubugingo./.

umuco_252.songBody:
1.Ririmba Mugeni wakunzwe 
ugir’ uj’ ahabona, Umukwe wanse 
guhemukira ng’uyo araje; ivy’ucamwo 
n’ivy’ubona ntibikaguc’ intege, raba 
kw’isaha usanga igihe kigeze kure.

Haleluya Mana yanje n’ushimwe, 
watoy’ Umugeni mu mahanga nshima 
ko ndimwo, Haleluya Mana nzogutazira, 
nkiri mur’ino si nzoririmba urukundo 
rwawe.

2.Es’ukuntu Yerusalemu waka 
nk’izuba, kubw’amasezerano dufise
 tuzowubamwo; es’ukuntu Yesu wamaze 
kwambika Umugeni, urahiriwe we 
watorewe gutah’ ubwo bukwe.

3.Agakiza kawe kari hafi ewe Mugeni, 
imibabar’ ubabarizwa mw’iyi si igira 
ishire; Yesu shimwa we watoye Umugeni 
mu mahanga, ndizeye yukw’Ishengero 
ryawe riri mu gutaha.

4.Ikizobemeza yuko mwatorewe ubwo 
Bukwe, muzogiriranir’ urukundo abantu 
batangare; nsabiye ishengero ryose 
kugira urwo rukundo, teg’ ugutwi iryo 
sengesho Yesu rigushikire.

umuco_253.songBody:
1.Nirate iki, ndirimbe iki nahawe 
iki, wahawe iki, nahawe intsinzi ku 
musaraba, aho yavuga ati: birarangiye.

Uwo ni we Jambo w’Imana, uwo ni we 
Rutare nubatseko, kuko ari we twahuye 
ndemerewe, kuko ari we twahuye 
mboshwe ./.Uwo ni we Mana yanje./.

2.Urukundo, amahoro narabihawe 
umunsi twahura akankiza n’urupfu 
akavuga ati: ingo unkurikire.

3.Numva umutima uririmba 
kuko yansezeraniye isezerano 
nk’iry’Aburahamu Sekuruza w’abizera 
bose.

4.Ndakanura nkamubona ntega amatwi 
abahanuzi numva ijambo, nkabona 
igikorwa kiramboha, kikampa ubugingo

5.Nkurikira inkingi y’umuriro niwo muco 
mu rugendo, mu bingora, akamurikira 
nirwo rufatiro nahawe na Yesu.

umuco_254.songBody:
1.Uyu mwanya n’uwo kurondera 
Umwami, hazoger’ igihe batazomubona, 
bazomurondera ntibazomubona, 
bazomurondera barira.

Isengero zimwe zizoba zugaye, 
bazomurondera cane rwose, 
bazomurondera ntibazomubona, 
bazomurondera barira.

2.Abazoba barakiriye Ijambo, 
bazokwumv’ inzamba zivuze hose, bazoca 
bamusanganira mu bicu, badugane nawe 
mw’ijuru.

3.Ntituz’ umunsi canke haba n’isaha, 
Umukiza Yesu azozira mw’isi, ico tuzi 
n’uko Yesu azogaruka, ni twisuzume mu 
mitima.

4.Hazoca haz’ amarushwa ateye ubwoba, 
kukw’amahoro azoba akuwe kw’isi, niho 
benshi bazorira baboroge bati: Mwami 
twugururire.

5.Haracar’ ubuntu mu gihe turimwo 
ntiwikomantaz’ umutima wawe 
Umwami Yesu aracafis’ imbabazi mwegere 
ac’ aguharira.

umuco_255.songBody:
1.Le Dieu puissant c’est Jésus; c’est le 
Prince de paix, le Père de l’éternité et le 
Roi de beauté, le Merveilleux en sagesse 
par qui toute chose est faite, la plénitude 
divine en Jésus incarné.

Tout est en lui, tout est en lui la 
plénitude divine et tout est en lui, tout 
est en lui, tout est en lui, Jésus est Dieu
 tout puissant et tout est en lui.

2.Emmanuel : Dieu en nous, Jéhovah 
l’Eternel, l’Esprit tout omniprésent qui 
rempli l’univers, le Grand sacrificateur 
et l’Agneau des pécheurs, l’Auteur de la 
rédemption ; que béni soit son Nom !

3.Le commencement et la fin, l’Alpha et 
l’Omega, la vrai Parole incarnée, l’Ami 
des rachetés, la sagesse et perfection, 
la justice et puissance, tout ce dont j’ai 
besoin, je le trouve en sa main.

4.Le Dieu que nous attendons, sera la 
gaie chanson, de l’Israël revenu quand 
paraîtra Jésus, il viendra pour délivrer,
 notre agneau immolé ; la plénitude est 
en lui, le vainqueur de la nuit.

umuco_256.songBody:
1.Har’igikorwa c’Imana ico gikorwa 
s’ikindi n’ijambo rihishuwe ryahawe 
abana b’Imana.

Ni nde, ni nde yahishuriwe ukuboko 
kw’Uhoraho ? Ni nde ni nde yemeye 
inkuru zacu, ko tur’ abanyamibabaro ?

2.Nah’iyi si yokwuzura amadayimoni 
isinzi aza mw’ihanga ry’Imana, 
ntiyoritsinda na gato kuko Yesu 
yanesheje.

3.Yesu Kristo ku musaraba yarasemereye 
cane, ati vyose birarangiye iyo niyo 
ntsinzi dufise

4.Twuzur’ ijambo ry’Imana dusengere 
muri Mpwemu, turenge umubiri 
n’ubwenge turagw’ ivyasezeranywe.

umuco_257.songBody:
1.Mana we waturemye turagusavye 
umugisha duhezagire, duhe ijambo 
ridushikirize agakiza.

Nico gituma uyu munsi twaje mu 
ngoro yawe Yera, turagusavye utweze 
Mwami...twambare imvune z’ubukwe.

2.Mana rurema, we wadukunze twe 
turicishije bugufi duhe ukwizera, duhe 
urukundo twuzure amahoro muri twe.

Nico gituma uyu munsi twahevye vyose 
vyo gukora, tukaza hano mu ngoro 
yawe...kugusenga wewe w’ukuri.

3.Mana rurema, Mana y’Abera twuzuze 
ijambo rihishuwe, mu nguvu zacu 
ntidushobora kwitez’ intambwe mu 
gakiza.

Nico gituma abana bawe duhanze 
amaso umusaraba, turakwinginze 
Mwami utuvure tube abakristo 
bashikamye.

4.Mana rurema, we watwiguze suka 
Mpwemu wawe muri twe tujanjagure, 
uduhindure ibikoresho vyawe Mwami.

Kaze Mukiza ndakwizeye wampishuriye 
ijambo ryera n’ubu komeza kumurikira...
nze nshike mw’ijuru amahoro.

umuco_258.songBody:
1.Ndabona ihanga riteye ubwoba, 
ndabona ihanga ryiharije, ryavutse 
mu rubavu  rwa Yesu, ryavutse mu maraso 
ya Yesu, rifis’ intsinzi y’umusaraba, rigize 
Abami n’Abaherezi ./.Ritang’ ibimazi nka 
Abeli ritang’ ibimazi nka Eliya./.

N’abana b’Imana Ihoraho, n’ihanga 
ry’Imana yiharije, ryambay’ ubwiza 
bw’Uhoraho, riter’ ishari ayandi 
mahanga, ./.uwuhagurutse kurirwanya,
 Asanga ari we yirwanya, asang’ari we 
yiyica./.

2.Ndabon’ ihanga ritey’ ubwoba, 
rirongorwa n’amasezerano, Balaki 
ararirwanya arananirwa, Balamu 
ararivuma arananirwa, umuvumo 
ku bana b’Imana, uhinduka 
umuhezagiro ./.Uhinduka umunezero 
kubw’amasezerano./.

3.Ndabon’ ihanga ritey’ ubwoba, 
rirongowe n’Uhoraho, imisozi yose 
iraribisa, n’inzuzi zose ziraribisa, 
n’intambwe zose ziraribisa, n’amatanure 
araribisa ./.Ivyo vyose biratinya 
kubw’inkingi y’umuriro./.

4.Ndabon’ ihanga ritey’ ubwoba, rica mu 
nzira ifunganye, ryikoreye imibabaro, 
ryikoreye umusaraba, riniha iminiho 
itovugwa, rica ahantu h’imbobane ./.Kubw’
urugendo ruruhije kubw’intambara zinaniza./.

5.Ndabon’ ihanga  rihambaye, 
rirwana intambara ziruhije, ritsinda 
kubw’ukwizera, ritsinda kubw’ivyizigiro, 
ryuzuye urukundo ruhinguye, iryo niryo 
ryamaze kurama ./.Ritegereje kuruhurwa 
imibabaro y’igihe gito./.

umuco_259.songBody:
1.Uhoraho n’ingab’ idukingira , niwe 
Mukiza ni we Mwungere, adukiza mu 
magorwa akomeye, turi mu biganza 
vyiwe ntituzopfa.

Ni we Mugabisha w’intambara, ari 
imbere y’ishengero ryiwe, arineshereza 
imbere n’inyuma, mu kuboko kwiwe 
harimwo intsinzi.

2.Uhoraho ni we nyen’ igikorwa, Uhoraho 
ni we azogikomeza, amaraso yavuye 
ku musaraba, arimw’ intsinzi y’ibihe 
bidashira .

3.Nta nkomezi z’umuntu zivugwa, 
nta ntege nke z’umuntu zivugwa, nta
 bikorwa nta kugororoka, amaraso ya Yesu
 araduhagije.

umuco_26.songBody:
1.Yesu yariko araganira, hamwe
 n’abatumwa biwe, maz’arababaza ati: 
mwumva bavuga ngo ndi nde?

Bamwe bavuga ng’uri Yohana, abandi 
nabo ng’uri Eliya, ng’ur’ umwe muri 
babandi bavugishwa n’Imana.

2.Petero niwe yamumenye, at’uri Kristo 
w’Imana, abandi ntibamumenye kand’ari 
Jambo w'Imana.

3.Abayuda ntibamumeye, kirets’abana 
b’Imana, kuko batari bubatse 
ku masezerano y’Imana.

4.Dufis’igihe ciza cane, co kumenyana 
n’umwami, natwe ntitube nk’abayuda 
batamumenye Mesiya.

5.Dufis' igihe ciza cane, co kumenyana
n'Umwami, na twe ntitube nk'abayuda
batamumenye Mesiya.

umuco_260.songBody:
1.Umpe kukuyoboka, niwo munezero 
wanje, umpe kwama menetse, ngumiza 
ku musaraba

Niyo mahoro arut’ ayandi, niwo 
munezero wanje ./.Niko kugukorera ni 
wampindur’ ikimazi./.

2.Umpe kuguhimbara, umpe kuba 
imbohe yawe, nuzur’ ishaka ryawe, 
nuzure ukugomba kwawe.

3.Umpe kwuzura Mpwemu yera,
ngw'anyemeze ivyo ugomba, bimpe
kuguhimbara, bimpe kuba intwari yawe.

4.Fash’ ishengero ryawe, twuzure 
Mpwemu Yera, tub’ ibimazi bizima, 
tub’ ishikanwa ryawe.

5.Umpe kukuyoboka niwo munezero 
wanje umpe kwama menetse ngumiza ku 
musaraba.

umuco_261.songBody:
1. Ico nshaka ni kimwe gusa, n’ugushika 
mw’ijuru, ivyo mw’isi ndabihinyuye, 
ndonder’ ivyo mw’ijuru.

Mbega jewe nzoshikayo jewe, mw’ijuru 
k’Uhoraho Imana, nzorushaho 
kunezerwa ninashika mw’ijuru ku Mana 
Yera.

2. Ngaha kw'isi tur' abashitsi,iwacu 
ni mw'ijuru ku Mana niho tuzohora,
imyaka bo n'imyaka.

3. Ewe ncuti ndakuburire niwizigire
vuba uzoronka umunezero niwashika 
mw'ijuru.

4. Mwene data reka ivyo vyose
n'ukurikire Imana, mbega uwo munsi 
niwashika, uzogenda mw'ijuru.

5. Iy'iwacu ku Mana yera ivyiza 
biruzuye, n'unezerwe kuj' iy'iwacu,
gusanganir' Umwami.

6. Mbega woba wizeye Yesu, kugir'uje
mw'ijuru, kuko niwe nzira n'ukuri,
buging' imyaka yose.

umuco_262.songBody:
1. Uhoraho niwe Mukiza, Uhoraho
niwe mwungere, amvyagiza mu canya
c'ubwatsi butotahaye, antegurira ameza
imbere y'abansi banje.

Niwe mwungere aruta abungere, 
niwe mukunzi aruta abakunzi,
uwageze mu biganza vyiwe, nta
mwansi yomukorako.

2.Nta mwana w’Imana ashobora 
kumaramara, kukw’Uhoraho 
nyen’inkomezi, ashobora kumuzigama, 
naho yoba mu magorwa akomezi akomeye, afise 
intsinzi.

3. Imana ishimwe, ku ntambwe zose
 twaciyemwo, ibikomeye twarabinesheje 
ibigatanya tubirya butsima, 
ibitur' imbere, tuzobitsinda mw’izina 
ry’Umwami wacu.

umuco_263.songBody:
1.De nos jours on recommence, les 
efforts surnaturels, on se creuse le 
cerveau, pour bâtir la tour Babel, pour 
aller jusqu’à la lune, même à Mars si tout 
va bien, on dépense les fortunes là où 
on trouve les moyens !

./.Nous dépasserons la lune, la planète 
Mars aussi, à travers la voie lactée, en 
vitesse mon ami, nous irons auprès de 
Jésus, notre bien aimé Sauveur, qui nous 
montrera le ciel et ses splendeurs./.

2. Il ne faut pas de poussée, par une 
fusée engin, quand nous quiterons la 
terre, ce sera par l’Esprit Saint, et puis 
tous les incrédules, ne pourront pas le 
savoir, ne sachant ce grand miracle, par 
la main du Tout Puissant.

3.Nous entendrons la trompette, 
Jésus-Christ apparaîtra, et la tour si 
magnifique, de Babel s’écroulera, on 
verra ce grand mystère, préparé par 
l’Eternel, lorsque sans fusée engin sans 
Spoutnik, nous irons au ciel.

4.Jamais tu ne pourras dire : je n’avais 
pas les moyens c’est uniquement par 
grâce, le billet ne coûte rien, car en Jésus 
Christ lui-même, Dieu paya pour nous le 
prix, les maisons sont préparées, et pour 
nous tous au Paradis.

5.Mon ami, toi qui m’écoutes, auras-tu 
ton passeport ? Te suffira-t-elle la lune,
 ou veux-tu la ville d’or ? Si tu veux donner
 à Jésus, tout ton coeur à cet instant, tu 
pourras te joindre à nous, pour t’en aller 
en triompant.

umuco_264.songBody:
1.Ndashimira Umwami Yesu (x3) 
Ubuntu yangiriye.

2.Ndashimir’Umwami Yesu (x3) 
Ni we Mwungere mwiza.

3.Niwe aduha kunesha (x3) 
Ingabo za satani.

4. Ni we aduha kuduga (x3) 
Imisozi iruhije

5.Ni we atumurikira (x3) 
Mu mwiza w’iyi si mbi.

6.Ni we atwereka inzira (x3) 
Mu bihe bigoye.

7.Ntaho tuzozimira (x3) 
Yesu niw’ aturongora.

8.Kandi ntidukekeranya (x3) 
Turi mu biganza vyiwe.

9.Turi mu kuboko kwiwe (x3) 
Ntaho tuzosegenyeshwa.

10.Tumeze nk'umusozi (x3)
Umusozi Siyoni.

11.Twubatse ku rufatiro (x3) 
Rw’intumwa n’abahanuzi.

12.Dufise Ubwami bw’Imana (x3) 
Urupfu twararutsinze.

13.Dufis’ amahoro yiwe (x3) 
Amahoro isi itazi.

14.Dufise umunezero (x3)  U
munezero w’Umwami.

15.Dufise uguhishurirwa (x3) 
     Gutandukanya impwemu.

16.Impwemu ya Antikristo (x3) 
Tuyipimira mw’ijambo.

17.Ni yigisha ibinyoma (x3) 
Tuyipimira mw’ijambo

18.Ishize hejuru umuntu(x3) 
Tuyipimira mw’ijambo.

19.Ni yavug’ ubutatu (x3)
 Tuyipimira mw’ijambo.

20.Ni yaza icokoranya (x3) 
Tuyipimira mw’ijambo

21.Ni yaza irementanya (x3) 
Tuyipimira mw’ijambo

umuco_265.songBody:
1.Umpe amahoro Mwami Mana, umpe 
amahoro nka Abeli, umpe amahoro nka 
Enoki ./.Kugeza aho uzozira./.

./.Amahoro, ivyizigiro, urukundo biri mu 
kwizera kwa Yesu./.

Umpe kubona igikorwa cawe, umpe 
kwizera ijambo ryawe, kugira ishaka nka 
Eliya ./.Naho nohamwa cane./.

./.Imigabo ufitiye, Umugeni nta 
munyamahanga ayimenya./.

3.Ngendere mu kwizera 
kwawe, ngendere mu kuboko 
kwawe, mbon’ urufatiro 
rw’intumwa ./.Mpishurirwe ukugomba 
kwawe./.

./.Guhahamira isezerano, kurishikira 
bibonwa n’abahizi gusa./.

umuco_266.songBody:
Egereza ncuti yanje, umusozi w’abana 
b’imfura ./.Umwe wubatsweko 
Yerusalemu, ni ryo shengero ry’abana 
b’Umwami./.

1.Uwo musozi wabaye ikoraniro rya Yesu
 Kristo,hamwe n’intumwa ziwe inkingi 
y’umuriro ica iramanuka bose buzura 
ubwiza bw’Uhoraho, Petero atangura 
kuvuga ati: Mwami ndakwubakire 
urusago, urundi narwo rub’ urwa Mose, 
urundi narwo rub’ urwa Eliya.

2.Mana yanje Mana ya Yesu Kristo, 
biguhimbare ngo mbe mu ngoro yawe, 
name ngavye mu mutima wanje, name 
numva ijwi ry’inzamba yawe, kuko 
kumara isaha imwe mu nzu yawe, 
Binyibagiza imiruho yo mw’isi kandi 
kwumva ijwi ry’ijambo ryawe, 
bintera gushikama mu rugendo.

3.Raba inyoni zose zo mu kirere, 
zironkeyeho uburaro bwiza, none weho 
ga mwene Data, ntuziruta se ko none 
ugira ubwoba, kandi Umwami yaguciriye 
inzira nziza, mu mubiri wiwe maze 
akuzamura ahera cane, mu bwigobeko 
bw’iyisumba vyose.

umuco_267.songBody:
Shengero ry’Imana, shengero 
ry’Umukiza n’ushime unezerwe, 
umunezero wawe wuzure kuko I Siyoni, 
I Siyoni mw’ijuru ku Mana i budapfa, niho 
umutima wwawe uziritse.

1.Umwami yavuze ati: nagukunze 
urukundo rutagira akagero, none se 
weho umpaye iki isi n’ijuru vyose, ibiyaga 
imisozi n’inzuzi zitemba bitarabaho nari 
nkuzi.

2.Mbega se womenya, imigabo 
myiza jewe ngufitiye? Icompa gusa 
ukanyumvira, wumvire intumwa, 
wumvire abavugishwa wicishe bugufi,
 ni ryo shikanwa rimpimbara.

3.Nta gihe na kimwe wigeze usonza,
canke ng'ugw' isari wamye unywa kuri
rwa rutare ico ndagusavye n'uce bugufi
maze uce aho ngucisha ubone kuragwa 
ibihoraho

umuco_268.songBody:
1.Umwami Imana y’Aburahamu ni we 
rutare rwatumenewe yihishuriye intama 
ziwe noneho zigendera mu muco.

Abahambaye bayishakira mu bikubita 
amaso bihinda ./.Ariko abato b’Ubwami 
bwayo banezerwa no guhishurirwa./.

2.Afise inyenyeri ndwi mu minwe ni 
we ntsinzi y’abizeye bose iyo yugaye 
ntawugurura kandi yuguruye ntawugara.

3.Mu bari mw’isi no mw’ijuru nta 
wuhwanye n’Uhoraho Imana afise 
ubwiza bukayangana aca n’imanza 
zigororotse.

umuco_269.songBody:
1.Uhoraho turagushimiye kubw’igikorwa 
cawe kubw’imigambi yawe Uhoraho 
Mana, turagushimiye kubw’ijambo 
ryawe, Manu yanyegejwe.

Uhoraho Ur’ Imana, Imana yihisha uwo 
utihishuriye ntashobora kukumenya uwo 
wihishuriye asanga uko wari ejo ariko 
uri uyu munsi kandi ariko uzokwama 
ibihe bidashira.

2.Turagushimiye ko watwihishuriye 
ukaturongoza inkingi y’umuriro ukaduha 
manu nsha y’igihe cacu niryo jambo 
ryawe, Jambo rihishuwe.

3.Wakuye Isirayeli, muri Egiputa ni wewe 
warirongoye mu bugaragwa kandi ni 
wewe warishikanye I Kanani kuko wewe 
ur’ Imana, Imana y’bushobozi.

4.Ku murango w’abarongoza igicu 
mw’ijoro ukabarongoza inkingi y’umuriro 
bashonje wabagaburira manu nsha kuko 
wewe uri Imana, Imana y’urukundo

5.Nkuko washikanye Isirayeli I Kanani 
natwe tur’ingenzi tugiye I Siyoni 
twizeye kuzodushikana i muhira kuko wewe 
ur’ Imana, idahindagurika.

umuco_27.songBody:
1.Unilehemu, e’Mungu wangu
 unilehemu mimi, maana roho yangu 
mimi inakukimbilia.

Maana neema yako ni kubwa Bwana 
hata milele./. Na mbinguni tutaimba 
Haleluya, Haleluya, Amen! Haleluya,
 Amen./.

2.Uniponyeshe maadui zangu ewe 
Mungu wangu, ninatembea katika giza 
unionyeshe nuru.

3.Unisikie E’Mungu wangu usiwe mbali 
nami, usinifiche uso wako sikia shida 
yangu.

4.Ninatamani moyo mwangu kuona 
uso wako, nimezaliwa katika giza 
nakuitaji wewe.

umuco_270.songBody:
1.Har’umuryango wuguruye, 
ntawushobora kuwugara, niyo 
wugaye ntawugurura, nyenewo 
n’umunyenkomezi.

Ewe Muryango mwiza, ewe 
Mwungere mwiza, abaguciyeko 
bose, bafis’ ubugingo budashira, kuko 
bumvis’ ijwi ryawe.

2.Uwo niwo intama zicamwo, iyo zigiye 
mu canya, niyo zigiye mu buraro, 
ego n’umuryango w’intama.

3.Ayandi masho ntawucamwo, 
niy’agerageje arananirwa, kuko 
umuryango n’uw’abumva ijwi 
ry’Umwungere w’Intama.

4.Uwo muryango ni Yesu Kristo, kandi 
n’Umwungere w’intama, ntawinjira atari 
kuri we, kukw’ari we azi intama ziwe.

5.Ni we aj’ imbere y’umukuku, 
akaziyobora mu canya, kandi niw’ azija  
inyuma, ngw’azirinde umwami mubi.

6.Mwene Data emera ube intama, 
niy'iragirwa igacurwa mu muryango, 
ayandi masho agejeje arananirwa.

umuco_271.songBody:
1.Yesu n’Umuzabibu, umuzabibu 
w’ukuri.

2.Natwe turi amashami, amashami 
y’ukuri.

3.Yesu ni we Rutare, rutare rw’ukuri.

4.Natwe nirwo tunywako tukaronka ubugingo.

5.Yesu ni we Mwungere, Mwungere 
w’ukuri.

6.Natwe abana biwe, abana biwe bukuri.

7.Twaciye mw’irembo ryiwe, irembo 
ryiwe ry’ukuri.

8.Turi mu kuboko kwiwe 
ntakizodukurayo.

9.Ishami ryo muri we ryer’ imbuto 
z’ubugingo.

10.Amashami yer’ imbuto Data 
arayazigama.

11.Amashami ater’ imbuto Data 
arayakuraho.

12.Arindiriy' umuriro w'ibihe bikomeye.

13.N’iki codutandukanya n’urukundo 
rw’Imana.

14.N’urupfu canke ubugingo, oya 
ntibishoboka.

15. N’ubukene cank’itunga, oya 
ntibishoboka.

16.Yesu ni we bugingo ni tumwumireko 
pe.

umuco_272.songBody:
1.Igihe co kwimurwa ni cagera uzoja he ?

Nzinjira mw’ijuru, mu bihe bidashira 
aho nateguriwe, kuzoruhukira, 
nzibanira n’Umwami, no muri 
Yerusalemu neshej’ imibabaro, n’imiruho 
yo mw’isi.

2.Ibihe bivyaye ibindi Mugenzi uzoja 
hehe ?

3.Ni wava mur’uru rusago, Mugenzi uzoja 
hehe ?

4.Emera usige vyose, winjire mu Bwami 
bwiwe.

5.Urwanye umubiri wawe, uwuhindure 
umuja. 

6.Uwimatanya n’Umwami, ahinduka 
Impwemu yiwe.

7.Uwizeye Uhoraho, eka 
ntazomaramara.

8.Yesu aje kujana abiwe mbe mugenzi 
uzoba urimwo

9.Ijwi ni risemerera mbe mugenzi 
uzoryumva?

10.Umugeni atashe ubukwe, mbe 
mugenzi uzoba urimwo?

11.Igihe kizogera, ijuru ryuguruke

12.Tuzosangira n’Umwami, ku meza 
twateguriwe.

13.Ico gihe tuzoba duhanagurw’ amarira.

14.Tuzinjira mu mazu Yesu yaduteguriye.

15.Tuzoba tunezerewe dufise ivyishimo 
vyinshi.

17.Nta joro tuzobona nta n’izuba 
tuzokwumva

18.Yesu ni we zuba ryaho azomurika 
hose.

umuco_273.songBody:
1.N’igihe ki ga mwene Data? N’umunsi 
wuhe turimwo iyo ubona umwiza w’iki
 gihe, bikwerek’ iki ga mugenzi? Ivyo vyose 
vyerekana igihe ico arico.

Turanezerewe ko tugufise Mwami 
Yesu Kristo ni wewe rutare rwacu 
turanezerewe kw’ari we Buhungiro 
bw’imitima yacu, Haleluya!

2.Duhe Mwami kuguhang’ amaso 
shimwa Mwami ko watwiyeretse umwiza 
kw’ari mwinshi cane umuco ukomeze 
kumurika ni wewe buhungiro bwacu, 
buhungiro bwacu, Haleluya!

3.Abagororotsi b’iki gihe bariruka 
baguhungiramwo urugamba rurakomeye 
n’igihe c’urugamba rwa nyuma 
arik’ umunsi w’intsinzi uraje, umunsi 
w’intsinzi uregereje.

4.Raba n’igihe c’iherezo ncuti 
kubera Yesu n’igihe ciza n’igihe kibi 
kubatamwizera n’igihe gikomeye cane 
kuv’ ijuru n’isi biremwa izamurwa
 ry’Umugeni riraje.

5.Igihe kiraheze mwene Data 
biranditswe mw’ijuru ku Mana 
biranditswe hose no kw’isi biboneka 
vyumvikana hose yukw’ar’igihe c’iherezo, 
ar’igihe c’iherezo.

6.Mana umuco wawe utumurikire 
dukomeze kurwana tunesha mu buruhe 
turab’ igihe kuk’urugamba rugiye gushira 
umunsi w’intsinzi uraje intsinzi iraje 
Haleluya!

umuco_274.songBody:
1.Umwami yarankunze kuva kera, 
anyigura ku musaraba, none ubu ndi mu 
bahiriwe, nihashimwe izina ryiwe.

./.Iyo nibutse urukundo rwa Yesu, hamwe 
n’ivyo yankoreye vyose, ubwo mperako 
ndirimba, n’ushimwe Gologota./.

2.Yarampaye amahoro n’urukundo, 
anyobora mu nzira hose, azondengukana
 mw’ijuru i we, n’ushimwe Gologota!

3Mbega umunezero mwinshi yampaye,
 yampaye abavandimwe benshi, none ubu 
ndiko ndamuhimbaza n’ushimwe Gologota.

4.Mbega n’iki conkura kuri Yesu, ko 
yanyiguze jewe ntamuzi, mbere niyo 
noca mu rupfu, nzoshimira Gologota.

5.N’umunezero mwinshi utavugwa, 
kugerera muri Kristo Yesu, 
n’umutakambire ubu agukize, akujane i 
Gologota

6.Yampinduye icaremwe gisha ciza, 
igihe yankura mu buja, none ubu ndiko 
ndamuririmba, n’ashimirwe Gologota!

umuco_275.songBody:
1.Nzomubona Umwami wanje, 
nzomubona umukiza wanje, kuko 
yansezeraniye amaze kunkiza urupfu
 akamp’ amahoro.

Niwo munezero wanje, niyo ntsinzi 
yanje nico gituma ndirimba.

2.Mpazwa na Manu ngaburirwa, 
ikamp’ ivyizigiro bizima, ikamfasha mu 
rugendo, ngo ngende mpanz’ umusaraba, 
bikamp’ amahoro.

3.Nzomubona uwanesheje, nzomubona 
ndi kumwe n’Abera, kuko yansezeraniye, 
maze kunesha urupfu, nkaronk’ igitsibo.

4.Mfis’ ubushobozi ni Yesu, 
nkagir’ Umukiza ni Yesu kuko 
yansezeraniye, ari we Man’ idahinduka, 
azonyiyereka.

umuco_276.songBody:
1.Urukundo rutangaje, narubonye 
kwa Yesu Kristo, yankunze 
nar’ umunyamahanga, ankunda ntari 
muzi ./.N’ashimwe, n’ashimwe

2.Urukundo rutangaje, nararubonye 
ku musaraba, aho naboneye agakiza, 
nkozwa ivyaha vyose ./.N’uwitwa 
Rukundo./.

3.Urukundo rutangaje, 
rushingirw ’intahe n'Abera, 
rushingirw' intahe n’Abahizi, niko 
karanga karwo ./.N’urwa Yesu 
Kristo./.

4.Nzoririmba ndirimbira Umwami wanje 
Yesu Kristo, yampishuriye izina ryiwe, 
rimenywa n’abaciye ./.bugufi nka Yesu./.

5.Iyo ngabire itangaje, n'iy’abazima 
mu gakiza, abogejwe n’amaraso yiwe, 
bakabona umuco ./.Ubamurikira./.

umuco_277.songBody:
1.Ni Mpwemu yaremye vyose, ni 
Mpwemu wo hambere ni we twanyoyeko 
ku buntu, nkuko vyari vyasezeranywe.

Ni Mpwemu w’isezerano, aza 
kw’ijambo ry’isezerano ./.Riri mu bana 
b’isezerano ni we Bugingo budashira./.

2.Ni Mpwemu w’Imana Data, tunywako 
umutaga n’ijoro, eka ntawomuhanga 
namba, n’Imana ubwayo muri twebwe.

3.Ni we ba Data bahaweko, yabarongora 
amanwa n’ijoro, uwo niwe Mpwemu 
twahawe, natwe ni we aturongora.

4.Uwumushaka wese n'aze, 
uwumunyotewe n'aze anywe, ari 
mw’ijambo ry’isezerano, niwo muco 
w’igihe cacu.

5.Yemwe ngenzi ni tureme, dufise 
umugabisha akomeye, atujana 
ahasezeranywe, ni Mpwemu Yera
 w’Imana.

umuco_278.songBody:
1.Mwana w’Imana rema, Mwana 
w’Uhoraho humura ./.Imana yawe muri 
kumwe, n’umuvyeyi atibagira./.

Uboneka nk’uwutariho, ariko ncuti raba 
uriho, uboneka nk’umukene ariko raba 
uri umutunzi, wiyumvirwa nk’uwapfuye, 
ariko ehe uri muzima.

2.Mwana w’isezerano, ntutinye 
isezerano ntiriri kure ./.Ehe ngiryo riri 
imbere yawe Imana n'iyo kwizigirwa./.

3.Wavutse kubw’isezerano, wavyawe 
n’ijambo rizima ./.Uhabwa Mpwemu 
w’isezerano none n’iki cokunyiganyiza./.

4.Shima Imana himbaza Imana, 
yagutoranirije ivyiza ./.Igushira mu rugo 
rw’intama, aho ugaburirwa utsindaje./.

umuco_28.songBody:
1.Ntaho, ntaho namba nzibagira, 
Umwami wanje

Kuko yaranyiguze aja k’umusaraba 
abon’ amagorwa arababazwa azira 
jewe.

2.Ntaho ntaho namba nzibagira, 
amarushwa yiwe.

3.Ntaho, ntaho namba nzibagira 
urukundo rwiwe.

4.Umukiza wanje ntaho namba 
anyibagira.

5.N’ubu nama ngendera mu nyonga 
z’Umwami wanje.

Yama anyobora neza kandi 
akankiza abansi bagomba kunyica 
akanyoboz’ukuboko kwiwe.

umuco_280.songBody:
1.Appartiens-tu à l’épouse de Jésus, 
notre Seigneur ? Sera-ce pour toi un jour 
de joie ou un jour de frayeur ? Quand il 
reviendra, ton vȇtement sera-t-il pur et 
serein ? Qui, c’est l’instant d’être prêt 
pour le festin.

./.(oh) Maranatha, Alléluia(x3) Jésus 
vient et son festin est préparé./.

2.Pour cela pourrais-tu renoncer au 
monde et ses plaisir ? Marches-tus dans 
la lumière ; es-tu prêt pour l’accueillir ? 
Si tu n’es pas encore libre alors Jésus te 
dit : « viens » car c’est l’instant d’être 
prêt pour le festin.

3.L’état mondial nous revèle aussi que 
Jésus vient bientôt. Lorsque tout va 
s’accomplir, ta délivrance viendra d’en 
haut. Dans les tènèbres profondes 
brillera l’étoile du matin ; oui, c’est 
l’instant d’être prêt pour le festin.

4.Que mon coeur attend ce règne sans 
mort et sans déstruction. Passées seront 
les choses anciennes, c’est une nouvelle 
création. Là, je pourrais rencontrer Jésus 
mon Roi et tous les saints ; oui, c’est 
l’instant d’être prêt pour le festin.

umuco_281.songBody:
1.Quel bonheur de marche avec lui ! 
(bis) il conduira tous les pas de mon 
voyage ici-bas ; Quel bonheur de 
marcher avec lui.

2.Alléluia ! Gloire à son Saint Nom (bis) 
le Seigneur m’a racheté, dans son sang 
il m’a lavé Alléluia ! Gloire à son Saint Nom !

3.Alléluia ! Jésus me guérit (bis) Il guérit 
parfaitement, me libère entièrement ; 
Alléluia ! Jésus me guérit !

4.Il me baptise de son Esprit !(bis) Il me 
rend tellement heureux en me baptisant 
de feu, Il me baptise de son Esprit !

5.Avec lui je monte toujours plus haut ! 
(bis) Jésus est le bon berger, je ne crains 
aucun danger ; avec lui je monte toujours
 plus haut !

6.Alléluia ! Gloire à Saint Nom ! bientôt, 
Jésus reviendra, dans son règne, Il me 
prendra ; Alléluia ! Gloire à son Saint 
Nom !
umuco_281.songTitle: QUEL BONHEUR DE MARCHE AVEC LUI

umuco_282.songBody:
1.Sans attendre je veux tendre au 
bonheur promis ; qui s’élance, qui 
s’avance obtiendra le prix ./.Quand je 
prie Dieu m’entend, on m’attaque Il me 
défend, donc en route point de doute le 
but est si grand./.

2.Près du trône la couronne attend le 
vainqueur nulle trève ! qu’on se lève, a 
dit le Seigneur ./.d’obeir soyons heureux 
point de tièdes (et) de peureux le Fidèle 
nous appelle à règner aux cieux./.

3.D’un pas ferme, jusqu’au terme, il faut 
s’avancer, Dieu m’observe, qu’Il préserve 
mon pied de glisser ./.Que ce monde et 
ses attraits ne me séduisent jamais ! si sa 
haine se déchaîne que je sois en paix!./.

4.Dieu de grâce, que ta face luise en 
mon chemin, Père tendre, viens me 
prendre par ta forte main,./.Toute 
puissance est à toi subviens en ma faible 
foi ; ma victoire c’est ta gloire Jésus Roi 
des rois.

umuco_283.songBody:
1.Ivy’umuntu buntu gusa, vyose biba 
ar’ubusa(2x)

2.Ijambo ry’Imana rivuga, nta ciza kiri
 mu muntu.

3.N’ubuntu twagiriwe gusa, nta ciza 
twari dufise.

4.Ibibogaboga muri we, nivyo twahawe 
n’Umwami.

5.Hashimwe izina ry’Umukiza, ni we 
yaducunguye.

6.Nta rindi zina dukeneye, 
atar’ iry’Umwami Yesu.

7.Nta rindi shimwe dukeneye, 
atar’ iry’Umwami Yesu

8.Nta cubahiro dukeneye, 
atar’ ic’Umwami Yesu.

9.Nta n’ibikorwa dukeneye, bidakorewe 
mu Mwami.

10.Nta n’amajambo dukeneye, 
atavugirwa mu Mwami.

11.Twese nitwicishe bugufi, Umwami 
ashirwe hejuru.

12.Twese nitub’ abavukana, Umwami 
azoturongora.

13.Nta majambo y’isi dukeneye, 
tuzohemberwa mw’ijuru.

14.Uko dutama mur’iyi si, niko 
tuzogororerwa.

15.Tunih’ iminiho itovugwa, twifuza ko 
Umwami yoza.

16.Twemeje kub’ abaruhijwe, 
tuzoruhuka mw’ijuru.

17. Twemeje guheb’ umubiri, 
n’ibiwunezereza.

18.Twemejwe kurwanya kamere n’ivyo 
gahahamira.

19.Dusavy’ Umukiza adufashe, 
kurwan’ intambara nziza.

20.Dusavy’ Uhoraho adufashe, tuze 
tugere mw’ijuru.

umuco_284.songBody:
1.Bana b’Imana mumenye, ko mu minsi 
y’imperuka; hazab’ ibihe birushya, abantu 
benshi bikunda; kandi bakund’ impiya, 
kurya no kudamarara, bafit’ ishusho yo 
kwera, baguhakanish’ ivyo bakora.

Kuko muri bo harimwo irari ry’uburyo 
bwinshi, bahora biga ariko, ntibabasha 
kumenya ukuri; abantu bameze bartyo, 
dukwiye kubater’ umugongo

2.Abahanur’ ibinyoma badutse 
mw’Isirayeli, niko muri mwe hazoba, 
abigisha b’ibinyoma; bazana 
rwihereranwa, inyigisho zirem’ ibice, 
ar’irari ryabo ribatera gushaka indamu 
muri mwe.

Arikw’inyamanswa bantu, kuko 
zitagir’ ubwenge; bakunda kudamarara, 
bagatuk’ ivyo batazi, bakurikiye Balamu, 
waremewe gusenya no kwica.

3.Kand’ukw’Abisirayeli, basohotse 
mw’Egiputa; natwe niko twasohotse, 
tuva mu madini yose; ngo tub’ itorero 
rimwe, dufit' ukwizera kumwe, 
dufit’ umubatiz’ umwe n’Umwami umwe 
ni we Yesu Kristo.

Ivyiringiro dufite, n'ibyo kumusanganira, 
aje gutwar’ itorero, ni ryo 
yagiz’ Umugeni; tuzomusanga mu bicu, 
turirimba, Haleluya Mwami!

4.Muze twitegure Yesu, ari hafi 
kugaruka; ibyerekana kuza kwe, 
byose byaragaragaye; twitegure mu 
mitima, kandi tugire urukundo; ni ryo
 tegeko ry’Umwami dukundane nk’uko 
yadukunze.

Ivyiringiro dufite, n'ibyo kumusanganira; 
aje gutwar’ itorero ni ryo 
yagiz’ Umugeni, tuzomusanga mu bicu, 
turirimba, Haleluya Mwami!

5.Sinzandikwa mu gitabo, cy’amadini yo 
mw’iyi si, nzi ko Yesu yanyanditse, mu 
gitabo cy’ubugingo; ubw’azaz’ ahamagara 
amazina y’abamwizeye; nanje 
nzumv’ izina ryanje, nzamwitaba 
ndirimba Haleluya.

Ivyiringiro dufite, n'ibyo kumusanganira; 
aje gutwar’ itorero, ni ryo 
yagiz’ Umugeni; tuzomusanga mu bicu, 
turirimba, Haleluya, Mwami!

umuco_285.songBody:
1.Igihe kirashitse, nyen’indimo 
yimbure, uburo mu kigega, urwamfu 
ruturirwe ./.Urwamfu n’uburo, vyabanye 
kuva kera; igihe kirashitse, bigira 
bitandukane./.

2.Ivyo twigishijwe, maze 
tukavyizera, igihe kirashitse, 
tubibone n’amaso ./.Abatizera bose, 
n’abank’ Imana bose; igihe kirashitse 
ntibazotubon’ ukundi./.

3.Abahizi mu kwizera basinziriye mu
 Mwami, igihe kirashitse tubabone 
n’amaso ./.N’umwami wacu Yesu, 
tumuzi mu kwizera; igihe kirashitse aho 
tuzomubona./.

4.Ivyaremwe vyose vyama biraniha, 
vyifuza uwo munsi wo gucungurwa 
kwacu ./.N’imitima yacu, nayo 
iraniha, yifuza uwo munsi, w’ukuza 
kw’Umwami./.

5.Kaze Mwami Yesu turagukumbuye 
imitima yacu irakunyotewe ./.Uzoza 
ryari ga Mwami Yesu, uzoza ryari 
kutujan’ i muhira./.

umuco_286.songBody:
1.Nama ntangazwa n’urukundo, Imana 
Data yankunze; mbeg’ubuntu butangaje, 
bwabonekeye muri Kristo.

Nshim’ Imana kubwa Yesu, we 
yikoreye ivyaha vyanje, kubwanje 
yaciriwekw’iteka ./.Nzomuhimbaza ibihe 
vyose./.

2.Navutse mpfuye muri jewe, nkura 
nd’umuja w’icaha; ariko none, 
yarampariye, aranzura angira muzima.

3.Yanyerets’ inzir’ ija mu Bwami, inzira 
nziza ija mw’ijuru; ni yo ntumberey’ iminsi 
yose, ni we anshoboza kuyicamwo.

4.Kubw’intumwa n’abahanuzi, 
kubw’ubushobozi bw’ijambo; 
ntagishobora kunzimiza, ngendera 
mw’izina ry’Imana.

umuco_287.songBody:
1.Cya gihugu twasezeranijwe, 
cy’amahoro cy’amahirwe, cy’umunezero 
cy’igikundiro, cy’ibyishimo bisa.

./.Nifuza mu mutima wanjye, 
kuzagituramwo, niko nsenga niko nsaba 
Imana nyiraco./.

2.Cya gihugu kizava mw’ijuru, cy’izahabu 
kirabagirana, ni cy’Imana yasezeranije
 Umugeni wa Yesu.

3.Abazinjira mur’icyo gihugu, n’abana 
b’Aburahamu, bizey’ ijambo ry’isezerano, 
ijambo rihishuwe.

4.Abajya bumv’ ijambo ry’Imana, 
bakiziba amatwi yabo, ntibazobona 
Yerusalemu, cya gihugu gishya.

umuco_288.songBody:
1.Wakati tumefikiliya, ni ule wa 
kujichunguza-a-a, Maana kuja kwake 
Bwana kunakalibia zaidi ./.Atashimama 
kule mawinguni waminifu watamuona-a-a./.

Siku ile, mashuja wa imani, 
watakusanyika mbele ya kiti, kile 
kiti cha hukumu, wa Mungu wote 
watapewa na taji ./.La uzima wa milele, 
je ndugu u’tayari kulipewa nawe?./.

2.Wakati huyu, tuko ndani, kondooo 
zote za Mungu-uu huja upesi, kwa haraka 
na kuingia mlangoni ./.Sasa ndugu, 
usichezecheze usibakie njiani-i-i./.

3.Naye Bwana Yesu, anarudi kuchukua 
washindaji wote watafutwa, machozi 
yote na kupewa sawabu zao ./.Kwa 
sababu, neno la Mungu ni la uzima wa 
milele./.

4.Ni ajabu, tena ni ajabu Bwana atapo 
mlaki-i-I Bibi arusi wake, kweli huko juu 
mbinguni ./.Je ndugu yangu, u’tayari 
kunyakuliwa nawe pia-a-a./.

umuco_289.songBody:
1.Qui me relève dans mes chutes ? C’est 
Jésus Christ qui combat pour moi dans 
mes luttes ? C’est Jésus Christ.

Jésus a parlé, je veux croire que je puis 
lutter pour sa Gloire, car mon bouclier, 
ma victoire c’est Jésus Christ.

2.Je vais à mon père, et ma voie c’est 
Jésus-Christ, Je suis bienheureux, et ma 
joie c’est Jésus-Christ.

Et si même, dans la souffrance mon 
coeur parle, d’éspèrance c’est que j’ai 
mis ma confiance en Jésus Christ.

3.Sauvé, je ne me glorifie qu’en Jésus-
Christ, pour la terre et le ciel, ma vie c’est 
Jésus Christ.

Bientôt Adieu choses mortelles ! loin 
de vous je prendrai des ailes, vers les 
demeures éternelles, vers Jésus Christ.
umuco_289.songTitle: QUI ME RELEVE DANS MES CHUTES?

umuco_29.songBody:
1.Amaraso y’Umwami Yesu 
niy’aduhanagura imyanda, Iyo 
satan’adutey’imyampi amaraso niyo 
adufasha.

Amaraso y’Umwami Yesu niy’aduha 
kuba ab’Imana; niy’akiza abananiwe, 
niy’abona ivyihishije.

2.Amaraso y’Umwami Yesu 
niyo yatuberey’ishikanwa, iyo 
dutakambiy’uhoraho amaraso niyo 
ducamwo.

3.Amaraso y’Umwami Yesu niyo Data 
aturabiramwo, uwanyoye kur’ayo maraso 
yama afis’ubushozi bwayo.

4.Uwanyoye amaraso ya Yesu, yama 
afis’ubugingo muri we, kandi uwunywa 
kur’ ayo maraso, yama afise intsinzi muri 
we.

5.Mwami Yesu nuze umfashe, mbone 
gushushanywa nawe Mwami, amaraso 
yawe ambereye, igitutu co kunkingira.

umuco_290.songBody:
1.Uru rugendo ndimwo mpura 
n’ingorane, uru rugendo ndimwo mpura 
n’intambara ./.Ariko ico nzi n’uko Yesu 
yanesheje

./.Nico gituma ntatinya, ntewe na 
Satani iyo andasa imyampi, sinterwa 
n’ubwoba ./.Kuko nzi ko Uhoraho 
azongwanira./.

2.Uru rugendo ndimwo 
sinihamagaye, uru rugendo ndimwo, 
narahamagawe ./.Umwami wanje Yesu 
ni we yampamagaye./.

3.Naho ibigeragezo vyoba vyinshi cane, 
umutima wanje ntuzonyiganyiga ./.Kuko 
uwanesheje ari imbere yanje./.

Ko nageze mu kiganza c’Umwami
 wanje Yesu nta na kimwe gishobora 
kuzohankura ./.Naziritse umutima 
wanje, ahera cane./.

4.Umunsi umwe urugendo 
nzoruheraheza, nzoruhuka imiruho yo 
mur’iyi si mbi ./.Nzobonana na Yesu 
amaso mu yandi./.

Sinzoba ngisubira kurira 
ukundi, ingorane z’aha mw’isi 
zizokwibagirwa ./.Nzibanira na Yesu 
tutagitandukana./.

umuco_291.songBody:
1.Hirya y’uruzi hariy’ igihugu, igihugu 
gitemba amata n’ubuki, niyo ndaba
 n'iyo ndiko ndaja iyagisezeranya ni yo 
yakimpishuriye.

Ngenda ndirimba kandi nezerewe, 
nubwo ngendera mu muniho, 
kubw’ivyiza biri mu gihugu,
 ntobigereranya n’ivy’iki gihe.

2.Ninashika mur’ico gihugu, 
nzohanagurwa amarira yose, n’Umwami 
nyene ico gihugu, kand’azonyambika 
n’igitsibo.

3.N’igihugu cabikiwe abahizi, 
abazonesha urugamba rukomeye, 
giteguriw’ abera b’Imana, bavyawe 
n’ijambo na Mpwemu Yera.

4.Mwene Data waragihishuriwe? 
Ntutinye gushingira intahe Umwami kuko 
kw’iherezo ry’urugendo uzokibona ni 
wihangana.

umuco_292.songBody:
1.Ku musaraba w’Umwami Yesu, niho 
naboneye intsinzi, kuko ca cangera 
c’icaha, arico c’urupfu camvako ./.Nico 
gituma ndirimba./.

Umwami Yesu yarankunze, isi n’ijuru 
bitararemwa, uyo n’umunyembabazi 
kuko umunsi, nzomubona nzoruhuka 
imiruho.

2.Ku musaraba w’Umukiza wanje, niho 
kwa gutandukana kwari hagati yanje, 
n’Imana kwavaho ubutagisubira ./.Nico 
gituma mfise amahoro./.

3.Ku musaraba w’Umucunguzi, niho 
n’Abera basinziriye baronkeye intsinzi 
vy’ukuri, bakabohorwa bakanesha ./.Ni co 
gituma tuzobonana./.

4.Uwo musaraba ndwawukunda, 
kuko wampaye kuzoragwa ubugingo 
budashira, nkaba niteze no 
kuzobona ./.Umwami imbonankubone./.

umuco_293.songBody:
1.Waducishije mu nzira igoye, kuko 
ntawundi yari bwayicemwo, ariko wewe 
waraciyemwo, nanje nzoyicamwo 
nezerewe.

Kuko ivyo navyo biva ku Mana, 
Umujanama w’igitangaza, uhambaye 
mu bwenge, Uhoraho nyen’ ingabo.

2.Iyo nzira ndende cane, kandi 
yuzuyemwo Sikoropiyo, amajwi yazo ni 
menshi cane, ariko ntaco warayanesheje.

3.Ivyo bintu biragoye cane, kuko 
s'ivy’inyama n’amaraso, ariko 
jewe narabimenye, kuko wamaze 
kubimpishurira.

4.None nawe mwana w’Imana, wiyubare 
ntuhendwe n'ayo majwi, kukw’ijwi 
nyaryo rir' i Gologota, hamwe hashinze 
umusaraba.

5.Har’umusozi wateguwe, kuzoba 
uburuhukiro bwacu, ba Daniyeli 
barawumenye, abahizi bose barawuzi.

6.Uwo musozi ni mwiza cane, izina 
ryawo ni Yerusalemu, Umwami wawo 
ni Yesu Kristo, ni we aganza amahanga 
yose.

umuco_294.songBody:
1.Imana twizeye, n’Imana y’ukuri 
yaduhamagaye, n'iyo kwizigirwa, 
kuko ikivyerekana n’urukundo rwayo, 
hamwe na ya nkingi y’umuriro, 
yarongor’ ishengero, mu nzira y’ukuri.

Imana yacu n’ihimbazwe cane, 
Umwami Yesu n’ahabw’ icubahiro, kuko 
yadukunze tutabizi, akatwigura ngo 
turonke agakiza.

2.Yatoranije ihanga, ry’Abisirayeli, aho 
hari kubw’ubuntu gusa ihagurutsa 
Mose w’umunyantege nke, naho hari 
kubw’ubushobozi bwayo, nimurabe 
namwe, urukundo rw’Imana.

3.Yatoranije Umugeni mu mahanga, aho 
hari kubw’umusaraba, asemerera n’ijwi 
rirenga ati: vyose birarangiye, vy’ukuri 
niho n’ubugingo bwacu, bwacungurwa.

4.Inkingi y’umuriro, ni yo yar’imbere 
y’Abisirayeli, mu bugaragwa, ni nayo 
n’ubu irongor’ ishengero, turya manu 
nsha tukagir’ ubugingo, kuko Umwami 
wacu, Yesu ari muzima.

5.Imana yacu n’ishimwe cane, 
kuko yaduhaye n’abakozi bayo, 
ntibasiba kuduhanura muri vyose, 
bakadutoz’ indero vy’ukuri, nico gituma 
dushimiy’ Imana.

umuco_295.songBody:
1.Ninjiye ahera cane, muri Yesu Kristo, 
ndahasanga itunga ry’uburyo bwose, 
none ubu ndaririmba mpimbaza Imana 
Data yangiriye ubuntu ikahanshikana.

./.Har’urukundo n’ukwizera, ivyizigiro 
n’amahoro, umunezero n’ukwihangana, 
har’ukuruhuka...guhimbar’ Imana...Ha...
leluya!./.

2.Igihe ntari bwagerere ahera cane, 
naronder’ ukuntu nohimbara Imana, 
nawo umutima wanje waja hirya no hino, 
nshitse ahera cane nca ndaruhuka.

3.Naraganya nkarira, maze nkicurikira, 
sinarinzi amahoro n’umunezero, 
ntakambiye Uhoraho Umwami Yesu 
Kristo, ambera inyishu y’ibibazo vyose.

4.None ubu ndaririmba, nshimira 
Umwami Yesu, yuzuye ubuntu urukundo, 
n’imbabazi ncuti, nawe mwegere, 
umusabe wizeye, akwinjize ahera cane, 
har’intsinzi.

umuco_296.songBody:
1.Turi ku rugamba rwanyuma, n’ijambo 
ry’Imana, riduhanura yuko, twokizera 
uwanesheje ./.Niho natwe tuzoshobora 
kunesha./.

Aho niho har’agakiza k’Imana, 
n’ukwambar’ ibirwanishwa vyose, 
mu gusengera muri Mpwemu, no mu 
kwitwaza inkota ya Mpwemu, ariryo 
Jambo ry’Uhoraho.

2.Kw’ijambo ry’Imana, rivuga riti 
ic’ umuntu abiba, nico azokwimbura, 
none natwe ni tubibe muri 
Mpwemu ./.Tuze twimbure ubugingo 
budashira./.

3.Ntituzoshobozwa n’inkomezi zacu, 
kiretse ni twizera Umwami Yesu, 
niho tuzorongorwa, na Mpwemu 
Yera ./.Tukagendera no mu muco 
w’ijambo./.

4.Ijambo ry’Imana, ni ryo rizoduha 
kugira ingeso nziza, hamwe 
n’ubwenge, ukwirinda n’ukwihangana 
navyo ./.Bituj’ imbere mu rugendo 
rwacu./.


5.Ni twubaha ijambo ry’Imana vy’ukuri, 
kandi tugakunda na bene Data, niho 
tuzogira intsinzi muri vyose ./.N’Imana 
izoshimagizwa muri twe./.

umuco_297.songBody:
1.Turasoma mw’ijambo ry’Uhoraho, 
yuko Aburahamu yizeye Imana 
imukura mu gihugu c’iwabo imwereka 
igihugu c’isezerano, kubw’ukwizera 
yaraciboneye.

Nawe mwene Data, n’utahure 
yuko ukwizera, ar’ ukumenya 
rwose ivyizigirwa, udakekeranya,
 n’ibitabonwa nikwo kubitumenyesha, 
kuko kutubwira, kw'ar’ivy’ukuri.

2.Mbega ukwizera, sikwo kwanatumye 
Abera b’Imana, bashikira neza, ivy’Imana 
yabasezeranira, bakagendana nayo 
itaboneka, gushika naho Henoki 
azamurwa.

3.Ukwizera nikwo kwatumye, Nowa 
yumvira ijwi ry’Umwami Imana 
nzima, akubaka ubwato bamucokora 
gushika naho umwuzure waza, agakira 
n’abamwumviye bose.

4.Kandi yemwe hanga ry’Imana nzima, 
ukwizera kwatumye Daniyeli, naho 
yatawe mu rwobo rw’intambwe, asohoka 
ari muzima vy’ukuri, kuko ukwizera 
kunesha imana

5.None mvuge ikindi ki ku kwizera, kuko 
n’ababaye abahizi bose, babishobojwe 
n’ukwizera Imana, bene Data nimuze 
twizere, tuzobane n’Umwami ibihe 
vyose.

umuco_298.songBody:
1.Bwana amesema tumpeni huyo 
Shetani na yeye pia atatukimbia ni ahadi 
tuliopewa na Bwana Yesu.

./.Kweli tutashinda tukiamini neno, 
tutashinda kwa nguvu za Bwana 
tukafike mbinguni./.

2.Pia Bwana amesema tumukaribie yeye 
peke na yeye atatukaribia  huo ndiwo 
ushindi wetu.

./.Kweli ni ushindi, ni ushindi kweli 
ushindi ni wetu tukidumu katika imani 
tutashinda kwa nguvu za Bwana./.

3.Kumbukeni Abrahamu pale mulimani 
Moriya amejaribiwa sana na kwa imani 
ameshinda majaribu yote.

./.Nasi tutashinda, tutashinda 
tukishikama na neno na kubaki katika 
imani tutamuona Bwana Yesu./.

umuco_299.songBody:
1.N’igihe ki ga mwene Data, ko 
mbon’ ibihe birakuze, n’igihe ki ga 
ncuti yanje, ko mbona Umwami ari 
mukuza ./.Kuko ni igihe cahanuwe, naco 
caramaze guseruka./.

./.Umugeni nawe ariteguye, Umwami 
Yesu azohagarara avuge n’ijwi rirenga ati: 
Ni muze yemwe bene Data niho tuzoba 
dukiz’ amarira./.

2.N’igihe ki bana b’Imana, ko 
mbon’ ijambo ry’ubuhanuzi, iryo twari 
twarasezeraniwe, naryo ryaramaze 
guseruka ./.Nuko rero ntidufyine ku 
gakiza twaronse k’ubuntu./.

3.N’igihe ki yemwe shengero, nico 
gusab’ Imana ukwizera, kandi tukagira 
n’ingeso nziza, ubwenge hamwe 
n’ukwirinda ./.Kukw’ihanga ry’Uhoraho, 
tur’ umuco n’umunyu w’iyi si./.

4.Kandi harahiriw’ umuntu, yihanganira 
ibimugerageza, kuko niyarama, azohabwa 
ca gitsibo, kimwe c’ubugingo ./.Ic’ Imana 
yasezeraniye abazoba barabay’ abahizi./.

umuco_3.songBody:
1.Ncuti j’ugendera mu muco, woye 
kuzimagirika, Umuco wera wo mw’Ijuru, 
Uzokuyobora.

Gendera mu Muco(3) Mu muco waka 
w’Imana

2.Gendera mu Muco w’ukuri, 
umv’Ijambo ry’Imana, uj’ukuyobor’iteka, 
Ukwizez’Imana.

3.J’ugendera mu Muco iteka, 
uj’ukumurikira, Maz’utamurur’umwijima, 
Hose hatangazwe

4.Gendera mu Muco mumenye, 
urukundo rw’Imana, N’uburyo 
yakunz’abiwe Akabarokora.

umuco_30.songBody:
1.Bakristo ve hasi yemwe twitegure 
neza, abenshi bibaza yuiko Yesu 
atebaganye

Uhoraho Imana yacu ntatebej’ isezerano, 
ariko agomba ko bose bihan’ivyaha 
vyabo

2.Abenshi ntibabon’ ibimenyetso yavuze, 
bibaza yukw’ivyo yavuze bitarashika.

3.Ibimenyetso yavuze vyarashitse vyose, 
niwikangur’uve mw’itiro witegereze.

4.Bakristo nimuze yemwe twitegure 
vuba, tumere nk’umugeni iyo yiteze 
Umukwe.

5.Hahiriw’ abamesur’ imvune zabo neza 
ngo babone kwegera ca giti c’ubugingo.

umuco_300.songBody:
1.Mwami Yesu, Mwami Imana yera,
 ni wewe womenya ingorane zanje. 
Ninashika mu bigeragezo, ntawundi 
Mwami, yompoz’ amarira.

Umv’ ugusenga kw’abahungu bawe, 
umv’ ugusenga kw’abakobwa bawe, 
teg’ ugutwi Mwami ukwinginga kwacu, 
tugutakambira ijoro n’umurango

2.Iki gihe, kiragoye cane, n’igihe 
c’intambara, n’igihe c’iherezo. Abantu 
benshi bamaze kwidibamira, ntibamenya 
yuko wegereje kuza.

3.Ndagusavye Mpwemu wawe yera, 
az’ ampishurire amabanga yawe. Kugira 
neshe, intege nke nyinshi, zo muri iki 
gihe, c’I Lawodikiya.

4.Ab’ ukunda, urabiyegereza, bakabana 
nawe, bakakubwira vyose. Ukabiyereka 
nabo, ijoro n’umurango.

umuco_301.songBody:
1.Amaraso ya  Yesu, n’imbizi 
y’isok’ idakama. Amaraso ya 
Yesu, ./.Atandukanye n’ay’ibindi 
vyaremwe./.

Yagendagenze mu mitsi ya IMANWELI, 
Atandukanye n’ay’izindi ntama, kuko 
yagendagenze mu mitsi ya NDIHO, 
Atandukanye n’ay’abahanuzi, Kuko 
yagendagenze mu mitsi ya YEHOVA,
 ./.Atandukanye n’ay’abandi bose./.

2.Amaraso ya Yesu, Arakomeye kuko 
yoz’ icaha, ntakindi na-mba kiriho, 
./.coshobora kwoz’ umutima./.

3.Wa mwambuzi, ku mpfiro, 
yagiriw’ ubuntu bukomeye, na jewe na-ri 
mub’ uko, ./.None nanje narayozemwo./.

4.Uw’ ubuntu, bugendereye, Ni we 
wenyen’ ayisukamwo, akarongorwa na 
Yesu, ./.Akama yitez’ umunsi wiwe./.

6.Har' ingoro-rano mw’ijuru, Nyinshi 
cane z’abayobotse, Arikw’ico mpahamiye 
cane,. /.N’ukubon’ uwo Yancunguye./.

umuco_302.songBody:
1.Reka twambambir’ Imana, ni yo 
nyen’ isezerano, Ishuz’ umuragi waweee. 
Ni wewe mfura mu bana.

Niyo yasezeraniye, Aburahamu Kanani: 
Ni nayo yasezeraniye, Abera Mpwemu 
Yera, None, ishuz’ umuragi waweee, 
Ni wewe mfura mu bana.

2.Reka kwangaz’ umutimaaa, Nka 
wa mwana w’icangazi. Imana 
vyarayihimbayeee, Ikugir’ itunga ryayo.

3.Waremeye kurya manuuu, emera 
n’imboga zirura. Abera ni bo batoranaaa, 
emera wezwe mwene Data.

umuco_303.songBody:
1.Yemwe shengero muze 
dusab’ ubwenge, kugira ngo 
tumenye, ivyo dukora. Umwami Yesu 
atwugur’ amatwi, aduhumur’ amaso 
tubon’ umuco.

Birababaje shengero birababaje; 
kubon’ umuntu Imana yiremeye, 
ikamuh’ ubwenge n’amatwi yo kwumva, 
Arikw’ akazorimbuka birababaje.

2.Abenshi cane, bamaze gut’ inzira, 
y’Umucunguzi wacu, Yesu Kristo. 
Bateg’ amatwi, amajambo ya gipfu, aho 
guteg’ amatw’ ivy'abwenge.

3.Umuco waramaze kwaka mur’iki gihe, 
ariko benshi, ntibawubona. Abandi nabo, 
bakizib’ amatwi yabo ngo ntibumv’ ijambo 
ry’ubuhanuzi.

4.Mur’iki gihe, iy’ijambo rishitse, 
benshi baca bavuga, ngo nico kimwe; 
bakabona ko, vyos’ ar’ibintu bisa, kuko 
batarahumuk’ amaso.

umuco_304.songBody:
1.Mwene Data n’ukorer’ Imana, 
wiyubare muvy'uvuga vyose, usuzume 
amajambo yawe yose ./.Usuzume 
n’ibikorwa vyawe./.

Wiyubare, wiyubare; wiyubare, mu 
ngendo zawe; ntiwanjanjwe kur’ubwo 
buntu, wagiriwe n’Uhoraho.

2.Ntumere nk’icapa canditswe ku 
nzira, cerekan’ inzir’ ija mu gisagara, 
arik’ ubwaco kitazoshikayo ./.kukw’ata 
bwenge buri muri co./.

3.Uhuye na mwene so wundi 
nawe, umwamir’ imbuto nziza 
cane, muganir’ ivy’Ubwami bwo
 mw’ijuru ./.ntimut’ umwanya muvy’
ubusa./.

4.N’uko mwicaye ngaho muganira, 
har’ ikibahuza hagati yanyu: ni satani 
canke ni Yesu Kristo ./.ni mwiyubare mu 
mvugo zanyu./.

5.Ntiwigungan’ ivy’Imana yaguhaye, ivyo 
nta kimazi vyokuzanira, n’ukorere Imana 
hakibona ./.Ibihe bikigushobokera./.

umuco_305.songBody:
1.Naho nkuburir’ ukanka, Imana 
yanj’ irapfuha. Incabit’ iri mu mizi, y’igiti 
cose kitama. Ijambo ric’ urubanza, abizera 
bagatsinda; ./.Ibikorwa vyawe ni vyasha, 
urubanza ruzoba ar’urwo./.

Nkuko satani ykoze, Hariya muri 
Edeni: na n’ubu niko akoraaa, Shengero 
nimube maso.

2.Watewe muri Paradizo, wavomewe 
kuva kera. Urary’ ariko ntiwama, 
kand’uz’ikibi n’iciza, hagarara va mu 
bapfuye, rya ku giti c’ubugingo ./.Reka 
kwam’ ivyamwa birumvye am’ ivyamwa 
vya Mpwemu Yera./.

3.Kanguka wew’ usinziriye, Umwami 
Yesu ari kw’irembo. Arahamagar’ ati 
ngwino, ugendere mu kuri kose. 
Abakoran’ urukundo, nibo bubak’ i Siyoni: 
ibibanza vyaratanzwe, tangura nawe 
wubake.

4.Watumwe kuvug’ ukuri, none 
wivugir’ ivy’ushaka; incabit’ iri mu mizi 
y’igiti cose kitama, Umugeni ntategurwa, 
n’inyigisho z’ivy’ubwenge ./.ategurwa 
n’ubutumwa, bwavuzwe n’umuhanuzi./.

umuco_306.songBody:
1.Kufara-ka-na kwa Isirayeli. Kumeleta 
matata, Kumeleta-u-wasi mku, kwa 
wateule wa Mungu.

Kumeleta kuwasi, kwa wateule wa 
Mungu; wanaingiya gizani, sababu njia 
ni nyembamba. Ebu jameni, ebu tuache, 
tuache sote, ile fitina, Ya yule mwovu, 
mwovu shetani; Tudumu katika Neno 
lake Yesu (Mungu).

2.Mafara-ka-no- kwa-taifa la Mungu, 
yameleta kuasi, yanale-ta-ma-tengano 
mengi, kwa watoto wa Mungu.

3.Na bwana-wetu-Yesu Kristo, alisema 
kwa kanisa, muwe-na-u-moja ndani 
yenu, nami nita-kuwa nanyi.

4.E ndu-gu, ya-ngu-tu-wace njia mbili; 
tufuate mwokozi, tusiwe ka-ma-yule 
Balamu, tufuate Bwana Yesu.

umuco_307.songBody:
1.Igihe ni kibi,Shengero ry’Imana, Guma 
mw’Ijambo rya Yesu tugira dutahe.
Teg’ ugutwi bwenge, wiyamirize gipfu, 
Niwirind’ umwambiro w’abafarisayo.

Umuhanuzi w’igihe cacu yarashiz’ ijwi 
hejuru, Ngo mwongera kumubamba 
nko ku musaraba. Inyigisho z’amadini 
muzirutish’ ivya Yesu, Mwongera 
kumubamb’ ubugira kabiri.

2.Ibuk’ aho bamubamba, ico bamuziza, 
ngo yigira Imana kand’azirur’ isabato.
Bari bahegekey’ ibitabo vyabo, mugabo 
ntibahishuriwe Umwami uw’ ari we.

3.Bamushikanye, I Nyagahanga, 
baramucurira kandi banamubambaho.
Ub’abonekera, mw’Ijambo ryiwe,
 bongera kumubamba, ko bank’ ivy’ukuri.

4.Ko batamumenye, mur’ico gihe, 
N’ubu shengero ntibonamumenya,
ko batatahuye, abana b’Imana 
n’ub’ Ishengero ryiwe ntiboritahura.

5.Shengero ry’Imana, shikam’ ukenyere, 
kuko tur’ abashikwako n’masezerano. 
Turi kw’iherezo ry’ibihe vy’iherezo, 
kuk’Umumarayika yavuze ngo ntibigitevye.

6.Abasenzi ni benshi, amadini n’injojo, 
inyigisho ni nyinshi igihe kigeze 
he? N’abasizw’ amavuta bo mu gihe 
canyuma, ariko Mpwemu n’Umugeni 
baracahamagara.

7.Abana b’Imana, bafis’ Umwami umwe 
ukwizera kumwe n’umubatiz’ umwe. 
Bubatswe ku rufatiro rw’intumwa 
n’abahanuzi Yesu akab’ ibuye rigumya 
imfuruka.

umuco_308.songBody:
1.Imana yabwiye Aburahamu, Iti n’uve I 
wanyu no mu mryang’ I wanyu, uje aho 
jewe nzokwereka, Aho jewe nashiz’ Izina 
ryanje.

Nzosengera (2x), ah’Imana yashize 
ijambo ryayo, nzosengera (2x), 
ah’Imana Yashiz’ Izina ryayo.

2.Imana yabwiye ab’Israeli, Iti: 
ntimuzigere musengera namba, ahantu 
ah’ariho hose, kiretse aho nashiz’ Izina 
ryanje.

3.Mu gutanga ishikanwa ryabo, mu 
gutanga ibigiracumi vyabo; bama baja 
ku musozi wera, ah’Imana yashiz’ Izina 
ryayo.

4.Iki gihe ibicaniro ni vyinshi, 
vyitirirwa amazina menshi cane; ariko 
ah’umuvyimb’ uzob’ uri, nih’inkukuma 
zizokoranira.

5.Ubutumwa butegur’ Umugeni, 
bwazanywe n’umuhanuzi w’iki gihe cacu, 
aho niho honyene, aho niho honyene, nih’ 
Imana yashiz’ Izina ryayo.

umuco_309.songBody:
1.Teg’ amatwi se bene Data, 
ndababwire ikintu nabonye; n’umugore 
w’indegeteranyi, ./.yicaye ku mazi 
menshi./.

Yaragiye, ku misozi, yubakako amazu 
yiwe. Aragenda no mu biyaya yubakaho 
amazu yiwe, amwe n’ay’abakobwa 
biwe, Akayit’ insengero z’Imana.

Kand’ariyo avugiramw’ ibinyoma, 
kand’ariyo asambaniramwo.

2.Uwo mugore w’indegeteranyi, abunda 
ku mahwane y’inzira; ategera imburabwenge,
./.azizimirish’ ibinyoma vyiwe./.

Ababwira, ko har’ Imana Zitatu 
ziri mw’Imana Imwe. Ababuza, 
kubatizwa, mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo. 
Ngw’igihe c’Intumwa caraheze. 
Abahendesh’ akarimi keza. Bagafatwa 
nk’inyon’ igwa mu mutego. Inzu ziwe 
n’inzir’ ija mu kuzimu.

3.Erega na jewe se bene Data, uwo yari 
yaranyifatiye; nahabony’ ubuntu bwa 
Yesu, ./.bwanteguye mu mutego wiwe./.

Ewe Yesu, Mana yanje, warakoze ko 
wambohoye; wambohoj’ isezerano 
ryawe, ryo muri Malaki kane, nca 
mbona ko Imana ar’Imwe: n’Izina ryayo 
kw’ari rimwe, Nzokora vyose mw’Izina 
ryawe, Kugez’ igihe co kugusanganira.

4.Ababohowe, n’ubuntu 
bwayo barasohoka bakav’ i we, 
abizigitiriyeyo bakagwayo. ./.Hunga 
ncut’ umwany’ ukiriho./.

Hari n’abandi bisubizayo, kubera vino 
y'uwo mugore; yaboreje, amahanga 
menshi; bakagiriranir’ amasezerano 
n’isi; bagacika abakobwa biwe; 
kand’igihe gihita cihuta, -Bakibagira Iva 
hasi ryabo; -Kubera amaronko y’iyi si.

umuco_31.songBody:
1.Mwami wanje ndakwihaye 
ndakwihereje, nizeye y’uk’utazigera 
umpemuki-ra, warapfuye urazuka non’uri 
muzima, ./.N’undinde mu ngendo zose 
ziy’isi Mwami./.

Mwami ndakwihereje n’undongore 
ukugomba, wiyerekane mu rusengero 
rwawe, name nuzuy’ amazi ./.y’isoko 
idakama./.

2.Mwami wanje ndakwihaye 
ndakwihereje, ndaguhay’ Ubugingo 
bwanj’ubwiganzire, unyuzuze rwa 
rukundo rwawe Mukiza ./.Nkund’abandi 
nk’uko nanje wankunze./.

3.Mwami wanje ndakwihaye 
ndakwihereje, name ngendera mu 
nyonga zawe Mukiza, unyuzuze za 
mbabazi zaw’Uhoraho ./. Mparir’abandi 
nk’uko nanje wampariye, Mwami./.

4.Kandi Mwami ninashika kuri rwa ruzi, 
uz’umpe gutinyuka nuzur’ ukwizera, 
ndarujabuke nuzuy’ inkomezi zawe 
./.Nzama ndirimb’ urukundo rw’Imana./.

5.Ninarenguka mu nyonga z’Umwami 
Imana, nta kindi nzirata Atari wa 
musaraba, nzomushimisha rwa rukundo 
rwiwe rwinshi, ./.Tumushime n’abiwe iyo
mw'ijuru./.

umuco_310.songBody:
1.Nari nicecekeye, kandi njumarariwe; 
Nkumva ko ntar’ aho nabwirizwa kuba 
kubw’uruhongore nari navukiyemwo.

Idamba rirahamagara irindi naryo rikishura; 
Mperaho Ndaguruka, Mbona kuv’aho 
nari ndi; non’ubu, ndi mu Bwami, 
bw’Imana ya Yakobo.

2.Hashiz’ igihe gito, numv’ ikiguruka; 
ndangamije hejuru mbona n’inkukuma; 
isemerer’ irondera umwana wayo.

3.Numvise ijwi ryayo, numva 
duhuj’ imvugo; nca mper’ aho ndavuga 
nay’ iranyishura; iti Duguz’ aho 
wategerezwa kuba.

4.Nkiguruka vyarangoye, kuko nahora 
mu nkoko; nya nkukuma nya mvyeyi 
ic’irandamira, inshikana ah’inkukuma 
zindi ziri.

umuco_311.songBody:
1.Igihe turimw, igihe tugezemwo
 n’igihe co gushits’ Ijambo ryose

Uku ni k’Uhorah’ agize, ngw’abantu 
banje barangunze; yamar’ abantu 
barabaza bati: “Mbega Mwami 
twakugunz’ iki”? Uu…uu…uu…uu…
uu..uu…uu… ./.Mwarangunze icacumi, 
n’amashikanwa mwishirira mu mifuko; 
wa muvumo namwe murawuvumwe, 
Muzosoromera mu mifuk’ itobotse./.

2.Twarabatijwe mw’Izina rya Yesu, 
bikwiye ko dushits’ ibindi vyose.

3.Bizobabaza ku musi w’imperuka, ni 
wagirizwa ko wahora wiba.

umuco_312.songBody:
1.Zan’ ubugingo bwawe, ubushire mu 
bwato, zana n’ivyawe vyose, shira 
mu bwato; uburake buraje kandi 
butey’ ubwoba, bugiye kurimbura.

Abantu barimbuwe n’umwuzure w’amazi, 
kuko banse kwumvira ngo bihane, 
kuko Nowa yavuga n’ijwi rirenga cane, 
bakanka kumwumvira, bararimbuka.

2.Turahunga satani, turahung’ igikoko, 
igitigiri caco caraharuwe, natwe 
tukumv’ iryo jwi, ritubarira riti: “Sohoka 
muv’ iwe mwese”.

3.Eh’Umuco waratse, wakir’ umw' umwe 
wese, none nind’ akigendera mu 
mwijima; Itara ryadometswe 
ryerekan’ uwo Muco, n’Ijambo 
ry’ubuhanuzi.

umuco_313.songBody:
Izina rya Yesu x4 
1. Izina rya Yesu n’izina rikomeye,
 Izina rya Yesu n’Izina ryo kwubahwa; 
nzorishingir' intahe aho nzoba ndi hose
kukw’ari ryo twahawe musi y’ijuru.

(Jewe-e-e-e, Nabwiw’ Ubutumwa 
mw’Izina rya Yesu, kandi nabatijwe 
mw’Izina rya Yesu. Peter’ avugishwa 
na Mpwemu Yera, ati mwese ni 
mwihan’ ivyaha vyanyu, kandi 
mubatizwe mw’Izina rya Yesu, 
muzoronk’ ingabire ya mpwemu Yera.

2.Har’abanka kubatiza mw’Izina rya 
Yesu, Bagashima kubatiza mu mazina 
atatu. Ariko naho yoba n’umumarayika, 
akigish’ ibinyuranye n’ivy’intumwa 
zigishije ico n’ikivume imbere y’Imana.

3.N’abigishwa ba Yohan’ Umubatizi na bo, 
baremeye kubatizwa mw’Izina rya 
Yesu. Na ya nkone yabwiw’ Ubutumwa 
bwiza, ihishurirw’ Izina ry’Umwami Yesu, 
Filipo yayibatije mw’Izina rya Yesu.

4.Naw’ ubatiz’ abantu mu mazin’ atatu, 
ndafis’ ikintu ngira ndakwibarize: Ese 
k’ufise Bibiliya kand’uyisoma, mbega 
wombwir’ umuntu muri Bibiliya, yoba 
yabatijwe mu mazin’ atatu?

5.Nawe waj’ uyu munsi 
wumvis’ ubutumwa, ihan’ ivyaha vyawe 
urababarirwa. Sab’umubatizo wo
 mw’Izina rya Yesu, Yesu-atez’ ibiganza 
arahamagara, kand’aracari ku ntebe 
y’imbabazi.

umuco_314.songBody:
1.Ninasenga nga-teba kwishurwa 
nzosaba Yesu kwihangana, nzomenya 
neza kw’igihe canje co kwishurwa 
kitarashika.

Nzihangana gushits’ iherezo, nzihangana 
gushitsa nishurwe, nzihangana 
gushits’ agaruke, nzihangana 
nzihangana.

2.Ninabon’ ibintu bihindutse 
nzosaba Yesu kwihangana, nzomenya 
kwar’ivy’igihe gito kandi kw’iyi si igiye 
gushira.

3.Ewe satani waratsinzw’ ubu 
nah’ unzaniramw’ intege nke, ndazi 
kw’integuro y’Umukiza yama yiteguriye 
gushika.

umuco_315.songBody:
1.Mfit’intambara mu mutima, 
mfit’ ubukene bukomeye; s’ubw’ifeza 
cyangw’izahabu, n’uburam’ imbere y’Imana.

Mwam' icyonkomeza Mana, 
mpore ngutegereje Mwami, 
nsukahw’ amavuta yawe, mpore 
ngutegereje; wayahay’ abatubanzirije, 
barangiza batarih’ umugayo, nanjye 
ndasab’ amavuta yawe, mpore 
ngutegereje.

2.Nshak’ ikintu wakorey’ Ubwoko, 
bw’Isirayeli mu rugendo rwabo, kudasaza 
kw’imyambaro yabo, n’uburame 
bw’ubuhamya.

3.Kubw’uburame butaramvye 
Mwami, intwari zunamye mu rugamba, 
zitay’ ibishwangi mu mayira, zibay’ indaza 
mu rugendo.

umuco_32.songBody:
1. Mw’izuka rya mbere, tuzomwibonera: 
Yesu Mwami wacu abazoba biteguye pe.

Inzamb’izovuga abasinziriye bazovyuka 
bose ,gusanganir’Umwami

2.Abasinziriye, ubushobozi bwiwe; 
buzobavyura bose, buzuye umunezero 
mwinshi.

3.Natw'abakiriho, abuzuye mpwemu,
tuzomwibonera, Yesu ari mu bwiza 
bwiwe.

4.Tuzomwibonera, Yesu mubwiza bwiwe; 
tumushime cane dusa nawe mu bwiza 
bwiwe.

5.Ewe ncuti yanje, ntumwitege 
nabi; wibaz’uti nanje, ndizeye ko 
nzomwibonera.

umuco_33.songBody:
1.Kuna mji huko juu mbinguni, 
umeandaliwa waamini waliozaliwa kati 
Ufalme, tutaimba, haleluya.

Tutaimba “Haleluya, amina!” Tutaimba 
“Haleluya,amen!” Kwa imani tutaingia 
kule tutaimba haleluya!

2.Apa duniani kunajaa mateso, kule 
ni furaha tele, tutafulahi tukifika kule, 
tutaimba haleluya!

3.Mateso ya hapa duniani ni ya siku 
kidogo sana, mwisho wa hayo ni furaha 
tele, tutaimba haleluya!

4.Majaribu yanatuhimiza katika, safari hii 
ndugu tukivumilia tutashinda, tutaimba 
haleluya!

5.Ewe, ndugu yangu uinuwe macho, 
utazame muji ule, mji tulioandaliwa, 
tutaimba haleluya!

umuco_34.songBody:
1.Tumusifu Mungu, haleluya! Alitupa
 Mwana, haleluya! Alikuja kwa hali ya 
mwili kuokowa sisi, haleluya!

./.Haleluya, amen, haleluya./.

2.Yesu alisema mimi ndie, ufufuko na 
uzima, kila mutu anaye niamini, hata akifa 
ana uzima.

3.Yesu ndie Alfa na Omega, yeye ni wa 
kwanza na wa mwisho, aliye kua’ko na 
aliye’ko, ni mwenye upendo na neema.

4.Yesu alikufa akafufuka, sasa yuko hai 
hata milele, Yeye ana funguo za mauti na 
za kuzimu ni mshindaji.

5.Yesu atarudi na utukufu, kuchukuwa 
wateule wake, wale waliojitarisha 
walikesha wakimungojea.

umuco_35.songBody:
1.Bene Data nitwumvire impanuro 
Imana iduha, tugir’ukwizera mu mitima 
yacu, nk’ukw’abana b’Imana ba mbere.

Bar’ingenzi n’akavantara kw’isi 
bizer’Imana, iy’isi ntiyar’ibabereye, abo 
bose bapfuye bacizeye.

2.Bose bapfuye bacizey’Imana, 
batarabon’ivyasezeranywe; ariko 
barabibona biri kure, bakabisasirira.

3.Bifuz’igihugu kirushirije, iy’isi kuba 
iciza; ni co gituma batamaramazwa, no 
gushingir’Imana intahe.

4.Bose bamerewe nabi aha kw’isi, 
kukw’iy’isi atar’iy’iwabo; bashirwa mu 
ngoyi no mu mabohero abandi bicishwa 
amabuye.

5.None mwene Data wakiwe n’umuco, 
ako n’akarorero keza; twifuze kumera 
nk’abo bizera, duhahamire ico gihugu.

umuco_36.songBody:
1.Yemwe ngabo z’Uhoraho ni 
mureme mu mitima; mumenye yuko 
atakizodukura mu rukundo rw’Umukiza.

Naho yob’aramarushwa, canke naho 
yob’urupfu; ntakizodutandukanya 
n’urukundo, rw’Umucunguzi wacu Yesu.

2.Naho twohamwa tukabona ivyago, 
tukankwa n’abantu bose; nta na kimwe 
co dukura, mu rukundo rw’Umukiza.

3.Nah’isi yose yoharuguruka, 
kurwany’ihanga ry’Imana; nta na kimwe 
yorigira kuko Yesu yaneshej’isi.

4.Yesu yaravuz’ijambo riremesha, ati: mu 
ntama zanje zose; nta mwans’ashobora 
kuziyovya, kuko ziz’umwungere wazo.

5.Shengero twihangane mu mitima, 
turindir’isezerano; tumenye yuko ingabo 
za satani zose tuzozirya butsima.

umuco_37.songBody:
1.Mwami Mana nzima Mana 
y’ubushobozi Mwami ndagusavye 
ngumfashe; ni wewe rukundo, ni wewe 
mahoro yanje ni wewe vyizigiro vyanje.

Ni wewe nizeye, ni wewe nizeye, kandi 
ni wewe nizigiye; Mwami nuz’umfashe, 
jewe nuz’umfashe, mbone kumutsinda 
satani.

2.Ni wewe Uwera wew’Uri hejuru, 
y’ibintu vyose vyitw’imana; ni wewe 
waremy’ibiri mw’isi vyose ni wewe 
vyizigiro vyanje.

3.Raba mur’urugendo ndimwo Mukiza 
nta nakimwe nokwishoboza: jewe 
nd’umunyantege nke cane rwose, 
Mwami ndagusavye ng’umfashe.

4.Ni wewe wankuye mu rwobo 
rw’urupfu, unyerek’inzira y’umuco: none 
rab’abansi banje bankikuje hose, Mwami 
ndagusavy’ untabare.

5.Rab’abana bawe aho turi mur’iy’isi, 
duhura n’ingorane nyinshi: 
ntawundi twizigiye ko yodufasha atari wew’Imana 
nzima.

umuco_38.songBody:
1.Mwami Yesu je ndagusavye 
uhumur’amaso abana bawe, 
tubon’ibitangaza vyawe ukora vyo 
mur’iki gihe cacu.

Turusheho kukubona Mwami mu 
mitima yacu, turusheho kukubona 
Mwami ibihe vyose.

2.Kangura abana bawe mur’iy’imisi 
ntiturabe kubir’inyuma, ariko turabe 
kubir’imbere birimwo ubugingo 
n’amahoro.

3.Urusheho kuduhumura amaso tubone 
amasezerano yawe, ab’ari yo atubera 
umuco udushikana mw’ijuru.

4.N’uturongore mur’iy’inzira duhonyore 
mu kirenge cawe, niho tutazota ya nzira 
nziza itujana mu bugingo.

umuco_39.songBody:
1.Mwami wacu turagusaba twebwe 
abana bawe ngo utwumvirize; ico 
tugusaba n’udufashe Mwami hagarikira 
igikorwa cawe.

Mwami Yesu n’utwumvirize turagusavye 
ngo udufashe Mwami hagarikira 
igikorwa cawe.

2.Raba abana bawe aho turi mw’isi 
y’umwijima n’udufashe; n’udukangure 
twame maso Mwami hagarikira igikorwa cawe.

3.Rab’isi yose yahagurutse 
kurwany’igikorwa cawe Mwami; none 
n’udufashe twikangure Mwami hagarikira 
igikorwa cawe.


4.Raba abansi b’umusaraba badukikije 
ngo baturwanye none tugusaba 
ng’udufashe Mwami hagarikir’igikorwa 
cawe.

5.Turagusaba ng’udufashe kuko 
twebw’abantu ntaco dufise; ico tugusaba 
duhe kwitanga Mwami hagarikira 
igikorwa cawe.

umuco_4.songBody:
1.Wengi waingia, mulango mpana yule: 
wachache waingia yule mwembamba.

Bwana Yesu We (x2) Nisaidie, nisaidie Ili 
nione, mji ule Ulipambwa kwa wale, 
waliyoamini 
-Amina ulipambwa kwa wale, waliyo 
amini 
-Haleluya, ulipambwa kwa wale, 
walioamini.

2.Njia hiyo ni nyembamba, inafika 
kule Sayuni (yuni), mpana inafika kure 
Motoni.

3.Njooni tuingie, mule munyembamba 
ndugu, Ndugu ili tuvikwe taji la uzima.

umuco_40.songBody:
1.Dushime cane izina ryawe, wewe 
Mukiza wacu wewe bugingo bwacu; 
turagushengereye ng’udufashe,

Eh’imitima ikwifuza ng’uyifashe, none 
yifashe; ngwino, ngwino, ngwino Yesu 
dufashe, ngwino ngo.

2.Namwe bana b’amasezerano, 
turirimbire Yesu turirimbe n’ishimwe; 
duh’icubahiro Uhoraho duti:

3.Namwe mwes’abakiwe nuy’umuco, 
tukaronka ubwo buntu, enda 
tumwunamire; ni we Mukiza wacu 
aganza vyose,

4.Dushim’Uhorah’imisi yose, twikine 
amatavu kubw’umuco twakiwe; umuco 
wo ku kagoroba waratse,

5.Umunsi tuzoshik’iy’iwacu mw’ijuru, 
aho Yesu ari tuzomushimagiza; 
duh’icubahiro Uhoraho duti:

Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya nushimwe 
Yesu; Shimwa, Shimwa, Shimwa Yesu 
n’ushimwe ibihe vyose.

umuco_41.songBody:
1.Eh’umuco uraje, uraje umuco waka 
w’Umwami uraje, uraje

Eh’ijoro rirakuze bugira buce, eh’umunsi 
mwiza uraje.

2.Eh’umuco utamanzuye uraje umuco 
wagatangaza uraje,uraje.

3.Eh’ijoro rirakuze, uraje umunsi mwiza 
w’umuco uraje, uraje.

4.Abizera bazobona uwo munsi uyo 
munsi wuzuy’ubwiza uraje, uraje.

5.Nutihana ntuzobona uyo munsi 
umunsi wo kuza kw’Umwami uraje, 
Haleluya!

umuco_42.songBody:
1.Mwami Yesu, Mwami Yesu Mwami 
turagusaba abana bawe ngo utwumvire 
iyo tukwambaza.

Mwami Yesu, twugururire Mwami 
amaraso yawe aduhe Mwami twinjire 
mu bwiza bwawe.

2.Mwami Yesu, Mwami Yesu, Mwami 
Turakwinginga, iyo Mwami tugusaba 
twumv’ubwiza bwawe.

3.Mwami Yesu, Mwami Yesu Mwami 
utwugururire, twumv’ubwiza bwawe 
mu mitima yacu.

4.Mwami Yesu, Mwami Yesu Mwami 
turanezerwa, iyo tuje mu nyonga hawe 
kuko wama udufasha.

5.Duhe Mwami, n’uduhe Mwami, 
Mwami kuba ahera hawe tugendere mu 
bwiza bwawe imyaka n’imyaka.

umuco_43.songBody:
1.Ibimenyetso vyo kugaruka, kwa 
Yesu Umwami biraboneka ivyo yavuze, 
vyarashitse vyose ./.None rero bagenzi 
twitegure./.
 
2.Satani akora mu buryo bwinshi, yama 
arondera abana b’Imana, asigaranye 
akanya gato ./.None rero bagenzi 
twitegure./.

3.Yesu yavuze ivy’iki gihe, abantu benshi 
urukundo rwabo, ruzotimba benshi cane
./.None rero bagenzi twitegure./.

4.Mu ngeso zacu, no mu bwenge bwacu 
niho turwanira n’umwansi satani, muze 
twiyegereze Imana nzima ./.None rero 
bagenzi twitegure./.

5.Yesu ari hafi kugaruka, kuduh’impera 
y’ivyo twakoze, yamana natwe iteka 
ryose ./.None rero bagenzi twitegure./.

umuco_44.songBody:
1.Mwokozi ameshinda kifo duniani, 
mauti ilimezwa kwa ushindi wake, 
na sisi twafulahi tumekombolewa
./.Tumutukuze Yesu mwana wa Mungu./.

Sisi tufuate Bwana kweli ni mwana wa 
Mungu sote tufuate Yesu ./.Tumutukuze 
Yesu mwana wa Mungu./.

2.Tetemeko imefika kwa dunia yote, 
waamini wanaimba kwa fulaha kubwa, 
sababu Mkombozi ameshinda kifo 
./.Tumusifu mwokozi wa milele./.

3.Bwana Mungu ameshinda uwezo 
wa giza na sisi tutashinda kwa neema 
yake, tutaona Bwana Yesu uko mbinguni
./.Tutaingia kule mbinguni./.

4. Tungojee Bwana Yesu kwa uvumilivu 
wengine wamelala wamepumzika 
wanangoja siku ile parapanda italia 
./.Tutamuona Mwokozi wetu./.

umuco_45.songBody:
1.Reka ndirimb’urukundo rw’Imana 
kukw’ari rwo nzoneshesha, ukwizera 
n’ukwemera bishize nzoneshesha 
urukundo.

Mbese Yesu yoz’ubu yotujana tukibera 
m’urukundo, mbese Yesu yoz’ubu 
yotujana tukibanira iteka.

2.Yesu ni Alfa na Omega itanguriro 
n’iherezo, az’ivyo yatanguriye gukora 
az’ibizoheruka.

umuco_46.songBody:
1.Bwana nichunguze, Bwana nitazame 
kwa matendo yangu nitembeye nuruni

Bwana ni wewe njia yangu ya wokovu 
Bwana ndiye njia kuu.

2.Mimi ni tayali, kulishuhudia jina la 
Mwokozi kwani ndiye njia kuu.

umuco_47.songBody:
1.Iyo mw’ijuru iwacu hariy’ivyiza vyinshi 
bizotunezereza, ntaho bizoshira.

Tuzoshika iy’iwacu dushim’Uhoraho 
tuti; Haleluya, haleluya iminsi yose.

2.Iyo mw’ijuru iwacu hariy’amazu 
menshi, Yesu yaduteguriye niyo 
tuzobamwo.

3.Iyo mw’ijuru iwacu hariy’itunga ryacu, 
ahatagerwa n’inyenzi canke ibisuma.

4.Iyo kwa Data Imana tuzonezerwa cane, 
umunezero mwinshi utigeze kubaho.

5.Yemwe mwa busho buto mwitwararike 
cane ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana 
duhung’ivy’isi.

umuco_48.songBody:
1.Umwami wacu Yesu agira agaruke 
kujana abamwizeye, kubw’ibimenyetso 
vyinshi vyarangiye vyerekana aho azozira.

Unamurira amaso yawe mw’ijuru, 
Umwami Yesu agira ashike, mbega 
uzoba umunezer’ungana gute 
twiboney’uwo Mukiza.

2.Bene Data dufatanije urugendo 
dukovye ntiturambirwe, twame 
duhanz’amaso iyo mw’ijuru turindire 
Umwami wacu.

umuco_49.songBody:
1.Bwana wangu unisikiye, nimesahau 
kutii Bwana, nimelemewa na Shetani, 
fika ewe Bwana wangu.

Yesu, Yesu, ninalia usi…usinipite mimi 
nime… nimeisha teseka Bwana kwa 
sababu ya dhambi

2.Mara nyingi ninahubiliwa, lakini 
ninakua mzaifu ninajua ni wewe Yesu, 
utaniokoa kwenye shida.

umuco_5.songBody:
1.Mbinguni juu malaika, waimba nyimbo 
nzuri sana, kwa kumusifu, Mungu wetu 
aliye muumba wa vyote.


Haleluya, waimba, waimba waimba(x2, 
Haleluya, waimba, Haleluya!

Wamalaika waimba, waimba,
waimba(x2), Haleluya waimba Haleluya!

Watakatifu waimba, waimba, waimba(x2), 
Haleluya waimba Haleluya, 

Waminifu waimba, waimba, waimba, waimba(x2), 
Haleluya waimba, Haleluya

Washujaa waimba,waimba, waimba(x2), 
Haleluya,waimba, Haleluya!

2. Natamani sana sana, Mji ule wa amani, 
mji ule wa utukufu utukufu wa milele.

3. Siku ile ya ajabu, Tutaimba Haleluya 
kukaa na bwana Yesu, Tutaimba 
Haleluya!

umuco_50.songBody:
1.Eh’ivyza vyo mw’ijuru, ncuti 
vyitegereze; bizoronka abahizi 
bashikamye vy’ukuri.

2.Eh’ubwiza bwa siyoni, ncuti 
bwitegereze; buzokwinjiramwo bande: 
abizeye vy’ukuri

3.Eh’ubwiza bw’iy’iwacu, busayangana 
cane; mu murwa wa Dat’Imana, numva 
ndahakumbuye.

4.Reka mbandany’urugendo, nihangane 
vy’ukuri; ico nzi nuko nzoshika, kandi 
nzonezerwa pe.

umuco_51.songBody:
1.Palikua mtu moja kipofu, aliketi kando 
ya njia, aliposikia Yesu akipita akapaza 
sauti yake

Yesu Mwana wa Dawidi unilehemu 
mimi, ninataka macho nione Yesu, 
walimkemea watu ili anyamanze lakini 
alizidi kuipaza sauti yake.

2.Yesu alisema akiamuru kumleta yule 
kipofu, Yesu alimuuliza unataka nini 
ninataka macho nione.

3.Yesu alimwambia upate kuona, na 
imani imekuponya kipofu akayenda 
akisifu Mungu asifiwe Mungu Amen!

umuco_52.songBody:
1.Mpwemu yera nyuzura 
undemesh’umutima, name 
mpimbaz’Imana nkiriho: 
Kuk’uzob’umufasha wo kunyobora hose, 
Name ndongorwa nawe Mukiza.

Nyuzura.... we Mpwemu, Mbashe 
kunesh’imyampi y’umubi, Nzomunesha 
mpagaze kuri wa muco wawe, umwe 
wokutwemeza ikibi.

2.Ndakwihereje rwose n’ivyo 
nzokora vyose, Ungab’unyiganzire 
mb’uwawe, Mpwemu mwiza w’ukuri 
Uzohor’unyigisha, kwizer’amasezerano 
yawe.

umuco_53.songBody:
1.Har’umubir’umwe na Mpwemu 
umwe, kandi dufis’icizigiro kimwe, 
har’Inzir’imw’ishikana mw’ijuru
./.Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya./.

2.Har’Umwami umwe n’ukwizera 
kumwe, kandi hari n’umubatizo 
umwe, Yesu Kristo yasiz’abwiy’abiwe, 
./.Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya./.

3.Hari Dat’umw’Imana isumba vyose,
 kand’Aganza bose, isi 
n’ijuru biri mu biganza vyiwe ./.Haleluya, 
Haleluya, Haleluya./.

4.Yesu kristo yaraduze mw’ijuru, 
afis’intsinzi ajanyey’iminyago, agabira 
abana biwe ingabire./.Haleluya, Haleluya
Haleluya./.

5.Yahaye bamwe kuba intumwa, abandi 
kub’abavugihwa nawe; abandi kuvuga 
ubutumwa bwiza ./. Haleluya, Haleluya,
Haleluya./.

6.Abandi nabo kub’aburungere, abandi 
na bo kub’abigisha; kugir’abera bashike 
ku kwezwa ./.Haleluya, Haleluya,
Haleluya./.

7. Vyose tubikorere mu rukundo, 
twuzuy’ukwicisha bugufi twese; 
twuzuy’ubumwe n’amahoro y’Umwami 
./.Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya./.

umuco_54.songBody:
1.Bwana Yesu ulisema muombeni bila 
kuchoka na kuomba unijaze roho wako 
nipate kuomba

Nakuomba unijaze, uwezo ewe Bwana 
nipate kuomba kila siku bila kuchoka

2.Bwana wangu ulinipa mfano 
nilipasavyo kuomba, ulikua ukikesha 
mulimani mwa mizeituni.

3.Nakuomba nikisii mimi Bwana nisaidie 
unipe kukuona, nina kiu na wewe Bwana

4.Ee Bwana sasa nami nipandishe 
mulimani huko, ili nami nikeshe, ningojee 
kurudi kwako.

umuco_55.songBody:
1.Jewe ndahagaze mw’izina ry’Uhoraho; 
ndaririmba cane urukundo yankunze.

Ntazir’izina ry’Uhoraho ndaririmba 
cane; ntazir’urukundo yankunze 
akanyigura.

2.Jewe ndaririmba mpimbaz’Umwami 
wanje; ndamushima cane, sinzoreka 
kumuhaya.

3.Ndirimb’Umwami wanje n’ijwi rirenga 
cane; nta na kimwe co mw’isi combuza 
kumushima.

4.Narabonye umuco ukayangana cane; 
muri wo nta kindi nabonye atr’ubuntu 
gusa.

5.Mbega nomushima nte ku buntu 
yangiriye; nta rindi shimwe mfise, 
akir’ubugingo bwanje.

umuco_56.songBody:
1.Bwana Yesu mimi naomba, sikiliza 
ombi langu ombi ninalo liomba Bwana 
tumika kazi yako.

E’Bwana sikiya, e’Bwana tujibu Ewe 
Bwana, Bwana tujibu Bwana tumika 
kazi yako

2.Bwana Yesu wewe ulisema ombeni 
mutapewa, tafuteni mutaona Bwana 
tumika kazi yako

3.Sisi wana twajiombea tukiomba wewe 
Baba, ewe Bwana Bwana tujibu Bwana 
tumika kazi yako.

umuco_57.songBody:
1. ./.Unilinde unilinde katika maisha 
yangu, Bwana Yesu unilinde./. Palikua na 
mtu moja jina lake aliitwa Lazaro masikini 
kabisa mu dunia na vidonda vingi mno.

Alikula kua makombo, yeny'
ameanguka mezani, aliomba kwa tabu 
na huzuni nyingi niokowe tabu zangu.

2.Maskini aliishi kwa tajili na tajili alila 
hakumtaja alikula chembe chembe la 
tajili na makombo ya tajili

3.Wote wawili walikufa walikufa wote na Lazaro 
akaenda mbinguni na tajili akaenda 
motoni pa mateso mengi sana.

umuco_58.songBody:
1.Umwami Imana yabwiye abana biwe 
ati: ndi Uwera Imana Isumba vyose jewe 
namyeho kandi nzokwamaho ntayindi 
Mana ir’imbere yanje.

 Rab’umugeni yiteguye, yamaze 
kwambar’impuzu y’ubukwe; yamaze 
kwambar’impuzu yera nivyo bikorwa 
vy'abera

2.Umwami Imana yabwiye abana 
biwe ati: nd’Uwera Imana y’abazima; 
nimub’abera nkuko nanje nd’Uwera, 
mubone kuragw’igihugu canyu.

3.Mwam’Uhoraho jewe ndagusavye, 
n'uzunshikane mur’uko kwera kwawe; 
impuzu yanje uyezesh’amaraso mbone 
kwinjira mu murwa wawe wera.

umuco_59.songBody:
1.Nanyi mtakua watu, wa kuchukiwa 
na mataifa; kwa ajili ya jina langu, ndipo 
wengi watajikwaa ./.Nawata-salitiana na 
kuchu-kiana.

Tetemeko na vita, mahali, mahali, 
na watawaudhi nyinyi e’ musiogope
tetemeko na vita mahali yatatokea 
mwanzo watawasaliti mpate dhiki wao 
watawauwa, e’ msiogope.

umuco_6.songBody:
1.Bene data ni mwihweze, 
ukwishushanya kwamyeho, kuva mbere 
kugeza nanone

Mwirinde bene data b’ibinyoma, 
biyoberanya muri mwe imisi yose,
./. Bama bota imigisha, muhezagiwe 
nawe nuko./.

2.Ni mwibuke umwe Balamu, 
yishushanije ku bisilayeli, ngo 
basambane n’abanya Mowabu.

3.Kandi mwibuke umwe Kayini, 
yishushanije kuri Abeli, kuber’imbuto 
mbi yari muri we.

4.None twibaze iki gihe cacu hariho 
abitwa bene Data, Biyorobeka muri twe 
vy’ukuri.

5.Urashobora kuvuga, ko wasohotse mu 
madini, ariko ncuti wumv’ufis’Ijambo.

umuco_60.songBody:
1.N’igitangaza (x3) (kubon’Umwami) 
kubon’Umwami Yesu.

2. “Haleluya” Naramwiboneye(x3) 
(Umukiza wanje) Umukiza wanje Yesu

3.Nca ndamumenya (x3) (Umwami 
Yesu) naramwiboneye ubwanje.

4.Yampay’ubugingo(x3) (Umwami 
wanje) naramwiboneye ubwanje

5.Nabonye umuco (x3) (Umwami Yesu) 
naramwiboneye ubwanje.

6.Ndamuririmba (x3) (Umwami wanje Yesu).
Umukiza wanje Yesu.

umuco_61.songBody:
1.Narahishuriwe ijambo rizima, iryo 
jambo n’iryo gufatanya gufatanya 
biradufasha.

Iyo dufatanije, mw’Izina ry’Umukiza; 
inkingi y’umuriro iba muri twe, 
twiyubare dufatanije.

2.Imana yabwiye Mose iti ni wiyeze,
 kukw’ah’uri ar'ahera cane, none natwe 
twiyubare.

3.Iyo dufatanije mw’Izina ry’Uhoraho, 
aho turi haba ar'ahera cane, none rero 
twiyubare.

4.Gufatanya biduha kubona ca gihugu; 
n’ivyiza vyinshi bitur’imbere, gufatanya 
biradufasha.

5.None twame twiyeza, aho turi hose, 
niyo twinjiye mu ngoro y’Umwami, 
twame twiyez’ibihe vyose.

umuco_62.songBody:
1.Na kama mwili unavyo viungo vyingi, 
sana mno ./.vyote ni vya mwili, ule ule 
ndivyo Kristo alivyo./.

2.Na kama mwili unavyo viungo vyingi, 
sana mno ./.Na kila kiungo, kina kazi 
kinachofanya mle./.

3.Na kila kiungo, kinafanya kazi, 
kilichopewa./. na kila kimoja, kinajalibu 
kukuza chenziye./.

4.Na kama Bwana wetu alitutia ndani, 
ya mwili wake ./.Na kila umoja ana kazi 
ndani ya mwili wake./.

5.Kwa roho wa Mungu tuliopewa 
twafanya mwili wa Yesu ./.Na kila umoja 
ana kazi ndani ya mwili wake./.

6.Ivyo viungo ni vingi sana ndani ya 
mwili wa Yesu ./.Lakini mwili, ni umoja 
ni mwili wa Yesu./.

umuco_63.songBody:
1.Umumarayika yarasemereye n’ijwi 
ry’urukundo ati twikangure(x2)

Ehe burakeye, twikangure vuba, twitege 
umukwe ; umunsi w’umuco, witezwe 
mw’ivyiza ./.none twikangure./.

2.Intambwe yo muryango wa Yuda 
yarazinguruye ibimatanijwe.

3.Inzamba y’Umumarayika w’indwi ; 
yamaze kuvuga iserura vyose.

4.Amabanga atari bwavugwe yose 
yaravuzwe none twikangure.

5.Ivyo ducamwo n’ivyo twumva vyose 
n’ibiduteguza umunsi w’isabato.

umuco_64.songBody:
1.Ntaco nigeze menya narajuragurika; 
nari nk’impumyi itabona ntazi iyo nja 
n’iyo mva.

Naramurondeye Umwami wanje nawe 
yaranyiyeretse ku musaraba.

2.Ngize ngo ndamumenya uwancunguye 
impwemu mbi inzibir’amaso, mbon’idini.

4.Ngize ngo ndab’imbere nsubij’inyuma; 
nsanga hose ni imisozi nzitijwe n’umwiza.

4.Ngize ntya ndazamurwa 
ndavy’unzamuye; nsaga n’Umwami 
w’ubuntu niwe yancunguye.

5.Non’ubu naramenye uwancuye; 
nahinduts’umwana wiwe niwe Mwami 
wanje.

6.Muri we har’itunga ry’uburyo bwose; 
ryateguriw’abaragwa ni bo bahizi.

umuco_65.songBody:
1.Mara nyingi mimi ninaona watu 
wanachoka, mara nyingi mimi ninaona 
njia ni ngumu sana.

Ni juu ya nini watu wanachoka ni kwa 
sababu hawana bidii, hawana bidii ya
 kuomba Mungu awaongoze katika njia.

2.Ninaona watu wengi sana wanasema 
kwamba na wao, wanakwenda mjini pa
 mbingu lakini hauwafuate njia.

3.Ninaona watu wengi sana wanapita
pembeni pa njia,naona wengine nao
wanajifanyia njia zao.

4.Pembeni pa njia hio ninaona zingine
njia, ambazo zasema ni za kweli, lakini ni
za kuangamuza

5.Ninaona watu wengi sana wanapita 
katika njia zile, naona wengine wachache 
wanaendelea na matumaini.

6.Enyi ndugu tusiwe wa kuchoka bali 
tuwe wenye bidii tufuate nyayo za Bwana 
ndipo tutaokoka.

umuco_66.songBody:
1.Bwana Yesu, ni mchungaji anaechunga 
wana wake.

Anachunga kila umoja, mahali pote 
Bwana Yesu, ni kiongozi anaongoza 
wana wake.

2.Bwana Yesu, ni mchungaji anajua 
waliyo wake.

3.Bwana Yesu, ndiye mwamba yeye 
ndiye kichwa cha kanisa.

4.Bwana Yesu, anatumika katika kanisa 
lake.

5.Bwana Yesu, ni Mwalimu mkuu katika 
kanisa lake.

6.Tumjipe, sote atuongoze ili atumike 
ndani yetu.

umuco_67.songBody:
1.Wizigire Uhoraho n’ubwenge bwawe 
bwose; wizigire Uhoraho n’ubugingo 
bwawe.

Twizigire Uhoraho n’imitima yacu 
twizigire Uhoraho n’inkomezi zacu.

2.Niwahura n’amarushwa izigir’Imana; 
Umubiri ukuremereye izigire Imana.

3.Umwami yaramaze kuvuza 
inzamba; ati vyuka mwikangure 
dutangur’urugamba.

4.Intambwe zivuze izigir’Imana; 
Apolowoni aguteye fata inkota yawe.

5. Goliyati aguteye izigir’Imana; izere 
uwanesheje azogutsindira.

6.Intsinzi twayironkeye k’umusaraba; 
Umwami yarasemereye ati birarangiye. 

7.Abizeye Uhoraho bameze nk’umusozi; 
umusozi wa Siyoni utanyiganyizwa.

umuco_68.songBody:
1.Imana yakoze mu minsi itandatu; 
uw’indwi iraruhuka.Yakoze vyose mu 
minsi itandatu ./.Uw’indwi iraruhuka./.

Isabato n’umunsi w’Imana yera 
yaruhukiyemwo ./.None natwe 
ntitwemerewe gukora kur’uwo munsi 
w’isabato./.

2.Imana yabwiye Ab’Isirayeli bakore 
mu minsi itandatu; uw’indwi nawo 
bawuruhukemwo ./.N’umunsi 
w’Uhoraho Imana./.

3.Imana yabwiye ab’Isirayeli barye 
imitsima itambiwe; mur’iyo minsi yose 
itandatu ./.Barye imitsima itambiwe.

4.Umunsi twareka ibikorwa vyose; 
vy’iy’isi yuzuy’umwijima, niho twinjiye 
mw’isabato yacu ./.Umunsi wera 
w’Uhoraho../.

5.None natwe ntitwemerewe gukora; 
kur’uwo munsi w’isabato kuko tur’abana 
b’Imana Ihoraho ./.Tur’ihanga ry’Imana 
y’Isirayeli./.

6.Turindiriye isabato nkuru isabato 
y’Umwami Imana; ni wo munsi 
w’uburuhukiro bwacu ./.N’umunsi 
w’intsinzi yacu./.

umuco_69.songBody:
1.Imana yarangiriye ubuntu, 
impumuray’amaso yanje mbona kubona; 
imbwir’iti ngo ndakwereke ivy’ab’isi 
./.Batigeze kumenya./.

2.Ngize ntya mbona ca kizira c’ubuyobe, 
cavuzwe na Paulo kir’ahera; mbon’isinzi 
ry’abantu benshi bo kw’isi ./.Baza 
kucunamira./.

3.Ubwambere ico kizira cakoze, mu 
Mpwemu ya Antikristo ata nkomezi; 
kukw’intambwe yo mu muryango wa
 Yuda ./.Yar’ifis’inkomezi./.

4.Ubwa kabiri ico kizira cakoze, mu 
buryo bw’umuvugishwa w’ibinyoma; 
Impwemu ya Antikristo itangura 
./.Guhinyura Kristo./.

5.Ubwa gatatu ico kizira cakoze, mu 
buryo bw’umwijima mwinshi n’ubutunzi; 
ah’ubuvugishwa bw’ivyo bwajimije 
./.Abantu benshi cane./.

6.Mur’ivyo bihe vyose bibi vyabayeho, 
Imana yararungika Mpwemu wayo; 
guhishurir’abana bayo umuco 
./.Wokubamurikira./.

7.Mur’iki gihe cacu kibi Impwemu, ikora 
mur’iki gihe yitwa rupfu; yish’abato 
n’abahambaye ivuga ./.Iti twese 
tur’abera./.

8.Mur’iki gihe c’iherezo Imana, 
yararungits’ubushobozi bw’inkukuma 
ituzamur’iyo hejuru y’ivy’isi ./.Ngo 
tubone vyose./.

umuco_7.songBody:
1.Mwene Data uri ngaha uyu munsi, 
wumva witeguye vy’ukuri. Ewe ncuti 
ambar’impuzu zera, vuba ubukwe burashitse.

R/ Eh’umukwe arashitse, aje gutora wa 
Mugeni afis’itara n’amavuta, niwe 
Mugeni yiteguye;

2. Umugabo n’umugore bab’umwe, 
Nawe ub’umwe n’Umukiza; 
Umugore yubah’umugabo we, nawe 
wumvir’umwami Yesu.

3.Ewe ncuti ushobora kuvuga uti nanje 
nditeguye pe; ntiwihende abatuzuye 
Mpwemu, ntibazokwinjira mu Bukwe.

4.Amajambo yavuzwe yarashitse 
Umuhanuzi yarashitse, yaj’azanye Ijambo 
ry’Ubugingo, Rihuz’abana naba se.

umuco_70.songBody:
1.Ewe ncuti yanje uri ngaha wifuza 
gukorer’Imana isuzume ncuti kukwiriye 
gukorera Imana Yera.

Ebu ndugu yangu uko hapa watamani 
kutumikia Bwana jichunguze kama 
unapendeza kutumikia Bwana Mungu.

E’ Mugenzi niwisuzume k’ukwiriye 
gukorera Imana Yera ihoraho E’ 
Mugenzi niwisuzume. Ebu (ndugu)
 ujichunguze kama unaendelea 
kutumikia Baba mwema Ebu ndugu
 ujichunguze.

2. E’mugenzi wanje wisuzume har’aho 
woba uri impumyi canke woba uri 
n’ubumuga! Mbega wokorer’Imana ute?

Ebu ndugu yangu jichunguze usije kuwa 
kipofu wala kuwa na ulema ndugu 
utatumikiya Mungu je?

3.Imana Yera ico yifuza n’uko 
twoyikorera n’imitima ihumuye cane 
yuzuye ukwicisha bugufi.

Bwana Yesu ambacho anatamani sisi 
tumutumikie na roho zijaazo upole 
zijaazo unyenyekevu.

4.Banza wih’Umwami wawe Yesu nawe 
yeze umutima wawe nawe azonezererwa 
cane gukorera mu bugingo bwawe.

Ujimpe Bwana wako Yesu atakase roho 
yako ndipo Bwana atafulahia kutumikiya 
ndani yako.

umuco_71.songBody:
1.Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, furaha 
inashuka; Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, 
Amani inashuka.

Kuomba kunanipa nguvu, kuomba 
kunanipa ushindi; kuomba kunanipa 
kuona kuomba kunanipa kujua.

2.Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, Viziwizi 
vinatoka; Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, 
Mbingu inafunguka.

3.Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, Upendo 
unashuka; Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, 
Imani inashuka.

4.Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, Umoja 
unashuka; Ninapoomba Bwana Mungu, 
Bidii inashuka.

umuco_72.songBody:
1.Iman’itang' isezerano, ibihe vyose 
arik’abarishikira, bama ari bake.

Irase-zerana; ariko ni bake barishikira.

2.Imana yasezeraniye, Abisirayeli igihugu 
c'i kanani hashitseyo babiri.

3.Umwami yasezeraniye, intumwa ziwe, 
yukw’azogaruka muri bo, vyabonywe n'abizeye.

4.Natwe dufis’isezerano, ry’Umwami 
Yesu, yukw’azogaruka gutwara abiteguye.

5.Iryo sezerano benshi, bararyiteze, ariko 
benshi siko bazoryinjiramwo

6.Ntitumere nk’abiteze, ico batazi; 
ntituze tumaramare kuri wa munsi.

umuco_73.songBody:
1.Tuvuga ko twahumutse 
amaso, s’imigani twarahumutse 
./.Mbeg’ubwo buntu, twagiriwe 
kumeny’ivyari vyanyegejwe./.

2.Imana yarungitse umuco, w’akagoroba 
ng’uduhumure ./.Ngo tumeny’ingene 
Satan’akora kuk’ubu iminsi ari mibi

3.Ubwa mbere yaje yishushanya, 
yiyambik’urusato rw’intama ./.arik’ubwo 
abana b’Imana ntibatevye kumumenya./.

4.Hanyuma yaje yambaye inkota iza yica 
abana b’Imana ./.Arikw’Imana yabahaye 
kurinda no kwihangana./.

5.Hanyum’iza mu buryo bw’idini, 
ihindura ijambo ry’Imana ./.Igurisha iryo 
jambo kandi ngo bose n’abana b’Imana./.

6.Non’ubu nah’iza muri vyose, 
ukwishushanya hamwe n’ukwica 
./.Amadini yo ni menshi cane ngo bose 
n’abana b’Imana./.

7.Amadini yazimije benshi, ariko Imana 
ishimwe kuko./. Intama z’Imana ibihe 
vyose tuza twumv’ijwi ry’umwungere.
